original: Part I
analyzed: part i

original: 01 pratijñāsūtra
analyzed: pratijñāsūtra

original: {1,1} vārttikārambhe śiṣṭācāram anuvidadhāno maṅgalaṃ tāvat karoti -- viśuddheti.
analyzed: vārttika ārambhe śiṣṭa ācāram anuvidadhānaḥ maṅgalam tāvat karoti viśuddha iti

original: dṛṣṭā hi śiṣṭānāṃ pravṛttiḥ sarvakāryeṣu maṅgalācaraṇapūrvikā. maṅgalaṃ ca devatāstutinamaskārādi.
analyzed: dṛṣṭā hi śiṣṭānām pravṛttiḥ sarva kāryeṣu maṅgala ācaraṇa pūrvikā maṅgalam ca devatā stuti namaskāra ādi

original: asya ca niyogataḥ phalavatkāryāntarārambhasaṃyogāt sākṣād aphalatvāc ca phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ
analyzed: asya ca niyogataḥ phalavat kārya antara ārambha saṃyogāt sākṣāt aphala tvāt ca phalavat sannidhau aphalam

original: tadaṅgam iti nyāyena kāryāntaraśeṣatve 'vadhṛte satyārambhasya samāptiparyantatvād
analyzed: tat aṅgam iti nyāyena kārya antara śeṣa tve sati ārambhasya samāpti paryanta tvāt

original: apekṣitāvighnaparisamāptiḥ phalam. apekṣitavidher anapekṣitavidhānaṃ durbalam iti
analyzed: apekṣita avighna parisamāptiḥ phalam apekṣita vidheḥ anapekṣita vidhānam durbalam iti

original: nyāyena phalāntarakalpanāyā durbalatvāt. ato yathā sāmpradāyikam adhyāyānadhyāyādi
analyzed: nyāyena phala antara kalpanāyāḥ durbala tvāt atas yathā sāmpradāyikam adhyāya anadhyāya ādi

original: svādhyāyāvighnārtham evam idam api. tad ayam arthaḥ -- viśuddhau jñānadehau yasya
analyzed: svādhyāya avighna artham evam idam api tat ayam arthaḥ viśuddhau jñāna dehau yasya

original: sa tathoktaḥ. viśuddhaṃ ca bhagavato jñānaṃ rāgādibhir jñānakāraṇānām adūṣitatvād,
analyzed: sa tathā uktaḥ viśuddham ca bhagavataḥ jñānam rāga ādibhiḥ jñāna kāraṇānām a dūṣita tvāt

original: dehaś cāyonijatvād vividhagarbhavedanāvirahāc ca. trivedī ca tasya cakṣur iti gauṇo vādaḥ,
analyzed: dehaḥ ca ayonija tvāt vividha garbha vedanā virahāt ca trivedī ca tasya cakṣuḥ iti gauṇaḥ vādaḥ

original: asandigdhāviparītaspaṣṭavedārthaprakāśakatvāt. divyaṃ cātīndriyārthagocaratvāt. bhautikaṃ
analyzed: asandigdha aviparīta spaṣṭa veda artha prakāśaka tvāt divyam ca atīndriya artha gocara tvāt bhautikam

original: hi cakṣuḥ pratyutpannārthaviṣayam. idaṃ tv anāgatādiviṣayaṃ divyam iti. śreyasaś
analyzed: hi cakṣuḥ pratyutpanna artha viṣayam idam tu anāgata ādi viṣayam divyam iti śreyasaḥ

original: ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārātmano bhagavān nimittam. somārdhadhāriṇe,
analyzed: ca hita ahita prāpti parihāra ātmanaḥ bhagavān nimittam soma ardha dhāriṇe

original: somakalādhāriṇe. nama iti. yady api vigrahādipañcakaṃ devatādhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate,
analyzed: soma kalā dhāriṇe namaḥ iti yadi api vigraha ādi pañcakam devatā adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate

original: tathāpyājyādistotravat pradhānakarmaṇa eva devatāstuter evaṅkṛtāyāḥ phalam ity adoṣa iti // 1 //
analyzed: tathā api ājya ādi stotra vat pradhāna karmaṇaḥ eva devatā stuteḥ evaṅkṛtāyāḥ phalam iti adoṣaḥ iti

original: {1,2} vidyāgurūṇām idānīṃ stutinamaskārau karoti -- abhivandyeti. śiṣyadhīpadminīnāṃ
analyzed: vidyā gurūṇām idānīm stuti namaskārau karoti abhivandya iti śiṣya dhī padminīnām

original: ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūnādau vande. tato vārttikaṃ kariṣye. teṣām eva prasādena
analyzed: ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūn ādau vande tatas vārttikam kariṣye teṣām eva prasādena

original: dṛṣṭenārthatattvopadeśenādṛṣṭena ca stutinamaskārabhuvā. gurvanugamanādayo 'pi hy
analyzed: dṛṣṭena artha tattva upadeśena adṛṣṭena ca stuti namaskāra bhuvā guru anugamana ādayaḥ hi

original: ācārapramāṇakā eva. vārttikagrahaṇena ca duruktabhaṅgam anuktavacanaṃ ca samādhatte.
analyzed: ācāra pramāṇakāḥ eva vārttika grahaṇena ca durukta bhaṅgam anukta vacanam ca samādhatte

original: mīmāṃsāśabdena nyāyaśāstram idam ato nyāyānusāreṇādhikaraṇabhaṅgādyadūṣaṇam iti darśayati.
analyzed: mīmāṃsā śabdena nyāya śāstram idam atas nyāya anusāreṇa adhikaraṇa bhaṅga ādya dūṣaṇam iti darśayati

original: ślokapadena ca lāghavavikāsaṃ kṣipāma iti darśayati. tataś ca sūtritaprāyam imam
analyzed: śloka padena ca lāghava vikāsam kṣipāmaḥ iti darśayati tatas ca sūtrita prāyam imam

original: artham avahitā jijñāsavo bhāvayiṣyantīti tātparyārtha iti // 2 //
analyzed: artham avahitāḥ jijñāsavaḥ bhāvayiṣyanti iti tātparyārthaḥ iti

original: samprati lokayātrāmādriyamāṇo ye 'tyantaparārthāḥ svopakāram agaṇayanto 'pi paropakārāya
analyzed: samprati lokayātrām ādriyamāṇaḥ ye tyanta para arthāḥ sva upakāram a gaṇayantaḥ pi para upakārāya

original: yatante santastān pratyāha -- tad vidvāṃsa iti. asūyavo matsarāḥ tato 'nye 'nasūyava iti // 3 //
analyzed: yatante santaḥ tān pratyāha tat vidvāṃsaḥ iti asūyavaḥ matsarāḥ tatas nye nasūyavaḥ iti  /

original: ye tu madhyasthā guṇadoṣanirūpaṇena doṣavantam apahāya guṇavantam upādadate,
analyzed: ye tu madhyasthāḥ guṇa doṣa nirūpaṇena doṣavantam apahāya guṇavantam upādadate

original: tān prati parīkṣāviśeṣārtham arthayate -- na cātreti. (madīye prabandhe 'smin guṇadoṣa)
analyzed: tān prati parīkṣā viśeṣa artham arthayate na ca atrā iti madīye prabandhe smin guṇa doṣa

original: vati yugapad guṇadoṣau nirūpayantu bhavantaḥ. anyathā guṇānupekṣya doṣeṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu doṣanirbhāvanaikamanasām asanto doṣāḥ prakāśeran iti
analyzed: yugapad guṇa doṣau nirūpayantu bhavantaḥ anyathā guṇān upekṣya doṣeṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu doṣa nirbhāvana ekamanasām asantaḥ doṣāḥ prakāśeran iti

original: idānīṃ durjanān prati sadaṇḍam āha -- kuto veti. ye vayaṃ parasthān api doṣān na mṛṣyāmaḥ,
analyzed: idānīm durjanān prati sa daṇḍam āha kutas vā iti ye vayam para sthān api doṣān na mṛṣyāmaḥ

original: te kathaṃ svagrantheṣu doṣānupādadīmahi. na cāsmābhir anupāttān doṣān sūrayo grahītum arhantīti // 5 //
analyzed: te katham sva grantheṣu doṣān upādadīmahi na ca asmābhiḥ an upāttān doṣān sūrayaḥ grahītum arhanti iti

original: {1,3} samprati matsarā nūnaṃ dūṣayiṣyanti mannibandhanam. atas taddoṣodbhāvanena
analyzed: samprati matsarāḥ nūnam dūṣayiṣyanti mad nibandhanam atas tad doṣa udbhāvanena

original: śuśrūṣūṇām utsāhabhaṅgo mā bhūd ity evam artham āha -- nirdoṣatveti. prasiddhātiśayāv
analyzed: śuśrūṣūṇām utsāha bhaṅgaḥ mā bhūt iti evam artham āha nirdoṣa tva iti prasiddha atiśayau

original: api mokṣasvargau prati nāstikā vivadante. vadanti ca -- sukhaduḥkhe laukike svarganarakau
analyzed: api mokṣa svargau prati nāstikāḥ vivadante vadanti ca sukha duḥkhe laukike svarga narakau

original: iti. mokṣe ca sadbhāvataḥ prabhṛti vivādaḥ. eke hi nāsti mokṣa iti vadanti. anye
analyzed: iti mokṣe ca sadbhāvataḥ prabhṛti vivādaḥ eke hi na asti mokṣaḥ iti vadanti anye

original: punaḥ sakalaviṣayoparāgarahitaṃ saṃvedanapravāham apavargam āhuḥ. anye taduparamam.
analyzed: punar sakala viṣaya uparāga rahitam saṃvedana pravāham apavargam āhuḥ anye tad uparamam

original: apare sakalavaiśeṣikātmaguṇocchedalakṣaṇaṃ niratiśayam aviṣayapariṣvaṅgajam anavasānam
analyzed: apare sakala vaiśeṣika ātma guṇa uccheda lakṣaṇam niratiśayam aviṣaya pariṣvaṅga jam anavasānam

original: ānandasandoham. apare ca pūrve ca bhrāntisamutthair nānāvikalpaiḥ pāramārthikamokṣasvarūpam
analyzed: ānanda sandoham apare ca pūrve ca bhrānti samutthaiḥ nānā vikalpaiḥ pāramārthika mokṣa svarūpam

original: apalapanty eveti // 6 //
analyzed: apalapanti eva iti

original: api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavo mannibandhane doṣānupalabhante,
analyzed: api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavaḥ mad nibandhane doṣān upalabhante

original: tathāpy aham anapavādyaḥ. na hy ahaṃ svatantraḥ kiñcidabhidadhe. āgamānusāriṇas tu
analyzed: tathā api aham anapavādyaḥ na hi aham svatantraḥ kiñcid abhidadhe āgama anusāriṇaḥ tu

original: me yathāgamaṃ vartamānasya skhalitam api daivād avarjanīyatayāpannam ity upekṣaṇīyam
analyzed: me yathāgamam vartamānasya skhalitam api daivāt avarjanīya tayā āpannam iti upekṣaṇīyam

original: eva. na hi kim apy abhimataṃ vastu nirdoṣaṃ bhavati. doṣāṃs tu samādhāya guṇā upajīvitavyā
analyzed: eva na hi kim api abhimatam vastu nirdoṣam bhavati doṣān tu samādhāya guṇāḥ upajīvitavyā

original: ity āha -- āgameti. satāṃ hi mārgo 'yam āgamānusāro nāma. tad iha bahulaṃ guṇā eva.
analyzed: iti āha āgama iti satām hi mārgaḥ yam āgama anusāraḥ nāma tat iha bahulam guṇāḥ eva

original: doṣās tu kathañcit santo 'py alpatvād asatkalpā ity upekṣitavyā iti // 7 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ tu kathañcid santaḥ api alpatvāt asat kalpāḥ iti upekṣitavyāḥ iti

original: kiñcāstu tāvad asmādṛśānāṃ kavipravīrāṇām āgamānusāriṇyo vācaḥ śobhanta iti. anyasyāpi
analyzed: kiñca astu tāvat asmādṛśānām kavi pravīrāṇām āgama anusāriṇyaḥ vācaḥ śobhante iti anyasya api

original: śraddadhānasya trayīmārgānusāriṇī yathākathañcidārabdhā kliṣṭā alpasārāpi vāgvṛttiḥ
analyzed: śraddadhānasya trayī mārga anusāriṇī yathā kathañcid ārabdhā kliṣṭā alpa sārā api vāc vṛttiḥ

original: śobhate. asmākaṃ tu bahusārā akleśanirmitā śobhatetarām ity āha -- yatheti // 8 //
analyzed: śobhate asmākam tu bahu sārā akleśa nirmitā śobhatetarām iti āha yathā iti

original: {1,4} nanu kimaṅgabhūtāyāṃ mīmāṃsāyāṃ vārttikaṃ praṇīyate,
analyzed: nanu kim aṅga bhūtāyām mīmāṃsāyām vārttikam praṇīyate

original: vedā eva sākṣād vyākhyāyantām ata āha -- mīmāṃseti. vedā eva saṃśayapūrvottarapakṣakrameṇa vyākhyāyamānā mano harantitarāṃ,
analyzed: vedāḥ eva sākṣāt vyākhyāyantām atas āha mīmāṃsā iti vedāḥ eva saṃśaya pūrva uttara pakṣa krameṇa vyākhyāyamānāḥ manaḥ harantitarām

original: na tu mantrabrāhmaṇabhāṣyaprasthānena. mīmāṃsayaiva tu te tathāvyākhyāyanta iti tatraiva vārttikaṃ kartuṃ me tṛṣṇā vardhata iti // 9 //
analyzed: na tu mantra brāhmaṇa bhāṣya prasthānena mīmāṃsayā eva tu te tathā vyākhyāyante iti tatra eva vārttikam kartum me tṛṣṇā vardhate iti

original: nanu mīmāṃsāyām api cirantananibandhanāni santīti kiṃ mudhā prayasyate. ata āha --
analyzed: nanu mīmāṃsāyām api cirantana nibandhanāni santi iti kim mudhā prayasyate atas āha

original: prāyeṇeti. lokāyataṃ nāma nāstikānāṃ tantram. tadbhāvamāpāditā nānāpasiddhāntasaṅgraheṇa.
analyzed: prāyeṇa iti lokāyatam nāma nāstikānām tantram tad bhāvam āpāditā nānā apasiddhānta saṅgraheṇa

original: tāmāstikapathe kartum ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛta iti. āśaṃsāyāṃ vartamāne 'rthe vā kto varṇanīya iti // 10 //
analyzed: tām āstika pathe kartum ayam yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti āśaṃsāyām vartamāne rthe vā ktaḥ varṇanīyaḥ iti  /

original: ity upoddhātaḥ
analyzed: iti upoddhātaḥ

original: sūtratātparyam idāṇīṃ darśayati -- atheti. idaṃ hi sūtraṃ dharmākhyam asya śāstrasya
analyzed: sūtra tātparyam idāṇīm darśayati atha iti idam hi sūtram dharma ākhyam asya śāstrasya

original: pratipādyatayā viṣayabhūtaṃ prayojanaṃ vaktuṃ kṛtam. ādyam iti prayojanābhidhānasthānam
analyzed: pratipādya tayā viṣaya bhūtam prayojanam vaktum kṛtam ādyam iti prayojana abhidhāna sthānam

original: iti darśayati. yady api dharmo 'sya prayojanam iti na kaṇṭhenoktaṃ,
analyzed: iti darśayati yadi api sya prayojanam iti na kaṇṭhena uktam

original: tathāpi jijñāsākarmabhūto dharma ity ācakṣāṇenāpuruṣārthajñānasyāniṣṭatvāt puruṣārthībhūto
analyzed: tathā api jijñāsā karma bhūtaḥ dharmaḥ iti ācakṣāṇena a puruṣa artha jñānasya aniṣṭa tvāt

original: dharmaḥ prayojanam iti sūcitam iti sūtram ity uktam. kṛtapadena ca kṛtrimam idam
analyzed: dharmaḥ prayojanam iti sūcitam iti sūtram iti uktam kṛta padena ca kṛtrimam idam

original: ataḥ pramāṇāntareṇa gurukulavāsāvasānanivṛttiparam api vyākhyāyamānaṃ na doṣam āvahatīti darśayati. nitye{1,
analyzed: atas pramāṇa antareṇa guru kula vāsa avasāna nivṛtti param api vyākhyāyamānam na doṣam āvahati iti darśayati

original: 5} hi yāvadvacanaṃ vācanikam. pauruṣeyaṃ tu pramāṇāntarabalenānyārtham api pratibhāsamānam anyaparatayā pratipādyata iti // 11 //
analyzed: hi yāvadvacanam vācanikam pauruṣeyam tu pramāṇa antara balena anya artham api pratibhāsamānam anya para tayā pratipādyate iti

original: nanu kiṃ prayojanābhidhānena. śāstram eva praṇīyatām. prayojanābhidhānaṃ hi śāstrād
analyzed: nanu kim prayojana abhidhānena śāstram eva praṇīyatām prayojana abhidhānam hi śāstrāt

original: bahirbhūtaṃ śāstraṃ praṇetukāmasya na yuktam. kiñ cāsya prayojanam. prayojanaviśeṣāt
analyzed: bahis bhūtam śāstram praṇetu kāmasya na yuktam kim ca asya prayojanam prayojana viśeṣāt

original: śāstreṣu śuśrūṣupravṛttir iti cet. tan na. na hi prekṣāvatāṃ puṃvacanād evam ayam
analyzed: śāstreṣu śuśrūṣu pravṛttiḥ iti ced tat na na hi prekṣāvatām puṃvacanāt evam ayam

original: artha iti viśvāso yuktaḥ,
analyzed: arthaḥ iti viśvāsaḥ yuktaḥ

original: viśeṣato hetudarśanāt. anyārtham api śāstraṃ dharmaprayojanatayā śrotṝn pravartayitum
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ hetu darśanāt anya artham api śāstram dharma prayojana tayā śrotṝn pravartayitum

original: ayam āheti śaṅkamānā nāśvaseyuḥ. ato mandaphalaṃ prayojanavacanam ata āha -- sarvasyeti.
analyzed: ayam āha iti śaṅkamānāḥ na āśvaseyuḥ atas manda phalam prayojana vacanam atas āha sarvasya iti

original: yad anyadalpāyāsasādhyam api kiñcit śāstraṃ laukikaṃ vaudanapākādi karma,
analyzed: yat anyat alpa āyāsa sādhyam api kiñcid śāstram laukikam vā odana pāka ādi karma

original: tad apy anuktaprayojanaṃ nādriyante. kiṃ punar mīmāṃsām iti yuktaḥ śāstrārambhe prayojananirdeśaḥ. yat tu puṃvacanād anāśvāsa iti,
analyzed: tat api anukta prayojanam na ādriyante kim punar mīmāṃsām iti yuktaḥ śāstra ārambhe prayojana nirdeśaḥ yat tu puṃvacanāt anāśvāsaḥ iti

original: tan na. āptānāptaviśeṣāt. vakṣyati hi -- tac cet pratyayitāt iti bhāṣyakāraḥ. jaiminiś ca api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran (1.3.7)
analyzed: tat na āpta anāpta viśeṣāt vakṣyati hi tat ced pratyayitāt iti bhāṣyakāraḥ jaiminiḥ ca api vā kāraṇa agrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran

original: iti. yat tu vipralipsamāno brūta iti. tan na. na hy asya maharṣer anṛtavacanaṃ sambhavati. na cāsya vipralambhe prayojanaṃ kiñcid upalabhyate.  #
analyzed: iti yat tu vipralipsamānaḥ brūte iti tat na na hi asya mahā ṛṣeḥ anṛta vacanam sambhavati na ca asya vipralambhe prayojanam kiñcid upalabhyate

original: yadi śrotāraḥ pravartantām iti,
analyzed: yadi śrotāraḥ pravartantām iti

original: kim asya tair aphale 'dharmaphale vā dharmacchalena pravartitaiḥ. pratyutādharma
analyzed: kim asya taiḥ aphale dharma phale vā dharma chalena pravartitaiḥ pratyuta adharma

original: evāsya śiṣyān bhrāmayato mahān doṣa āpadyeta. na ca paramadhārmiko 'dharmam ācaratīty
analyzed: eva asya śiṣyān bhrāmayataḥ mahān doṣaḥ āpadyeta na ca parama dhārmikaḥ dharmam ācarati iti

original: utprekṣitum api śakyam. na ca tantrakāras tantraprayojane bhrāmyatīti sambhāvyate.
analyzed: utprekṣitum api śakyam na ca tantra kāraḥ tantra prayojane bhrāmyati iti sambhāvyate

original: ata evāsambhavadbhramavipralambhatvād ṛṣīṇām aṣṭakādismaraṇāni śrutimūlānīti smṛtyadhikaraṇe
analyzed: atas eva asambhavat bhrama vipralambha tvāt ṛṣīṇām aṣṭaka ādi smaraṇāni śruti mūlāni iti smṛti adhikaraṇe

original: vakṣyate. sarvapuruṣavacanāviśvāse[1] punas tad api bhajyeteti[2]yuktaṃ prayojanābhidhānam iti // 12 //
analyzed: vakṣyate punar tat api prayojana abhidhānam iti

original: [1] nānāśvā
analyzed: nānā aśvā

original: [2] sū
analyzed: sū

original: sarvasyaiveti kākvā[3]mīmāṃsāyāṃ viśeṣo yo 'ntarṇītastamabhidyotayati -- mīmāṃsākhyeti. śāstrāntarāṇi hi[4]vācyaikaviṣayanibandhanāni{1,

original: ata āha -- vastutvād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- trividhaṃ khalv aprāmāṇyaṃ jñānābhāvasaṃśayaviparyayaiḥ.

original: tatra saṃśayaviparyayau prati avastutvād iti hetur asiddhaḥ,
analyzed: tatra saṃśaya viparyayau prati avastu tvāt iti hetuḥ asiddhaḥ

original: jñānātmakavastutvāt tayor iti // 54 //
analyzed: jñāna ātmaka vastu tvāt tayoḥ iti

original: jñānaprāgabhāvas tv avastutayā siddha eva. na cāsmākam apy asau doṣair janyate,
analyzed: jñāna prāgabhāvaḥ tu avastu tayā siddhaḥ eva na ca asmākam api asau doṣaiḥ janyate

original: jñānakāraṇābhāvād eva tvaduktivat tatsiddheḥ. atas tasminn akāraṇake sādhyamāne siddhasādhyataivetyabhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: jñāna kāraṇa abhāvāt eva tvad ukti vat tad siddheḥ atas tasmin akāraṇake sādhyamāne siddha sādhya tā eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: -- avijñāna iti. na cāprāmāṇyaśabda[308]vācyatāmātreṇa saṃśayaviparyayayor apy akāraṇakatvaṃ śakyam anumātum,
analyzed: avijñāne iti na saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ api akāraṇaka tvam śakyam anumātum

original: ajñānavad,
analyzed: ajñāna vat

original: vāco 'pi gośabdavācyatayā viṣāṇitvāpa[309]tter iti // 55 //
analyzed: vācaḥ api go śabda vācya tayā iti

original: [308] bdā (KHA)
analyzed: bdā kha

original: [309] tvānumānāpatteḥ (GA)
analyzed: tva anumāna āpatteḥ ga

original: nanv iyam anavasthā prāmāṇya iva parāśraye 'prāmāṇye 'pīṣyamāṇe āpadyata eva,
analyzed: nanu iyam anavasthā prāmāṇye iva para āśraye prāmāṇye pīṣyamāṇe āpadyate eva

original: pāratantryaṃ hy anavasthām āpādayati. ataḥ ko viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: pāratantryam hi anavasthām āpādayati atas kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: ata āha -- doṣata iti. asyārthaḥ -- svataḥprāmāṇyavādināṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ doṣato 'pramāṇatve nānavasthā bhavati. doṣeṣu jñātavyeṣu yathā guṇajñāne  #
analyzed: atas āha doṣataḥ iti asya arthaḥ svatas prāmāṇya vādinām mīmāṃsakānām pramāṇa tve na anavasthā bhavati doṣeṣu jñātavyeṣu yathā guṇa jñāne

original: 'navasthāpāditeti // 56 //
analyzed: nava sthā āpāditā iti

original: {1,93} svataḥprāmāṇyavādinām iti cānavasthāparihārabījam uktaṃ,

original: taduddhāṭayati -- sākṣād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- sajātīyāpekṣāyāṃ hy anavasthā bhavati.
analyzed: tat uddhāṭayati sākṣāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ sajātīya apekṣāyām hi anavasthā bhavati

original: yathā[310]prāmāṇyasya pramāṇāpekṣāyām uktam. aprāmāṇyaṃ tu svataḥ pramāṇena naitad
analyzed: pramāṇa apekṣāyām uktam aprāmāṇyam tu svatas pramāṇena na etat

original: evam iti sākṣād viparyayajñānena yatra tāvadavagamyate,
analyzed: evam iti sākṣāt viparyaya jñānena yatra tāvat avagamyate

original: tatra laghutaram eva gṛhītam iti na parāśrayatvamātram anavasthām āpādayatīti. nanu
analyzed: tatra laghutaram eva gṛhītam iti na para āśraya tva mātram anavasthām āpādayati iti nanu

original: svataḥprāmāṇye pūrvam api jñānam utpannam asandigdham iti kim apramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: svatas prāmāṇye pūrvam api jñānam utpannam asandigdham iti kim apramāṇam bhaviṣyati

original: yena pareṇa pūrvaṃ bādhyate. tenaiva tu kiṃ na paraṃ bādhyate,
analyzed: yena pareṇa pūrvam bādhyate tena eva tu kim na param bādhyate

original: ata āha -- pūrveti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam,
analyzed: atas āha pūrvā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam

original: utsargataḥ pūrvasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prāptam evāpavādabhūtena tūttareṇa bādhyamānaṃ tadapramāṇaṃ bhavati. yat tu tenaiva kiṃ nottaraṃ bādhyata iti.  #
analyzed: utsargataḥ pūrvasya api prāmāṇyam prāptam eva apavāda bhūtena tu uttareṇa bādhyamānam tat apramāṇam bhavati yat tu tena eva kim na uttaram bādhyate iti

original: tan na,
analyzed: tat na

original: na hīcchāmātreṇa bādhyabādhakabhāvo vyavasthāpyate. yad dhi yadbādha[311]kam avabhāsate
analyzed: na hi icchā mātreṇa bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate yat hi avabhāsate

original: tat tasya bādhakam abhidhīyate. nacānāgatottarabādhakarūpeṇa pūrvam avabhāsata iti
analyzed: tat tasya bādhakam abhidhīyate na ca anāgata uttara bādhaka rūpeṇa pūrvam avabhāsate iti

original: nacānāgatabādhenety atraiva vakṣyati. uttarasya tu pūrvajñānabādham antareṇotpattir
analyzed: na ca anāgata bādhena iti atra eva vakṣyati uttarasya tu pūrva jñāna bādham antareṇa utpattiḥ

original: eva na sambhavati. utpannaṃ ca tat. atas tad eva pūrvasya bādhakam. tac ca svata
analyzed: eva na sambhavati utpannam ca tat atas tat eva pūrvasya bādhakam tat ca svatas

original: eva pramāṇam iti na kācidanavastheti // 57 //
analyzed: eva pramāṇam iti na kācid anavasthā iti

original: [310] pramāṇasya (GA)
analyzed: pramāṇasya ga

original: [311] dhamānam a (KA)
analyzed: dhamānam a ka

original: nanv astu sākṣād viparyayajñānena pareṇa pūrvasya bādhaḥ,
analyzed: nanu astu sākṣāt viparyaya jñānena pareṇa pūrvasya bādhaḥ

original: ubhayor api samānaviṣayopanipātāt. yatra tūttaraṃ kāraṇadoṣaviṣayaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api samāna viṣaya upanipātāt yatra tu uttaram kāraṇa doṣa viṣayam bhavati

original: tatra viṣayabhedān na bādho yukta iti duruktaṃ hetūtthadoṣajñānāt prāmāṇyam apodyata
analyzed: tatra viṣaya bhedāt na bādhaḥ yuktaḥ iti duruktam hetu uttha doṣa jñānāt prāmāṇyam

original: ity ata āha -- duṣṭeti bādho 'ntena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api duṣṭakāraṇabodhe
analyzed: iti atas āha duṣṭa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi api duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe

original: viṣayabhedaḥ pītaśaṅkhādivibhrameṣu,
analyzed: viṣaya bhedaḥ pīta śaṅkha ādi vibhrameṣu

original: tathāpy arthāt tulyārthatāṃ prāpya bādho bhavaty eva. śaṅkhe hi pīta iti vidite parataś
analyzed: tathā api arthāt tulya artha tām prāpya bādhaḥ bhavati eva śaṅkhe hi pītaḥ iti vidite paratas

original: ca jñānakāraṇadoṣe 'vagate 'rthāt pītimā śaṅkhasya pratikṣipto bhavati. yatkāraṇādhīnātmalābhaṃ hi yat kāryaṃ,
analyzed: ca jñāna kāraṇa doṣe vagate ṛthāt pītimā śaṅkhasya pratikṣiptaḥ bhavati yad kāraṇa adhīna ātmalābham hi yat kāryam

original: tat taddoṣe duṣyati. eṣa ca jñānasya doṣaḥ yadanyathāsthitasyānyathāprakāśanam. ataḥ kāraṇadoṣe 'vagate 'rthānyathātvam evāvagataṃ bhavati.  #
analyzed: tat tad doṣe duṣyati eṣa ca jñānasya doṣaḥ yat anyathā sthitasya anyathā prakāśanam atas kāraṇa doṣe vagate rtha anyathātvam eva avagatam bhavati  /

original: evaṃ ca{1,
analyzed: evam

original: 94}sākṣādviparyayajñānena tulyatvam iti. atraiva vaidikanyāyam udāharati -- godohanādivad
analyzed: tulya tvam iti atra eva vaidika nyāyam udāharati godohana ādi vat

original: iti. darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kratvarthena camasenāpāṃ praṇayane vihite bhavaty aparo guṇaphalasambandhavidhiḥ.
analyzed: iti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kratu arthena camasena apām praṇayane vihite bhavati aparaḥ guṇa phala sambandha vidhiḥ

original: yathā godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed iti. asyārthaḥ -- godohanena paśūn bhāvayed
analyzed: yathā godohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti asya arthaḥ godohanena paśūn bhāvayet

original: iti. tad idaṃ puruṣābhilaṣitapaśvartha[312]tayā puruṣārtham eva[313]sad godohanaṃ
analyzed: iti tat idam puruṣa artham godohanam

original: kratvarthasya camasasya bādhakam iṣyate. tatrāpi ca sphuṭo viṣayabhedaḥ. kratūpakāro
analyzed: kratu arthasya camasasya bādhakam iṣyate tatra api ca sphuṭaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ

original: hi camasasya sādhyaḥ. paśavo godohanasyārthād eva tulyārthatayā tatrāpi bādho vakṣyate.
analyzed: hi camasasya sādhyaḥ paśavaḥ godohanasya arthāt eva tulya ārtha tayā tatra api bādhaḥ vakṣyate

original: godohanaṃ hi dravyam. na tat kriyām anāśritam udāsīnaṃ phalaṃ bhāvayitum alam iti
analyzed: godohanam hi dravyam na tat kriyām anāśritam udāsīnam phalam bhāvayitum alam iti

original: yāṃkāñcit kriyām āśrayatayā samīhamānaṃ sannihitaṃ kratvarthamapāṃ praṇayanaṃ gṛhṇātīti
analyzed: yāṃkāñcid kriyām āśraya tayā samīhamānam sannihitam kratu artham apām praṇayanam gṛhṇāti iti

original: tadāśritena paśavo bhāvayitavyā iti śāstrārtho 'vatiṣṭhate. evaṃ ca tenaiva kratvarthamapāṃ
analyzed: tad āśritena paśavaḥ bhāvayitavyāḥ iti śāstra arthaḥ vatiṣṭhate evam ca tena eva kratu artham apām

original: praṇayanaṃ siddham iti camaso nivartate. nanv asāv eva kratau viniyukta iti kathaṃ
analyzed: praṇayanam siddham iti camasaḥ nivartate nanu asau eva kratau viniyuktaḥ iti katham

original: tatparityāgena godohanena kratūpakāro bhāvyate. satyam. paśukāmaprayoge tu kratur
analyzed: tad parityāgena godohanena kratu upakāraḥ bhāvyate satyam paśu kāma prayoge tu kratuḥ

original: api godohanam eva svopakārasādhanatayānujānāti. kāryārtho hi svaguṇaṃ pratyādaraḥ,
analyzed: api godohanam eva sva upakāra sādhanatayā anujānāti kārya arthaḥ hi sva guṇam pratyādaraḥ

original: na svīyatayā. tac ca kāryaṃ phalārthatvād eva godohanād āsāditaṃ kratuneti kim ādareṇa svaguṇe. āha ca --
analyzed: na svīya tayā tat ca kāryam phala artha tvāt eva godohanāt āsāditam kratunā iti kim ādareṇa sva guṇe āha ca

original: [312] rthaṃ
analyzed: rtham

original: [313] va go (GA)
analyzed: va gaḥ ga

original: sarvasyaiva hi kāryārthaḥ svaguṇagrahaṇādaraḥ /

original: anyārthaguṇasiddhe tu kārye 'syāḥ svaguṇena kim //
analyzed: anya artha guṇa siddhe tu kārye syāḥ sva guṇena kim

original: evam atrāpīti na doṣa iti // 58 //
analyzed: evam atra api iti na doṣaḥ iti

original: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ yat sarvadā pareṇa pūrvaṃ bādhyate. nety āha -- tatreti. yadi tatra duṣṭakāraṇabodhe naitad evam iti viparyaye vā parā bādhadhīr  #
analyzed: kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ yat sarvadā pareṇa pūrvam bādhyate na iti āha tatra iti yadi tatra duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe na etat evam iti viparyaye vā parā bādha dhīḥ

original: na bhavati kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ vā,
analyzed: na bhavati kāraṇa doṣa jñānam vā

analyzed: tadā pūrvasya bādhaḥ bhavati na tu anyathā iti atha ubhayoḥ anyatara udbhūtau kim nāma bhaviṣyati

analyzed: atas āha tad udbhūtau iti tadā bādhake sa apavāde prathamam eva nirapavādam autsargikam prāmāṇyam labhate iti

analyzed: tathā ca tṛtīyam atas tena bādhaka bādhane kṛte bhavati ādyasya māna tā iti nanu asatsu

original: ata āha -- doṣeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- jāte doṣajñāne sambhāvitā doṣāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ vighnanti. tṛtīye tu doṣajñānaṃ na tāvadutpannam. śaṅkā tu  #

analyzed: ṣāśa

analyzed: na ayam kaunteya na paraḥ saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: iti. yasya tu tṛtīye vijñāne doṣajñānaṃ bādhaka[315]jñānaṃ vā jāyate,

analyzed: prāyeṇa hi prathama jñāna janmani eva nirapavādaḥ nirṇayaḥ dṛśyate kvacid tu

analyzed: tṛtīya jñāna udayaḥ api na ati pracuraḥ natarām sati api tu tasmin

original: na svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ vihanyate ity evam paratayaivedam asmābhir uktam. astu caturthajñānān
analyzed: na svatas prāmāṇyam vihanyate iti evam para tayā evā idam asmābhiḥ uktam astu caturtha jñānān

original: nirṇaya iti vārttikakāro 'py ata eva evaṃ tricaturajñānajanmana iti vakṣyatīti. kiṃ
analyzed: nirṇayaḥ iti vārttikakāraḥ pi atas eva evam tri catur ajñāna janmanaḥ iti vakṣyati iti kim

original: dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya hi pramātur ekatrāpi nāśvāso bhaved yadi caivam ucchidyante vyavahārāḥ.
analyzed: dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya hi pramātuḥ ekatra api nā āśvāsaḥ bhavet yadi ca evam ucchidyante vyavahārāḥ

original: kāmaṃ pramāṇato hi te parinistiṣṭhanti. na tebhyaḥ pramāṇam ata āha -- niṣpramāṇiketi.
analyzed: kāmam pramāṇataḥ hi te parinistiṣṭhanti na tebhyaḥ pramāṇam atas āha niṣpramāṇikā iti

original: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yāvad dhi doṣāṇām abhāvo nāvadhāryate,

original: tu jāte tānāśaṅkamānasyābhāvavirodha eva.[318]arthendriyādayo hi jñānakāraṇam. taddoṣā
analyzed: tu jāte hi jñāna kāraṇam tad doṣā

original: dūratvatimirādayaḥ. tad yathā dūre santastaravo vanam ity ekākāratayā parigṛhītāḥ
analyzed: dūra tva timira ādayaḥ tat yathā dūre santaḥ taravaḥ vanam iti eka ākāra tayā parigṛhītāḥ

original: sannikarṣe nānā dṛśyante. tadā dūratvadoṣād ekatvabuddhir upajāteti niścīyate. nānātvabuddhes
analyzed: sannikarṣe nānā dṛśyante tadā dūra tva doṣāt eka tva buddhiḥ upajātā iti niścīyate nānātva buddheḥ

original: tu na kaścid doṣo dṛśyata iti katham āśaṅkyate.{1,
analyzed: tu na kaścid doṣaḥ dṛśyate iti katham

original: 96} evaṃ santamase gavyaśvabhrame sa eva doṣaḥ. divā tu gojñāne na kaściddoṣaḥ sambhāvyata
analyzed: evam santamase gavi aśva bhrame saḥ eva doṣaḥ divā tu go jñāne na kaścid doṣaḥ sambhāvyata

original: iti tatpramāṇam. evaṃ cakṣurādidoṣāṇāṃ timirādīnām abhāve 'vagate niṣpramāṇikaiva
analyzed: iti tat pramāṇam evam cakṣuḥ ādi doṣāṇām timira ādīnām abhāve vagate niṣpramāṇikā eva

original: doṣāśaṅkā. yatrāpi sādṛśyacalatvādayo viṣayadoṣā bhrāntihetavaḥ,

original: nanv avagataṃ tāvat pramātṛbhedād dūre dūratare ca cakṣuḥ prakāśayatīti tat kāṣṭhāprāptaprakarṣaṃ sarvaṃ prakāśayiṣyati. jñānasyāpi yathottaraṃ

analyzed: tatas pāratantrye kāraṇam vācyam utpadyamānena eva hi tena sva viṣaya paricchedaḥ kṛtaḥ iti kim anyat apekṣate niścaya artham vaktṛ pramāṇa apekṣā iti

analyzed: tasmāt iti

original: yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra iṣur ityevamādiḥ. tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ityevamartham arthagrahaṇam iti. asya kilāyam arthaḥ -- yadi  #
analyzed: yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyenaḥ vajraḥ iṣuḥ iti evamādiḥ tatra anarthaḥ dharmaḥ uktaḥ mā bhūt iti evamartham artha grahaṇam iti asya kila ayam arthaḥ yadi

original: codanālakṣaṇo dharma ity etāvad ucyeta,

original: atas tannivṛttyartho 'rthaśabda iti. tad etad ākṣipati -- purastād iti. asyārthaḥ

original: [519] ti. tad ya (GA)

original: syād etat -- śyenādayo 'tra bhāṣyakāreṇa pratyudāhṛtāḥ,

analyzed: ca vidhi viṣayāṇām niṣedha agocara tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha codanā iti tat iha yaḥ

original: hiṃsā nāsau codanālakṣaṇā,
analyzed: hiṃsā na asau codanā lakṣaṇā

analyzed: na te narthāḥ iti ubhayatas pāśā rajjuḥ iti

original: syād etat -- yadi nāma niṣedhapramāṇakam anarthatvaṃ na. evam api śyenādau na sambhavati,

original: kāraṇe kāryopacārāt. śyenaśabda eva vā tatphala upacaritaḥ kārye kāraṇopacārād iti
analyzed: kāraṇe kārya upacārāt śyena śabdaḥ eva vā tad phalaḥ upacaritaḥ kārye kāraṇa upacārāt iti

original: bhāvaḥ. kiṃ punarupacārāśrayaṇe kāraṇam ata āha -- pratiṣiddheti. bhāṣyakārānusāreṇaivedam

original: idaṃ cāparaṃ liṅgadarśanam ity āha -- hiṃsā hīti. kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ ity uktvā yad uktaṃ hiṃsā hi seti,

analyzed: ākṣepa kāle na sva rūpeṇa śyenaḥ hiṃsā iti atas hiṃsā hi iti atra bhāṣyakāreṇa etat sphuṭīkṛtam

original: tathā śyenenābhicaran yajeteti hi samāmananti nābhicaritavyam ity ante vakṣyate.

original: tatra pratiṣiddhā hīty etat tāvad anupapannam ity āha -- vihitatvād iti. vihitā hiṃsāsādhanatayā śyenādayaḥ. na teṣu pratiṣedho 'vakāśaṃ{1,
analyzed: tatra pratiṣiddhāḥ hi iti etat tāvat anupapannam iti āha vihita tvāt iti vihitāḥ hiṃsā sādhanatayā śyena ādayaḥ na teṣu

analyzed: svayam eva hi tatra puruṣāḥ pravartante

original: kathaṃ niṣiddhatvād anarthaḥ. codanālakṣaṇatve 'py avidheyatvam iti tu bhavadbhir eva nirākṛtam. ata eva kramo vidheya ity āśritam,

original: ata āha -- phalāṃśa iti vakṣyate'ntena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- uktam idam asmābhiḥ kiñcid vidhātuṃ phalam uddiśyate ity etāvatī codanālakṣaṇatā.  #

analyzed: na tu phalam eva vidhīyate

original: viruddhaś cāyaṃ hetur ity āha -- viruddheti. kathaṃ viruddhatā,

original: hiṃsāyām api tādṛg eva phalaṃ bhaved iti. tādṛktvam eva phalasya darśayati -- vidhigamyeti.

original: tac cātac ca tadatadī. te pūrve yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- tad vā pratyakṣam

original: [609] rva (GA)
analyzed: rva ga

original: sidhyatu vā pratyakṣalakṣaṇokter anumānādīnāṃ tatpūrvakatvam. yas tv eṣām avāntaralakṣaṇabhedaḥ svarūpaṃ ca,

original: tad etad āha -- tenānyeti sūtramantena. abhimatapramāṇaparisaṃkhyānaṃ cāyuktam iti

original: tulyatvād iti. ekaṃ tu svapnajñānaṃ varjayitvā sakalapramāṇāpramāṇasajātīyavijātīyajñānamātrasādhāraṇam

original: idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āha -- svapneti. liṅgaśabdasadṛśādisambaddheṣv evendriyeṣv anumānādipramāṇapañcakotpattir iti bhāvaḥ // 10 //

original: svapnajñānavarjane kāraṇam āha -- taddhīti. bāhyendriyasamprayogābhāvābhiprāyeṇa

analyzed: tat kenacid samprayoge satī eva jāyate iti pratyakṣam āpadyeta iti āha kenacid iti yathā kenacid samprayoge bhrānti ādiḥ bhavati

original: ata āha -- grāhyeṇeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam abhimataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavato 'pi. tat tv anupāttaṃ na labhyate. vṛttikāramate tu vyatyastena  #

original: tadvṛttena tadupādāsyate.

original: iti vakṣyate. ato bhavanmate grāhyaviśeṣaṇānupādānād grāhyasamprayogajam anyasamprayogajaṃ vā jñānaṃ pratyakṣam āpadyeta. ato 'sti mahān vakṣyamāṇena  #

analyzed: hi smṛtiḥ eva sā ca na pramāṇam iti sthitam eva na ca

iti

original: kāryadoṣāt śuktikāyogo duṣṭa ity avagamyate. ato 'sau samyagarthavācinā saṃśabdena
analyzed: kārya doṣāt śuktikā yogaḥ duṣṭaḥ iti avagamyate sau samyak artha vācinā saṃśabdena

original: vāryata iti. evañ cāvayavavyākhyāyām āśrīyamāṇāyāṃ lokasiddhalakṣaṇānuvādenāpy animittatvavidhir
analyzed: vāryate iti evam ca avayava vyākhyāyām āśrīyamāṇāyām loka siddha lakṣaṇa anuvādena api animitta tva vidhiḥ

original: na duṣyatīty āha -- evam iti // 39 //
analyzed: na duṣyati iti āha evam iti

original: tathā yad api bauddhaiḥ prāptivacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ manvānaiḥ śrotracakṣuṣor aprāpyakāritvād avyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam ity uktaṃ,
analyzed: tathā yat api bauddhaiḥ prāpti vacanam prayoga śabdam manvānaiḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ a prāpya kāri tvāt avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti uktam

original: tad api vyāpāramātravacanaṃ prayogaśabdaṃ vyācakṣāṇair asmābhiḥ parihṛtam ity āha -- tataś ceti. vyāpāramātravācitvād aviruddham ity uparitanena  #
analyzed: tat api vyāpāra mātra vacanam prayoga śabdam vyācakṣāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ parihṛtam iti āha tatas ca iti vyāpāra mātra vāci tvāt aviruddham iti uparitanena  /

original: sambandha iti // 40 //
analyzed: sambandhaḥ iti

original: śrotracakṣuṣor aprāpyakāritve bauddhānām abhiprāyam āha -- prāpyeti nontena. evaṃ hi tair uktaṃ -

analyzed: sāntara grahaṇam na syāt prāptau jñāne dhikasya ca

original: iti. yadi cakṣuśśrotre viṣayaṃ prāpya gṛhṇītaḥ,
analyzed: iti yadi cakṣuḥ śrotre viṣayam prāpya gṛhṇītaḥ

original: yad idaṃ dūre śabdo dūre 'rtha iti sāntaragrahaṇaṃ yac ca sumahatāṃ mahīmahīdharādīnām adhiṣṭhānādhikaparimāṇānāṃ{1,
analyzed: yat idam dūre śabdaḥ dūre rthaḥ iti sa antara grahaṇam yat ca su mahatām mahī mahīdhara ādīnām

original: 223}grahaṇaṃ tat kilobhayam api na syāt,
analyzed: tat kila ubhayam api na syāt

original: prāpyakāriṣu tvagādiṣv adarśanāt. tad etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yat prāpyakāri na tat sāntaram adhikaṃ ca vedayati,
analyzed: prāpyakāriṣu tvac ādiṣu adarśanāt tat etat uktam bhavati yat prāpyakāri na tat sāntaram adhikam ca vedayati

original: yathā kāyaḥ na ca tathā śrotracakṣuṣī ity āvītahetuḥ. upālambhe kilaśabdaḥ. ubhayasyāpi
analyzed: yathā kāyaḥ na ca tathā śrotra cakṣuṣī iti āvīta hetuḥ upālambhe kila śabdaḥ ubhayasya api

original: samādhāsyamānatvād iti. ārjavāvasthānaṃ vā samprayogo 'bhimata ity āha -- yadi veti.
analyzed: samādhāsyamāna tvāt iti ārjava avasthānam vā samprayogaḥ bhimataḥ iti āha yadi vā iti

analyzed: ārjava avasthitasya hi rūpa ādi jñānam utpadyate tatra eva samprayoga śabda upacāraḥ tvac ādiṣu

original: tathā vyapadiśyate. evam eva vyāpāre 'pi darśayitavyam iti // 41-42 //
analyzed: tathā vyapadiśyate evam eva vyāpāre pi darśayitavyam iti  /

original: kāryalakṣitayogyatālakṣaṇo vā yaḥ śabdārthayor iva rūpādicakṣurādyoḥ sambandhaḥ samprayoga
analyzed: kārya lakṣita yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ vā yaḥ śabda arthayoḥ iva rūpa ādi cakṣuḥ ādyoḥ sambandhaḥ samprayoga

original: ity āha -- yogyateti. athavāstu sāṅkhyādisiddhāntasiddhaḥ prāptirūpa eva sambandhaḥ.
analyzed: iti āha yogyatā iti athavā astu sāṅkhya ādi siddhānta siddhaḥ prāpti rūpaḥ eva sambandhaḥ

original: anumānenāpi śrotracakṣuṣoḥ prāpyakāritvam avagamyate ity āha -- tayor iti. tayoḥ śrotracakṣuṣor ity arthaḥ. cakṣuśśrotre prāpyakāriṇī,
analyzed: anumānena api śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ prāpyakāri tvam avagamyate iti āha tayoḥ iti tayoḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ iti arthaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotre prāpyakāriṇī

original: bāhyendriyatvāt tvagindriyavad iti. nanu ca karṇaśaṣkulī cakṣurgolakaṃ ca śarīrastham evopalabhyate,

analyzed: avatiṣṭhate iti

original: {1,224} nanv adhiṣṭhānam evendriyaṃ,

analyzed: tatra uddharaṇa pūraṇa ādi nigraha anugraha darśanāt itarathā tad asambhavāt yadi hi adhiṣṭhāna atiriktam akṣam bhavet

original: tarhy adhiṣṭhānasaṃskāro 'narthakaḥ syāt,
analyzed: tarhi adhiṣṭhāna saṃskāraḥ narthakaḥ syāt

original: tato 'dhiṣṭhānasaṃskāras tasyopakārako na syāt. adhiṣṭhānādhāraṃ tu tat. atas tasyaivādhārabhūtasyādhiṣṭhānasya
analyzed: tatas dhiṣṭhāna saṃskāraḥ tasya upakārakaḥ na syāt adhiṣṭhāna ādhāram tu tat atas tasya eva ādhāra bhūtasya adhiṣṭhānasya

original: nanv evam api golakādhikaraṇasyaiva tatsaṃskāra upakārako bhavatu,

analyzed: saṃskṛte na prayojanam tasya eva prāpta tvena prakāśaka tvāt atas yat prakāśakam tat

analyzed: asambaddhasya hi bhāgasya prakāśayitum aśakteḥ

original: ata āha -- taddeśa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- ekaivendriyavṛttir anugatādhiṣṭhānadeśasambandhā arthadeśaṃ yāvat prāptā,
analyzed: atas āha tad deśe iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ekā eva indriya vṛttiḥ anugata adhiṣṭhāna deśa sambandhā artha deśam yāvat prāptā

original: ato 'dhiṣṭhānadeśa eva saṃskāraḥ sarvopakārako bhaviṣyati. yathā pādayoḥ prayuktaḥ saṃskāro dūrasthasyāpi cakṣuṣa upakārako bhaviṣyatīti //

original: ato nāyam ekāntaḥ yadadhiṣṭhānadeśe saṃskārāt tadvartyevendriyamitīty āha -- tasmād

original: iti. nirantarādhikagrahaṇam upapādayati -- bahir iti syādantena. kāryadarśanabalena

original: hi tadvṛttiḥ kalpyamānā yathākāryam avatiṣṭhata{1,

original: 225}ity uktam. ato 'dhiṣṭhānādhikaparimāṇārthadarśanāt pṛthvagrā kalpayiṣyate. nirantaradarśanāc ca santatā. ato yatra yādṛśaṃ vṛttibhāge pārthavaṃ  #
analyzed: uktam atas dhiṣṭhāna adhika parimāṇa artha darśanāt pṛthu agrā kalpayiṣyate nirantara darśanāt ca santatā atas yatra yādṛśam vṛtti bhāge pārthavam

analyzed: pṛthu tvam bhavati

original: ata āha -- dīpaprabheti. nāvaśyaṃ pihitendriyasya vṛttir asti kāryābhāvāt tu sā dīpanāśe prabhāvannimīlayato 'pi naṣṭety unnīyata iti // 49
analyzed: atas āha dīpa prabhā iti na avaśyam pihita indriyasya vṛttiḥ asti kārya abhāvāt tu sā dīpa nāśe naṣṭā iti unnīyate iti

original: astu vā adhiṣṭhānapidhāne 'pi vṛttiḥ. ātmaprayatnānugṛhītā tu sā ātmany artham upanayati.

original: vicchinnabodham idānīm upapādayati -- vicchinna itīti. vibhor apy ātmanaḥ prāgbhavīyaka[647]rmārjitaṃ

analyzed: aviccheda bodhaḥ yuktaḥ iti śabde tu viccheda adhika bodhaḥ bhrāntiḥ evā iti kim

original: na punarabhipretaḥ. na hīndriyavṛttir nāma kācit pramāṇenāvagamyate. tathā hi -- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilā manyante. yathāhuḥ --

original: tanmayānīndriyāṇy api vibhūni bhaveyuḥ. na ca vibhūnāṃ vṛttir upapadyate. vṛttir
analyzed: tanmayāni indriyāṇi api vibhūni bhaveyuḥ na ca vibhūnām vṛttiḥ upapadyate vṛttiḥ

original: nirgamanam. na ca tad vibhūnāṃ sambhavati. syān matam -- na ca brūmo vibhūnīndriyāṇi gacchantīti,

original: kiṃ tarhi. tadādhārā vṛttir iti. keyaṃ vṛttir iti vaktavyam. yadi śrotrādīnāṃ śabdādigrahaṇayogyatā,

original: sā tarhy amūrtā śaktiḥ kathaṃ gacchet. api ca trīṇy antaḥkaraṇāni mahānahaṅkāro mana

original: iti kāpilā manyante. na ca karaṇaṃ karaṇāntarāṇāṃ prakṛtir upapadyate karaṇatvāt
analyzed: iti kāpilāḥ manyante na ca karaṇam karaṇa antarāṇām prakṛtiḥ upapadyate karaṇa tvāt

original: pramāṇa iti. indriyaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tasyārthaprāptyā jñānasya ca tadviṣayatvena
analyzed: pramāṇe iti indriya prāmāṇya pakṣe tasya artha prāptyā jñānasya ca tad viṣaya tvena

original: sphuṭaṃ viṣayasāmyam ity āha -- pramāṇam iti // 69 //

original: evaṃ tāvadindriyādiprāmāṇyapakṣe pramāṇaphalayor viṣayasāmyam uktam. idānīṃ jñānaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'py evam eva darśayitavyam ity āha -- pramāṇeti.{1,
analyzed: evam tāvat indriya ādi prāmāṇya pakṣe pramāṇa phalayoḥ viṣaya sāmyam uktam idānīm jñāna prāmāṇya pakṣe pi evam eva darśayitavyam iti āha  /

original: 235}sarvasavikalpakajñānāni viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakāṇi,

original: yathā daṇḍy ayaṃ gaur ayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ gacchaty ayaṃ ḍittho 'yam iti. tad iha viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ
analyzed: yathā daṇḍī ayam gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ yam gacchati ayam ḍitthaḥ yam iti tat iha viśeṣaṇa jñānam

original: pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ ca phalam. viśeṣyajñānasiddhyarthatvāc ca viśeṣaṇajñānasya.

original: yadā tu viśeṣaṇam eva boddhavyaṃ pramitsitaṃ bhavati,

analyzed: katham vā samāna viṣayatvam atas āha viśeṣaṇe tu iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ tatra api

original: vijñānadvayam upalabhyate. ālocanājñānaṃ hi tatra viśeṣaṇe niścayaṃ prasūte. tādarthyāc
analyzed: vijñāna dvayam upalabhyate ālocanā jñānam hi tatra viśeṣaṇe niścayam prasūte tādarthyāt

analyzed: atas āha niścayaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ālocanā ajñāne hi tat idam iti pratyabhijñāna ātmakam īdṛśaḥ yam iti vā niścaya ātmakam jñāna antaram

original: śabdayojanāśūnyam asty eva,

original: sarvatra prasaṅgāt. na cāsati phale pramāṇatvam api śakyaṃ samarthayitum. atha tad eva pramāṇaṃ phalaṃ ceti dvirūpam iṣyate,

original: kiṃ bhedopanyāsena. yuktaṃ caitad evam. evaṃ hi pramāṇaphalayor atyantapratyāsattir{1,

original: 236}āśritā bhavati. saiva copapattimatī. na hy anyatra sādhanam anyatra sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭam. na hi paraśau khadiraṃ prāpte palāśe chidā bhavati,
analyzed: bhavati sā eva ca upapattimatī na hi anyatra sādhanam anyatra sādhyam dṛṣṭam na hi paraśau khadiram prāpte palāśe chidā bhavati

original: ata āha -- hānādīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yat tāvad idam atipratyāsattitṛṣṇayaikatvaṃ pramāṇaphalayoḥ,

original: tadanantaram eva nirākariṣyāmaḥ. yat tu viśeṣyajñānasya phalāntaraṃ na dṛśyata iti. tan na. asti tatrāpi taduttarakālabhāvi hānādi phalam.  #
analyzed: tad anantaram eva nirākariṣyāmaḥ yat tu viśeṣya jñānasya phala antaram na dṛśyate iti tat na asti tatra api tad uttara kāla bhāvi hāna ādi phalam

original: atha jñānasya jñānam eva phalam,
analyzed: atha jñānasya jñānam eva phalam

original: evam ihāpi hānādidhīr eva phala[ṃ] bhaviṣyatīti. athopakārādismṛtivyavahitā hānādibuddhir na phalam iti kiṃ manyase,
analyzed: evam iha api hāna ādi dhīḥ eva phalam bhaviṣyati iti atha upakāra ādi smṛti vyavahitā hāna ādi buddhiḥ na phalam iti kim manyase

original: astu tarhīyam evopakārādismṛtiḥ phalam ity āha -- upakārādīti // 73 //

original: yas tu viṣayaikatvam icchatā pramāṇaphalayor ekatvam āśritaṃ,

original: tadalaukikam ayuktaṃ cety āha -- viṣayeti // 74 //

original: yac cedam uktaṃ paraśau khadirāśrite palāśe na chidā dṛśyate iti. idaṃ vā kiṃ dṛśyate

original: yat paraśucchedanayor ekatvam iti. ato yatra sādhanaṃ vyāpriyeta tatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate.

original: tac ca pūrvaṃ pratipāditam eva,

original: yadi tūcyate -- sādhyasādhanayor viṣayabhedo[659]na dṛṣṭaḥ ekatvaṃ ca,

analyzed: tad anyatarasmin na āśrayitavye smabhyam viṣaya abhedaḥ rocate iti tat na śakyam idam itareṇa api vaktum iti sa apahāsam āha bhavataḥ iti

original: tataḥ savikalpakam api katham ātmānaṃ labhate. tad dhi saṅketakālabhāviśabdādismaraṇapūrvakam. na cākasmād eva tatsmaraṇam āvirasti,

original: 249}astu vikalpā iti yuktaṃ yadātmānaṃ labhata iti. yad api cāvyavahārāṅgatvaṃ nirvikalpakasyety
analyzed: vikalpāḥ iti yuktam yadā ātmānam labhate iti yat api ca avyavahāra aṅga tvam nirvikalpakasya iti

original: uktam. tad ayuktam. na hi vyavahārārtham eva pramāṇam āśrīyate. upekṣā hi pramāṇaphalam
analyzed: uktam tat ayuktam na hi vyavahāra artham eva pramāṇam āśrīyate upekṣā hi pramāṇa phalam

original: iṣyata eva. api ca santi kecid vyavahārāḥ ye nirvikalpakamātrād eva bhavanti,
analyzed: iṣyate eva api ca santi kecid vyavahārāḥ ye nirvikalpaka mātrāt eva bhavanti

original: yathāgninā dahyamānasya sahasāpasaraṇam. tad dhi parāmarśānapekṣam eva jhaṭ iti jāyamānam

original: upalabhyate. tiryagbālānāṃ cāvikalpakenaiva sarvo vyavahāraḥ. na ca teṣāṃ sūkṣmaśabdasadbhāve

analyzed: pramāṇam asti pratyaya tvasya asmat ādi sva saṃvedya avikalpaka pratyayena anaikāntika tvāt

analyzed: katham ca teṣām agṛhīta sambandhānām śabda sambhinna artha bodhaḥ yat uktam prāgbhavīya vāsanā vaśāt upapattiḥ iti

original: tan na. tasyāḥ prāyeṇa maraṇenocchedāt. bhavāntarānubhūtasmaraṇe vā parastād api sambandhagrahaṇānarthakyam. yo hi jātamātraḥ sūtikāśayante  #
analyzed: tat na tasyāḥ prāyeṇa maraṇena ucchedāt bhava antara anubhūta smaraṇe vā parastāt api sambandha grahaṇa ānarthakyam yaḥ hi jāta mātraḥ sūtikāśayante

original: śayānaḥ kumārako bhavāntarīyaṃ smarati,
analyzed: śayānaḥ kumārakaḥ bhava antarīyam smarati

original: sa katham upariṣṭān na smariṣyati. atha mataṃ parastād asya saṃskāro naśyatīti. tan na. yasya hi nidhanena yoniyantrapīḍayā ca saṃskāro na
analyzed: sa katham upariṣṭāt na smariṣyati atha matam parastāt asya saṃskāraḥ naśyati iti tat na yasya hi nidhanena yoni yantra pīḍayā ca saṃskāraḥ na

analyzed: tasya katham akasmāt eva dvitraiḥ eva varṣaiḥ saṃskāra nāśaḥ bhavati tasmāt asti bālānām avikalpaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: tanmūlaś ca vyavahāra iti siddhaṃ nirvikalpakam api pratyakṣam

original: iti. ādiśabdena ca jātamātrasya badhirasya tiraścāṃ ca jñānam upādatta iti // 112 //

original: nanv arthendriyasāmarthyamātrajaṃ jñānaṃ nirvikalpakam. na tatrānuvṛttivyāvṛttī pratibhāsete.

original: kiṃ nāma tenāvagantavyam. na hi tadatiriktaṃ vastv astīty ata āha -- tayor iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vyaktimātragocaraṃ nirvikalpakam. asti vā  #
analyzed: kim nāma tena avagantavyam na hi tad atiriktam vastu asti iti atas āha tayoḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ vyakti mātra gocaram nirvikalpakam asti vā

original: viśeṣātiriktā vyaktiḥ. bāḍhaṃ,
yo 'rthaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣāṇāṃ cāśrayaḥ sā vyaktiḥ. ke punar amī viśeṣāḥ. khaṇḍādayaḥ,

original: yair itaretaraṃ vyaktayo viśeṣyante. sāmānyaṃ tu{1,

original: viśeṣo 'yam iti ca vivicyāgrahaṇād uktam. tayor api tu svarūpaṃ prakāśata eva. tad
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ yam iti ca vivicya agrahaṇāt uktam tayoḥ api tu svarūpam prakāśate eva tat

original: etad upariṣṭād vakṣyāma iti // 113 //
analyzed: etat upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ iti

original: prayoktṝṇām aprayogād uttarottareṣām aprayoga iti. tad ayuktam. aprayogābhāvāt. prayogamātre hi pravṛttihetutā,
analyzed: prayoktṝṇām aprayogāt uttara uttareṣām aprayogaḥ iti tat ayuktam a prayoga abhāvāt prayoga mātre hi pravṛtti hetu tā

original: avayavayoḥ svārthe prayogo dṛśyata eva. samudāyas tu nānyaḥ kaścid yasyāprayoga iti
analyzed: avayavayoḥ svārthe prayogaḥ dṛśyate eva samudāyaḥ tu na anyaḥ kaścid yasya a prayogaḥ iti

original: śakyate vaktum. samudāyaśakter anabhyupagamāt prayogamātrād eva paṅkajādiśabdapravṛtteḥ.
analyzed: śakyate vaktum samudāya śakteḥ anabhyupagamāt prayoga mātrāt eva paṅkaja ādi śabda pravṛtteḥ

original: prayukto hi paṅkaśabdaḥ paṅke. janiḥ prādurbhāve. tadatiriktaṃ vastu samudāyo nāsty
analyzed: prayuktaḥ hi paṅka śabdaḥ paṅke janiḥ prādurbhāve tad atiriktam vastu samudāyaḥ na asti

original: eva. kasyāprayoga iti vaktavyam. arthānvayo hi tathā pravṛttau hetuḥ. sa ca saugandhikādiṣv
analyzed: eva kasya aprayogaḥ iti vaktavyam artha anvayaḥ hi tathā pravṛttau hetuḥ sa ca saugandhika ādiṣu

original: api samāna iti teṣv api paṅkajaśabdapravṛttiḥ. ato 'vaśyam anyatrāprayogārthaṃ rūḍhir
analyzed: api samāne iti teṣu api paṅkaja śabda pravṛttiḥ atas vaśyam anyatra a prayoga artham rūḍhiḥ

original: āśrayitavyā. yad uktam anyatrāprayogas tu rūḍhim āpādayatīti,
analyzed: āśrayitavyāḥ yat uktam anyatra aprayogaḥ tu rūḍhim āpādayati iti

original: tad iṣyata eva. yogo 'pi dṛṣṭo na hātuṃ śakyata ity uktam. aśvakarṇādau tv avayavānugamābhāvāt
analyzed: tat iṣyate eva yogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na hātum śakyate iti uktam aśvakarṇa ādau tu avayava anugama abhāvāt

original: kvacid eva rūḍhir ātmānaṃ labhate. ato neyaṃ rūḍhir eva kevalā nāpi kevalayogaḥ.
analyzed: kvacid eva rūḍhiḥ ātmānam labhate atas na iyam rūḍhiḥ eva kevalā na api kevala yogaḥ

original: yogarūḍhir iti manyante vṛddhā iti //
analyzed: yoga rūḍhiḥ iti manyante vṛddhāḥ iti

original: [681] ṇam i
analyzed: ṇam i

original: [682] ja e (KA)
analyzed: jaḥ e ka

original: [683] ya śa
analyzed: ya śa

original: atha vyavadhānād akāraṇaṃ yoga iti manyase,
analyzed: atha vyavadhānāt akāraṇam yogaḥ iti manyase

original: tathāpi rūḍhyaiva kevalayā pratyakṣaśabdaḥ savikalpake vartiṣyate. bhūmnā hi tatraiva laukikāḥ pratyakṣaśabdam upacaranti. alpaṃ nirvikalpaka  #
analyzed: tathā api rūḍhyā eva kevalayā pratyakṣa śabdaḥ savikalpake vartiṣyate bhūmnā hi tatra eva laukikāḥ pratyakṣa śabdam upacaranti alpam nirvikalpaka

original: ty āha -- animittaiveti // 131 //
yadi tūcyate satyaṃ vṛddhāḥ prayuñjate. lakṣaṇakārās tu nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate satyam vṛddhāḥ prayuñjate lakṣaṇakārāḥ tu nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam

original: ātiṣṭhante. yathāhuḥ -- kalpanāpoḍham abhrāntaṃ pratyakṣam iti. ata āha -- vṛddhaprayogeti
analyzed: ātiṣṭhante yathā āhuḥ kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam pratyakṣam iti atas āha vṛddha prayoga iti

original: dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- laukiko hi śabdārtha{1,
analyzed: dvayena ayam abhiprāyaḥ laukikaḥ hi

original: 258}sambandhaḥ. tena parīkṣakair api yathālokam eva vartitavyam. anyathākaraṇe teṣāṃ lokabādha eveti // 133 //
analyzed: tena parīkṣakaiḥ api yathālokam eva vartitavyam anyathā karaṇe teṣām loka bādhaḥ eva iti

original: api ca kalpanāpoḍhavādinām api kalpanājñānaṃ svasaṃvedane pratyakṣam iṣṭam eva. yad evam āhuḥ --
analyzed: api ca kalpanāpoḍha vādinām api kalpanā jñānam sva saṃvedane pratyakṣam iṣṭam eva yat evam āhuḥ

original: kalpanāpi svasaṃvittāviṣṭā nārthe vikalpanāt
analyzed: kalpanā api sva saṃvitta āviṣṭā na arthe vikalpanāt

original: iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- na kalpanā svasaṃvittir ātmānaṃ vikalpayati,
analyzed: iti evam hi manyante na kalpanā sva saṃvittiḥ ātmānam vikalpayati

original: bahirarthavikalpāvabhāsitvāt. asādhāraṇasya ca kalpanātmano 'pi kalpanāspadatvāt. atrāpy āhuḥ -- nainam iyam abhilāpena saṃsṛjati tathā vṛtter  #
analyzed: bahis artha vikalpa avabhāsi tvāt asādhāraṇasya ca kalpanā ātmanaḥ api kalpanā āspada tvāt atra api āhuḥ na enam iyam abhilāpena saṃsṛjati tathā vṛtteḥ

original: ātmani virodhāt iti.
analyzed: ātmani virodhāt iti

original: teṣām ataḥ svasaṃvittir nābhijalpānuṣaṅgiṇī
analyzed: teṣām atas sva saṃvittiḥ na abhijalpa anuṣaṅgiṇī

original: iti ca. tad idaṃ kalpanāsvasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nopapadyeta. tad api hi nirvikalpakapratyayāntaritākṣavyāpāram eva. atha tatra rūḍhyā pratyakṣaśabdo  #
analyzed: iti ca tat idam kalpanāsu asaṃvedanam pratyakṣam nā upapadyeta tat api hi nirvikalpaka pratyaya antarita akṣa vyāpāram eva atha tatra rūḍhyā pratyakṣa śabdaḥ

original: vartata ity ucyate,
analyzed: vartate iti ucyate

original: tad gotvādibahirviṣayaprakāśe 'pi samānaṃ,

original: na paraṃ svasaṃvittāv ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- kalpaneti. yadi matam asti tatrendriyajaṃ
analyzed: na param sva saṃvittau iti abhiprāyeṇa āha kalpanā iti yadi matam asti tatra indriya jam

original: nirvikalpakajñānaṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ. tad eva mana ity ācakṣate. yathāhuḥ -- tac
analyzed: nirvikalpaka jñānam samanantara pratyayaḥ tat eva manaḥ iti ācakṣate yathā āhuḥ tat

original: caturvidham indriya(?ja)
analyzed: caturvidham indriya ja

original: m indriyajaṃ samanantarapratyayodbhavaṃ mānasam iti. mano 'pi cendriyam iti manodhīnatayā
analyzed: indriya jam samanantara pratyaya udbhavam mānasam iti manaḥ pi ca indriyam iti manaḥ adhīna tayā

original: pratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. tad gotvādibodhe 'pi samānam. tadbodhe 'pi vayaṃ manovyāpāram

original: ātiṣṭhāmaha eva. manaḥsvarūpe tu vivadāmaḥ. tat tāvad anyad evety āha -- mana iti // 134 //
analyzed: ātiṣṭhāmahe eva manaḥ svarūpe tu vivadāmaḥ tat tāvat anyat eva iti āha manaḥ iti

original: nanv āntaraṃ manaḥ kathaṃ bahirviṣayabodhe vartiṣyata iti,
analyzed: nanu āntaram manaḥ katham bahis viṣaya bodhe vartiṣyate iti

original: tat tāvad āśaṅkate -- svasaṃvittāv iti. pariharati -- loka iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -{1,

original: 259}satyam iṣṭaṃ kalpanājñānaṃ svasaṃvedane pratyakṣam iti bhavadbhiḥ. laukikās tu
analyzed: iṣṭam kalpanā jñānam sva saṃvedane pratyakṣam iti bhavadbhiḥ laukikāḥ tu

analyzed: viparītam manyante ayam gauḥ iti para rūpa nirūpaṇam sa vikalpakam laukikāḥ manyante

analyzed: na punar aham gauḥ iti ātma nirūpaṇam yat api bāhyeṣu manaḥ na vartate iti satyam

original: bahirindriyānapekṣaṃ na pravartate. gotvādayas tu saṃyuktasamavāyena cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyanta
analyzed: bahis indriya anapekṣam na pravartate go tva ādayaḥ tu saṃyukta samavāyena cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyanta

original: ity asti teṣu manovyāpāra iti tannibaddham akṣavyapadeśaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ. ato
analyzed: iti asti teṣu manaḥ vyāpāraḥ iti tat nibaddham akṣa vyapadeśam labhate iti bhāvaḥ

analyzed: rūḍhiḥ vā paribhāṣā vā sarvathā vayam api pratyavasthātum śaktāḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: -- tasmād iti // 135 //
analyzed: tasmāt iti

original: sukhādisvasaṃvedane 'pi mana evākṣam āśritaṃ bhavadbhiḥ. tadvad ihāpi jātivikalpo bhaviṣyatīty āha -- manasas tv iti //136 //
analyzed: sukha ādi sva saṃvedane manaḥ eva akṣam āśritam bhavadbhiḥ tadvat iha api jāti vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha manasaḥ tu iti

original: atha samāne 'pi manodhīnatve svakīyakalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇānusāreṇa kiñcid eva pratyakṣam

original: eva pratyakṣaṃ vakṣyāma ity āha -- tadadhīnatveti // 137 //
analyzed: eva pratyakṣam vakṣyāmaḥ iti āha tad adhīna tva iti

original: pāriśeṣyād api pratyakṣāntarbhāva evāsyāḥ savikalpakadhiyo yukta ity āha -- liṅgādīti. nanu sati prāmāṇye pāriśeṣyaṃ bhavati,

original: na tv iyaṃ pramāṇam ata āha -- bādhaketi // 138 //
analyzed: na tu iyam pramāṇam atas āha bādhaka iti  /

original: idaṃ tv iha vaktavyam -- satyaṃ neyam apramāṇaṃ,
analyzed: idam tu iha vaktavyam satyam neyam apramāṇam

original: mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad vyavahārāvirodhāt. na ca pramāṇam asadarthagocaratvāt. nirvikalpapariplāvitasvalakṣaṇaprāpakatayā
analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna vat vyavahāra avirodhāt na ca pramāṇam asat artha gocara tvāt nirvikalpa pariplāvita sva lakṣaṇa prāpaka tayā

original: smṛtir ity ākhyāyate. na ca smaraṇaṃ pramāṇam ata āha -- na ceti. pūrvadṛṣṭārthaviṣayaṃ

analyzed: smaraṇam bhavati na ca nirvikalpakena

original: apratyakṣaviṣayatvāt tasya bhavatsiddhānte. asmākam api svalakṣaṇāntarasambhedaḥ pūrvam adṛṣṭa eva. na cāsadarthatvaṃ,
analyzed: apratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt tasya bhavat siddhānte asmākam api sva lakṣaṇa antara sambhedaḥ pūrvam adṛṣṭaḥ eva na ca asat artha tvam

original: vakṣyamāṇanyāyena jātyādīnāṃ sthāsyamānatvāt. ato nāgṛhītagrahaṇād aprāmāṇyaṃ nāsadarthatayā veti,

original: ataḥ pramāṇaṃ sat pāriśeṣyāt pratyakṣe 'ntarbhavatīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti.

original: viśeṣyād viśeṣaṇam. abhede viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyānupapatteḥ. ato 'rthāntarabhūtair jātyādibhir
analyzed: viśeṣyāt viśeṣaṇam abhede viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya anupapatteḥ atas rtha antara bhūtaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ

original: viśiṣṭe vastuni gṛhyamāṇe atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇād bhrāntir eva savikalpakajñānam ity
analyzed: viśiṣṭe vastuni gṛhyamāṇe a tasmin tad grahaṇāt bhrāntiḥ eva sa vikalpaka jñānam iti

original: āha -- jātyādīti // 140 //
analyzed: āha jāti ādi iti

original: pariharati -- naitad iti. kāraṇam āha -- sthitam iti. pararūpeṇa hi parasmin nirūpyamāṇe bhrāntir bhavati. na ca jātyādīnāṃ pārarūpyaṃ,

original: teṣām anatibhedād iti bhāvaḥ // 141 //
analyzed: teṣām anatibhedāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanv abhede viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvānupapattir uktā,
ata āha -- yadi hīti. na viśeṣaṇam ekāntato jātyādi viśeṣyād bhidyate,
analyzed: atas āha yadi hi iti na viśeṣaṇam ekāntataḥ jāti ādi viśeṣyāt bhidyate

original: sarvadaiva tadākārāvabodhād ity arthaḥ // 142 //
analyzed: sarvadā eva tad ākāra avabodhāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanv atyantabhinnam eva lākṣādirūpaṃ sphaṭikādi svākāreṇa viśiṣṭaṃ bodhayad dṛṣṭaṃ,
analyzed: nanu atyanta bhinnam eva lākṣā ādi rūpam sphaṭika ādi sva ākāreṇa viśiṣṭam bodhayat dṛṣṭam

original: tadvad eva hi jātyādiviśiṣṭabodho 'pi bhavan mithyā syād iti,
analyzed: tadvat eva hi jāti ādi viśiṣṭa bodhaḥ u pi bhavat mithyā syāt iti

original: ata āha -- sphaṭikādāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- uktam asmābhiḥ{1,
analyzed: atas āha sphaṭika ādau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ uktam

original: 261}sadaiva jātyādiviśiṣṭaṃ vastu gṛhyate. kasyacit kadācid vivekānavagamāt. ataḥ
analyzed: jāti ādi viśiṣṭam vastu gṛhyate kasyacid kadācid viveka anavagamāt atas

original: kathaṃ mithyā bhaviṣyati. lākṣopahitaṃ tu sphaṭikaṃ kaścid evāvyutpanno 'jātaviveko
analyzed: katham mithyā bhaviṣyati lākṣā upahitam tu sphaṭikam kaścid evā avyutpannaḥ jāta vivekaḥ

original: 'ruṇam iti budhyate. atas tajjñānaṃ bhrāntir bhavati. tadaiva hītare dṛṣṭavivekā
analyzed: iti budhyate atas tat jñānam bhrāntiḥ bhavati tadā eva hi itare dṛṣṭa vivekā

original: jānanti nedam aruṇam aupādhiko 'yam aruṇabhrama iti. avyutpanno 'pi copādhivigame
analyzed: jānanti na idam aruṇam aupādhikaḥ yam aruṇa bhramaḥ iti ca upādhi vigame

original: jānāty eva yathā nedam aruṇam iti. ato yuktaṃ bhrāntitvaṃ bādhotpādād iti // 143 //
analyzed: jānāti eva yathā na idam aruṇam iti atas yuktam bhrānti tvam bādhā utpādāt iti

original: jātyāditadvatāṃ tu parasparaviveko na dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ. ato na bhrāntitvaṃ yuktam ity
analyzed: jāti ādi tadvatām tu paraspara vivekaḥ na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ atas na bhrānti tvam yuktam iti

original: āha -- na hīti. nanu bhavatv evaṃ jātau. na hi tayā nirmuktaṃ vastu kadācid upalabhyate.
analyzed: āha na hi iti nanu bhavatu evam jātau na hi tayā nirmuktam vastu kadācid upalabhyate

original: guṇakarmabhyāṃ tu viyuktavastubodho dṛṣṭa eva. dhriyamāṇa eva hi dravye kutaścit
analyzed: guṇa karmabhyām tu viyukta vastu bodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva dhriyamāṇaḥ eva hi dravye kutaścid

original: kāraṇāt pūrvaguṇavināśo guṇāntarotpādaś ca dṛśyate. evaṃ karmaṇy api darśayitavyam.
analyzed: kāraṇāt pūrva guṇa vināśaḥ guṇa antara utpādaḥ ca dṛśyate evam karmaṇi api darśayitavyam

original: ataḥ kathaṃ tayor avyatirekaḥ,
analyzed: atas katham tayoḥ a vyatirekaḥ

original: ata āha - tadvimokeneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady api tadvimuktaṃ vastu dṛśyate,
analyzed: atas āha tad vimokena iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi api tad vimuktam vastu dṛśyate

original: tāni tu tadvimuktāni na jātu dṛśyante. yac ca nāma yato bhinnaṃ tat tato vimuktam
analyzed: tāni tu tad vimuktāni na jātu dṛśyante yat ca nāma yatas bhinnam tat tatas vimuktam

original: api kadācid upalabdhaṃ maṇer ivaupādhiko 'ruṇimā. na ceha tathā. ato vyāpakanivṛttyā
analyzed: api kadācid upalabdham maṇeḥ iva aupādhikaḥ ruṇimā na ca iha tathā atas vyāpaka nivṛttyā

original: vyāpyasyātyantabhedasya nivṛttiḥ. katham idānīṃ pūrvāparayor guṇakarmaṇor nāśotpādau.

original: tadviśiṣṭāni bhūmyaptejāṃsi dravyāṇi dvābhyāṃ darśanasparśanābhyām upalabhyante.
