original: rūpādipañcakaṃ vaikaikaśaś cakṣurādibhiḥ. evaṃ dravyāntaraguṇāntarakarmaṇāṃ jāteś
analyzed: rūpa ādi pañcakam vā ekaikaśas cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ evam dravya antara guṇa antara karmaṇām jāteḥ

original: ca yathādarśanaṃ vyavasthāsaṅkarāv anusandhātavyāv iti // 170 //
analyzed: ca yathādarśanam vyavasthā saṅkarau anusandhātavyau iti

original: {1,271} evaṃ tāvad asti dharmī grāhakabhede cābhinnaḥ. jātyādayaś ca tadanatirekiṇo
analyzed: evam tāvat asti dharmī grāhaka bhede ca abhinnaḥ jāti ādayaḥ ca tad an atirekiṇaḥ

original: dharmā iti pararūpanirūpaṇābhāvān na savikalpakajñānānāṃ mithyātvam ity uktam. idānīm
analyzed: dharmāḥ iti para rūpa nirūpaṇa abhāvāt na savikalpaka jñānānām mithyātvam iti uktam idānīm

original: aśabdarūpāṇām eva bhāvānāṃ savikalpakajñāneṣu śabdākāreṇa nirūpyamāṇatvād asti pārarūpyam iti ye vadanti,
analyzed: a śabda rūpāṇām eva bhāvānām sa vikalpaka jñāneṣu śabda ākāreṇa nirūpyamāṇa tvāt asti pārarūpyam iti ye vadanti

original: teṣāṃ matam upanyasyati -- nanv iti. ayam arthaḥ -- yady api jātyādirūpo dharmī,
analyzed: teṣām matam upanyasyati nanu iti ayam arthaḥ yadi api jāti ādi rūpaḥ dharmī

original: tathāpi teṣām eva śabdātiriktānām abhāvāt tadrūpeṇa vastuni nirūpyamāṇe śabdātmanaiva
analyzed: tathā api teṣām eva śabda atiriktānām abhāvāt tad rūpeṇa vastuni nirūpyamāṇe śabda ātmanā eva

original: nirūpaṇam āpadyate. tataś cāśabdātmanāṃ śabdātmanā nirūpaṇe punar api pārarūpyam
analyzed: nirūpaṇam āpadyate tatas ca a śabda ātmanām śabda ātmanā nirūpaṇe punar api pārarūpyam

original: āpannam iti mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad eva pañca vikalpā mithyā syur iti // 171 //
analyzed: āpannam iti mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna vat eva pañca vikalpāḥ mithyā syuḥ iti

original: pariharati -- na śabdeti. kāraṇam āha -- prāg iti. buddhir evātra śabdākārā nāstīti bhāvaḥ // 172 //
analyzed: pariharati na śabda iti kāraṇam āha prāk iti buddhiḥ eva atra śabda ākārā na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: atra codayati -- nanv iti dvayena. ayam arthaḥ -- kim idaṃ prāg śabdād yādṛśī buddhir
analyzed: atra codayati nanu iti dvayena ayam arthaḥ kim idam prāk śabdāt yādṛśī buddhiḥ

original: ity ucyate. na hi śabdārthasambandhajñānāt prāg gotvaśuklatvādirūpeṇa gavākārādibhāvaviṣayā
analyzed: iti ucyate na hi śabda artha sambandha jñānāt prāk go tva śukla tva ādi rūpeṇa gavākāra ādi bhāva viṣayā

original: buddhayo bhavanti. śabdasambandhottarakālam eva tadrūpā buddhir utpadyate. tad yadi
analyzed: buddhayaḥ bhavanti śabda sambandha uttara kālam eva tad rūpā buddhiḥ utpadyate tat yadi

original: śabdātirekiṇo jātyādayaḥ santi teṣāṃ ca tadrūpatvaṃ,
analyzed: śabda atirekiṇaḥ jāti ādayaḥ santi teṣām ca tad rūpa tvam

original: tataḥ prāg api śabdasambandhād aśabdajño 'pi tadrūpaṃ lakṣayet. na ca lakṣayati. ataḥ śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāc chabdasyaiva tadrūpatvam  #
analyzed: tatas prāk api śabda sambandhāt aśabdajñaḥ tad rūpam lakṣayet na ca lakṣayati atas śabda anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt śabdasya eva tad rūpa tvam

original: iti niścīyata iti // 174 //
analyzed: iti niścīyate iti

original: {1,272} pariharati -- yatheti. yathaiva hi rūparasagandhasparśaśabdā evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau vibhaktā bhāsante vināpi śabdam,
analyzed: pariharati yathā iti yathā eva hi rūpa rasa gandha sparśa śabdāḥ eva akṣa jāyām buddhau vibhaktāḥ bhāsante vinā api śabdam

original: evaṃ gotvādijātayo gamanādīni karmāṇi prāg api śabdān nirvikalpakenāpi vilakṣaṇena
analyzed: evam go tva ādi jātayaḥ gamana ādīni karmāṇi prāk api śabdāt nirvikalpakena api vilakṣaṇena

original: rūpeṇa pratīyanta eva. sambandhagrahaṇottarakālaṃ tu kevalaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhagrahaṇam
analyzed: rūpeṇa pratīyante eva sambandha grahaṇa uttara kālam tu kevalam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha grahaṇam

original: evādhikaṃ nāparaṃ kiñcit. yadi tu śabdādayo na santīty ucyate,
analyzed: eva adhikam na aparam kiñcid yadi tu śabda ādayaḥ na santi iti ucyate

original: kasyādhyāsa iti vaktavyam iti // 175 //
analyzed: kasya adhyāsaḥ iti vaktavyam iti

original: sidhyaty api śabdātmakatā yadi śabdasambhedāt prāg gotvādayo na pratīyanta eva. na tv etad asti,
analyzed: sidhyati api śabda ātmaka tā yadi śabda sambhedāt prāk go tva ādayaḥ na pratīyante eva na tu etat asti

original: agṛhītasambandhasyāpi tadbodhotpādād ity āha -- na ceti // 176 //
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhasya api tad bodha utpādāt iti āha na ca iti

original: parastād api nābhedopacāro 'stīty āha -- śrutīti. kāraṇam āha -- vivekād iti. dvābhyām[698]indriyābhyāṃ dvāv arthaśabdau gamyete ity arthaḥ
analyzed: parastāt api na abheda upacāraḥ sti iti āha śruti iti kāraṇam āha vivekāt iti dvau artha śabdau gamyete iti arthaḥ

original: [698] bhyāṃ dvā
analyzed: bhyām dvā

original: anyataradharmaniṣkarṣamātre tu śabdasya vyāpāraḥ,
analyzed: anyatara dharma niṣkarṣa mātre tu śabdasya vyāpāraḥ

original: na svarūpāropa ity āha -- ananteti // 178 //
analyzed: na svarūpa āropaḥ iti āha ananta iti

original: syād etat -- upāyaḥ śabdo 'rthabodhe. upāyadharmāś copeye 'dhyāropyamāṇā dṛṣṭā darpaṇādidharmā iva mukhādau,
analyzed: syāt etat upāyaḥ śabdaḥ rtha bodhe upāya dharmāḥ ca upeye dhī āropyamāṇāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ darpaṇa ādi dharmāḥ iva mukha ādau

original: ata āha -- na ceti. anaikāntiko hetur iti bhāvaḥ // 179 //
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: {1,273} atrāpare vadanti -- na vayaṃ jātyādīn apalapāmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. gaur ayam iti
analyzed: atra apare vadanti na vayam jāti ādīn apalapāmaḥ kim tarhi gauḥ ayam iti

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdarūpānuviddhabodhād rūpasamāropam ācakṣmahe iti. tān pratyāha
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabda rūpa anuviddha bodhāt rūpa samāropam ācakṣmahe iti tān pratyāha

original: -- nityam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi śabdarūpānuviddha eva sarvadā gotvādibodhaḥ
analyzed: nityam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi śabda rūpa anuviddhaḥ eva sarvadā go tva ādi bodhaḥ

original: rūpāntaraṃ tu teṣaṃ kadācid api na dṛṣṭaṃ,
analyzed: rūpa antaram tu teṣām kadācid api na dṛṣṭam

original: kathaṃ tarhi śabdarūpāt tadrūpabhedasiddhiḥ,
analyzed: katham tarhi śabda rūpāt tad rūpa bheda siddhiḥ

original: asati bhede kutra kim adhyastyata iti // 180 //
analyzed: asati bhede kutra kim adhyastyate iti

original: abhedābhyupagame ca pārarūpyābhāvān na savikalpakajñānānāṃ mithyātvam ity āha --
analyzed: abheda abhyupagame ca pārarūpya abhāvāt na savikalpaka jñānānām mithyātvam iti āha

original: yady abheda iti. pāramārthike tu svarūpabhedābhyupagame 'dhyāropavācoyuktir anarthikā.
analyzed: yadi abhedaḥ iti pāramārthike tu svarūpa bheda abhyupagame dhyāropa vācoyuktiḥ anarthikā

original: na hy asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvaṃ vastu vastvantarātmanā bhrāntivarjitair āropayituṃ śakyate.
analyzed: na hi asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvam vastu vastu antarātmanā bhrānti varjitaiḥ āropayitum śakyate

original: na ca sarvadā sarveṣāṃ bhrāntiḥ sambhavati,
analyzed: na ca sarvadā sarveṣām bhrāntiḥ sambhavati

original: tad etad āha -- bhedaś ced iti. ato bhrāntyaiveyam adhyāsakalpanā tadvādinām ity āha -- bhrāntyeti // 181 //
analyzed: tat etat āha bhedaḥ ced iti atas bhrāntyā eva iyam adhyāsa kalpanā tad vādinām iti āha bhrāntyā iti

original: bhrāntau bījam āha -- śabdeneti. gṛhīto hy artho na śabdam antareṇa nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyata
analyzed: bhrāntau bījam āha śabdena iti gṛhītaḥ hi arthaḥ na śabdam antareṇa nirdeṣṭum śakyata

original: iti bhāvaḥ. tathāpi kim ata āha -- gaur iti. trayāṇām api vācyavācakajñānānāṃ samāno
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ tathā api kim atas āha gauḥ iti trayāṇām api vācya vācaka jñānānām

original: nirdeśaḥ gaur[699]iti śabdo gaur ity artho gaur iti jñānam iti. vācyaṃ ca sa ca buddhiś
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ śabdaḥ gauḥ iti arthaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam iti vācyam ca sa ca buddhiḥ

original: ca vācyatadbuddhayaḥ. tadvādināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gaur iti samāno nirdeśaḥ pratīyata ity arthaḥ // 182 //
analyzed: ca vācya tad buddhayaḥ tad vādinām puruṣāṇām gauḥ iti samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ pratīyate iti arthaḥ

original: [699] gor artho (KA)
analyzed: goḥ arthaḥ ka

original: tathāpi kiṃ jātam ata āha -- nirdeśeti. ayam arthaḥ -- evaṃ hi śrotā vikalpayati yato 'yaṃ vaktā triṣv api samānaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
analyzed: tathā api kim jātam atas āha nirdeśa iti ayam arthaḥ evam hi śrotā vikalpayati yatas yam vaktā triṣu api samānam śabdam prayuṅkte

original: 274}'syānubhavas triṣv api samāna eva. tadvac ca svayam api savikalpakajñānaprameyam
analyzed: triṣu api samānaḥ eva tadvat ca svayam api sa vikalpaka jñāna prameyam

original: arthaṃ budhyamānas trigocarasya jñānasya vaktṛsvarūpatām adhyavasyati. yādṛśaṃ vaktrā
analyzed: artham budhyamānaḥ tri gocarasya jñānasya vaktṛ sva rūpa tām adhyavasyati yādṛśam vaktrā

original: pratipannaṃ tādṛg eva pratipadyata iti yāvat. evaṃ pūrvapūrvavaktranusāreṇottarottareṣāṃ
analyzed: pratipannam tādṛś eva pratipadyate iti yāvat evam pūrva pūrva vaktṛ anusāreṇa uttara uttareṣām

original: śrotṝṇāṃ nirdeśasādhāraṇyād adhyāsabhrama iti // 183 //
analyzed: śrotṝṇām nirdeśa sādhāraṇyāt adhyāsa bhramaḥ iti

original: yadi nirdeśasādhāraṇyād bhrāntiḥ,
arthādhyāsa eva kiṃ na śabdabuddhyoḥ pratipādyate. samānaṃ hi bhrāntibījam ata āha
analyzed: artha adhyāsaḥ eva kim na śabda buddhyoḥ pratipādyate samānam hi bhrānti bījam atas āha

original: -- bhrāntīti. upāyo hy arthasya jaḍātmanaḥ svayam aprakāśasya matiśrutī. upāyapūrvikā
analyzed: bhrāntī iti upāyaḥ hi arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ svayam aprakāśasya mati śrutī upāya pūrvikā

original: copeyasthitir iti tatpūrvam arthaṃ budhyamānās tadadhyāsaṃ manyante. śrutiś ca śrūyata
analyzed: ca upeya sthitiḥ iti tad pūrvam artham budhyamānāḥ tad adhyāsam manyante śrutiḥ ca śrūyata

original: iti śabdo 'bhidhīyate. matyadhyāsaś ca pūrvam anupakṣipto 'pi kaiścid āśritaḥ. sa
analyzed: iti śabdaḥ abhidhīyate mati adhyāsaḥ ca pūrvam anupakṣiptaḥ kaiścid āśritaḥ sa

original: ca śabdādhyāsanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛto bhaviṣyatīty upanyastaḥ. evaṃ
analyzed: ca śabda adhyāsa nirākaraṇena eva tulya nyāya tayā nirākṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati iti upanyastaḥ evam

original: bauddhagandhivaiyākaraṇā manyante -- jātyādir artho vyatirekāvyatirekavikalpadūrīkṛtanirūpaṇaḥ.[700]śūnyāṅkurajanmādau
analyzed: bauddha gandhi vaiyākaraṇāḥ manyante jāti ādiḥ

original: tu bāhyā[701]sambhavād aśakyo 'bhyupagantum,
analyzed: tu aśakyaḥ bhyupagantum

original: ato jñānākāra evārtha iti. tad api jñānāt prāg evārtharūpopalambhāt taddvāreṇaiva
analyzed: atas jñāna ākāraḥ eva arthaḥ iti tat api jñānāt prāk eva artha rūpa upalambhāt tad dvāreṇa eva

original: jñānāvadhāraṇān nirākṛtaṃ veditavyam. vikalpaparihāras tv ākṛtigranthe vakṣyate.
analyzed: jñāna avadhāraṇāt nirākṛtam veditavyam vikalpa parihāraḥ tu ākṛti granthe vakṣyate

original: śūnyādau tu bāhyārthasambhavo nirālambanavāda iti // 184 //
[700] rākaraṇaḥ (KA)
analyzed: rā karaṇaḥ ka

original: [701] hyārthasaṃ (GA)
analyzed: hi ārthasam ga

original: nipuṇaṃ tu cintayatāṃ triṣv api vilakṣaṇā buddhir upajāyata ity āha -- gotva iti. ubhayor jñānam anākāram anumīyata ity arthaḥ // 185 //
analyzed: nipuṇam tu cintayatām triṣu api vilakṣaṇā buddhiḥ upajāyate iti āha go tve iti ubhayoḥ jñānam anākāram anumīyate iti arthaḥ  /

original: ayam aparaḥ śabdādhyāse doṣa ity āha -- yadi ceti. śabdena sahābhedarūpeṇety arthaḥ.
analyzed: ayam aparaḥ śabda adhyāse doṣaḥ iti āha yadi ca iti śabdena saha abheda rūpeṇa iti arthaḥ

original: akṣādau śabde 'dhyasyamāne śabdaikatvāt tadrūpatvāc cārthasya devanāder ekatvaṃ prasajyata iti // 186 //
analyzed: akṣa ādau śabde dhyasyamāne śabda ekatvāt tad rūpa tvāt ca arthasya devanā ādeḥ ekatvam prasajyate iti

original: {1,275} nanv asty evānakṣanivṛttyā triṣv apy ekatvaṃ,
analyzed: nanu asti eva an akṣa nivṛttyā triṣu api ekatvam

original: na. śabdāt prāganavagateḥ. agṛhītasambandhasya ca śabdasyāpratyāyakatvāt. tad etad
analyzed: na śabdāt prāk anavagateḥ agṛhīta sambandhasya ca śabdasya apratyāyaka tvāt tat etat

original: āśaṅkayā sahāha -- syād iti. adhyāsavādī svābhiprāyeṇa codayati -- gavādiṣv iti.
analyzed: āśaṅkayā saha āha syāt iti adhyāsa vādī sva abhiprāyeṇa codayati gav ādiṣu iti

original: itaraś ca[702]svamatatvenottaram āha -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- eketi. dṛśyate hi prāg
analyzed: itaraḥ āha na iti kāraṇam āha ekā iti dṛśyate hi prāk

original: eva śabdān nirvikalpakenāpy ekaṃ rūpam anugatam iti prāg evoktam iti // 187 //
analyzed: eva śabdāt nirvikalpakena api ekam rūpam anugatam iti prāk eva uktam iti

original: [702] vastutve (GA)
analyzed: vastu tve ga

original: vibhītakādiṣu naikarūpānugamo 'stīty āha -- traya iti. śabda evātra sādhāraṇo gavādijātiśabdavilakṣaṇo nārtha iti // 188 //
analyzed: vibhītaka ādiṣu na eka rūpa anugamaḥ sti iti āha trayaḥ iti śabdaḥ eva atra sādhāraṇaḥ go ādi jāti śabda vilakṣaṇaḥ na arthaḥ iti

original: kiṃ punar atrāpy ekaśabdavācyatayā śābaleyādivadekadharmānvayo neṣyate. ata āha --
analyzed: kim punar atra api eka śabda vācya tayā śābaleya ādi vat eka dharma anvayaḥ na iṣyate atas āha

original: paraspareti. ayaṃ ca viviktākṛtibodho 'dhyāsapakṣe na yuktaḥ. śabdarūpasyāvibhāgād
analyzed: paraspara iti ayam ca vivikta ākṛti bodhaḥ dhyāsa pakṣe na yuktaḥ śabda rūpasya avibhāgāt

original: ity āha -- tadadhyāsa iti // 189 //
analyzed: iti āha tad adhyāsaḥ iti

original: nanu na varṇaḥ śabdaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. sphoṭaḥ. tad iha bhinnārthapratyayāvaseya eva bhinnaḥ
analyzed: nanu na varṇaḥ śabdaḥ kim tarhi sphoṭaḥ tat iha bhinna artha pratyaya avaseyaḥ eva bhinnaḥ

original: sphoṭa ity āśaṅkate -- bhinnāḥ syur iti. tatra parihāram āha -- neti. kāraṇam āha
analyzed: sphoṭaḥ iti āśaṅkate bhinnāḥ syuḥ iti tatra parihāram āha na iti kāraṇam āha

original: -- artha iti. saṃśayo hy artha uccarite śabde bhavati. sa śabdabhede na bhaved iti
analyzed: arthaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ hi arthaḥ uccarite śabde bhavati sa śabda bhede na bhavet iti

original: bhāvaḥ. yadi saṃśayaḥ tataḥ kim ata āha -- na sāmānyād iti. sāmānyadarśananibandhano
analyzed: bhāvaḥ yadi saṃśayaḥ tatas kim atas āha na sāmānyāt iti sāmānya darśana nibandhanaḥ

original: hi saṃśayaḥ. sa śabdabhede 'nupapanna iti. śabdasādṛśyāt tarhi saṃśayo bhaviṣyatīty
analyzed: hi saṃśayaḥ sa śabda bhede nu upapannaḥ iti śabda sādṛśyāt tarhi saṃśayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: ata āha -- rūpābheda iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na varṇātiriktaḥ padasphoṭo 'stīti vakṣyāmaḥ. varṇā eva hi padaṃ,
analyzed: atas āha rūpa abhedaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na varṇa atiriktaḥ pada sphoṭaḥ sti iti vakṣyāmaḥ varṇāḥ eva hi padam

original: te cābhinnarūpāḥ pratīyanta iti // 190 //
analyzed: te ca abhinna rūpāḥ pratīyante iti

original: {1,276} durbhaṇaḥ śabdabheda iti dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bhavatyādāv iti // 191 //
analyzed: śabda bhedaḥ iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha bhavati ādau iti

original: ayaṃ cāparo doṣa ity āha -- śabdeti kathamantena. abhinnā hi śabdasya niṣpannarūpatā
analyzed: ayam ca aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha śabda iti katham antena abhinnā hi śabdasya niṣpanna rūpa tā

original: nāmākhyātayor iti. idaṃ ca nopapadyata ity āha -- kathaṃ ceti. kaḥ punar mūrto 'rthaḥ.
analyzed: nāma ākhyātayoḥ iti idam ca na upapadyate iti āha katham ca iti kaḥ punar mūrtaḥ rthaḥ

original: na tāvaj jātiḥ amūrtatvāt. vyaktis tv adhyāsavādibhir api nāpalapitaiva. sā ca mūrtaiveti.
analyzed: na tāvat jātiḥ amūrta tvāt vyaktiḥ tu adhyāsa vādibhiḥ api nā apalapitā eva sā ca mūrtā evā iti

original: ko doṣaḥ. satyam. idaṃ tu pariṇāmavivartavādinaḥ pratyuktam. pariṇāmavādino hi vāg
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ satyam idam tu pariṇāma vivarta vādinaḥ pratyuktam pariṇāma vādinaḥ hi vāc

original: evārthātmanā pariṇamatīti manyante,
analyzed: eva artha ātmanā pariṇamati iti manyante

original: ta upālabhyante. katham amūrtasya mūrtaḥ pariṇāmaḥ. mūrtānāṃ hi mṛdādīnāṃ mūrto ghaṭādipariṇāmo
analyzed: te upālabhyante katham amūrtasya mūrtaḥ pariṇāmaḥ mūrtānām hi mṛd ādīnām mūrtaḥ ghaṭa ādi pariṇāmaḥ

original: bhavatīti yuktam. evaṃ vivartavāde 'pi vācyam. mūrtaṃ hi mukham ādarśe vivṛttaṃ yuktaṃ
analyzed: bhavati iti yuktam evam vivarta vāde vācyam mūrtam hi mukham ādarśe vivṛttam yuktam

original: yad mūrtam upalabhyate. amūrtavivarte tu kathaṃ mūrtanirbhāsā buddhir iti // 192 //
analyzed: yat mūrtam upalabhyate amūrta vivarte tu katham mūrta nirbhāsā buddhiḥ iti

original: tathā yac cedaṃ gavāśvādayo jātiśabdāḥ śuklādayo guṇaśabdā iti vibhajyante,
analyzed: tathā yat ca idam gavāśva ādayaḥ jāti śabdāḥ śukla ādayaḥ guṇa śabdāḥ iti vibhajyante

original: tad api vācyarūpānapekṣaṇe nopapadyata ity āha -- gavāśveti //
analyzed: tat api vācya rūpa anapekṣaṇe na upapadyate iti āha gavāśva iti

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo 'pi bāhyārthānapekṣayā na vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha -- vṛkṣaplakṣādīti // 194 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ pi bāhya artha anapekṣayā na vyavatiṣṭhate iti āha vṛkṣa plakṣa ādi iti

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca nīlotpalādiṣu śabdabuddhyor ivārthabuddhyor api nādhyāsa upapanna ity āha -- sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti. api ca{1,
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca nīlotpala ādiṣu śabda buddhyoḥ iva artha buddhyoḥ api na adhyāsaḥ upapannaḥ iti āha sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti api

original: 277}ekatropasaṃhṛte buddhī samānādhikaraṇe bhavataḥ. tad ihādhyāsavādināṃ kutraikatropasaṃhāro vācyaḥ. na tāvad asādhāraṇe,
analyzed: buddhī samāna adhikaraṇe bhavataḥ tat iha adhyāsa vādinām kutra ekatra upasaṃhāraḥ vācyaḥ na tāvat asādhāraṇe

original: tasyāpi kalpanīyatvād ity āha -- ekatreti. asmanmate tu vācyabhāgānupraveśadvāreṇāsty ekatropasaṃhāra iti vivecanīyam iti // 195 //
analyzed: tasya api kalpanīya tvāt iti āha ekatra iti asmad mate tu vācya bhāga anupraveśa dvāreṇa asti ekatra upasaṃhāraḥ iti vivecanīyam iti  /

original: yadi tv asādhāraṇa eva vastutvasāmānyagocara upasaṃhāra iṣyate,
analyzed: yadi tu asādhāraṇaḥ eva vastu tva sāmānya gocaraḥ upasaṃhāraḥ iṣyate

original: tataḥ sarveṣām eva gavāśvādiśabdānāṃ vastugocaratvāviśeṣāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāpnotīty
analyzed: tatas sarveṣām eva gavāśva ādi śabdānām vastu gocara tva aviśeṣāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam prāpnoti iti

original: āha -- vastumātra iti. iha vastutvābhyupagamam anāpādyaiva vārttikakṛtā doṣabāhulyād
analyzed: āha vastu mātre iti iha vastu tva abhyupagamam an āpādya eva vārttikakṛtā doṣa bāhulyāt

original: atiprasaṅgo 'bhihita iti // 196 //
analyzed: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhihitaḥ iti

original: abhyupagamyāpy asādhāraṇopasaṃhāraṃ vyaktyānantyān nīlopalapadaprayogo na syāt,
analyzed: abhyupagamya api asādhāraṇa upasaṃhāram vyakti ānantyāt nīla upala pada prayogaḥ na syāt

original: dṛśyate cāsāv iti dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- na ceti // 197 //
analyzed: dṛśyate ca asau iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha na ca iti

original: na cānekanīlotpalavyaktisādhāraṇī nīlotpalatvajātir bhavadbhir iṣyate yatra śabdo vartetety āha -- na ceti. na kevalaṃ neṣyate,
analyzed: na ca aneka nīlotpala vyakti sādhāraṇī nīlotpala tva jātiḥ bhavadbhiḥ iṣyate yatra śabdaḥ varteta iti āha na ca iti na kevalam na iṣyate

original: yuktiś ca tadabhyupagame na bhavatīty āha -- śabdārthayor iti. dvau hy atra nīlotpalaśabdāv
analyzed: yuktiḥ ca tad abhyupagame na bhavati iti āha śabda arthayoḥ iti dvau hi atra nīlotpala śabdau

original: adhyasyete. ataḥ śrutaśabdabhāgānugatau dvāv eva śabdādhyāsarūpāv arthau gamyete.
analyzed: adhyasyete atas śruta śabda bhāga anugatau dvau eva śabda adhyāsa rūpau arthau gamyete

original: na hi śabdadvayādhyāse pratyāyyaikatvaṃ sambhavatīti // 198 //
analyzed: na hi śabda dvaya adhyāse pratyāyya eka tvam sambhavati iti

original: yadi sahaprayogamātrāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam ity ucyate,
analyzed: yadi saha prayoga mātrāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti ucyate

original: sa tarhi paryāyaśabdayor api kadācid avyutpannabodhārthe prayogo dṛṣṭa iti tayor api sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syād ity āha -- śabdadvayasyeti // 199
analyzed: sa tarhi paryāya śabdayoḥ api kadācid avyutpanna bodha arthe prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti tayoḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt iti āha śabda dvayasya iti

original: {1,278} api ca nānavagatasambandhaṃ padaṃ pratyāyayati. na cānavagate 'rthe sambandho
analyzed: api ca na anavagata sambandham padam pratyāyayati na ca anavagate rthe

original: 'nubhavituṃ śakyate. tad ihādhyāsavāde sambandhānubhavavelāyāṃ kīdṛśo 'rthaḥ pratyetavya
analyzed: anubhavitum śakyate tat iha adhyāsa vāde sambandha anubhava velāyām kīdṛśaḥ rthaḥ pratyetavya

original: iti vācyam ity āha -- na ceti. na kenacid rūpeṇa pratyetuṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ // 200 //
analyzed: iti vācyam iti āha na ca iti na kenacid rūpeṇa pratyetum śakyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: kim iti na śakyate,
analyzed: kim iti na śakyate

original: ata āha -- tadānīm iti. śabdarūpo hy arthaḥ. na cāvyutpannas tādrūpyāvadhāraṇe samarthaḥ.
analyzed: atas āha tadānīm iti śabda rūpaḥ hi arthaḥ na ca avyutpannaḥ tādrūpya avadhāraṇe samarthaḥ

original: tad ihādhyāsāt sambandhabuddhiḥ tataś cādhyāsa iti tatretaretarāśrayam iti bhāvaḥ.
analyzed: tat iha adhyāsāt sambandha buddhiḥ tatas ca adhyāsaḥ iti tatra itaretara āśrayam iti bhāvaḥ

original: asādhāraṇena ca sambandhagrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkannīyam eva,
analyzed: asādhāraṇena ca sambandha grahaṇam na āśaṅkannīyam eva

original: piṇḍāntare 'prayogaprasaṅgād ity āha -- na ceti // 201 //
analyzed: piṇḍa antare prayoga prasaṅgāt iti āha na ca iti

original: tad idānīṃ sambandhānapekṣasyaiva śabdasyātmādhyāsaśaktatvaṃ balād āpatitaṃ,
analyzed: tat idānīm sambandha anapekṣasya eva śabdasya ātma adhyāsa śakta tvam balāt āpatitam

original: tatra ca prathamaśrāviṇo 'pi tadrūpārthabodhaprasaṅga ity āha -- tatreti //
analyzed: tatra ca tad rūpa artha bodha prasaṅgaḥ iti āha tatra iti

original: na ca vākyaṃ tavāpi śabdo nityam arthena sambaddhaḥ tat kimarthe smaraṇaṃ nādadhātīti. mama hy asti vācyaṃ vyatiriktaṃ tad,
analyzed: na ca vākyam tava api śabdaḥ nityam arthena sambaddhaḥ tat kimarthe smaraṇam na ādadhāti iti mama hi asti vācyam vyatiriktam tat

original: yena vācyavācakasambandho 'vagataḥ sa śabdadarśanād arthaṃ smarati. yas tv asyedaṃ
analyzed: yena vācya vācaka sambandhaḥ vagataḥ sa śabda darśanāt artham smarati yaḥ tu asya idam

original: vācyam iti na jānāti na tasyārthasmaraṇam iti nānupapannaṃ kiñcid ity āha -- mameti.
analyzed: vācyam iti na jānāti na tasya artha smaraṇam iti na anupapannam kiñcid iti āha mama iti

original: bhavatas tu vācakarūpātiriktavācyarūpābhāvāt prathamaśravaṇe 'py adhyastarūpatā syād
analyzed: bhavataḥ tu vācaka rūpa atirikta vācya rūpa abhāvāt prathama śravaṇe pi adhyasta rūpa tā syāt

original: iti pūrveṇa sambandha ity āha -- bhavata iti // 203 //
analyzed: iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ iti āha bhavataḥ iti

original: na tv etad astīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati -- yatheti // 204 //
analyzed: na tu etat asti iti vyatirekeṇa darśayati yathā iti

original: {1,279} yataś ca gṛhītaśabdo 'pi nārthaṃ pratipadyate,
analyzed: yatas ca na artham pratipadyate

original: tato naiva vācakādhīnaṃ vācyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. pramāṇāntarāvagatārtharūpasmārakatvāt tu śruter eva tatpāratantryaṃ yuktam ity āha --  #
analyzed: tatas na eva vācaka adhīnam vācyam iti āha tasmāt iti pramāṇa antara avagata artha rūpa smāraka tvāt tu śruteḥ eva tat pāratantryam yuktam iti āha  /

original: smārakatvād iti // 205 //
analyzed: smāraka tvāt iti

original: upasaṃharati -- teneti // 206 //
analyzed: upasaṃharati tena iti

original: pravṛttinivṛttyupadeśeṣu kuryād na kuryād ity evamādiṣu śabdasyātadātmakatvāt tadātmakārthabodho 'nupapanna ity āha -- pravṛttāv iti // 207
analyzed: pravṛtti nivṛtti upadeśeṣu kuryāt na kuryāt iti evamādiṣu śabdasya a tad ātmaka tvāt tad ātmaka artha bodhaḥ nupapannaḥ iti āha pravṛttau iti

original: paryāyaśabdeṣu ca śabdabhedād artha(?bhedopa/
analyzed: paryāya śabdeṣu ca śabda bhedāt artha bheda upa

original: bhedā)pattir ity āha -- karahastādīti // 208 //
analyzed: bheda āpattiḥ iti āha kara hasta ādi iti

original: api cāyam adhyāsaḥ sādṛśyād vā bhavati śuktāv iva rajatasya,
analyzed: api ca ayam adhyāsaḥ sādṛśyāt vā bhavati śuktau iva rajatasya

original: uparāgād vā maṇāv iva japāruṇimnaḥ. na caitad ubhayam api śabdādhyāse sambhavati.
analyzed: uparāgāt vā maṇau iva japa aruṇimnaḥ na ca etat ubhayam api śabda adhyāse sambhavati

original: dūrasthenānurāgāsambhavāt sādṛśyānavagateś ceti. tad etad āha -- ātmādhyāsa iti sārdhena.
analyzed: dūra sthena anurāga asambhavāt sādṛśya anavagateḥ ca iti tat etat āha ātma adhyāsaḥ iti sārdhena

original: yad api vivartavādināṃ pratyavasthānaṃ dūrastham api candrādi jale vivarta(?m u /
analyzed: yat api vivarta vādinām pratyavasthānam dūra stham api candra ādi jale vivartam

original: u)palabhyate,
analyzed: upalabhyate

original: tadvacchabdo 'pi pratyeṣyata iti. tad ayuktam. arūpasya pratibimbāsambhavād ity āha -- dūrastheti // 210 //
analyzed: tadvat śabdaḥ api pratyeṣyate iti tat ayuktam arūpasya pratibimba asambhavāt iti āha dūra stha iti  /

original: {1,280} nanu yad idam uktaṃ dūrasthatvāc chabdenānurāgo na sambhavatīti. tad ayuktam. vaibhavena śabdasya sarvatra sannidhānād ata āha -- śabdeti
analyzed: nanu yat idam uktam dūra stha tvāt śabdena anurāgaḥ na sambhavati iti tat ayuktam vaibhavena śabdasya sarvatra sannidhānāt atas āha śabda iti

original: kiñcāyam anurāgaḥ samānendriyagrāhyeṇaiva dṛṣṭaḥ yathā cākṣuṣasya maṇer aruṇimnā
analyzed: kiñca ayam anurāgaḥ samāna indriya grāhyeṇa eva dṛṣṭaḥ yathā cākṣuṣasya maṇeḥ aruṇimnā

original: cākṣuṣeṇaiva. na hi tvacā sphaṭike 'nubhūyamāne cākṣuṣo 'ruṇimā tam anurañjayati.
analyzed: cākṣuṣeṇa eva na hi tvacā sphaṭike nubhūyamāne cākṣuṣaḥ ruṇimā tam anurañjayati

original: evaṃ śrautraḥ śabdo na cākṣuṣam artham anurañjayituṃ śaknotīty āha -- na ceti // 292 //
analyzed: evam śrautraḥ śabdaḥ na cākṣuṣam artham anurañjayitum śaknoti iti āha na ca iti

original: evaṃ tāvad aśabdātmanaḥ śabdātmakatayā vedane pārarūpyaprasañjanena yat savikalpakajñānānāṃ
analyzed: evam tāvat aśabda ātmanaḥ śabda ātmaka tayā vedane pārarūpya prasañjanena yat sa vikalpaka jñānānām

original: mithyātvam uktaṃ tannirākṛtam. adhyāsavādināṃ tu savikalpakajñānamithyātvenānumānādīnāṃ
analyzed: mithyātvam uktam tat nirākṛtam adhyāsa vādinām tu sa vikalpaka jñāna mithyātvena anumāna ādīnām

original: prāmāṇyaṃ durlabham ity āha -- anumāneti. na kevalam anumānādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na sidhyati,
analyzed: prāmāṇyam durlabham iti āha anumāna iti na kevalam anumāna ādīnām prāmāṇyam na sidhyati

original: sarvanirūpaṇānām eva tu vikalpādhīnatvāt sarvalokavedavyavahārocchedaprasaṅga ity āha -- nirūpaṇasyeti. nirūpaṇaṃ nirṇaya iti // 213 //
analyzed: sarva nirūpaṇānām eva tu vikalpa adhīna tvāt sarva loka veda vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ iti āha nirūpaṇasya iti nirūpaṇam nirṇayaḥ iti

original: nanu sarvaṃ mithyaiva vāco 'tiriktaṃ vāṅmayatvād viśvasya,
analyzed: nanu sarvam mithyā eva vācaḥ tiriktam vāc maya tvāt viśvasya

original: tad yathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni santṛṇṇāny evamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk santṛṇṇā oṅkāra
analyzed: tat yathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni santṛṇṇāni evam oṅkāreṇa sarvā vāc santṛṇṇā oṅkāra

original: evedaṃ sarvaṃ vāg eva viśvā bhuvanāni jajñire iti śruteḥ. ata āha -- tathāstv iti.
analyzed: eva idam sarvam vāc eva viśvā bhuvanāni jajñire iti śruteḥ atas āha tathā astu iti

original: sarvamithyātve pratijñāyā eva mithyātvād na sarvamithyātvaṃ sidhyatīti // 214 //
analyzed: sarva mithyātve pratijñāyāḥ eva mithyātvāt na sarva mithyātvam sidhyati iti

original: {1,281} api cāyam adhyāsāparanāmnā bāhyāpalāpaḥ. bāhyāpalāpo māhāyānikaḥ pakṣaḥ.
analyzed: api ca ayam adhyāsa apara nāmnā bāhya apalāpaḥ bāhya apalāpaḥ māhāyānikaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: sa ca śūnyavādottareṇaiva nirākārya ity āha -- śūnyavādeti. buddhigrahaṇaṃ buddhyadhyāsanirākaraṇārtham.
analyzed: sa ca śūnyavāda uttareṇa eva nirākāryaḥ iti āha śūnyavāda iti buddhi grahaṇam buddhi adhyāsa nirākaraṇa artham

original: idaṃ ca prāg api vyākhyātam iti // 215 //
analyzed: idam ca prāk api vyākhyātam iti

original: prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. bhinnaikatvādibuddhibhir iti. anugatavyāvṛttibuddhibhir ity arthaḥ // 216 //
analyzed: prakaraṇa artham upasaṃharati  tasmāt iti bhinna eka tva ādi buddhibhiḥ iti anugata vyāvṛtti buddhibhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ tāvat pramāṇāntarapratipannārthagocaraḥ śabdaḥ na tat tantram artharūpam ity uktam. idānīṃ tu yady api śabdopāyako 'rtho 'sati śabde nāvagamyate,
analyzed: evam tāvat pramāṇa antara pratipanna artha gocaraḥ śabdaḥ na tat tantram artha rūpam iti uktam idānīm tu yadi api śabda upāyakaḥ sati śabde na avagamyate

original: tathāpi na tasya svarūpanāśo bhavati. na hi cakṣurāder abhāve rūpādipañcakaṃ na pratīyata
analyzed: tathā api na tasya svarūpa nāśaḥ bhavati na hi cakṣuḥ ādeḥ abhāve rūpa ādi pañcakam na pratīyata

original: iti tad asad bhavati. tad etad āha -- śabdābhyupāyaka iti dvayena. iha copāyāpekṣatvenāsattvaṃ nirākṛtaṃ,
analyzed: iti tat asat bhavati tat etat āha śabda abhyupāyakaḥ iti dvayena iha ca upāya apekṣa tvena asattvam nirākṛtam

original: na hi dīpendriyādīnām ity atra hetor anaikāntikatvam uktam iti viveka iti // 217-218 //
analyzed: na hi dīpa indriya ādīnām iti atra hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam uktam iti vivekaḥ iti

original: nanv astu śabdātiriktam artharūpam. tat tu sambandhagrahaṇāt prāk śabdākāreṇa nāvagatam.
analyzed: nanu astu śabda atiriktam artha rūpam tat tu sambandha grahaṇāt prāk śabda ākāreṇa na avagatam

original: uttarakālaṃ tu tadākāram avagamyata ity atadākārasya tadākārapratīter mithyātvam
analyzed: uttara kālam tu tad ākāram avagamyate iti a tad ākārasya tad ākāra pratīteḥ mithyātvam

original: ata āha -- sambandhasyeti. nityo hi vācyavācakasambandha iti pūrvam api tacchabdavācyaśaktir
analyzed: atas āha sambandhasya iti nityaḥ hi vācya vācaka sambandhaḥ iti pūrvam api tad śabda vācya śaktiḥ

original: āsīd eva. parastāt tv abhivyaktā.{1,
analyzed: āsīt eva parastāt tu

original: 282}etāvac ca tadānīm api śabdākāratvaṃ na tadātmatā. ato nātadākāraṃ tadākāratayā
analyzed: ca tadānīm api śabda ākāra tvam na tad ātma tā atas na a tad ākāram tad ākāra tayā

original: gamyata iti kuto bhrāntiḥ. śabdasambandhamātreṇa cedaṃ śabdākāratvam ucyate. na tu śabdātmakatayā,
analyzed: gamyate iti kutas bhrāntiḥ śabda sambandha mātreṇa ca idam śabda ākāra tvam ucyate na tu śabda ātmaka tayā

original: nityaṃ yadi ca gotvādīty atra śabdātmakatvam aṅgīkṛtya bhrāntitvaṃ nirākṛtam iti
analyzed: nityam yadi ca go tva ādi iti atra śabda ātmaka tvam aṅgīkṛtya bhrānti tvam nirākṛtam iti

original: vivekaḥ. arūpatā aśabdarūpatety arthaḥ. kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate sambandhagrahaṇāt
analyzed: vivekaḥ arūpa tā aśabda rūpa tā iti arthaḥ katham punar idam avagamyate sambandha grahaṇāt

original: prāg api tadrūpam āsīd iti,
analyzed: prāk api tat rūpam āsīt iti

original: atrāha -- yugapad iti. na hi yugapad eva sarve śabdāsambhinnam arthaṃ budhyante. yadaiva hy eko 'śabdākāram arthaṃ pratyeti,

analyzed: jñānam jāyate sarvam tat pratyakṣam abhyupagantavyam iti āha tena iti

original: nanu viditaśabdārthasambadhāḥ satyevendriyārthasambandhe kecid eva tam arthaṃ jātyādinā
analyzed: nanu sati eva indriya artha sambandhe kecid eva tam artham jāti ādinā

original: vikalpayanti nāpare. atas tāvatsāmagrīkasyaiva kasyacid abhāvād apratibandhakakāraṇaviśeṣā
analyzed: vikalpayanti na apare atas tāvat sāmagrīkasya eva kasyacid abhāvāt a pratibandhaka kāraṇa viśeṣā

original: bhrāntir eva savikalpakapratyaya ity ata āha -- vimanaskā iti dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ
analyzed: bhrāntiḥ eva savikalpaka pratyayaḥ iti atas āha vimanaskāḥ iti dvayena ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: -- na vyutpattīndriyasamprayogamātrajaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ,
analyzed: na vyutpatti indriya samprayoga mātra jam jñānam sa vikalpakam

original: tad api sarvasādhāraṇaṃ manaḥpraṇidhānādy apekṣate. ato yadi nāma kasyacid vimanaskasya dūrasūkṣmasādṛśyādiviṣayadoṣād vyāmūḍhasya nāmuko 'yam  #
analyzed: tat api sarva sādhāraṇam manaḥ praṇidhāna ādi apekṣate atas yadi nāma kasyacid vimanaskasya dūra sūkṣma sādṛśya ādi viṣaya doṣāt vyāmūḍhasya nāmukaḥ yam

original: iti viśadataram avabhāso bhavati,
analyzed: iti viśadataram avabhāsaḥ bhavati

original: naitāvatā kuśalasya sūkṣmasādṛśyādivivekacaturasyāpi vibhrameṇa bhavitavyam iti yuktam iti // 238 //
analyzed: na etāvatā kuśalasya sūkṣma sādṛśya ādi viveka caturasya api vibhrameṇa bhavitavyam iti yuktam iti

original: atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- yathā ṣaḍjādīti dvayena. tatsaṃskṛteti. ṣaḍjādyabhyāsasaṃskṛtety arthaḥ // 240 //
analyzed: atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā ṣaḍja ādi iti dvayena tad saṃskṛtā iti ṣaḍja ādi abhyāsa saṃskṛtā iti arthaḥ

original: {1,288} yathā ṣaḍjādiṣv akuśalasyāpi viviktākārabodho bhavati vinā ṣaḍjādiśabdaprayogam,
analyzed: yathā ṣaḍja ādiṣu akuśalasya api vivikta ākāra bodhaḥ bhavati vinā ṣaḍja ādi śabda prayogam

original: evaṃ gotvādyaviditāsmṛtaśabdair viviktam upalabhyata evety āha -- te hīti // 241 //
analyzed: evam go tva ādi avidita asmṛta śabdaiḥ viviktam upalabhyate eva iti āha te hi iti

original: nānājātiguṇādisaṅkīrṇaṃ tu tadaśabdajñasya vijātīyapiṇḍaviviktam avabhāsate. śabdasmaraṇasaṃskṛtānāṃ tu piṇḍaviviktajātyādimātraṃ nirbhāsata  #
analyzed: nānā jāti guṇa ādi saṅkīrṇam tu tat aśabdajñasya vijātīya piṇḍa viviktam avabhāsate śabda smaraṇa saṃskṛtānām tu piṇḍa vivikta jāti ādi mātram nirbhāsata

original: ity āha -- saṅkīrṇam iti // 242 //
analyzed: iti āha saṅkīrṇam iti

original: yata eva smaraṇatantrā vikalpāḥ,
analyzed: yatas eva smaraṇa tantrāḥ vikalpāḥ

original: ato yadā yacchabdasmaraṇamāvirasti tenaiva tadā vastu vikalpyate. yathā cakṣuṣmadādinā rūpādi netareṇa,
analyzed: atas yadā yad śabda smaraṇam āvis asti tena eva tadā vastu vikalpyate yathā cakṣuṣmat ādinā rūpa ādi na itareṇa

original: cakṣuṣmatāpi badhireṇa rūpamātraṃ na śabdaḥ anupāyatvād iti. tad etat sarvam āha -- yatheti dvayena. vivekahetūnām. śabdānām ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: cakṣuṣmatā api badhireṇa rūpa mātram na śabdaḥ anupāya tvāt iti tat etat sarvam āha yathā iti dvayena viveka hetūnām śabdānām iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ savikalpakam api pratyakṣam. yāvat tu vivekopāyā na śabdā buddhā bhavanti tāvannirvikalpakaṃ na tu tad evety āha -- teneti //
analyzed: atas siddham sa vikalpakam api pratyakṣam yāvat tu viveka upāyāḥ na śabdāḥ buddhāḥ bhavanti tāvat nirvikalpakam na tu tat eva iti āha tena iti

original: {1,289} ato yat kalpanāpi svasaṃvittāv iṣṭā nārthe vikalpanād iti bauddhair uktaṃ tat paradharmavikalpe 'numanyāmahe na svadharmajātyādivikalpaneṣv  #
analyzed: atas yat kalpanā api sva saṃvittau iṣṭā na arthe vikalpanāt iti bauddhaiḥ uktam tat para dharma vikalpe nu manyāmahe na svadharma jāti ādi vikalpaneṣu

original: ity āha -- tasmād iti // 246 //
analyzed: iti āha tasmāt iti

original: ato liṅgaliṅgisāmānyayos tatsambandhasya ca savikalpakapratyakṣavedyatvād upapannam anumānādīnāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvam ity āha -- pratyakṣatvam  #
analyzed: atas liṅga liṅgi sāmānyayoḥ tad sambandhasya ca sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa vedya tvāt upapannam anumāna ādīnām pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam iti āha pratyakṣa tvam

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: kiṃ punaḥ prayasyatā savikalpakasya pratyakṣatvaṃ sādhyate. nirvikalpakadvāreṇāpi
analyzed: kim punar sa vikalpakasya pratyakṣa tvam sādhyate nirvikalpaka dvāreṇa api

original: bauddhādīnām ivānumānādivyavahāro ghaṭiṣyate ata āha -- sarvaṃ ceti. yathā na nirvikalpakapūrvakam
analyzed: bauddha ādīnām iva anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ ghaṭiṣyate atas āha sarvam ca iti yathā na nirvikalpaka pūrvakam

original: anumānādyātmānaṃ labhate,
analyzed: anumāna ādi ātmānam labhate

original: tadanumāne 'bhidhāsyata iti // 248 //
analyzed: tad anumāne bhidhāsyate iti

original: atra codayati -- nanv evam iti. yadīndriyavyāpārānuparamamātrāj jātyādivikalpānāṃ pratyakṣatvam,
analyzed: atra codayati nanu evam iti yadi indriya vyāpāra anuparama mātrāt jāti ādi vikalpānām pratyakṣa tvam

original: evaṃ tarhi visphāritākṣo dūrād uṣṇo 'yam iti vahniṃ vikalpayati. tad api pratyakṣam āpadyate indriyavyāpārāvirāmād iti // 249 //
analyzed: evam tarhi visphārita akṣaḥ dūrāt uṣṇaḥ yam iti vahnim vikalpayati tat api pratyakṣam āpadyate indriya vyāpāra avirāmāt iti

original: pariharati -- pratyāsanneti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- agnisaṃvedana eva tatrendriyavyāpāra
analyzed: pariharati pratyāsannā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ agni saṃvedane eva tatra indriya vyāpāra

original: upakṣīṇaḥ. agnitvād eva vyāptibalenānumānikoṣṇavikalpo jāyate. gotve tu nendriyavyāpārataḥ
analyzed: upakṣīṇaḥ agni tvāt eva vyāpti balena ānumānika uṣṇa vikalpaḥ jāyate go tve tu na indriya vyāpārataḥ

original: pratyāsannam arthāntaraṃ pratyakṣatvena{1,
analyzed: pratyāsannam artha antaram

original: 290}sammataṃ kiñcid asti yena tad eva pratyakṣaṃ netarad ity ucyate. ato gotvam eva pratyakṣam iti // 250 //
analyzed: kiñcid asti yena tat eva pratyakṣam na itarat iti ucyate atas go tvam eva pratyakṣam iti

original: yad api tatrāpi dūrād gomahiṣādisaṃśaye śabdaviśeṣādinā gotvādiniścayo bhavati,

analyzed: saḥ u kṣa sambandhaḥ ānumānikaḥ eva na tu pratyakṣaḥ iti āha tatra iti

original: api ca saṃvitparāhatam evārāduṣṇavikalpasya pratyakṣatvam. aparokṣā hi buddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ,
analyzed: api ca saṃvid parāhatam eva ārāt uṣṇa vikalpasya pratyakṣa tvam aparokṣā hi buddhiḥ pratyakṣam

analyzed: cakṣuṣā vahnau prakāśite bhavantī parokṣa avabhāsi tvāt na pratyakṣam iti āha sparśanena iti  /

analyzed: atas sva indriya anusāreṇa eva pratyakṣa tā indriya antaram tu asat kalpam eva iti āha tasmāt iti

analyzed: iti na idam alaukikam yatra hi aparokṣa avabhāsa buddhiḥ tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇāt

original: vināpi laukikā manyante. akṣasambandho 'pi{1,
analyzed: vinā api laukikāḥ manyante

original: . na ca codanaivety avadhāraṇopapattir iti // 1 //

analyzed: yaḥ ca dharmam ācarati sa dhārmikaḥ tat yadi anugrahaḥ dharmaḥ tat evam upapadyate

original: prayogāsambhavāt tadviṣayam idamā pratinirdiśati. tad ayam arthaḥ -- viśiṣṭaviṣaye
analyzed: prayoga asambhavāt tad viṣayam pratinirdiśati tat ayam arthaḥ viśiṣṭa viṣaye

analyzed: puṇya pāpa pada dvaye ācaṇḍālam manuṣyāṇām vidyamāne tena eva dharma adharma pramiti siddheḥ

original: anarthakaṃ śāstram iti. nanv evaṃ puṇyapāpapramāṇakau dharmādharmāv uktau,
analyzed: anarthakam śāstram iti nanu evam puṇya pāpa pramāṇakau dharma adharmau uktau

analyzed: na loka pramāṇakau

analyzed: nirmūlāyāḥ prasiddheḥ abhāvāt kutas sā pravṛttā iti pramāṇaiḥ anviṣyate iti nanu ca

analyzed: kārya draḍhimnā mūlam kalpayiṣyate

original: smṛtidraḍhimneva śrutir ata āha -- pratyakṣādīti. satyam. samūlā prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣādimūlatayā pratyakṣasūtre nivāritā codanā (mūlaṃ)
analyzed: smṛti draḍhimnā iva śrutiḥ atas āha pratyakṣa ādi iti satyam sa mūlā prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣa ādi mūla tayā pratyakṣa sūtre nivāritā codanā mūlam

original: bhaviṣyaty eveti // 4 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati eva iti

original: nanu sannikṛṣṭārthagocaram eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam. ataḥ prasiddheḥ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthatvaṃ guṇaḥ na doṣāya,
analyzed: nanu sannikṛṣṭa artha gocaram eva sarvam pramāṇam atas prasiddheḥ pramāṇa antara agocara artha tvam guṇaḥ na doṣāya

analyzed: atas āha na ca iti na ca pratyakṣa ādīni parityajya lokaḥ nāma pramāṇa gaṇe pramāṇam

original: abhidhāsyāma iti.{2,
analyzed: abhidhāsyāma

analyzed: yadi vyavasthitā eva prasiddhiḥ syāt sā tu avyavasthitā tathā hi saṃsāramocakāḥ nāma nāstikāḥ bāhya hiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ anye tu tapaḥ

original: prā)jāpatyādi pīḍātmakatvāt parapīḍāvat adharma.......stu vidhiniṣedhapramāṇakau tadviparītau dharmādharmau saṅgirante(?.)
analyzed: prājāpatya ādi pīḍā ātmaka tvāt para pīḍā vat adharmaḥ tu vidhi niṣedha pramāṇakau tad viparītau dharma adharmau saṅgirante

original: tad evaṃ mlecchāryāṇāṃ parasparavigānān na lokaprasiddhatvaṃ dharmādharmayor upapadyata ity āha -- saṃsāreti sārdhena // 6 //
analyzed: tat evam mleccha āryāṇām paraspara vigānāt na loka prasiddha tvam dharma adharmayoḥ upapadyate iti āha saṃsāra iti sārdhena

original: nanv anumānābhāsasaṅkareṇa pramāṇam apramāṇībhavati. na hi pratyakṣābhāsasaṅkarāt

original: pratyakṣam apramāṇaṃ bhavati. atha tatra kāraṇadoṣasadasadbhāvanibandhanaḥ pramāṇatadābhāsavivekaḥ,
analyzed: pratyakṣam apramāṇam bhavati atha tatra kāraṇa doṣa sat asat bhāva nibandhanaḥ pramāṇa tad ābhāsa vivekaḥ

original: so 'trāpy aviśiṣṭaḥ. atrāpi smṛtikārair vivekopāyo darśita eva. ācāraś caiva sādhūnām
analyzed: saḥ trāpi a viśiṣṭaḥ atrā api smṛti kāraiḥ viveka upāyaḥ darśitaḥ eva ācāraḥ ca eva sādhūnām

original: ityādinā. sādhavaś cāryāḥ. svābhāvikakṛṣṇamṛgacaraṇopalakṣitāryāvartanivāsinaś cāryaśabdavācyāḥ.
analyzed: ityādinā sādhavaḥ ca āryāḥ svābhāvika kṛṣṇa mṛgacaraṇa upalakṣita āryāvarta nivāsinaḥ ca ārya śabda vācyāḥ

original: atas tadācāro dharmo 'nyo 'dharma iti viveko bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: atas tad ācāraḥ dharmaḥ nyaḥ dharmaḥ iti vivekaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ata āha -- na ceti. śāstrasadasadbhāvanibandhano hy āryamlecchavibhāgaḥ tada(nāśrayeṇa)
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti śāstra sat asat bhāva nibandhanaḥ hi ārya mleccha vibhāgaḥ tad anāśrayeṇa

original: tv āryamlecchavibhāgo durbhaṇaḥ. ata eva śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt (1.3.9)
analyzed: tu ārya mleccha vibhāgaḥ durbhaṇaḥ atas eva śāstra sthāḥ vā tad nimitta tvāt

original: iti vakṣyatīti. astu tarhi śāstramūlārthaprasiddhiḥ pramāṇam ata āha tanmūleti. na svatantrāyāḥ prasiddher eva prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyatīty abhiprāyaḥ
analyzed: iti vakṣyati iti astu tarhi śāstra mūla artha prasiddhiḥ pramāṇam atas āha tad mūla iti na svatantrāyāḥ prasiddheḥ eva prāmāṇyam sidhyati iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: ataḥ sakalabhāvapramāṇanirākaraṇāt śaṅkitābhāvanirākaraṇena codanaiva dharmādharmayoḥ pramāṇam ity upapannam ity āha -- tasmād iti. paśyatām  #
analyzed: atas sakala bhāva pramāṇa nirākaraṇāt śaṅkita abhāva nirākaraṇena codanā eva dharma adharmayoḥ pramāṇam iti upapannam iti āha tasmāt iti paśyatām

original: iti. ṣaṣṭhī cānādare (2.3.38)
analyzed: iti ṣaṣṭhī ca an ādare

original: ityanādare ṣaṣṭhīti // 8 //
analyzed: iti anādare ṣaṣṭhī iti

original: {2,4} atra bhāṣyakāreṇa aupattikas tu śabdasyārthena sambandhas tasyāgnihotrādilakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittam ity uktvā (katham)
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa aupattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ tasya agnihotra ādi lakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittam iti uktvā katham

original: iti praśnānantaram upadeśo hi bhavatīti sautram upadeśapadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ,
analyzed: iti praśna anantaram upadeśaḥ hi bhavati iti sautram upadeśa padam vyākhyātam

original: tatra na jñāyate kenāsya sambandha iti yogyapadānvayaṃ darśayati -- upadeśa iti. tasya dharmasyopadeśo jñānaṃ pramāṇam iti. nanūpadeśo granthasandarbhātmā,
analyzed: tatra na jñāyate kena asya sambandhaḥ iti yogya pada anvayam darśayati upadeśaḥ iti tasya dharmasya upadeśaḥ jñānam pramāṇam iti nanu upadeśaḥ grantha sandarbha ātmā

original: jñānaṃ cārthāvagrahaḥ. katham anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ata āha -- jñāyata iti. bhāvasādhano
analyzed: jñānam ca artha avagrahaḥ katham anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam atas āha jñāyate iti

original: hi jñānaśabdo nopadeśaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ labhate. ayaṃ tu jñāyate 'neneti
analyzed: hi jñāna śabdaḥ na upadeśa śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam labhate ayam tu jñāyate nena iti

original: karaṇasādhana iti yuktaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti // 9 //
analyzed: karaṇa sādhane iti yuktam sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti

original: kathaṃ punar upadeśo dharme pramāṇam ata āha -- autpattiketi. bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hy aprāmāṇyam. tatra sambandhautpattikatvapratipādanena  #
analyzed: katham punar upadeśaḥ dharme pramāṇam atas āha autpattika iti bādha kāraṇa doṣa adhīnam hi aprāmāṇyam tatra sambandha autpattika tva pratipādanena

original: taddvārā puruṣānupraveśābhāvāt,
analyzed: tad dvārā puruṣa anupraveśa abhāvāt

original: puruṣāśrayatvāc ca śabde doṣāṇāṃ kāraṇadoṣanivāraṇaṃ tāvat kṛtam. tannirākaraṇena

original: sahāprāmāṇyam anapoditam ity avyatirekapadaprayojanam āha -- abādha iti. avyatirekapadenābādhaḥ
analyzed: saha aprāmāṇyam anapoditam iti avyatireka pada prayojanam āha abādhaḥ iti avyatireka padena abādhaḥ

original: pratipādyate na hi deśakālayor ubhayor api codanājanitaṃ jñānaṃ viparyetīti. tad
analyzed: pratipādyate na hi deśa kālayoḥ ubhayoḥ api codanā janitam jñānam viparyeti iti tat

original: evaṃ bādhakāraṇadoṣanirākaraṇe kṛte 'napoditam autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyam iti tat pramāṇam

original: ity anenoktam iti darśayati -- svata iti // 10 //
analyzed: iti anena uktam iti darśayati svatas iti

analyzed: atra ca arthe nu palabdhe iti ucyate tat ayuktam upalabdha artha viṣayam api pramāṇam

analyzed: bhavati eva anubhūtiḥ hi pramāṇam pratyutpanna indriya liṅga ādi janitā ca saṃvid anubhūtiḥ atas eva unmīlita akṣa

original: syaikabhāvagocarāṇāṃ dhārāvāhikasaṃvidāṃ prāmāṇyam upapannaṃ bhavati. anyathā tan na syāt. na hi tatrānavagataṃ kiñcid anubhūyate. deśakālāntarasambandho  #
analyzed: dhārāvāhika saṃvidām prāmāṇyam upapannam bhavati anyathā tat na syāt na hi tatra anavagatam kiñcid anubhūyate deśa kāla antara sambandhaḥ

original: 'nubhūyata iti ced,
analyzed: nubhūyate iti ced

original: na. ekadeśasthe 'pi bhāvāt.{2,
analyzed: na eka deśa sthe pi

original: tarumarutsaṃyogavat. ato ('vagatārtham)
analyzed: taru marut saṃyoga vat atas vagata artham

original: anadhikārtham api grahaṇaṃ iti vācyam. na caivaṃ smṛtitvāpātaḥ. smṛtir hi pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitabhāvanāvaśalabdhasiddhir nādhikam apekṣate

original: grahaṇa + tva)
analyzed: grahaṇa tva

analyzed: anena vākya antaram api

analyzed: na ca anuṣṭhānam

original: so 'bhidhānapakṣābhyupagamenaiva parihṛtaḥ.

original: vartamānāpadeśeṣv api prasaṅgāt. ato 'nanyapramāṇatvād upapannam abhidheyatvam abhidhāyāḥ. yat tu ananyapramāṇake vyutpattyasambhava ity uktam.

original: arthāpattipramāṇakatvāt. nanv arthāpattyā pravartanāpadeśasādhāraṇam abhidhāyā rūpam

original: yogipratyakṣabuddhāgamādyapramāṇam iti codanāsūtre pratijñātaṃ,

original: tadasati bāhye codanāpadārthe duḥsthitam eva. pramāṇatvopanyāsenaiva tatparikaraprathamapādoktasambandhautpattikatvaśabdanityatvavākyārthapratipattimūlasadbhāvāpauruṣeyavedavākyaracanādiparigrahaḥ.
analyzed: tat asati bāhye codanā padārthe duḥsthitam eva pramāṇa tva upanyāsena eva tad parikara prathama pāda ukta sambandha autpattika tva śabda nitya tva vākya artha pratipatti mūla sadbhāva apauruṣeya veda vākya racanā ādi parigrahaḥ

original: apramāṇatvopanyāsena ca pratyakṣasūtranirdiṣṭānyāpramāṇatvakāraṇopādānam iti darśayitavyam.

original: tathā yad api codanāsūtra eva śrutyārthena ca puṇyapāpāparanāmnor dharmādharmayoḥ
analyzed: tathā yat api codanāsūtre eva śrutyā arthena ca puṇya pāpa apara nāmnoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ

original: svarūpaṃ pratijñātaṃ,

analyzed: nivartanam upādatte yat artha sādhanam vastu tad viparītam vā tat puṇya pāpa padayoḥ

original: aspadam. aśubhebhyo nivartanaṃ tu na sukhāya na duḥkhāyety ubhayarūparahitam. etad

original: api codanāsūtrasthenārthapadena pratipāditam. tatphalam iti ca trividhasya puṇyapāpodāsīnātmano

original: 25}tāvad bāhyārthasiddher asti prathamapādoktasamastopayogaḥ. tathā vakṣyamāṇopayogo
'pi. na hi vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāṃ sādhyasādhanasambandhavidhividheyastutuvihitasmṛtirūpārthā

analyzed: tāni santu pramāṇam yāni tu akriyā arthāni saḥ rodīt yat arodīt ityādīni tāni na kañcid dharmam pramimate iti pūrvapakṣite

original: nirākṛtaḥ. puruṣavākyam apy asambhavanmūlam apramāṇam eva. vipralambho 'pi bhrāntivannirākāryaḥ.

original: codanā tu sambhavadvedasaṃyogināṃ traivarṇikānāṃ smṛtimūlaṃ bhavatīti tatkalpanaiva
analyzed: codanā tu sambhavat veda saṃyoginām traivarṇikānām smṛti mūlam bhavati iti tad kalpanā eva

original: laghīyasīti. nanv evam agnihotrādicodanāvadaṣṭakādicodanā api kiṃ nopalabhyante.
analyzed: laghīyasī iti nanu evam agnihotra ādi codanā vat aṣṭakā ādi codanāḥ api kim na upalabhyante

original: nedam anupapannam. viprakīrṇānekaśākhāśrayā hi śrutayaḥ kratupuruṣārthopadeśasaṅkīrṇāḥ
analyzed: na idam anupapannam viprakīrṇa aneka śākhā āśrayāḥ hi śrutayaḥ kratu puruṣa artha upadeśa saṅkīrṇāḥ

original: pramādyadbhir adyatanair na vivicyopalabhyanta iti kiṃ nopapadyante. ato yad aśrūyamāṇam
analyzed: pramādyadbhiḥ adyatanaiḥ na vivicya upalabhyante iti kim nā upapadyante atas yat a śrūyamāṇam

original: apy aṣṭakādidharmasya nimittaṃ codaneti siddham aṣṭakādayo dharmā iti. tad evaṃ pratyakṣaśrutyaviruddhābhyaḥ
analyzed: api aṣṭakā ādi dharmasya nimittam codanā iti siddham aṣṭakā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ iti tat evam pratyakṣa śruti aviruddhābhyaḥ

original: śrutyanumānam. pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe tu na śrutir anumātuṃ śakyata iti virodhādhikaraṇe{2,
analyzed: śruti anumānam pratyakṣa śruti virodhe tu na śrutiḥ anumātum śakyate iti

original: 28}uktam. upariṣṭāc cācāraprāmāṇyaṃ smṛtyā ca saha balābalaparīkṣetyādi darśayitavyam. sarveṣu ca bhedādilakṣaṇeṣu svapramāṇagaṇaiḥ śabdāntarādibhiḥ
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ca ācāra prāmāṇyam smṛtyā ca saha bala abala parīkṣā ityādi darśayitavyam sarveṣu ca bheda ādi lakṣaṇeṣu sva pramāṇa gaṇaiḥ śabda antara ādibhiḥ

original: r) sati bāhye 'rthe na sambhavati. somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyamātreyāya
analyzed: R sati bāhye rthe na sambhavati somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyam ātreyāya

original: dadātīti yāgahomadānabhāvanānāṃ śabdabhedād eva bhedo vakṣyate. tathā ca samidho

original: yajatītyevamādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ prayājānām asaty api śabdabhede 'bhyāsānarthakyaprasaṅgād
analyzed: yajati iti evamādīnām pañcānām prayājānām asati api śabda bhede bhyāsa ānarthakya prasaṅgāt

original: bhedo darśitaḥ. tisra āhutīr juhotīti pṛthaktvaniveśitvāt saṃkhyāyā āhutīnāṃ bhedo darśitaḥ.
analyzed: bhedaḥ darśitaḥ tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti pṛthaktva niveśi tvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ āhutīnām bhedaḥ darśitaḥ

original: athaiṣa jyotir etena yajeteti jyotiṣṭomāj jyotir iti saṃjñāntareṇa karmabhedaḥ. vaiśvadevyām

analyzed: kauṇḍapāyina homasya bhedaḥ tat evam ṣoḍhā karma bhedaḥ dvitīye anyat upoddhāta ādinā

original: tṛtīyāśrutyā kriyāṅgabhāve sāmānyato 'vagate aruṇayā krīṇātīti kriyāviśeṣalābho vākyāt.
analyzed: tṛtīyā śrutyā kriyā aṅga bhāve sāmānyatas vagate aruṇayā krīṇāti iti kriyā viśeṣa lābhaḥ vākyāt

original: vaikṛtam eva tv aṅgānāṃ sannihitasamāmnānam anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti tatsannidhipāṭhād

analyzed: eva teṣām tatra viniyogaḥ niścīyate samākhyā viniyogaḥ tu ādhvaryava samākhyāteṣu

original: padārtheṣv adhvaryor anenāmī kartavyā iti.

original: tat tena{2,
analyzed: tat

analyzed: krama niyamaḥ agnihotram juhoti yavāgūm pacati iti pāṭhāt anyādṛśe pi krame vagamyamāne

original: pāṭhānuṣṭhānasādeśyād viniyogasya kāraṇam //

original: coditeṣv apīśvareṇāpi tathā sambhāvayitum{2,

analyzed: avarjanīya vyavadhānam tu vidheḥ anumatam bhavati tatra ca vaiṣamya kāraṇa abhāvāt

analyzed: tena eva pradhānena codyamāne kartari prayoga vacana pramāṇaka yaugapadya balena paśu antaraiḥ

original: ākṛṣyamāṇe tatpadārthamātrasya paśvantareṣv anuṣṭhānaṃ sa paśuḥ pratīkṣate. tadante
analyzed: ākṛṣyamāṇe tad padārtha mātrasya paśu antareṣu anuṣṭhānam sa paśuḥ pratīkṣate tad ante

original: śakyam. ato dvitīyādīnām apy anuṣṭhānaṃ tata evārabhyeti siddhāntāt kramaniyamaḥ.

original: kramaniyamo jāyate. atrāpi śrutyādir eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ.
analyzed: krama niyamaḥ jāyate atra api śruti ādiḥ eva pramāṇa gaṇaḥ

original: evamadhikāravicārādāv api śeṣaśeṣiprapañcārthatvāt śeṣalakṣaṇoktāny eva śrutyādīni

original: siddhāntasthitihetutayā darśayitavyānīti. yathā tāvadādya eva svargakāmo yajeteti

original: nanu tridhaiva tattvaṃ vibhajāmahe satyam asatyam saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti. saṃvṛtaṃ hi nātyantam asad bhavati,

analyzed: vyavahāra avisaṃvādāt na api sat eva

original: tasmād yat paramārthato nāstīti nirūpyate na tat saṃvṛtyā tadrūpaṃ bhavitum arhati. nāsty eva tat. yat tu tāvad vyavahārāvisaṃvādi tad asty

original: tat tarhi paramārthata evāsti.{2,

original: api ca svapnāvagatā apy arthāḥ kecicchokaharṣādivyavahārahetavo dṛśyante. atas te

atra bhāṣyakāreṇa bāhyārthasadbhāva eva pūrvapakṣapurassaraṃ pratipāditaḥ,

original: jñānasyāpy abhāvam icchanti. tatra dvayor api vādinos tāvad bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ sādhāraṇam.

original: na tatsamūhaḥ,

original: kiṃ prameyavikalpaiḥ kṛtakarair iti. iha śābare tantre. idānīm asminn avasare. pramāṇastha eva bāhyāpahnavo vicāryata iti // 17 //

analyzed: manyante anumānam tu bhrāmyataḥ pratyuktam iti kim tat purassarīkriyate atas āha

original: da e)va pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇena nirṇaye kṛte 'numānasyopanyāso 'navasara eva syād iti // 18 //

original: anumānabhāṣyam idānīṃ prakṛtasaṅgatidarśanārtham avatārayati -- tatreti ityantena.

original: saṅgatim āha -- asyeti durlabha ityantena. ayam arthaḥ -- yat sūtrakāreṇa tatsaṃyogajaṃ
analyzed: saṅgatim āha asya iti durlabhaḥ iti antena ayam arthaḥ yat sūtrakāreṇa tad saṃyoga jam

original: pratyakṣam uktaṃ tadākṣepeṇaiva saṅgacchate. kālpaniko hy ayam indriyārthasamprayogaḥ,

original: indriyāder abhāvāt. kālpanikaś ca sakalamithyājñānasādhāraṇa iti tadatadyogajatvavibhāgo na yukta iti sūtroktākṣepa iti // 21 //
analyzed: indriya ādeḥ abhāvāt kālpanikaḥ ca sakala mithyājñāna sādhāraṇaḥ iti tad a tad yoga ja tva vibhāgaḥ na yuktaḥ iti sūtra ukta ākṣepaḥ iti  /

original: {2,38} svoktākṣepeṇa vā saṅgatir ity āha -- mithyātvam iti. yad etadvṛttikāragranthānta
uktaṃ - yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnapratyayaḥ

original: nānyaḥ iti tadanenākṣipyate. sarvamithyātve viśeṣaṇopādānavaiyarthyam iti // 22 //

original: bhāṣyatirohitam anumānam idānīṃ vispaṣṭam upanyasyati -- stambhādīti. stambhādipratyaya iti dharminirdeśaḥ. mithyeti dharmavacanaṃ,
analyzed: bhāṣya tirohitam anumānam idānīm vispaṣṭam upanyasyati stambha ādi iti stambha ādi pratyayaḥ iti dharmi nirdeśaḥ mithyā iti dharma vacanam

original: pratyayatvād iti hetuḥ. tathāhīti dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti // 23 //

original: atra bhāṣyaṃ sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ iti. tad yathāśrutaṃ sarveṣām anālambanatvaṃ sādhayati. tatra cāṃśe siddhasādhanatā
analyzed: atra bhāṣyam sarve eva nirālambanaḥ svapna vat pratyayaḥ iti tat yathāśrutam sarveṣām anālambana tvam sādhayati tatra ca aṃśe siddhasādhana tā

original: vibhramāṇām anālambanatvāt. yadvijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate 'rthaṃ tannirālambanam
analyzed: vibhramāṇām anālambana tvāt yat vijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate ṛtham tat nirālambanam

original: iṣyata eva. tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapnajñānasyāpi tadantarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ.
analyzed: iṣyate eva tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapna jñānasya api tad antarbhāvāt dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ

original: sarva eveti caivaśabdānupapattiś ca. sa hi vibhaktapratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ. yathedaṃ devebhya
analyzed: sarve evā iti ca eva śabda anupapattiḥ ca sa hi vibhakta pratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ yathā idam

original: idaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti vibhakte bhavati vacanaṃ sarvam evedaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti. tatra
analyzed: idam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti vibhakte bhavati vacanam sarvam eva idam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti tatra

original: vibhāgapratiṣedhapara evakāro dṛśyate. sarvasmiṃs tu pakṣe sarva ity ācakṣīta,
analyzed: vibhāga pratiṣedha paraḥ evakāraḥ dṛśyate sarvasmin tu pakṣe sarvaḥ iti ācakṣīta

original: naivakāraṃ prayuñjīta. ato jāgradbuddhivivakṣayaiva bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātavyam ity āha
analyzed: na eva kāram prayuñjīta atas jāgrat buddhi vivakṣayā eva bhāṣyam vyākhyātavyam iti āha

original: -- siddhasādhaneti sārdhena. nanv evam apy aviśeṣitanirālambanatvopādāne 'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ.
svāṃśālambanatvaṃ jñānānāṃ bauddhair iṣyata evāta āha -- svāṃśeti. ata eva kāraṇād
analyzed: sva aṃśa ālambana tvam jñānānām bauddhaiḥ iṣyate eva atas āha sva aṃśa iti atas eva kāraṇāt

original: bāhyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ sādhanīyam ity arthaḥ // 25 //
analyzed: bāhya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam anālambana tvam sādhanīyam iti arthaḥ

original: {2,39} aparam api bhāṣyaṃ pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne. jāgrato 'pi stambha iti vā kuḍya iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati,
analyzed: aparam api bhāṣyam pratyayasya hi nirālambana tā svabhāvaḥ upalakṣitaḥ svapne stambhaḥ iti vā kuḍyaḥ iti vā pratyayaḥ eva bhavati

original: tasmāt so 'pi nirālambanaḥ iti. tasyārtham āha -- pratyayasyeti. pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva
analyzed: tasmāt saḥ pi nirālambanaḥ iti tasya artham āha pratyayasya iti pratyayasya hi nirālambana tā svabhāva

original: upalakṣitaḥ svapne ity etāvatā bhāgena tāvat sādhyena nirālambanatvena vyāptaṃ pratyayatvaṃ
analyzed: upalakṣitaḥ svapne iti etāvatā bhāgena tāvat sādhyena nirālambana tvena vyāptam pratyaya tvam

original: hetur nirdiśyate. dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti yāvad iti. nanu na pratyayatvād iti hetur upāttaḥ,
analyzed: hetuḥ nirdiśyate dṛṣṭānta vacanam iti yāvat iti nanu na pratyaya tvāt iti hetuḥ upāttaḥ

original: kasya vyāptir nirdiśyate. ata āha -- hetuś ceti. yady api pratyayatvasya na vyaktaṃ pañcamyā hetutvam upāttaṃ,
analyzed: kasya vyāptiḥ nirdiśyate atas āha hetuḥ ca iti yadi api pratyaya tvasya na vyaktam pañcamyā hetu tvam upāttam

original: tathāpi upanayanākhyena sādhanavākyāvayavena jāgrato 'pītyādinā hetuḥ pradarśita eva. yadaiva hi sādhyānvitaṃ pradarśitaṃ pratyayatvaṃ punaḥ  #
analyzed: tathā api upanayana ākhyena sādhana vākya avayavena pi ityādinā hetuḥ pradarśitaḥ eva yadā eva hi sādhya anvitam pradarśitam pratyaya tvam punar

original: pratijñārtha upanīyate,
analyzed: pratijñā arthaḥ upanīyate

original: tadaiva tad atra hetur iti pradarśitaṃ bhavaty eva. sādhyānvitasyaiva pakṣasthasya
analyzed: tadā eva tat atra hetuḥ iti pradarśitam bhavati eva sādhya anvitasya eva pakṣa sthasya

original: hetutvād iti. kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ. sādhanavākyāvayavaviśeṣaḥ. pañcāvayavaṃ hi
analyzed: hetu tvāt iti kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ sādhana vākya avayava viśeṣaḥ pañca avayavam hi

original: sādhanavākyaṃ pratijñā hetur udāharaṇam upanayo nigamanaṃ ceti. tatra sādhyanirdeśaḥ
analyzed: sādhana vākyam pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanam ca iti tatra sādhya nirdeśaḥ

original: pratijñā. yathā anityaḥ śabda iti. utpattidharmakatvād iti hetuḥ. utpattidharmakaṃ
analyzed: pratijñā yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti hetuḥ utpatti dharmakam

original: sthālyādi dravyam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam ity udāharaṇam. tathā cotpattidharmakaḥ śabda ity
analyzed: sthālī ādi dravyam anityam dṛṣṭam iti udāharaṇam tathā ca utpatti dharmakaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: upanayaḥ. sa hy udāharaṇāpekṣaṃs tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanaya
analyzed: upanayaḥ sa hi udāharaṇa apekṣan tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanaya

original: iti varṇitam. kim uktaṃ bhavati. dvedhā hi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayati udāharaṇasādharmyād
analyzed: iti varṇitam kim uktam bhavati dvedhā hi hetuḥ sādhyam sādhayati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt

original: vaidharmyād vā. tatra sādharmyaṃ pradarśitam. vaidharmyaṃ tu yathā -- tasyām eva
analyzed: vaidharmyāt vā tatra sādharmyam pradarśitam vaidharmyam tu yathā tasyām eva

original: pratijñāyāṃ tasminn evotpattidharmakatvād iti hetau anutpattidharmakam ātmādi dravyaṃ
analyzed: pratijñāyām tasmin eva utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti hetau anutpatti dharmakam ātma ādi dravyam

original: nityaṃ dṛṣṭam. na ca tathā śabdo 'nutpattidharmaka iti. tatra yo 'yaṃ dvividhodāharaṇāpekṣaḥ

original: sādharmyodāhṛte tatheti vaidharmyodāhṛte na tatheti sādhyasya śabdasya sambandhitayotpattidharmakatvasyopasaṃhāravacanam upanayaḥ,
analyzed: sādharmya udāhṛte tathā iti vaidharmya udāhṛte na tathā iti sādhyasya śabdasya sambandhi tayā utpatti dharmaka tvasya upasaṃhāra vacanam upanayaḥ

original: sa codāharaṇāpekṣa eva. udāharaṇadvaitād eva tadupasaṃhāradvaitaṃ bhavati. vaidharmyodāharaṇena
analyzed: sa ca udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ eva udāharaṇa dvaitāt eva tad upasaṃhāra dvaitam bhavati vaidharmya udāharaṇena

analyzed: ca viruddha nivṛttyā sādhya sambandhi tvena hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ yathā ātma ādi dravyam nityam anutpatti dharmakam

original: na ca tathā śabdaḥ ity anutpattidharmakatvapratiṣedhenotpattidharmakatvam upasaṃhriyate. prakṛte tu sādharmyodāharaṇe{2,
analyzed: na ca tathā śabdaḥ iti anutpatti dharmaka tva pratiṣedhena utpatti dharmaka tvam upasaṃhriyate prakṛte tu

original: 40}tathaiveti hetor upasaṃhāra upanayo veditavyaḥ. nigamanaṃ tu hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam. tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda  #
analyzed: hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ veditavyaḥ nigamanam tu hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam tasmāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ śabda

original: iti. nigamyante 'nena
analyzed: iti nigamyante nena

original: nanu nāvyāvṛtto vipakṣād dhetur bhavatīti vaidharmyadarśanena hetor vyatireko darśayitavyaḥ. na cātra tathā darśitaḥ,
analyzed: nanu na avyāvṛttaḥ vipakṣāt hetuḥ bhavati iti vaidharmya darśanena hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ darśayitavyaḥ na ca atra tathā darśitaḥ

original: sādharmyamātravacanāt. ata āha -- vipakṣeti. nirālambanatve hi sādhyamāne sālambanatvaṃ

analyzed: vipakṣaḥ na ca sarva anālambana tva vādinaḥ tat asti iti kim tad vyatireka pradarśanena iti

analyzed: pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pakṣa bādhaḥ sati api kathañcid bāhya viśeṣaṇe pratyakṣa ādeḥ api bāhya viṣaya avaśeṣāt

original: 43}pratyayā balīyāṃsaḥ. naiṣu paripanthiṣv anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. etasmād anumānād ity arthaḥ // 33 //

original: so 'pi na sarvathā nirālambanaḥ. sarvatra yathākathañcidālambanasiddher vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato dṛṣṭāntābhāvo 'py evaṃ satyāpadyeteti // 49 //

original: yadi tu na sarvathā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. kin tu sālambanasyaiva kenāpi prakāreṇa nirālambanatvam apīty ucyate,
analyzed: yadi tu na sarvathā nirālambana tvam sādhyate kin tu sa ālambanasya eva kena api prakāreṇa nirālambana tvam api iti ucyate

original: tadā rasādijñānānāṃ rūpādyālambanaśūnyatayā siddhasādhanam ity āha -- kenacid iti // 50 //

original: nanu yadākārā buddhis tan nālambate iti sādhayiṣyāmaḥ na siddhasādhanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,

original: tad etadāśaṅkate -- atheti. etad api nirākaroti -- svākārasyeti. abhyupagato hi bhavadbhiḥ

analyzed: su ākāraḥ buddheḥ ālambanam tat iti vadadbhiḥ atas tad ālambana abhāvaḥ

original: 'bhyupetenaiva virudhyata iti // 51 //
analyzed: bhyupetena eva virudhyate iti

original: [708] kāraṃ pra (KHA)

original: nanu kim āpādya dūṣaṇodbhāvanam. bāhyānālambanatvaṃ hi naḥ pakṣaḥ. tathā ca bhāṣyopaskāre

analyzed: vastutas vā bāhyam na ālambate iti pūrvasmin pakṣe siddhasādhanam parasmin doṣaḥ vakṣyate stambha ādi dhiyaḥ hi stambha ādi ākāra tayā eva sva viṣayam

original: ālambante na bāhyatayeti // 52 //

original: {2,49} yadi tu stambhānālambanatvam eva sādhyate,

original: tatas tadrūpasaṃvedanasya dṛṣṭatvāt saṃvidvirodha evety āha -- tatheti // 53 //

analyzed: atra codayati dvi candra ādiṣu iti evam hi manyante samānaḥ yam anālambana tva abhimateṣu

original: prakāśayati tat sad grāhyam. viparītam anyat. na ca yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvam.
analyzed: prakāśayati tat sat grāhyam viparītam anyat na ca yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvam

original: bādhakadarśanāt. ato yad deśāntarastham indriyāprāptam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti tad asad grāhyam.

original: tasyārtho nāstīty ucyate. kvacid dhi kiñcit pratiṣidhyate. na svarūpeṇaiva kiñcit.

analyzed: ca idam rajatam iti na ayam

original: na caiṣa vibhāgo bauddhasya sambhavatīty āha -- bhavata iti. na ca bauddhasyendriyādīni santi yat prāptyaprāptinibandhanaṃ bhāvālambanālambanapratiṣedhau  #

analyzed: yujyete iti

original: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bahirbhāveti sādhyatentena. na hy anālambanajñānavādināṃ bahirbhāvo nāma kaścit siddhaḥ,

original: ata āha -- yatheti. viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv eva kim. na tāvat pakṣasiddhiḥ,

analyzed: tathāvidham anyaḥ bodhayitum na śakyate iti ced

analyzed: iti hi dvau arthau sambhavataḥ paryudāsa pratiṣedhābhyām paryudāse hi nāma yogāt nañaḥ vyatirikta ālambanaḥ pratyayaḥ iti arthaḥ bhavati niṣedhe

analyzed: prāk kalpitena pakṣa virodhaḥ iṣyate hi kathañcid kalpanā mātra kalpitam bhavadbhiḥ

analyzed: api bāhya ālambanam atas tad niṣedhe bhavati prāk kalpitena pakṣa bādhaḥ tat etat āha

original: anyathā siddhasādhanaṃ darśayati -- vastv iti. buddhir hi vastvādyākāreṇa jaḍarūpā na kiñcidālambata iti siddham eva. asādhāraṇena tu prakāśātmanā{2,

original: 52}bāhyam ālambate. tatrāviśeṣitopādāne śakyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ darśayitum iti. nanu grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam itīdam atra naḥ sādhyaṃ,

original: tatra kiṃ nānāvikalpaiḥ. ata āha -- grāhakād iti. na tāvannirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity

original: ayam arthaḥ grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam iti. evaṃ saty api yad dviśaktikatvaṃ jñānasyeṣṭaṃ
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ grāhakāt grāhyam abhinnam iti evam sati api yat dvi śaktika tvam jñānasya iṣṭam

original: tatrāpi ca siddhasādhanam eva. utpadyate hi nirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity ukte nirālambanatvabuddhiḥ. na tv iyam arthakriyāyai samarthā,
analyzed: tatra api ca siddha sādhanam eva utpadyate hi nirālambanāḥ pratyayāḥ iti ukte nirālambana tva buddhiḥ na tu iyam arthakriyāyai samarthā

analyzed: atas mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna vat eva ātma aṃśa paryavasāyinī buddhiḥ iyam abhyupagantavyā asmākam

analyzed: api sarva mithyātva grāhi pratyaya mithyātvam siddham evā iti āvayoḥ avivādāt siddham anālambana buddheḥ

original: yathedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatam iti cānayoḥ. na ceha tathā. caitrādipratyayā hi svaviṣayaṃ sthāpayanti. na ca tannirālambanabuddhiḥ pratikṣipati,
analyzed: yathā idam rajatam na idam rajatam iti ca anayoḥ na ca iha tathā caitra ādi pratyayāḥ hi sva viṣayam sthāpayanti na ca tat nirālambana buddhiḥ pratikṣipati

analyzed: caitra ādayaḥ iti spaṣṭaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ iti kim kena bādhyate iti ucyate tat etat āha

kiñca yat tat pūrvam uktaṃ kartṛtve karaṇatve vā pratyayatve śabdo 'pi pratyayaśabdavācya iti,

original: alātam evālambanam. gandharvanagaravibhrame tu sanniveśaviśeṣāvasthitāny abhrāṇy
analyzed: alātam eva ālambanam gandharvanagara vibhrame tu sanniveśa viśeṣa avasthitāni abhrāṇi

original: eva dūratvāt pūrvāvagatagṛhākāreṇālambyante. tad iha pūrvadṛṣṭagṛhāṇy abhrāṇi ca
analyzed: eva dūra tvāt pūrva avagata gṛha ākāreṇa ālambyante tat iha pūrva dṛṣṭa gṛhāṇi abhrāṇi ca

original: tatsanniveśaviśeṣabhrāñjyālambanam. tad iha dviprakāro viṣayadoṣo vibhrame kāraṇam.
analyzed: tad sanniveśa viśeṣa bhrāñjī ālambanam tat iha dvi prakāraḥ viṣaya doṣaḥ vibhrame kāraṇam

original: mṛgatoyajñāne pūrvānubhūtatoyamūṣaraṃ ca sūryaraśmitaptam evālambanam. ubhayaṃ hi
analyzed: mṛga toya jñāne pūrva anubhūta toyam ūṣaram ca sūrya raśmi taptam eva ālambanam ubhayam hi

original: vigāhya bhrāntir ātmānaṃ labhate,
analyzed: vigāhya bhrāntiḥ ātmānam labhate

original: tadanyatarāpāye hy abhāvāt. iha cāntaḥkaraṇaviṣayadoṣābhyāṃ vibhramaḥ. pipāsādūṣitāntaḥkaraṇasya
analyzed: tad anyatara apāye hi abhāvāt iha ca antaḥkaraṇa viṣaya doṣābhyām vibhramaḥ pipāsā dūṣita antaḥkaraṇasya

original: hi sūryaraśmitaptamūṣaraṃ toyasadṛśaṃ tadvadābhāti. śaśaviṣāṇabuddhes tu mānasād
analyzed: hi sūrya raśmi taptam ūṣaram toya sadṛśam tadvat ābhāti śaśaviṣāṇa buddheḥ tu mānasāt

original: eva kutaścid bhramanimittāj{2,
analyzed: eva kutaścid

original: 65}jāyamānāyā. gavādidravyāntaragataṃ viṣāṇam ātmā ca śaśasya kāraṇam. ubhayabhāvabhāvitvād
analyzed: go ādi dravya antara gatam viṣāṇam ātmā ca śaśasya kāraṇam ubhaya bhāva bhāvi tvāt

original: ekatarāpāye 'pi cāpāyād iti. nanu śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstīti buddher na kiñcid ālambanaṃ
analyzed: ekatara apāye ca apāyāt iti nanu śaśa viṣāṇam na asti iti buddheḥ na kiñcid ālambanam

original: na tāvat śaśo viṣāṇaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vāsyālambanam. pratiṣedharūpatvān nābhāvaḥ. svatantrānirbhāsāt.
analyzed: na tāvat śaśaḥ viṣāṇam vā tad saṃyogaḥ vā asya ālambanam pratiṣedha rūpa tvāt na abhāvaḥ svatantra anirbhāsāt

original: tathā hi -- na vayaṃ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstītyukte svatantram abhāvam avagacchāmaḥ. ato
analyzed: tathā hi na vayam śaśa viṣāṇam na asti iti ukte svatantram abhāvam avagacchāmaḥ

original: 'vaśyamātmālambanam evedaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ vaktavyam,
analyzed: vaśyam ātma ālambanam eva idam na asti iti jñānam vaktavyam

original: ata āha -- mauṇḍyam iti. asya śṛṅgasya niṣedhe śaśaśiromauṇḍyaṃ kāraṇam. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yady api svatantro 'bhāvo na pratīyate,
analyzed: atas āha mauṇḍyam iti asya śṛṅgasya niṣedhe śaśa śiraḥ mauṇḍyam kāraṇam etat uktam bhavati yadi api svatantraḥ bhāvaḥ na pratīyate

original: bhāvāśrayas tu pratīyata eva. ataḥ śaśamūrdhavartino 'vayavā uparyupari hīyamānā dīrghadṛḍhasanniveśarūpe(?ṇā/
analyzed: bhāva āśrayaḥ tu pratīyate eva atas śaśa mūrdha vartinaḥ vayavāḥ upari upari hīyamānāḥ dīrgha dṛḍha sanniveśa rūpeṇa

original: ṇa)pariṇatā mauṇḍyāparanāmānaḥ śṛṅgābhāvātmanā jñāyante. yad dhi yathā nirbhāsate
analyzed: ṇa pariṇatāḥ mauṇḍya apara nāmānaḥ śṛṅga abhāva ātmanā jñāyante yat hi yathā nirbhāsate

original: tat tatheivālambanam. abhāvo 'pi parādhīna evānubhūyamānas tathaivālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: tat tathā iva ālambanam abhāvaḥ pi para adhīnaḥ eva anubhūyamānaḥ tathā eva ālambanam bhaviṣyati

original: jñānaṃ tu sadrūpaṃ nāsyā nāstītibuddher ālambanaṃ bhavitum arhati. āha ca --
analyzed: jñānam tu sat rūpam na asyāḥ na asti iti buddheḥ ālambanam bhavitum arhati āha ca

original: bhāvarūpaṃ ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti katham ucyate /
analyzed: bhāva rūpam ca vijñānam na asti iti katham ucyate

original: iti. yat tarhy anāśritaviṣayaṃ śūnyaśabdāj jñānam utpadyate tadanālambanaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: iti yat tarhi anāśrita viṣayam śūnya śabdāt jñānam utpadyate tat anālambanam bhavet

original: sarvābhāvasya pratyetum aśakyatvād,
analyzed: sarva abhāvasya pratyetum aśakya tvāt

original: viśeṣāprakāśāc ca. ata āha -- vastv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svatantraṃ śūnyajñānam

original: utpadyate kiñcid dhi kenacit śūnyam avasīyate. gṛhaṃ caitreṇa jagad vandhyāsutena.
analyzed: utpadyate kiñcid hi kenacid śūnyam avasīyate gṛham caitreṇa jagat vandhyā sutena

original: ataḥ kevalagṛhādyālambanam eva śūnyajñānaṃ nānālambanaṃ svāṃśālambanaṃ veti // 112 //

original: evam aṅgulyādivākyajanitaśābdavibhramāṇām api sannidhidoṣadūṣitā eva padārthāḥ kāraṇam ity āha -- kāraṇatvam iti. yas tarhy atyantānanubhūtapūrvaḥ{2,
analyzed: evam aṅguli ādi vākya janita śābda vibhramāṇām api sannidhi doṣa dūṣitāḥ eva padārthāḥ kāraṇam iti āha kāraṇa tvam iti yaḥ tarhi

original: 66}pradhānādir artho buddhyā sāṅkhyādibhiḥ kalpyate,
analyzed: arthaḥ buddhyā sāṅkhya ādibhiḥ kalpyate

original: tatra na kiñcij jñānasyālambanam upalabhyate. viṣāṇādir hi kvacid adṛṣṭaḥ kvacit
analyzed: tatra na kiñcid jñānasya ālambanam upalabhyate viṣāṇa ādiḥ hi kvacid adṛṣṭaḥ kvacid

original: tūpalabhyata iti yuktam. svarūpāsatas tu kathaṃ kutra vā kalpanam ata āha -- atyanteti.
analyzed: tu upalabhyate iti yuktam sva rūpa asataḥ tu katham kutra vā kalpanam atas āha atyanta iti

original: pṛthivyādi sūkṣmam eva hi taiḥ pradhānam iti kalpyate. sthūlasya hi jagato nākasmān
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi sūkṣmam eva hi taiḥ pradhānam iti kalpyate sthūlasya hi jagataḥ na akasmān

original: niṣpattir upapadyata iti pradhānaṃ kalpyate. na ca tadanyat paramāṇubhyo ghaṭata
analyzed: niṣpattiḥ upapadyate iti pradhānam kalpyate na ca tad anyat paramāṇubhyaḥ ghaṭata

original: iti kathañcit sūkṣmarūpāvasthitāḥ pṛthivyādaya eva pradhānabuddhyā gṛhyante. so 'yaṃ
analyzed: iti kathañcid sūkṣma rūpa avasthitāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ eva pradhāna buddhyā gṛhyante saḥ yam

original: sūkṣmarūpatayā teṣām agrahaṇāt tadvyatiriktaḥ pradhānabhramaḥ. paramārthatas tu tatsthāne
analyzed: sūkṣma rūpa tayā teṣām agrahaṇāt tad vyatiriktaḥ pradhāna bhramaḥ paramārthataḥ tu tad sthāne

original: pradhānaparikalpanād eva tadālambanaṃ prakalpyata iti. ataḥ prakṛtaṃ vipariṇataṃ
analyzed: pradhāna parikalpanāt eva tad ālambanam prakalpyate iti atas prakṛtam vipariṇatam

original: prakalpanaṃ tasyeti parāmṛśyata iti // 113 //
analyzed: prakalpanam tasya iti parāmṛśyate iti

original: nanv atra prakaraṇe 'vartamāna evārtho buddhyā viṣayīkriyata ity uktam. tad ayuktaṃ,

original: indriyasannikṛṣṭārthaviṣayatvaṃ ca. ayaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇadharmo na jñānāntarāṇām.
analyzed: indriya sannikṛṣṭa artha viṣaya tvam ca ayam pratyakṣa pramāṇa dharmaḥ na jñāna antarāṇām

analyzed: na tu vibhramāḥ pratyakṣam

original: tadābhāsatvād iti // 114 //

analyzed: pratyakṣam tu indriya sannikarṣa anuvidhāyi na ca atra āvartamānena indriyam sannikṛṣyata

analyzed: iti bhavati vartamāna viṣayam doṣa sahāyebhyaḥ tu indriyebhyaḥ prācīna anubhava janita saṃskāra vaśena āvartamānam

analyzed: iti śaktimat

original: 67}kāraṇam. nacāsataḥ śaktisamavāyaḥ sambhavati. na. sattvāt. yadi tadekāntam asad bhaved,

original: virodhāt. nābhāvaḥ,

original: kāraṇāt sadātmanāvasthite gavādau vastvantarābhāvātmanā yaj jñānam utpadyate tadabhāvālambanam ucyata iti,

original: idaṃ ca prāg apy uktam adhunopapāditam iti vivekaḥ. bauddhānāṃ tu sarvasaṃvidām ātmaparyavasāyitvād

original: na tv etad astīty āha -- bhavatām iti. bhavanmata ity arthaḥ // 118 //

analyzed: na ubhayam iti pratijñā ādi doṣaḥ abhihitaḥ

original: dṛṣṭānto 'pi na kevalam sādhyahīnaḥ sarva eva tu dṛṣṭāntadoṣās tadvacanābhāvaprabhṛti yojayitavyāḥ. na hy ekasmin jñānamātre vastuni dṛṣṭāntavaca(saḥ)

original: sādhyāṃśo nirālambanatvaṃ,
hetvaṃśaḥ pratyayatvaṃ,
analyzed: hetu aṃśaḥ pratyaya tvam

original: dvedhā hi dṛṣṭāntavacanasamayaḥ. kecid vyāptyā sādharmya ukte 'pi vaidharmyavacanaṃ

original: kāryam iti manyante. tad idam ekeṣāṃ matena paricoditam iti kecid ity uktam iti.
analyzed: kāryam iti manyante tat idam ekeṣām matena paricoditam iti kecid iti uktam iti

original: nanu ca vipakṣād hetuṃ vyāvartayituṃ vaidharmyavacanaṃ,
analyzed: nanu ca vipakṣāt hetum vyāvartayitum vaidharmya vacanam

original: na ceha vipakṣānuvṛttiḥ sambhavati. sādhanabhāṣyasya tadantareṇa hetor vipakṣād vyāvṛttyasiddheḥ. a(?nye tu/
analyzed: na ca iha vipakṣa anuvṛttiḥ sambhavati sādhana bhāṣyasya tad antareṇa hetoḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛtti asiddheḥ anye tu

original: nyais tu) hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiṃ darśayituṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam. tad yadi samyak sādharmyavacanād eva vyāptir avagatā,
analyzed: nyaiḥ tu hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptim darśayitum dṛṣṭānta vacanam tat yadi samyak sādharmya vacanāt eva vyāptiḥ avagatā

original: na sahabhāvamātraṃ,
analyzed: na sahabhāva mātram

original: na ca viparītānvayaḥ,
analyzed: na ca viparīta anvayaḥ

original: tadā kiṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti sādhanabhāṣyavyākhyānāvasare varṇitam. uktaṃ ca parair api na vā tadabhāvāt tatrāvṛtter iti. ato{2,
analyzed: tadā kim vaidharmya vacanena iti sādhana bhāṣya vyākhyāna avasare varṇitam uktam ca paraiḥ api na vā tad abhāvāt tatra avṛtteḥ iti

original: 70}vaidharmyasyāvacanam ity adoṣaḥ. ata āha -- tadabhāveti. tadabhāvād avṛttir iti yad etad tavābhidhānaṃ tasyātra prakṛtasādhane 'vasaro nāstīti
analyzed: iti adoṣaḥ atas āha tad abhāva iti tad abhāvāt avṛttiḥ iti yat etat tava abhidhānam tasya atra prakṛta sādhane vasaraḥ na asti iti

original: katham anavasaro 'ata āha -- vidhirūpeti. tadabhāvād avṛtter iti yad uktaṃ tasyāyam
analyzed: katham anavasaraḥ atas āha vidhi rūpā iti tad abhāvāt avṛtteḥ iti yat uktam tasya ayam

original: arthaḥ -- bhāve pratijñāte vidhirūpeṇābhāvo vipakṣo bhavati. tadabhāve ca vipakṣe

original: hetuḥ prakāśakaḥ. vyatirekapradhānavādino hi te. sarvatra sādhyānvitahetusaṃvido
analyzed: hetuḥ prakāśakaḥ vyatireka pradhāna vādinaḥ hi te sarvatra sādhya anvita hetu saṃvidaḥ

original: durlabhatvāt. ato vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhenaiva sarvatra hetor gamakatvam āśritam. na
analyzed: durlabha tvāt atas vipakṣa vyāvṛtti mukhena eva sarvatra hetoḥ gamaka tvam āśritam na

original: cāsati vaidharmyavacane vipakṣavyāvṛttiḥ śakyate darśayitum. ataḥ sarvatraiva tvanmate

analyzed: pratijñāte vastu ātmakam sa ālambanam eva vipakṣaḥ tatra ca hetoḥ vṛtti sambhāvanāyām

original: [715] ke (KHA)
analyzed: ke kha

analyzed: vaidharmyasya prayogaḥ sambhavati eva kriyate ca anumāna kuśalaiḥ atas vaśyam vācyam vaidharmyam

original: yan nocyate tan nocitam ity āha -- tatreti. tadvṛttena vidhirūpapratijñā parāmṛśyate. hiśabdo hetau. yasmād avastuvipakṣe prayogaḥ sambhavati,
analyzed: yat na ucyate tat na ucitam iti āha tatra iti tad vṛttena vidhi rūpa pratijñā parāmṛśyate hi śabdaḥ hetau yasmāt avastu vipakṣe prayogaḥ sambhavati

analyzed: yathā khapuṣpam iti śakyam eva

original: 71}sarvābhāvasyāvastuni śakyanidarśanatvāt. bhāvo hi tatra nidarśayitum aśakyaḥ. vināśākhyakriyāsāmānyaṃ cānityatvam iti vidhirūpapratijñā
analyzed: śakya nidarśana tvāt bhāvaḥ hi tatra nidarśayitum aśakyaḥ vināśa ākhya kriyā sāmānyam ca anitya tvam iti vidhi rūpa pratijñā

analyzed: na tu evam manyāmahe vakṣyati hi

iti

original: sādhu tarhi sādhanam āpannaṃ sampratipattir evottaram ata āha -- sarvatheti. yeṣāṃ hi sādhyasiddhāv upāyāntarāṇi pratijñāhetudṛṣṭā(?ntāni/

original: svāsiddhe 'pi tathākaraṇe ko doṣaḥ,

original: ata āha -- dvayor iti. nāyam adṛṣṭāya vṛddhopadeśo dṛṣṭānusāreṇa parāsiddhapratiṣedhaparatvam evāsya niścīyate ity āha -- pratyeṣya(ntī)

original: pradarśanaṃ kṛtam. sādhyābhāve tu vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvo darśayitavyaḥ. vyāptiviparyayasyānumāne
analyzed: pradarśanam kṛtam sādhya abhāve tu vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte hetu abhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ vyāpti viparyayasya anumāne

original: vakṣyamāṇatvāt. tad ihānityatvasya sarvatvād iti vaktavye sarvasyānityatvād iti vacanaṃ

original: atra codayati -- nanv iti. saṃsārāvasthāyām anumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ. atra ca hetvādayo

analyzed: loka prasiddhāḥ eva lokaḥ iti laukika saṃvṛti satyam apadiśati atas saṃvṛti satya siddhena

original: hetvādinā sādhyasiddhir āsīd eva prāk,
analyzed: hetu ādinā sādhya siddhiḥ āsīt eva prāk
