analyzed: paramārtha avasthāyām tu sarva abhāvam ācakṣmahe iti avasthā bhedāt adoṣaḥ iti

original: pariharati -- yo 'dhuneti. yadi hi tadbādhakabalena nāstīty ucyate,
analyzed: pariharati yaḥ dhuna iti yadi hi tad bādhaka balena na asti iti ucyate

original: prāg api nāsīd eva. bādhakena tatprāg api pratikṣiptaṃ rajatam iva śuktāv avagatikṣaṇād ārabhya. ataḥ prāg apy asataḥ kathaṃ sādhanatvam iti
analyzed: prāk api na āsīt eva bādhakena tat prāk api pratikṣiptam rajatam iva śuktau avagati kṣaṇāt ārabhya atas prāk api asataḥ katham sādhana tvam iti

original: {2,79} prāk sādhanatvābhyupagame vā paramārthāstitvam āpadyata ity āha -- sādhaneti. kāraṇam āha -- siddhir iti // 159 //
analyzed: prāk sādhanatva abhyupagame vā paramārtha astitvam āpadyate iti āha sādhana iti kāraṇam āha siddhiḥ iti

original: kim iti na yujyeta,
analyzed: kim iti na yujyeta

original: ata āha -- na dṛṣṭeti. nātyantam asataḥ sādhanatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śaśaviṣāṇavad ity anumānam antarṇītaṃ,
analyzed: atas āha na dṛṣṭa iti na atyantam asataḥ sādhanatvam dṛṣṭam śaśaviṣāṇa vat iti anumānam antarṇītam

original: kvacid dṛṣṭasyāpi rūpasyānyatropacaritasya paramārthopāyatā nāsti. kim utātyantāsato hetvāder ity āha -- bāṣpādineti // 158 //
analyzed: kvacid dṛṣṭasya api rūpasya anyatra upacaritasya paramārtha upāya tā na asti kim uta atyanta asataḥ hetu ādeḥ iti āha bāṣpa ādinā iti  /

original: upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 159 //
analyzed: upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: nanu varṇātmanā asatyānām api rekhādīnāṃ paramārthavarṇopāyatā dṛṣṭā,
analyzed: nanu varṇa ātmanā asatyānām api rekhā ādīnām paramārtha varṇa upāya tā dṛṣṭā

original: ato naikāntiko 'satyatvaṃ hetur ata āha -- ye 'pīti. vipakṣavṛttir hi hetur anaikāntiko bhavati. na ca paramārthopāyeṣu rekhādiṣv asatyatvam
analyzed: atas na aikāntikaḥ satya tvam hetuḥ atas āha ye pi iti vipakṣa vṛttiḥ hi hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati na ca paramārtha upāyeṣu rekhā ādiṣu asatya tvam

original: svarūpasatyatvāt. tena ca rūpeṇa varṇabodhopāyatvāt. taddarśino hi smṛtasaṅketasya varṇā buddhau bhavantīti // 160 //
analyzed: sva rūpa satya tvāt tena ca rūpeṇa varṇa bodha upāya tvāt tad darśinaḥ hi smṛta saṅketasya varṇāḥ buddhau bhavanti iti

original: nanu bhavantu svarūpasantaḥ. varṇātmanā tāvadasatyā eva,
analyzed: nanu bhavantu sva rūpa santaḥ varṇa ātmanā tāvat asatyāḥ eva

original: ata āha -- varṇeti. sarve hi bhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa santaḥ pararūpeṇāsantaḥ. kenacid viśeṣeṇa rekhodāharaṇam iti // 161 //
analyzed: atas āha varṇa iti sarve hi bhāvāḥ sva rūpeṇa santaḥ para rūpeṇa asantaḥ kenacid viśeṣeṇa rekhā udāharaṇam iti  /

original: {2,80} na caiṣa prakāro 'tyantāsatāṃ hetvādīnāṃ sambhavatīty āha -- svarūpa iti.
analyzed: na ca eṣa prakāraḥ tyanta asatām hetu ādīnām sambhavati iti āha svarūpe iti

original: asatyam api kenacid rūpeṇa sad eva rūpāntareṇa bhavati. na hi nissvabhāvam iti nāpy
analyzed: asatyam api kenacid rūpeṇa sat eva rūpa antareṇa bhavati na hi nissvabhāvam iti nā api

original: asatyatety uktam iti // 162 //
analyzed: asatya tā iti uktam iti

original: etad eva sphuṭayati -- hetvādīnām iti. atra ca bāṣpādīnām ivāgnyādāv upāyatvaṃ hetvādīnāṃ,
analyzed: etat eva sphuṭayati hetu ādīnām iti atra ca bāṣpa ādīnām iva agni ādau upāya tvam hetu ādīnām

original: na paramārthena tu lekhyavad ity āha -- teneti. hetutvābhāvapratipādanaparam idam iti // 163 //
analyzed: na paramārthena tu lekhya vat iti āha tena iti hetutva abhāva pratipādana param idam iti

original: atra codayati -- upāyānām iti. kim idaṃ nissvabhāvatvam upāyānām āpadyate. saṃvṛtyātmakā hi te. tena ca rūpeṇa santa eveti // 164 //
analyzed: atra codayati upāyānām iti kim idam nissvabhāva tvam upāyānām āpadyate saṃvṛti ātmakāḥ hi te tena ca rūpeṇa santaḥ eva iti  /

original: pariharati -- saṃvṛtyeti. sāṃvṛtaṃ hi rūpaṃ vāṅmātranirmitaṃ,
analyzed: pariharati saṃvṛtya iti sāṃvṛtam hi rūpam vāc mātra nirmitam

original: na paramārthopāyo bhavatīti // 165 //
analyzed: na parama artha upāyaḥ bhavati iti

original: api ca, paramārthāl lokasya saṃvṛtisatyasya bhede na hetur asti,
analyzed: api ca paramārthāt lokasya saṃvṛti satyasya bhede na hetuḥ asti

original: tadbhedagrāhiṇo 'pi jñānasya mithyātvād ity āha -- paramārtheti. api ca yadi paramārtho 'pi laukikopāyagamyaḥ,
analyzed: tad bheda grāhiṇaḥ api jñānasya mithyātvāt iti āha paramārtha iti api ca yadi laukika upāya gamyaḥ

original: na tarhi paramārthaḥ,
analyzed: na tarhi paramārthaḥ

original: laukikopāyagamyatvād bāṣpādivāgnir avagamyamāna ity āha -- laukiketi. pūrvaṃ ca satyabhedo
analyzed: laukika upāya gamya tvāt bāṣpāt iva agniḥ avagamyamānaḥ iti āha laukika iti pūrvam ca

original: nirākṛtaḥ. idānīṃ sāṃvṛtasya paramārthopāyateti vivekaḥ. nanv asata eva śrutyādiprapañcāt
analyzed: nirākṛtaḥ idānīm sāṃvṛtasya paramārtha upāya tā iti vivekaḥ nanu asataḥ eva śruti ādi prapañcāt

original: prapañcavilayātmano brahmaṇo nirūpaṇaṃ vedāntavidbhir iṣyate. yathāhuḥ --
analyzed: prapañca vilaya ātmanaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nirūpaṇam vedānta vidbhiḥ iṣyate yathā āhuḥ

original: {2,81} bhedaprapañcavilayadvāreṇa ca nirūpaṇam / iti.
analyzed: bheda prapañca vilaya dvāreṇa ca nirūpaṇam iti

original: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tadvedobhayaṃ saha /
analyzed: vidyām ca avidyām ca yaḥ tat veda ubhayam saha

original: avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtam aśnute //
analyzed: avidyayā mṛtyum tīrtvā vidyayā amṛtam aśnute

original: iti. kim uktam. vidyārūpaṃ ca brahma,
analyzed: iti kim uktam vidyā rūpam ca brahma

original: avidyārūpaṃ ca śrutyādi. tadubhayam api yaḥ saha veda so 'vidyopalakṣitaṃ mṛtyuṃ
analyzed: avidyā rūpam ca śruti ādi tat ubhayam api yaḥ saha veda saḥ vidyā upalakṣitam mṛtyum

original: tīrtvā vidyārūpeṇopalakṣitaṃ brahmānandaṃ pratipadyata iti. tad evam avidyāta eva
analyzed: tīrtvā vidyā rūpeṇa upalakṣitam brahma ānandam pratipadyate iti tat evam avidyātaḥ eva

original: vidyāprāptir iṣyate iti. kim aparāddham evaṃ bruvāṇair asmābhiḥ. naiṣa naḥ siddhāntaḥ
analyzed: vidyā prāptiḥ iṣyate iti kim aparāddham evam bruvāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ na eṣa naḥ siddhāntaḥ

original: yad asann eva śrutyādiprapañco brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti. teṣām api pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhānām
analyzed: yat asan eva śruti ādi prapañcaḥ brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti teṣām api pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddhānām

original: aśakyāpahnavatvāt. yathā hi so 'yam iti pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pratyagātmā,
analyzed: aśakya apahnava tvāt yathā hi saḥ yam iti pratyakṣa siddhaḥ pratyagātmā

original: evaṃ teṣv iti tadvad eva samyañco bhavitum arhanti. tasya ca pūrvottarakarmanirodhānutpādābhyāṃ vigalitabhogabhogāyatanasya kaivalyaṃ mokṣam
analyzed: evam teṣu iti tadvat eva samyañcaḥ bhavitum arhanti tasya ca pūrva uttara karma nirodha anutpādābhyām vigalita bhoga bhoga āyatanasya kaivalyam mokṣam

original: na prapañcavilayam. ekam evādvitīyam ityādivedāntās tv arthavādāntaravad viṣayavairāgyapratipādanaparatayā
analyzed: na prapañca vilayam ekam eva advitīyam ityādi vedāntāḥ tu arthavāda antara vat viṣaya vairāgya pratipādana para tayā

original: kathañcid gamayitavyāḥ. sa eṣa neti netītikaraṇena spaṣṭam eva bahirviṣayasadbhāvam
analyzed: kathañcid gamayitavyāḥ saḥ eṣa na iti na iti iti karaṇena spaṣṭam eva bahis viṣaya sadbhāvam

original: upadarśayati. eṣa ity aparokṣanirdiṣṭasya brahmaṇo viṣayavivekamātraṃ kathayati na
analyzed: upadarśayati eṣaḥ iti aparokṣa nirdiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ viṣaya viveka mātram kathayati na

original: tadabhāvam. śrutyādiṣu cāvidyāvādo brahmaṇaḥ praśaṃsārthaḥ. apaśavo 'nye gośvebhyaḥ
analyzed: tad abhāvam śruti ādiṣu ca avidyā vādaḥ brahmaṇaḥ praśaṃsā arthaḥ a paśavaḥ nye go śvebhyaḥ

original: itivat paśvantareṣv apaśuvādaḥ. ato na kvacidaparamārthasya paramārthopāyatā. astu
analyzed: iti vat paśu antareṣu a paśu vādaḥ atas na kvacid aparama arthasya parama artha upāya tā astu

original: vā nityanirdoṣavedāntasiddham aprapañcaṃ brahma. na tu kṣaṇikasaṃvedanapravāhātmakaṃ
analyzed: vā nitya nirdoṣa vedānta siddham aprapañcam brahma na tu kṣaṇika saṃvedana pravāha ātmakam

original: dvaitaṃ kutaścit pramāṇād avagacchāma ity alambanenāpi // 166 //
analyzed: dvaitam kutaścid pramāṇāt avagacchāmaḥ iti alambanena api

original: pratyavasthānāntaram idānīṃ bauddhasyopanyasyati -- nanv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- yady api bāhyo hetvādir artho nāsti,
analyzed: pratyavasthāna antaram idānīm bauddhasya upanyasyati nanu iti evam hi manyante yadi api bāhyaḥ hetu ādiḥ arthaḥ na asti

original: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhenaiva hetvādinānumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ setsyati. anādivāsanopaplāvitā

original: hi hetvādivikalpavibhāgā bhavanti hetur ayaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'yam ityādayaḥ. vikalpa iti

original: savikalpikāṃ buddhim ācakṣmahe. ato vāsanābhedād buddhibhedaḥ,
analyzed: savikalpikām buddhim ācakṣmahe atas vāsanā bhedāt buddhi bhedaḥ

original: tadbhedād dhetvādibheda ity uktaṃ bhavati. avaśyābhyupagama(?niyama/
analyzed: tad bhedāt hetu ādi bhedaḥ iti uktam bhavati avaśya abhyupagama niyama

original: nīya)ś cāyaṃ bhavadbhir api. buddhinibandhano dharmyādibhedaḥ. na hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti{2,
analyzed: nīyaḥ ca ayam bhavadbhiḥ api buddhi nibandhanaḥ dharmya ādi bhedaḥ na hi anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt

original: 82}parasparaṃ dharmiṇo vā bhinnayor hetusādhyayor avagatir asti. ato jñānabhedanibandhana
analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ vā bhinnayoḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ avagatiḥ asti atas jñāna bheda nibandhana

original: evātra bhinnatvavyavahāraḥ. sarvatraiva ca jñānam eva bhedanibandhanam. sudūram api
analyzed: eva atra bhinna tva vyavahāraḥ sarvatra eva ca jñānam eva bheda nibandhanam su dūram api

original: gatvā yuktibhir anusaṃhito bhedo jñāna eva paryavasyati. ato 'stu tannibandhana eva
analyzed: gatvā yuktibhiḥ anusaṃhitaḥ bhedaḥ jñāne eva paryavasyati atas stu tad nibandhanaḥ eva

original: sarvatra bhedaḥ. deśādibhedād api hi bhedaṃ bruvāṇas tadbhedaṃ paryanuyukto jñānabhedam
analyzed: sarvatra bhedaḥ deśa ādi bhedāt api hi bhedam bruvāṇaḥ tad bhedam paryanuyuktaḥ jñāna bhedam

original: evālambate. tāvatāpi vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ prakārāntareṇa bhedo 'nusriyata iti. atrāpy
analyzed: eva ālambate tāvatā api vyavahāra siddhau kim prakāra antareṇa bhedaḥ nusriyate iti atra api

original: agnidhūmādau kṛtakānityatvavilakṣaṇaḥ sphuṭo bhedāvagraho bhavati. tatrāpi na jātibhedo
analyzed: agni dhūma ādau kṛtaka anitya tva vilakṣaṇaḥ sphuṭaḥ bheda avagrahaḥ bhavati tatra api na jāti bhedaḥ

original: nibandhanam iti vācyam. so 'pi cāgnidhūmaśabdanirmita eva. na hi saṃvṛtikalpanād
analyzed: nibandhanam iti vācyam ca agni dhūma śabda nirmitaḥ eva na hi saṃvṛti kalpanāt

original: anyena prakāreṇa jātibhedam upalabhāmahe. ataḥ śabdabhede 'rthavikalpavilāsitā evāgnitvādaya
analyzed: anyena prakāreṇa jāti bhedam upalabhāmahe atas śabda bhede rtha vikalpa vilāsitāḥ eva agni tva ādayaḥ

original: iti. idaṃ ca bāhyanirākaraṇaparatayānāsthayoktam. na śabdabhedo 'pi vijñānabhedād
analyzed: iti idam ca bāhya nirākaraṇa para tayā anāsthayā uktam na vijñāna bhedāt

original: vinā sambhavati. so 'pi jñānamātraprabhāvita evābhyupetya bāhyahetvādivikalpavibhāgārtham ukta iti // 167 //
analyzed: vinā sambhavati saḥ pi jñāna mātra prabhāvitaḥ eva abhyupetya bāhya hetu ādi vikalpa vibhāga artham uktaḥ iti

original: ayam evāsmadīyatantrakārāṇāṃ siddhānta ity āha -- nyāyavidbhir iti. nyāyavidbhir
analyzed: ayam eva asmadīya tantra kārāṇām siddhāntaḥ iti āha nyāya vidbhiḥ iti nyāya vidbhiḥ

original: hi diṅnāgācāryair idam uktaṃ sarva evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena
analyzed: hi diṅnāga ācāryaiḥ idam uktam sarvaḥ eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena

original: bahiḥ sadasattvam apekṣata iti // 168 //
analyzed: bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti

original: etad api dūṣayati -- astīti. nāsataḥ śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ śabdanibandhanaḥ tajjanitabuddhinibandhano
analyzed: etat api dūṣayati asti iti na asataḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādeḥ śabda nibandhanaḥ tad janita buddhi nibandhanaḥ

original: vā bhedo dṛṣṭa iti duruktam idam apareṣāṃ buddhyārūḍhenānumānānumeyavyavahāra iti // 169 //

original: api ca astu buddhiśabdabhedanibandhano hetvādibhedaḥ,
analyzed: api ca astu buddhi śabda bheda nibandhanaḥ hetu ādi bhedaḥ

original: tayor eva tu katham akasmād udbhavaḥ. na hy akāraṇikā kāryotpattiḥ sambhavati. na ca śūnye jagati{2,
analyzed: tayoḥ eva tu katham akasmāt udbhavaḥ na hi akāraṇikā kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati na ca śūnye

original: 83}tayoḥ kāraṇam utprekṣitum api śakyata ity āha -- nirvastuka iti. yaś cāyaṃ śabdabhedo hetvādibhedahetutayopavarṇitaḥ,
analyzed: kāraṇam utprekṣitum api śakyate iti āha nirvastukaḥ iti yaḥ ca ayam śabda bhedaḥ hetu ādi bheda hetutayā upavarṇitaḥ

original: so 'pi tadabhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- śabdeti // 170 //
analyzed: saḥ api tad abhāvāt anupapannaḥ iti āha śabda iti   /

original: kiñ ca yady avidyamāna eva buddhimātrakalpitaḥ sādhyādibhedo 'numānavyavahārāya kalpyate,
analyzed: kim ca yadi avidyamānaḥ eva buddhi mātra kalpitaḥ sādhya ādi bhedaḥ numāna vyavahārāya kalpyate

original: tato dūṣaṇavyavahāro 'pi tadvad eva syāt. utpadyate khalv asmin sādhane hetvādinyūnatoktimātrād eva dūṣaṇabuddhir ity āha -- yadi veti dvayena
analyzed: tatas dūṣaṇa vyavahāraḥ api tadvat eva syāt utpadyate khalu asmin sādhane hetu ādi nyūna tā ukti mātrāt eva dūṣaṇa buddhiḥ iti āha yadi vā iti dvayena

original: śakyate ca vaditum evam api sarva evāyaṃ dūṣyadūṣaṇavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dūṣyadūṣaṇanyāyena,
analyzed: śakyate ca vaditum evam api sarvaḥ eva ayam dūṣya dūṣaṇa vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dūṣya dūṣaṇa nyāyena

original: na bahiḥ sadasattvam apekṣata ity āha -- yaś ceti // 173 //
analyzed: na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti āha yaḥ ca iti

original: nanv evam apy āvayor aviśeṣa eva,
analyzed: nanu evam api āvayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ eva

original: yathā hi no dūṣaṇajñānam utpannam evaṃ bhavato 'pi sādhanajñānam. ataḥ kathaṃ vijayase
analyzed: yathā hi naḥ dūṣaṇa jñānam utpannam evam bhavataḥ sādhana jñānam atas katham vijayase

original: ata āha -- buddhīti. ayam āvayor viśeṣaḥ buddhimātravyavahāriṇo bhavato maduktadūṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: atas āha buddhi iti ayam āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ buddhi mātra vyavahāriṇaḥ bhavataḥ mad ukta dūṣaṇam

original: siddham iti na te pakṣaḥ sidhyati. tvaduktaṃ tu sādhanam asmākam asiddham iti na
analyzed: siddham iti na te pakṣaḥ sidhyati tvad uktam tu sādhanam asmākam asiddham iti na

original: sādhyaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti // 174 //
analyzed: sādhyam pratipadyāmahe iti

original: kathaṃ sādhanam asiddham ata āha -- bāhyeti. bāhyārthavyavahāriṇo hi vayaṃ,
analyzed: katham sādhanam asiddham atas āha bāhya iti bāhya artha vyavahāriṇaḥ hi vayam

original: na tvam iva jñānaikaśaraṇāḥ. tatra katham asati bāhye budhyāmaha iti // 175 //
analyzed: na tvam iva jñāna eka śaraṇāḥ tatra katham asati bāhye budhyāmahe iti  /

original: {2,84} punar api paraś codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hi me sādhanam asiddham,
analyzed: punar api paraḥ codayati nanu iti yathā hi me sādhanam asiddham

original: evaṃ dūṣaṇam apīti na duṣṭaṃ sādhanam iti // 176 //
analyzed: evam dūṣaṇam api iti na duṣṭam sādhanam iti

original: mīmāṃsakas tu pāśupato 'yam evaṃvādī yad vihāya sādhanam abhāvād dūṣaṇasyāpy aduṣṭatvam ātiṣṭhata iti sāpahāsam āha -- nedānīm iti // 177 //
analyzed: mīmāṃsakaḥ tu pāśupataḥ yam evaṃvādī yat vihāya sādhanam abhāvāt dūṣaṇasya api aduṣṭa tvam ātiṣṭhate iti sa apahāsam āha na idānīm iti

original: yaś ca vāsanābhedanibandhano vikalpapravibhāgo varṇitaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca vāsanā bheda nibandhanaḥ vikalpa pravibhāgaḥ varṇitaḥ

original: so 'pi tadbhedanimittābhāvād anupapanna ity āha -- na ceti. nanu jñānabhedād eva vāsanābhedo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: saḥ u pi tad bheda nimitta abhāvāt anupapannaḥ iti āha na ca iti nanu jñāna bhedāt eva vāsanā bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kathaṃ nimittābhāvaḥ. na,
analyzed: katham nimitta abhāvaḥ na

original: tadbhedasyaiva nirnimittatvād,
analyzed: tad bhedasya eva nirnimitta tvāt

original: vāsanānibandhane tu tadbhede 'nyonyāśrayatvam ity āśaṅkayā sahāha -- jñāneti. nanu svabhāvabhinnam eva jñānaṃ vāsanābhedanibandhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,

original: iti. grāhyalakṣaṇāyogāt tāvan nānyo 'nubhāvyo 'sti. ata eva tasyā nānubhavo 'paraḥ.

original: tenāpi tadgrahaṇānupapatteḥ. ataḥ svaprakāśā dhīr evaikā modata iti siddham. yas
analyzed: tena api tad grahaṇa anupapatteḥ atas sva prakāśā dhīḥ evā ekā modate iti siddham yaḥ

original: tv asambaddhasyaiva jñānenārthasya prakāśyatām ātiṣṭhate,
analyzed: tu asambaddhasya eva jñānena arthasya prakāśya tām ātiṣṭhate

original: so 'sambaddhenāpi dīpena ghaṭasya prakāśyatām ātiṣṭhata iti vivṛtaṃ hetudvayam. sahopalambhaniyama upariṣṭād vivariṣyata iti // 20 //
analyzed: saḥ sambaddhena api dīpena ghaṭasya prakāśya tām ātiṣṭhate iti vivṛtam hetu dvayam saha upalambha niyamaḥ upariṣṭāt vivariṣyate iti  /

original: {2,102} aparam api jñānasyaivākāravattāyāṃ kāraṇam āha -- itaś ceti. yuṣmākaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ
analyzed: aparam api jñānasya eva ākāravat tāyām kāraṇam āha itas ca iti yuṣmākam mīmāṃsakānām

original: tajjñānaṃ prakāśakam iti siddhānta iti. kasya prakāśakam ata āha -- svayam iti. bāhyasya
analyzed: tat jñānam prakāśakam iti siddhānte iti kasya prakāśakam atas āha svayam iti bāhyasya

original: jaḍātmanaḥ svayaṃ prakāśahīnasya tadupāyatayā sammataṃ,
analyzed: jaḍa ātmanaḥ svayam prakāśa hīnasya tad upāya tayā sammatam

original: anyathā tatprakāśāyogāt // 21 //
analyzed: anyathā tad prakāśa ayogāt

original: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- na ceti. yad dhi yasya prakāśakaṃ tad gṛhītam eva prakāśayati.
analyzed: kim atas yadi evam atas āha na ca iti yat hi yasya prakāśakam tat gṛhītam eva prakāśayati

original: tad yadi jñānam arthasya prakāśakam etad api nāgṛhītaṃ tat prakāśayet. ato 'vaśyaṃ
analyzed: tat yadi jñānam arthasya prakāśakam etat api na agṛhītam tat prakāśayet atas vaśyam

original: grahītavyam. na ca tadanākāraṃ grahītuṃ śakyam,
analyzed: grahītavyam na ca tat anākāram grahītum śakyam

original: na cārthajñānayor ākārabhedopalambhaḥ. ato 'vaśyābhyupagantavyaṃ grahaṇasya jñānasyaivāyam
analyzed: na ca artha jñānayoḥ ākāra bheda upalambhaḥ atas vaśyā abhyupagantavyam grahaṇasya jñānasya eva ayam

original: ākāra iti sāmpratam ity abhiprāya iti. tadadhīnaprakāśatvād iti jñānādhīnaḥ prakāśaḥ
analyzed: ākāraḥ iti sāmpratam iti abhiprāyaḥ iti tad adhīna prakāśa tvāt iti jñāna adhīnaḥ prakāśaḥ

original: pratibhāso yasyety arthaḥ // 22 //
analyzed: pratibhāsaḥ yasya iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ tāvadavaśyagrāhyatayā jñānasyaivākāraḥ avaśyagrāhyatā ca prakāśakatayety uktam.
analyzed: evam tāvat avaśya grāhya tayā jñānasya eva ākāraḥ avaśya grāhya tā ca prakāśaka tayā iti uktam

original: itaraś cāvaśyagrāhyatety āha -- utpanneṣv iti dvayena. dvedhā hy utpannaṃ vastu na
analyzed: itaraḥ ca avaśya grāhya tā iti āha utpanneṣu iti dvayena dvedhā hi utpannam vastu na

original: gṛhyate prakāśakābhāvāt pratibandhād vā. yathāndhakāratirohito ghaṭaḥ kuḍyādipratibandhād
analyzed: gṛhyate prakāśaka abhāvāt pratibandhāt vā yathā andhakāra tirohitaḥ ghaṭaḥ kuḍya ādi pratibandhāt

original: vā yathā loke. sa eva caitad ubhayam api jñāne sambhavati. ato grahaṇakāraṇāsambhavād
analyzed: vā yathā loke saḥ eva ca etat ubhayam api jñāne sambhavati atas grahaṇa kāraṇa asambhavāt

original: utpadyamānam eva grahītavyam. evaṃ ca tasyaiva sākāratvāpattir ity uktam eveti // 24 //
analyzed: utpadyamānam eva grahītavyam evam ca tasya eva sa ākāra tva āpattiḥ iti uktam eva iti

original: {2,103} yadi tv arthaprakāśāt prāg jñānaṃ notpadyetaiva,
analyzed: yadi tu artha prakāśāt prāk jñānam na utpadyeta eva

original: tato 'sato grahaṇāsambhavān na gṛhyeta,
analyzed: tatas sataḥ grahaṇa asambhavāt na gṛhyeta

original: na tv evaṃ bhavadbhir apīṣyate. utpannāyām eva buddhāv arthasya jñātatvābhyupagamāt.
analyzed: na tu evam bhavadbhiḥ api iṣyate utpannāyām eva buddhau arthasya jñāta tva abhyupagamāt

original: tataḥ prāgutpannasyāgrahaṇakāraṇābhāvādāv aśyakaṃ tādātvikaṃ grahaṇam ity āha --
analyzed: tatas prāk utpannasya agrahaṇa kāraṇa abhāva ādau aśyakam tādātvikam grahaṇam iti āha

original: prāk cārtheti asyāntena. yadi tūtpa(?nnaṃ /
analyzed: prāk ca artha iti asya antena yadi tu utpannam

original: nna) pratibandhaṃ ca kenāpi na gṛhyata ity ucyate nityāsaṃvedyataiva tarhy āpadyeta. tataś cābhāva eva jñānasya bhaved ity abhiprāyeṇāha --  #
analyzed: na pratibandham ca kena api na gṛhyate iti ucyate nitya asaṃvedya tā eva tarhi āpadyeta tatas ca abhāvaḥ eva jñānasya bhavet iti abhiprāyeṇa āha  /

original: na ced iti // 25 //
analyzed: na ced iti

original: kiṃ punaḥ kālāntare na grahaṇam ity ata āha -- kim iti. agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣe prāgagrahaṇaṃ parastāc ca grahaṇam ity anupapannam iti // 26 //
analyzed: kim punar kāla antare na grahaṇam iti atas āha kim iti agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣe prāk agrahaṇam parastāt ca grahaṇam iti anupapannam iti  /

original: nanūtpannasyāpi saṃvidantarāpekṣayā grahaṇam iti kiṃ nopapadyate ata āha -- jñāneti.

original: yuktaṃ yadaprakāśako 'rthaḥ prakāśāya jñānāntaram apekṣate. jñānaṃ tu svayam eva

original: prakāśarūpam iti kiṃ tasya prakāśāntarāpekṣayā. ataḥ sahasaiva prakāśeteti. tulyajātīyāntarāpekṣāyām
analyzed: prakāśa rūpam iti kim tasya prakāśa antara apekṣayā atas sahasā eva prakāśeta iti tulya jātīya antara apekṣāyām

original: anavasthā. yathāhuḥ -- jñānāntareṇānubhave hīṣṭā iti. na ca jñānaṃ na jñāyata eveti
analyzed: anavasthā yathā āhuḥ jñāna antareṇa anubhave hi iṣṭāḥ iti na ca jñānam na jñāyate eva iti

original: sāmpratam. abhāvaprasaṅgāt. uttarakālaṃ ca smṛtidarśanāt sahaiva hi vijñānena pūrvadṛṣṭam
analyzed: sāmpratam abhāva prasaṅgāt uttara kālam ca smṛti darśanāt saha eva hi vijñānena pūrva dṛṣṭam

original: arthaṃ smaranto dṛśyante jñāto 'sāv artho mayeti. na cājñātasya jñānasya smṛtir upapadyate.
analyzed: artham smarantaḥ dṛśyante jñātaḥ sau arthaḥ mayā iti na ca ajñātasya jñānasya smṛtiḥ upapadyate

original: uktaṃ ca paraiḥ -- tatrāpi ca smṛtiḥ iti. evaṃ cāparāparajñānāpekṣāyām ekaviṣayasaṃvittāv
analyzed: uktam ca paraiḥ tatra api ca smṛtiḥ iti evam ca apara apara jñāna apekṣāyām eka viṣaya saṃvittau

original: evāyuḥ paryavasyet na viṣayāntarasañcāro jāyeta. tatra ca dṛṣṭaṃ jñānam. yathāhuḥ --

original: viṣayāntarasañcāras tathā na syāt sa ceṣyate /
analyzed: viṣaya antara sañcāraḥ tathā na syāt sa ca iṣyate

original: iti. tad etat sarvam abhipretyāha -- tasyeti // 27 //

original: {2,104} itaś ca prāg jñānaṃ jñāyate jñānākāraś ca nīlādiḥ,

original: yena jñānapurassaram evāvagatapūrvaṃ niruddham arthaṃ smaranto dṛśyante jñāto mayātikrānto 'muko rājeti. yadi hy arthasyākāro bhavet,

original: asaty arthe satā kathaṃ dhīr anurajyeta. ato buddhir eva tadākāram artham ālikhyopajāyata iti yuktam. yadi cātīte kāle jñānapurassaram artho  #
analyzed: asati arthe satā katham dhīḥ anurajyeta atas buddhiḥ eva tad ākāram artham ālikhya upajāyate iti yuktam yadi ca atīte kāle jñāna purassaram

original: nopalakṣito bhavet,
analyzed: na upalakṣitaḥ bhavet

original: katham idānīṃ tathā smaryeta. yathāvagatagrāhiṇyo hi smṛtayaḥ kathaṃ mātrayāpi pūrvānubhūtam

original: atikrāmanti. tasmāj jñānākāro nīlādiḥ jñānapūrvakaś cārthānubhava ity āha -- jñāneti

original: dvayena. tat punar idaṃ parasparaviruddham ivobhayaṃ sādhyam upalabhyate. tathā hi.
analyzed: dvayena tat punar idam paraspara viruddham iva ubhayam sādhyam upalabhyate tathā hi

original: jñānapūrvam artho 'nubhūyata ity artham aṅgīkarotīti lakṣyate. jñānākārasādhanena
analyzed: jñāna pūrvam arthaḥ nubhūyate iti artham aṅgīkaroti iti lakṣyate jñāna ākāra sādhanena

original: ca nirākaroti iti tadviṣayam anṛtam. maivam. nātra jñānapurassaram artho 'vasīyata
analyzed: ca nirākaroti iti tad viṣayam anṛtam mā evam na atra jñāna purassaram arthaḥ vasīyata

original: iti tātparyam. evaṃ tu manyate -- aṅgīkārayāmi tāvad enaṃ śrotriyam anubhavānubhavapurassarīm
analyzed: iti tātparyam evam tu manyate aṅgīkārayāmi tāvat enam śrotriyam anubhava anubhava purassarīm

analyzed: artha sthitim eṣa hi chāndasaḥ dvaita siddhim evam api aviguṇām manyamānaḥ bhyanujānāti

analyzed: tāvat prathamam jñāna saṃvedanam tatas na ākāra upalambha asambhavāt eka ākāra upalambhāt ca anāyāsam

original: ato na doṣa iti // 29 //
analyzed: atas na doṣaḥ iti

original: iti. jñānanirapekṣe tv arthaniścaye naitad upapadyate. tad etad āha -- vaktāra iti // 30 //

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ buddhijñānapurassaram arthajñānam ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti.

original: {2,105} atraike vadanti -- kim idam aniṣṭam āpādyate jñānam anubhūyata iti. pratīmo hi vayam ekasyāṃ saṃvidi tritayaṃ pramātā pramitiḥ prameyaṃ

original: asti cāsyām arthavittau tritayasya sākṣātkāraḥ. tatrāpi mātṛmeyayoḥ parādhīnaḥ prakāśaḥ. na miteḥ,

original: gantṛvadupapatteḥ. yathā khalu samāne 'pi triyāphalasaṃyogavibhāgabhāgitve grāmādeḥ karmabhāvo,

original: na gantuḥ. evaṃ pramāṇaphalasaṃvittisambandhāviśeṣe 'py ātmanaḥ kartṛtā. tat kasya
analyzed: na gantuḥ evam pramāṇa phala saṃvitti sambandha aviśeṣe pi ātmanaḥ kartṛ tā tat kasya

analyzed: hetoḥ para samavāyi kriyā phala bhāgi tā hi karmatā sa avayavānām gantavyānām ca

analyzed: ātmani jñāna samavāyāt tatra asau grāmaḥ karma tathā ca viṣayāḥ iti te tathā atas nirākārā eva

original: pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate na tu pūrvaṃ jñāyata iti. na,

analyzed: saṃvid prakāśate iti kim idānīm

analyzed: na brūmaḥ saṃvedya iti saṃvibhakta

original: tta)yaiva hi saṃvit saṃvedyate na saṃvedyatayā. keyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ. iyam iyaṃ nāsyāḥ karmabhāvo vidyata iti. svayamprakāśatvāt. na caivam asaṃvit.
analyzed: ttayā eva hi saṃvid saṃvedyate na saṃvedya tayā kā iyam vācoyuktiḥ iyam iyam na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate iti svayam prakāśa tvāt na ca evam a saṃvid

original: atanmūlatvāt saṃvedyabhāvasya sarvabhāvānāṃ,
analyzed: a tad mūla tvāt saṃvedya bhāvasya sarva bhāvānām

original: sā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ siddhiḥ na cāsañ cetītā sidhyatīti kathaṃ te 'pi sidhyeyuḥ. ataḥ
analyzed: sā hi sarva bhāvānām siddhiḥ sidhyati iti katham te sidhyeyuḥ atas

original: saṃvitprakāśa eva dvaitaṃ sādhayatīti kiṃ siddhasādhanena. saṃvidupārūḍho hi nīlādir
analyzed: saṃvid prakāśaḥ eva dvaitam sādhayati iti kim siddhasādhanena saṃvid upārūḍhaḥ hi nīla ādiḥ

original: advaitam āpādayati. saṃvidaiva tv anākārasaṃviditayā vyatirecito nīlādir nādvaitāya
analyzed: advaitam āpādayati saṃvidā eva tu an ākāra saṃviditayā vyatirecitaḥ nīla ādiḥ na advaitāya

original: ghaṭata iti siddhaṃ pramātā pramitiḥ prameyaṃ ceti. tān pratyāha -- na ceti. ayam
analyzed: ghaṭate iti siddham pramātā pramitiḥ prameyam ca iti tān pratyāha na ca iti ayam

original: abhiprāyaḥ -- śrotriyadṛṣṭyaiva tāvad buddhir anumeyeti lakṣyate. yad evam āha --
analyzed: abhiprāyaḥ śrotriya dṛṣṭyā eva tāvat buddhiḥ anumeyā iti lakṣyate yat evam āha

original: jñāte tv anumānād avagacchatīti. yat tu jñānābhiprāyaṃ tad na saṃvidabhiprāyam iti.
analyzed: jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti yat tu jñāna abhiprāyam tat na saṃvid abhiprāyam iti

original: tan na. paryāyatvād anayoḥ. cetanā buddhiḥ jñānaṃ saṃvid ity anarthāntaram iti laukikā

original: budhyante. na cātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaś cetanā,

analyzed: sādhāraṇa tvāt acetanā buddhiḥ iti alaukikam yathā āhuḥ buddhiḥ cetanā eva hi gamyate

original: iti. ato yaivāsāv anākārā saṃvid bhavatābhimatā saiva tāvad buddhiḥ,
analyzed: iti atas yā eva asau anākārā saṃvid bhavatā abhimatā sā eva tāvat buddhiḥ

original: tadabhiprāyam eva buddhyanumeyatvābhidhānam. na tv anākārā saṃvidaparokṣam anubhūyate

original: buddhiś cānumīyata iti sāmpratam. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yāsau laukikī buddhir nāsāv

analyzed: iti tatra ca uktā buddhi anumāne liṅga anupapattiḥ atas siddham anirākārāyāḥ buddheḥ

original: anupalambhāt saṃvid eva dvaitaṃ sādhayatīti // 31 //
analyzed: anupalambhāt saṃvid eva dvaitam sādhayati iti
ha

original: [723] di saṃvedyamā (KHA)
analyzed: di saṃvedyamā kha

original: abheda eva trayasyāpadyeta, {2,
analyzed: abhedaḥ eva trayasya āpadyeta

original: na. anekāntāt. tatraitat syād,
analyzed: na anekāntāt tatra etat syāt

analyzed: ekadā api hi tritayam anubhūyamānam bhinnam evā avabhāsate ghaṭa kuḍya ādi vat atas bhidyata

original: iti. tan na. anaikāntikatvād bhedopalambhasya bhede. upalabhyate khalu dvicandrādibodhe

original: netare. yathāhuḥ -- na bhinnāvabhāsitve 'py anarthāntararūpatvaṃ nīlasyānubhavāt

original: dṛṣṭaḥ. anālokopalambhā na rūpabuddhir yataḥ. tan na,

original: kevalasyāpi kvacid ālokasya darśanāt. rūpasya ca prāṇiviśeṣeṣv anālokasya. santi
analyzed: kevalasya api kvacid ālokasya darśanāt rūpasya ca prāṇi viśeṣeṣu an ālokasya santi

original: upālambho 'stu sahopalambhaniyamavādinām ekeṣāṃ mīmāṃsakānām. ye tu viṣayavittipurassarīṃ

original: iti. tān pratyāha -- seti ta ityantena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- idaṃ tāvadavivādaṃ sākāraṃ vastu dṛśyata iti. sākāradarśanaṃ cedam apratyakṣe saṃvedane
analyzed: iti tān pratyāha sā iti te ityantena ayam abhiprāyaḥ idam tāvat avivādam sa ākāram vastu dṛśyate iti sa ākāra darśanam ca idam apratyakṣe saṃvedane

original: viṣayaḥ sanmātratayā na prakāśate yataḥ. tathā sati nityaprakāśāpatteḥ. ato viṣayopalambhasattayaiva viṣayaprakāśaḥ,
analyzed: viṣayaḥ sanmātra tayā na prakāśate yatas tathā sati nitya prakāśa āpatteḥ atas viṣaya upalambha sattayā eva viṣaya prakāśaḥ

original: api ca pramāṇāntaraprasiddhe 'rthasyākāravattve bhaved apy evam. na ca tasyākārasyetthambhāve 'rthadharmatve pramāṇam asti,

original: {2,110} tān eva prasiddhapratibimbodāharaṇena pratibodhayati -- niścandreti. tam iti yogyatayā candraḥ pratinirdiśyate. khe ca jale cety arthaḥ

original: na caiṣa nyāyo 'tra sambhavatīty āha -- vijñāneti // 38 //

original: api cāstu rūpavatsu pratibimbakalpanā,

original: arūpāṇāṃ tu śabdādīnāṃ pratibimbakalpanā na kathañcit sambhavatīty āha -- śabdeti. api ca nīlādyākārā saṃvid upalabhyate. tat kim aparāddham

analyzed: yat tām an ādṛtya ayam ākāraḥ rtha dharma tayā abhyupagamyate pratibimba vat ca darśanam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha jñāne ca iti

original: yas tu vadati -- nārthākāro jñāne saṅkrāmati. na cārthasthaḥ pratibimbo dṛśyate.

analyzed: artha ākāraḥ jñāne dṛśyate iti tam pratyāha ayaḥ tejasoḥ hi sannikarṣāt

original: api ca kaścid ekaḥ sammūḍho bhavati jagatas tu sammohakalpanā sammoha eva. na cātra kaścit kadācid asammūḍho dṛśyate. sarvasya vivekādarśanāt.{2,

original: 111}ato na sammohakalpanā yuktety āha -- asammūḍhasyeti. yadi tu jñānārthayor viviktayor adarśane 'pi sammohaḥ kalpyate,

original: nanv asaty apy ekadeśatve ekakālatayā saṃsargo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- trailokyeneti.

analyzed: kiñcid ākāram jñānam jāyate iti na na upapannam vilakṣaṇāḥ hi te upādāna viśeṣāḥ vilakṣaṇa śaktayaḥ

original: 114} āvirasti,

original: kathaṃ buddhāvākāram ādadhyāt. na hi tatra viṣayākāro nāma kaścid asti. balāt tatra

original: iti. bauddhagandhimīmāṃsakair apy uktaṃ - saṃvittayaiva hi saṃvit saṃvedyate na tu

original: tasya tathātvenāprasiddheḥ. asāv api svagocaro na paraṃ paragocaratayā darśayituṃ

original: śaknoti. atadrūpatvāt tādrūpyaniṣpattyayogāt. itarathānubhavarūpatāpi tasya na syāt.
analyzed: śaknoti a tad rūpa tvāt tādrūpya niṣpatti ayogāt itarathā anubhava rūpa tā api tasya na syāt

original: anubhavākāratāṃ hy uttarasya samanantarapratyayo vitanute. tat kasya hetoḥ. svarūpānurūpakāryārambhasthiteḥ.
analyzed: anubhava ākāra tām hi uttarasya samanantara pratyayaḥ vitanute tat kasya hetoḥ svarūpa anurūpa kārya ārambha sthiteḥ

original: ata eva nātmagocarād idam iti parasaṃvedanotpattyupapattiḥ. paratrāham mānakalpanā tu bhrāntiḥ,
analyzed: atas eva na ātma gocarāt idam iti para saṃvedana utpatti upapattiḥ paratra aham māna kalpanā tu bhrāntiḥ

original: jñātṛgocaratvād ahaṅkārasyety uktam eva. na tv iha bāhyālambanatve jñānasya kiñcid anupapannaṃ yenātmagocaratāvaśyaṃ kalpyata iti siddhaṃ bāhyālambanam  #
analyzed: jñātṛ gocara tvāt ahaṅkārasya iti uktam eva na tu iha bāhya ālambana tve jñānasya kiñcid anupapannam yena ātma gocara tā avaśyam kalpyate iti siddham bāhya ālambanam

original: eva jñānam iti) // 77 //
analyzed: eva jñānam iti

original: {2,133} evaṃ tāvad anyatarāgrahaṇe 'nyataro na gṛhyata ity uktam. tadvad eva dvayor
analyzed: evam tāvat anyatara a grahaṇe nyataraḥ na gṛhyate iti uktam tadvat eva dvayoḥ

original: apy agrahaṇam iti samāhṛtya darśayati -- yathā ceti. asyārthaḥ -- yathā grāhyagrahaṇe
analyzed: api agrahaṇam iti samāhṛtya darśayati yathā ca iti asya arthaḥ yathā grāhya grahaṇe

original: grāhako na gṛhyate grāhakagrahaṇe ca grāhyaḥ. evaṃ ca dvayor apy agrahaṇaṃ bhavet.
analyzed: grāhakaḥ na gṛhyate grāhaka grahaṇe ca grāhyaḥ evam ca dvayoḥ api agrahaṇam bhavet

original: na tu grāhakamātrasya vā grāhyamātrasya vā. pūrvaṃ tv anyatarāgrahaṇadṛṣṭāntenetarasyāgrahaṇam
analyzed: na tu grāhaka mātrasya vā grāhya mātrasya vā pūrvam tu anyatara agrahaṇa dṛṣṭāntena itarasya agrahaṇam

original: āpāditam. idānīṃ samāhṛtyobhayor ucyata iti prayogabheda iti // 78 //
analyzed: āpāditam idānīm samāhṛtya ubhayoḥ ucyate iti prayoga bhedaḥ iti

original: etac ca grāhyamātrasya grahaṇaṃ grāhakarahitaṃ sa bahirdeśasambaddhaḥ ityādinā bhāṣyeṇoktam
analyzed: etat ca grāhya mātrasya grahaṇam grāhaka rahitam sa bahis deśa sambaddhaḥ ityādinā bhāṣyeṇa uktam

original: ity āha -- sa iti. ayaṃ ca bhāṣyārthaḥ -- sa eva kevalo bāhyārthaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate.
analyzed: iti āha saḥ iti ayam ca bhāṣya arthaḥ saḥ eva kevalaḥ bāhya arthaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate

original: na punargrāhaka iti // 79 //
analyzed: na punargrāhake iti

original: āñjasyena tv arthākāro nīlādir ity etatsiddhaye bahirdeśasambandho hetutayā lakṣyate,
analyzed: āñjasyena tu artha ākāraḥ nīla ādiḥ iti etad siddhaye bahis deśa sambandhaḥ hetutayā lakṣyate

original: tannānumanyāmaha ity āha -- param iti. na hi parasya bahirdeśo nāma kaścit siddhaḥ
analyzed: tat na anumanyāmahe iti āha param iti na hi parasya bahirdeśaḥ nāma kaścid siddhaḥ

original: yo 'rthasākāratve hetutayopanyasyeta. sarvasya jñānākāratvenābhyupagamāt. ato bahirdeśas
analyzed: yaḥ ṛtha sākāra tve hetutayā upanyasyeta sarvasya jñāna ākāra tvena abhyupagamāt atas bahis deśaḥ

original: tatsambandhaś ca bauddhaṃ prati sādhya eva,
analyzed: tad sambandhaḥ ca bauddham prati sādhyaḥ eva

original: na hetur iti // 80 //
analyzed: na hetuḥ iti

original: tasmād yathokta eva bhāṣyasyārtha ity āha -- tasmād iti. asyārthaḥ -- bahir ityādau
analyzed: tasmāt yathā uktaḥ eva bhāṣyasya arthaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti asya arthaḥ bahis ityādau

original: bhāṣye idaṃśabdenedaṃ nīlam iti vikalpasthena niṣkṛṣṭaṃ grāhakāṃśāt pratyakṣādeḥ
analyzed: bhāṣye idam śabdena idam nīlam iti vikalpa sthena niṣkṛṣṭam grāhaka aṃśāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ

original: pramāṇagaṇasya saṃvedyam udāhṛtaṃ nīlādimātram. etad uktaṃ bhavati. na svagocaraṃ
analyzed: pramāṇa gaṇasya saṃvedyam udāhṛtam nīla ādi mātram etat uktam bhavati na sva gocaram

original: jñānaṃ bahiḥprakāśād,
analyzed: jñānam bahis prakāśāt

original: idam iti{2,
analyzed: idam

original: 134}paranirūpaṇāt. svagocare hi nedam iti prakāśo bhavet,
analyzed: sva gocare hi na idam iti prakāśaḥ bhavet

original: kin tv aham iti. tad iha bahirdeśasambandhopanyāsena paragocarataiva saṃvitter ucyata iti // 81 //
analyzed: kin tu aham iti tat iha bahis deśa sambandha upanyāsena para gocara tā eva saṃvitteḥ ucyate iti  /

original: tathā kevalagrāhakasaṃvittir api satyam pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate na tu pūrvaṃ jñāyate ity atroktety āha -- neti. atra hi pūrvam utpannāpi buddhir  #
analyzed: tathā kevala grāhaka saṃvittiḥ api satyam pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate na tu pūrvam jñāyate iti atra uktā iti āha na iti atra hi pūrvam utpannā api buddhiḥ

original: na prāg avagamyate,
analyzed: na prāk avagamyate

original: kin tu paścād iti vadatā grāhyākāravinirmuktasyaiva grāhakasya saṃvittir ukteti // 82 //
analyzed: kim tu paścāt iti vadatā grāhya ākāra vinirmuktasya eva grāhakasya saṃvittiḥ uktā iti

original: prāg buddher agrahaṇasiddhyarthaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ bhavati hi kadācid etad yajjñāto
analyzed: prāk buddheḥ agrahaṇa siddhi artham bhāṣyakāreṇa uktam bhavati hi kadācid etat

original: 'rthaḥ sannajñāta ity ucyate iti. tasyārthaḥ -- jñātapūrvo 'rthaḥ kadācid asmaryamāṇo
analyzed: rthaḥ san ajñātaḥ iti ucyate iti tasya arthaḥ jñāta pūrvaḥ rthaḥ kadācid asmaryamāṇaḥ

original: 'jñātavad abhidhīyate. jñānamātraṃ tu tadgocaraṃ smaryate. evaṃ hi vaktāro bhavanti
analyzed: jñāta vat abhidhīyate jñāna mātram tu tad gocaram smaryate evam hi vaktāraḥ bhavanti

original: -- asyāḥ śruter artho mayā guruṇā vyākhyāyamāno jñātaḥ,
analyzed: asyāḥ śruteḥ arthaḥ mayā guruṇā vyākhyāyamānaḥ jñātaḥ

original: idānīṃ prasmṛtavān asmi. jñānaṃ tv etadgocaraṃ pūrvaṃ jātaṃ smarāmīti. yathā cāsyā
analyzed: idānīm prasmṛtavān asmi jñānam tu etad gocaram pūrvam jātam smarāmi iti yathā ca asyā

original: buddher agrahaṇe hetutvaṃ tatphalābhiprāyeṇa parastād vakṣyati phalatvād granthavarṇane
analyzed: buddheḥ agrahaṇe hetu tvam tad phala abhiprāyeṇa parastāt vakṣyati phala tvāt grantha varṇane

original: ity atra. tasmād api kevalaṃ grāhakasmaraṇād grāhyākāraviviktagrāhakabodhaḥ setsyatīty
analyzed: iti atra tasmāt api kevalam grāhaka smaraṇāt grāhya ākāra vivikta grāhaka bodhaḥ setsyati iti

original: āha -- neti // 83 //
analyzed: āha na iti

original: abhede tu grāhyagrāhakayor grāhakavad grāhyasyāpi smaraṇaṃ bhaved ity āha -- tasmād

original: iti. tasmād grāhakād ity arthaḥ. yatas tu grāhakamātrasyaiva smṛtyātmako nirbhāso
analyzed: iti tasmāt grāhakāt iti arthaḥ yatas tu grāhaka mātrasya eva smṛti ātmakaḥ

original: bhavati na grāhyasya,
analyzed: bhavati na grāhyasya

original: ato 'vagacchāmaḥ yadanubhavakāle 'py eṣā buddhir eva kevalā gṛhītā katham anyathā
analyzed: atas vagacchāmaḥ yad anubhava kāle pi eṣā buddhiḥ eva kevalā gṛhītā katham anyathā

original: kevalā smaryeta. tad etad āha -- grāhaketi. grāhakamātrasya smṛtinirbhāsāt kāraṇāt
analyzed: kevalā smaryeta tat etat āha grāhaka iti grāhaka mātrasya smṛti nirbhāsāt kāraṇāt

original: tatra grāhakagrahaṇakāle kevalā buddhir gṛhyate ity arthaḥ // 84 //
analyzed: tatra grāhaka grahaṇa kāle kevalā buddhiḥ gṛhyate iti arthaḥ

original: {2,135} kasmād evam ata āha -- tad iti. tat smaraṇam. atyantāvinābhāvād grāhyagrāhakayor

original: ekākāraṃ na jāyata ity arthaḥ. tad evam anyatarāṃśānvaye 'nyataravivekāt siddho grāhyagrāhakayor
analyzed: eka ākāram na jāyate iti arthaḥ tat evam anyatara aṃśa anvaye nyatara vivekāt siddhaḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ

original: bheda ity āha -- anvayeti // 85 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ iti āha anvaya iti

original: atra codayati -- grāhyeti. ayam arthaḥ -- yad etad bhavatā grāhyagrāhakayor abhedam abhyupetyānyataragrahaṇe 'nyataragrahaṇam āpādyate,
analyzed: atra codayati grāhya iti ayam arthaḥ yat etat bhavatā grāhya grāhakayoḥ abhedam abhyupetya anyatara grahaṇe nyatara grahaṇam āpādyate

original: tad ayuktam. na hi yad yato na bhidyate tadavaśyaṃ tadgrahaṇe gṛhyate. na hi śabdād
analyzed: tat ayuktam na hi yat yatas na bhidyate tat avaśyam tad grahaṇe gṛhyate na hi śabdāt

original: abhinnā nityānityādayo dharmāḥ śabdagrahaṇe gṛhyante. abhede 'pi tu yasyāṃśasya yadā
analyzed: abhinnāḥ nitya anitya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ śabda grahaṇe gṛhyante abhede tu yasya aṃśasya yadā

original: yogyatā sa tadā gṛhyate netara iti kim anupapannam. grāhyāṃśaś ca grāhakāṃśasadbhāvād grahaṇayogyaḥ,
analyzed: yogyatā sa tadā gṛhyate na itaraḥ iti kim anupapannam grāhya aṃśaḥ ca grāhaka aṃśa sadbhāvāt grahaṇa yogyaḥ

original: na grāhakāṃśaḥ,
analyzed: na grāhaka aṃśaḥ

original: tadatiriktagrāhakāntarābhāvāt. ato na grāhyagrahaṇe grāhakagrahaṇaprasaktir iti // 86 //

analyzed: syāt etat grāhya aṃśaḥ eva asya grāhakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tat na

original: karmaṇaḥ kartṛbhāvānupapatter ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- grāhyeti. api ca grāhyagrāhakabhāvam

original: ekasya jñānasyābhyupetya bhavatobhayagrahaṇam āpādyate. yadi ca grāhyāṃśo 'pi grāhako

original: atha vā grāhyāṃśas tāvad grāhya eva,
analyzed: atha vā grāhya aṃśaḥ tāvat grāhyaḥ eva

analyzed: yadi ca grāhakaḥ gṛhyeta

original: {2,136} evaṃ tāvad grāhakāntaravarjanād grāhako na gṛhyata ity uktam. api codbhavābhibhavau bhāvānāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇakāraṇatayā siddhau. ato  #

analyzed: yaḥ eva aṃśaḥ yadā udbhūtaḥ bhavati

analyzed: tadā teṣu vartamāneṣu api gandha mātram evā upalabhyate na dravyam abhibhūta tvāt sā

original: punar iyaṃ dravyasaṅkrāntir ayukteti manyante. yadi khalu tilādiṣu campakādidravyam
analyzed: punar iyam dravya saṅkrāntiḥ ayuktā iti manyante yadi khalu tila ādiṣu campaka ādi dravyam

original: eva saṅkāmed evaṃ mṛdyamāneṣu teṣu campakagandho naśyet puṣpastha iva. campakādidravyeṣu

analyzed: mṛdyamāneṣu tad gandhasya nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam tila stha kusuma avayava mardane bhavet

original: yaḥ khalu sthūleṣv eva kusumeṣu mṛdyamāneṣu naśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ khalu sthūleṣu eva kusumeṣu mṛdyamāneṣu naśyati

original: sa kathaṃ sūkṣmāvayavasthaṃ na naṅkṣyatīty utprekṣyate. ataś campakādisannidhānād
analyzed: sa katham sūkṣma avayava stham na naṅkṣyati iti utprekṣyate atas campaka ādi sannidhānāt

original: gandhāntaram eva tilādiṣu jāyate iti manyate. evam apsvagnisaṃyogād guṇāntarāgamo

analyzed: vaktavyaḥ na agni saṅkrāntiḥ anupalambhanāt sparśa mātram eva hi tatra agneḥ vayam upalabhāmahe

analyzed: na agnim api ca ayam tapasvī dravya saṅkrāntim ātiṣṭhamānaḥ surā ghrāṇe patet surā trasa reṇūnām

original: ghrāṇodareṇa vaktrasañcārāt. ata ātmavadhāyaiveyaṃ dravyasaṅkrāntir āśritā bhavet.
analyzed: ghrāṇa udareṇa vaktra sañcārāt atas ātma vadhāya eva iyam dravya saṅkrāntiḥ āśritā bhavet

original: atrābhidhīyate -- na tāvat svāśrayaparityāgenāśrayāntaraṃ gandho gacchatīti sambhāvayāmaḥ.
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate na tāvat sva āśraya parityāgena āśraya antaram gandhaḥ gacchati iti sambhāvayāmaḥ

original: guṇānām asvatantratvāt. āśrayapāratantryam eva hi tallakṣaṇam. guṇāntaram api na

original: tāvat sannihiteṣv ākāśānilādiṣu kusumasamparkāj{2,
analyzed: tāvat sannihiteṣu ākāśa anila ādiṣu

original: 137}jāyate iti vācyam. teṣu gandhasyātyantābhāvāt. nāpi nāsikāyām eva gandhāntaraṃ
analyzed: iti vācyam teṣu gandhasya atyanta abhāvāt nā api nāsikāyām eva gandha antaram

original: jāyata iti vaktavyam. atidūratvena kusumāsaṃsargāt. ataḥ kusumāvayavā eva dṛṣṭatadgandhasambandhāvāyunā
analyzed: jāyate iti vaktavyam ati dūra tvena kusuma a saṃsargāt atas kusuma avayavāḥ eva dṛṣṭa tad gandha sambandhāḥ vāyunā

original: preryamāṇā ghrāṇodaraṃ yāvadāgatā gṛhyanta iti pramāṇavatī kalpanā. yo 'pi mardane gandhanāśa uktaḥ,
analyzed: preryamāṇāḥ ghrāṇa udaram yāvat āgatāḥ gṛhyante iti pramāṇavatī kalpanā mardane gandha nāśaḥ uktaḥ

original: so 'py ayuktaḥ. sūkṣmā hi tatra kusumāvayavāḥ saṅkrāntāḥ. na te mṛdyante. ato gandho na naśyatīty uktam. yo 'pi gandhāghrāṇe surāpānadoṣo 'bhihitaḥ,
analyzed: saḥ u pi ayuktaḥ sūkṣmāḥ hi tatra kusuma avayavāḥ saṅkrāntāḥ na te mṛdyante atas gandhaḥ na naśyati iti uktam gandha āghrāṇe surā pāna doṣaḥ bhihitaḥ

original: nāsau. pānaṃ hi surāyā niṣiddhaṃ, nāghrāṇam.
analyzed: na asau pānam hi surāyāḥ niṣiddham na āghrāṇam

original: alpas tu tadāghrāṇe doṣaḥ. na ca surāṃ jighran pibatīty ucyate. ato na sūkṣmāvayavānāṃ
analyzed: alpaḥ tu tad āghrāṇe doṣaḥ na ca surām jighran pibati iti ucyate atas na sūkṣma avayavānām

original: nāsikāsannidhānamātrāt surāpānāpattir iti siddhaṃ gandhavad eva dravyaṃ tatra vartate
analyzed: nāsikā sannidhāna mātrāt surā pāna āpattiḥ iti siddham gandhavat eva dravyam tatra vartate

original: sūkṣmatvāt tu nopalabhyata iti // 90 //
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt tu na upalabhyate iti

original: evaṃ dṛṣṭānteṣv abhibhūtasyāgrahaṇam uktvā prakṛte yojayati -- neti. yathā dīpaprabhādiṣu guṇāntarasaṃvittir nāsti,
analyzed: evam dṛṣṭānteṣu abhibhūtasya agrahaṇam uktvā prakṛte yojayati na iti yathā dīpa prabhā ādiṣu guṇa antara saṃvittiḥ na asti

original: yathā ca gandhavaddravyavṛttau dravyasya,
analyzed: yathā ca gandhavat dravya vṛttau dravyasya

original: evaṃ grāhyāṃśabuddhau grāhakāṃśabuddhau vākārāntarasaṃvittir na bhaviṣyatīti // 91 //
analyzed: evam grāhya aṃśa buddhau grāhaka aṃśa buddhau vā ākāra antara saṃvittiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti

original: idaṃ cāparaṃ grāhyād abhinnam eva na gṛhyata ity āha -- grāhyād iti. asti kaścid dharmabhedaḥ yo grāhyāt śabdād abhinno 'pi nopalabhyate nityatvādaya  #
analyzed: idam ca aparam grāhyāt abhinnam eva na gṛhyate iti āha grāhyāt iti asti kaścid dharma bhedaḥ yaḥ grāhyāt śabdāt na upalabhyate

original: iva śabdagrahaṇa iti // 92 //
analyzed: iva śabda grahaṇe iti

original: idaṃ tu cintanīyam -- kasyedaṃ pratyavasthānaṃ grāhyāṃśo grāhakāṃśenetyādi. na tāvad
analyzed: idam tu cintanīyam kasya idam pratyavasthānam grāhya aṃśaḥ grāhaka aṃśena ityādi na tāvat

original: bauddhasya. sa hy avibhaktasyaiva buddhyātmano grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedabhinnasya
analyzed: bauddhasya sa hi avibhaktasya eva buddhi ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bheda bhinnasya

original: grahaṇam ātiṣṭhate. yadāha --
analyzed: grahaṇam ātiṣṭhate yat āha

original: avibhakto 'pi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: avibhaktaḥ pi buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ

original: grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavān iha lakṣyate //
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iha lakṣyate

original: {2,138}iti. atas tryākārasyaiva jñānasyānubhavāt katham anyatarāṃśāgrahaṇena pratyavatiṣṭhate. bhrāntikalpitaṃ tu grāhyādivibhāgaṃ bauddhā
analyzed: atas tri ākārasya eva jñānasya anubhavāt katham anyatara aṃśa agrahaṇena pratyavatiṣṭhate bhrānti kalpitam tu grāhya ādi vibhāgam bauddhāḥ

original: na tv apratibhānam eva teṣām. ataḥ kasyedaṃ pratyavasthānam iti. satyam. nātra bauddhaś
analyzed: na tu apratibhānam eva teṣām atas kasya idam pratyavasthānam iti satyam na atra bauddhaḥ

original: codayitā. pārśvasthavacanam idam. evaṃ hi kaścid atra pārśvastho vadati -- kim idaṃ
analyzed: codayitā pārśva stha vacanam idam evam hi kaścid atra pārśva sthaḥ vadati kim idam

original: grāhyagrāhakabhāvam abhyupetyaiva bhavatā dvirūpagrahaṇam āpādyate. na hi grāhakasya
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka bhāvam abhyupetya eva bhavatā dvi rūpa grahaṇam āpādyate na hi grāhakasya

original: grāhakāntaraṃ vidyate tadgrahaṇe ca dvairūpyahāniḥ tac cābhyupetam eveti kathaṃ tadviparītābhidhānaṃ
analyzed: grāhaka antaram vidyate tad grahaṇe ca dvairūpya hāniḥ tat ca abhyupetam eva iti katham tad viparīta abhidhānam

original: mīmāṃsakasya. dṛṣṭā cābhede 'py udbhavābhibhavādikṛtā grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti.
analyzed: mīmāṃsakasya dṛṣṭā ca abhede pi udbhava abhibhava ādi kṛtā grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā iti

original: sa evedānīṃ bauddhābhiprāyeṇāha -- abhedam iti. grāhyagrāhakayor hi pāramārthiko
analyzed: saḥ eva idānīm bauddha abhiprāyeṇa āha abhedam iti grāhya grāhakayoḥ hi pāramārthikaḥ

original: bhedo neṣyata eva. ekarūpasyaiva tu buddhyātmanas tathā prakāśābhyupagamāt. ato yo
analyzed: bhedaḥ na iṣyate eva eka rūpasya eva tu buddhi ātmanaḥ tathā prakāśa abhyupagamāt atas yaḥ

original: 'yaṃ buddhyātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ sa eva tayor iti kim iti tadgrahaṇe na gṛhītaṃ bhavati. api ca,
analyzed: yam buddhi ātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ saḥ eva tayoḥ iti kim iti tad grahaṇe na gṛhītam bhavati api ca

original: abhedam abhyupetyāsmān prati prasaṅgo gīyate katham abhede grāhyagrāhakavyavastheti.
analyzed: abhedam abhyupetya asmān prati prasaṅgaḥ gīyate katham abhede grāhya grāhaka vyavasthā iti

original: tac cāyuktam. kathaṃ hy abhinnasya tattvasya kiñcid agṛhītaṃ nāma sambhavati. yadi
analyzed: tat ca ayuktam katham hi abhinnasya tattvasya kiñcid agṛhītam nāma sambhavati yadi

original: tv abhedo nābhyupeyate,
analyzed: tu abhedaḥ na abhyupeyate

original: nāyaṃ prasaṅgo gātuṃ śakyate. bhinnatvād evāgrahaṇopapatter iti // 93 //
analyzed: na ayam prasaṅgaḥ gātum śakyate bhinna tvāt eva a grahaṇa upapatteḥ iti

original: pūrvaparicodanām idānīm upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. yad dhi grahaṇayogyaṃ tad gṛhyate
analyzed: pūrva paricodanām idānīm upasaṃharati tasmāt iti yat hi grahaṇa yogyam tat gṛhyate

original: yasya ca grāhakasadbhāva udbhavo vā tad grahaṇayogyam. ataḥ pūrvopanyastasya grāhyagrāhakātmano
analyzed: yasya ca grāhaka sadbhāvaḥ udbhavaḥ vā tat grahaṇa yogyam atas pūrva upanyastasya grāhya grāhaka ātmanaḥ

original: dvayasya kiñcid eva grahītuṃ śakyaṃ netarad iti grahaṇaśaktyabhāvān nobhayaṃ codanīyam iti // 94 //
analyzed: dvayasya kiñcid eva grahītum śakyam na itarat iti grahaṇa śakti abhāvāt na ubhayam codanīyam iti

original: atra parihāram āha -- kuta iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvadbhrāntikalpito grāhakādivibhāgaḥ,
analyzed: atra parihāram āha kutas iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat bhrānti kalpitaḥ grāhaka ādi vibhāgaḥ

original: bādhavirahāt. tathāpi vā bhrāntitve saṃvidrūpe 'pi tatprasaṅgād abhāvātmatāpattiḥ.
analyzed: bādha virahāt tathā api vā bhrānti tve saṃvid rūpe tad prasaṅgāt abhāva ātma tā āpattiḥ

original: tad ayaṃ vāstavo grāhyādivibhāgo naikasminn advitīye jñānātmani sambhavatīti prathamam
analyzed: tat ayam vāstavaḥ grāhya ādi vibhāgaḥ na ekasmin advitīye jñāna ātmani sambhavati iti prathamam

original: uktaṃ naitad astītyādinā.{2,
analyzed: uktam na etat

original: 139}punaś ca abhinnatvaṃ yadā ceṣṭam ityādinā ekasyaiva dvairūpyam aṅgīkṛtyobhayagrahaṇaprasaktir
analyzed: ca abhinna tvam yadā ca iṣṭam ityādinā ekasya eva dvairūpyam aṅgīkṛtya ubhaya grahaṇa prasaktiḥ

original: āpāditā. tatra naiṣa parihāro ghaṭate ayogyatvād abhibhūtatvād anyan na gṛhyate iti.
analyzed: āpāditā tatra na eṣa parihāraḥ ghaṭate ayogya tvāt abhibhūta tvāt anyat na gṛhyate iti

original: na hy ekasmin jñānātmani yogyāyogyatvavibhāga udbhavābhibhavātmatvaṃ vā sambhavati.
analyzed: na hi ekasmin jñāna ātmani yogya ayogya tva vibhāgaḥ udbhava abhibhava ātmatvam vā sambhavati

original: ato 'vaśyam abhinnatva iṣṭe 'nyatarasaṃvittau dvyākāragrahaṇena bhavitavyam iti // 95 //
analyzed: atas vaśyam abhinna tve iṣṭe nyatara saṃvittau dvi ākāra grahaṇena bhavitavyam iti

original: kiṃ punar ekasyodbhavābhibhavātmatvaṃ na sambhavatīty ata āha -- eketi. evaṃ hi grāhyagrāhakābhidhānaṃ
analyzed: kim punar ekasya udbhava abhibhava ātmatvam na sambhavati iti atas āha eka iti evam hi grāhya grāhaka abhidhānam

original: tattvam. tatra yadi grāhakāṃśo 'bhibhūtaḥ kathaṃ tadabhinno grāhyāṃśo nābhibhūta iti śakyate vaktuṃ,
analyzed: tattvam tatra yadi grāhaka aṃśaḥ bhibhūtaḥ katham tad abhinnaḥ grāhya aṃśaḥ na abhibhūtaḥ iti śakyate vaktum

original: viruddhadharmādhyāsena bhedāpatter iti. evaṃ cobhayābhibhave grāhyāṃśasyāpi grāhyatvaṃ na syād iti na kiñcit tattvaṃ sambhaved ity āha -- tatheti
analyzed: viruddha dharma adhyāsena bheda āpatteḥ iti evam ca ubhaya abhibhave grāhya aṃśasya api grāhya tvam na syāt iti na kiñcid tattvam sambhavet iti āha tathā iti

original: evam ayogyatāpi vikalpanīyā kim ubhayam ayogyam ekaṃ vā. yady ubhayaṃ na kiñcid gṛhyata
analyzed: evam ayogya tā api vikalpanīyā kim ubhayam ayogyam ekam vā yadi ubhayam na kiñcid gṛhyata

original: iti śūnyataivāpadyeta. yadi tv ekam ayogyam itaran nety ucyate tad ekatrādvitīye
analyzed: iti śūnyatā eva āpadyeta yadi tu ekam ayogyam itarat na iti ucyate tat ekatra advitīye

original: nopapannam ity āha -- ayogyateti. ye punar atra dṛṣṭāntā uktāḥ pradīpaprabhādiṣu rūpādayaḥ,
analyzed: na upapannam iti āha ayogya tā iti ye punar atra dṛṣṭāntāḥ uktāḥ pradīpa prabhā ādiṣu rūpa ādayaḥ

original: tatrodbhavābhibhavābhidhānaṃ yujyate. rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhedena tatrodbhavābhibhavopapatteḥ. bhinnaṃ hi sparśād rūpaṃ,
analyzed: tatra udbhava abhibhava abhidhānam yujyate rūpa ādīnām paraspara bhedena tatra udbhava abhibhava upapatteḥ bhinnam hi sparśāt rūpam

original: tadrātrau rūpodbhave 'bhibhūtasparśo na gṛhyata iti kim anupapannam. tad etad āha
analyzed: tad rātrau rūpa udbhave bhibhūta sparśaḥ na gṛhyate iti kim anupapannam tat etat āha

original: -- dṛṣṭāntā iti. ādiśabdād yogyāyogyabhedo 'pīti. svarūpabhedānuvidhāyy udbhavābhibhavādibhedo
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntāḥ iti ādi śabdāt pi iti svarūpa bheda anuvidhāyī udbhava abhibhava ādi bhedaḥ

original: 'pīty arthaḥ // 97 //
analyzed: pi iti arthaḥ

original: nanu nāsti rūpādīnāṃ pāramārthiko bhedo mahān khalv ayaṃ kleśaḥ yad dravyād eva teṣāṃ
analyzed: nanu nā asti rūpa ādīnām pāramārthikaḥ bhedaḥ mahān khalu ayam kleśaḥ yat dravyāt eva teṣām

original: bhedo 'bhidhīyate. parasparabhedās tu kleśatareṇopapādyante. ata ekam eva dravyādirūpaṃ
analyzed: bhedaḥ bhidhīyate paraspara bhedāḥ tu kleśatareṇa upapādyante atas ekam eva dravya ādi rūpam

original: grāhakabhedād rūpādibhedabhinnam ābhāsate mukham{2,
analyzed: grāhaka bhedāt rūpa ādi bheda bhinnam ābhāsate

original: 140}ivādarśabhedād iti manyante. atas tatrāpy abheda evodbhavādivyavasthā dṛṣṭeti
analyzed: iti manyante atas tatra api abhedaḥ eva udbhava ādi vyavasthā dṛṣṭā iti

original: na kaścid viśeṣaḥ. ata āha -- yadāpīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi tāvad asmatsiddhānto rūpādāv āśrīyate,
analyzed: na kaścid viśeṣaḥ atas āha yadā api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi tāvat asmad siddhāntaḥ rūpa ādau āśrīyate

original: tatas te dravyāt parasparataś ca bhidyanta eva. atha matāntareṇa,
analyzed: tatas te dravyāt parasparataḥ ca bhidyante eva atha mata antareṇa

original: tathāpi na tāvad ekasyodbhavābhibhavāv api sidhyataḥ. ato 'smanmate 'pi hi yathaikam
analyzed: tathā api na tāvat ekasya udbhava abhibhavau api sidhyataḥ atas smad mate hi yathā ekam

original: eva mṛdrūpaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādipariṇāmabhedabhinnam evam ekam eva dravyarūpaṃ rūpādibhiḥ
analyzed: eva mṛd rūpam ghaṭa śarāva ādi pariṇāma bheda bhinnam evam ekam eva dravya rūpam rūpa ādibhiḥ

original: pariṇāmabhedair bhidyata ity āśrayaṇīyam. yat tu ekasyaiva dravyarūpasya grāhakabhedād bheda iti,
analyzed: pariṇāma bhedaiḥ bhidyate iti āśrayaṇīyam yat tu ekasya eva dravya rūpasya grāhaka bhedāt bhedaḥ iti

original: tadatisthavīyaḥ. yuktaṃ hi mukheṣu pratyabhijñānād aupādhikabhedāśrayaṇam ādarśabhedāśrayaṇena.
analyzed: tat ati sthavīyaḥ yuktam hi mukheṣu pratyabhijñānāt aupādhika bheda āśrayaṇam ādarśa bheda āśrayaṇena

original: na tv iha tatheti varaṃ pariṇāmavāda eva. tatra ca naikasyodbhavādivyavasthā loke
analyzed: na tu iha tathā iti varam pariṇāma vādaḥ eva tatra ca nā ekasya udbhava ādi vyavasthā loke

original: dṛśyate. yas tv ayam ākasmiko rūpasya sparśātmanā pariṇāmaḥ punas tasyaiva rūpātmanā,
analyzed: dṛśyate yaḥ tu ayam ākasmikaḥ rūpasya sparśa ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ punar tasya eva rūpa ātmanā

original: sa nirnimitto na vaktum ucitaḥ. ekasyaiva ca dravyasyaikaṃ rūpaṃ divā guṇāntarodbhavenābhibhūtaṃ yad naktaṃ punar budhyate,
analyzed: sa nirnimittaḥ na vaktum ucitaḥ ekasya eva ca dravyasya ekam rūpam divā guṇa antara udbhavena abhibhūtam yat naktam punar budhyate

original: tan nopapannam. pariṇāme na hi dadhyātmanā pariṇataṃ kṣīraṃ punaḥ kṣīrātmanā pariṇataṃ
analyzed: tat na upapannam pariṇāme na hi dadhi ātmanā pariṇatam kṣīram punar kṣīra ātmanā pariṇatam

original: dṛśyate. ataḥ svabhāvād eva dravyāt parasparaṃ ca rūpādayo bhidyante ity etad eva
analyzed: dṛśyate atas svabhāvāt eva dravyāt parasparam ca rūpa ādayaḥ bhidyante iti etat eva

original: sāmpratam. yathā cāsaty api deśādibhede bhedaḥ sidhyati tathānantaram eva vakṣyati.
analyzed: sāmpratam yathā ca asati api deśa ādi bhede bhedaḥ sidhyati tathā anantaram eva vakṣyati

original: tadupekṣyaiva tāvat pariṇāmavādam abhidadhmahe naivam apy ekasyodbhavābhibhavāv iti // 98 //
analyzed: tat upekṣya eva tāvat pariṇāma vādam abhidadhmahe na evam api ekasya udbhava abhibhavau iti

original: yad apīdam aparam uktam grāhyād abhinnam api kiñcin nānubhūyate śabdādau nityatvādīti,
analyzed: yat api idam aparam uktam grāhyāt abhinnam api kiñcid nā anubhūyate śabda ādau nitya tva ādi iti

original: tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati -- abhinneti. yathā hi buddhibhedanibandhano rūpādīnāṃ bhedaḥ,
analyzed: tat anubhāṣya dūṣayati abhinna iti yathā hi buddhi bheda nibandhanaḥ rūpa ādīnām bhedaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtakatvādidharmāṇāṃ śabdād dharmāntarebhyaś ca dhībhedakṛtaṃ bhedam abhidadhānā na daṇḍena vārayituṃ śakyā iti // 99 //
analyzed: evam kṛtaka tva ādi dharmāṇām śabdāt dharma antarebhyaḥ ca dhī bheda kṛtam bhedam abhidadhānāḥ na daṇḍena vārayitum śakyāḥ iti

original: kiṃ punar eṣāṃ bhede kāraṇam ata āha -- na hīti. dravyaguṇakarmāṇy eva tāvad bhidyanta
analyzed: kim punar eṣām bhede kāraṇam atas āha na hi iti dravya guṇa karmāṇi eva tāvat bhidyanta

original: iti kim atra kāraṇam anyad ataḥ pratyayabhedāt. sa cāyam aviśiṣṭaḥ kṛtakatvādidharmabhede
analyzed: iti kim atra kāraṇam anyat atas pratyaya bhedāt sa ca ayam a viśiṣṭaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi dharma bhede

original: 'pīti tatkāraṇakas teṣāṃ bheda iti. nanu{2,
analyzed: pi iti tad kāraṇakaḥ teṣām bhedaḥ iti

original: 141}nāmīṣāṃ deśabhedo vā mūrtibhedo vā dṛśyate. ataḥ kathaṃ te bhinnāḥ,
analyzed: deśa bhedaḥ vā mūrti bhedaḥ vā dṛśyate atas katham te bhinnāḥ

original: ata āha -- na ceti. na naḥ pāribhāṣiko bhāvānāṃ bhedaḥ. saṃvidekaśaraṇā hi vayam.
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti na naḥ pāribhāṣikaḥ bhāvānām bhedaḥ saṃvid eka śaraṇāḥ hi vayam

original: sā ca bhinnā bhedam abhinnā cābhedaṃ vyavasthāpayati. na tu deśato mūrtito vā bheda
analyzed: sā ca bhinnā bhedam abhinnā ca abhedam vyavasthāpayati na tu deśataḥ mūrtitaḥ vā

original: iti iyattaiva paribhāṣyata iti // 100 //
analyzed: iti iyat tā eva paribhāṣyate iti

original: kīdṛśī punar iyaṃ kṛtakatā,
analyzed: kīdṛśī punar iyam kṛtaka tā

original: yā buddhibhedabhinnāvagamyate ata āha -- kārakāṇām iti. yo 'yaṃ kāryadravyāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kārakaiḥ kulālādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ,
analyzed: yā buddhi bheda bhinnā avagamyate atas āha kārakāṇām iti yaḥ yam kārya dravyāṇām ghaṭa ādīnām kārakaiḥ kulāla ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ

original: sā kṛtakatā. kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ tv atalbhyām iti smṛteḥ. seyam
analyzed: sā kṛtaka tā kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam tu iti smṛteḥ sā iyam

original: īdṛśī kṛtakatā kathaṃ śabdād abhinnety ucyate. anyo hi tadā śabdo gakārādyākāraḥ.

original: kathan tarhi nīlākāraṃ pītākāraṃ jñānam iti vyapadeśo 'ta āha -- viṣayeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvaj jñānam ākāravattayā dṛśyate,
analyzed: kathan tarhi nīla ākāram pīta ākāram jñānam iti āha viṣaya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat jñānam ākāravat tayā dṛśyate

original: bahirākāratvavedanād ity uktam. yas tu nīlākāraṃ jñānam iti vyapadeśaḥ,
analyzed: bahis ākāra tva vedanāt iti uktam yaḥ tu nīla ākāram jñānam iti vyapadeśaḥ

original: na tenākāravattā jñānasya sidhyati. viṣayo hi nīlādivyapadeśabhājanam. tadvyapadeśenaiva ca jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate na tu tannīlam.{2,
analyzed: na tena ākāravat tā jñānasya sidhyati viṣayaḥ hi nīla ādi vyapadeśa bhājanam tad vyapadeśena eva ca jñānam vyapadiśyate na tu

original: 146}kasya hetoḥ paravyapadeśena vyapadiśyata iti ced,
analyzed: hetoḥ para vyapadeśena vyapadiśyate iti ced

original: na. taṃ vinā vyapadeṣṭum aśakyatvāt. na hi tadvyapadeśam antareṇa nirūpayituṃ śakyam īdṛśaṃ nāmedaṃ jñānam iti,
analyzed: na tam vinā vyapadeṣṭum aśakya tvāt na hi tad vyapadeśam antareṇa nirūpayitum śakyam īdṛśam nāma idam jñānam iti

original: svayam anākāratvāt saṃvidām iti // 115 //
analyzed: svayam an ākāra tvāt saṃvidām iti

original: yat tu nirākāratvapakṣe sarvasaṃvidāṃ tulyataiva prasajyata ity uktaṃ,
analyzed: yat tu nirākāra tva pakṣe sarva saṃvidām tulya tā eva prasajyate iti uktam

original: tad ayuktam. anākāratve 'pi grāhyabhedapramāṇakatvād bhedasya,
analyzed: tat ayuktam an ākāra tve pi grāhya bheda pramāṇaka tvāt bhedasya

original: grāhyā hi viṣayāḥ saṃvittau pramāṇam. te ca bhinnā dṛśyamānā bhinnā eva saṃvittīr

original: avasthāpayantīti. atas tadbhedasiddhaye tatsamavetākārāntarābhyupagamo na yukta ity
analyzed: avasthāpayanti iti atas tad bheda siddhaye tad samaveta ākāra antara abhyupagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti

original: āha -- tasmād iti. grāhyabhedanibandhanas tatpramāṇaka ity arthaḥ // 116 //
analyzed: āha tasmāt iti grāhya bheda nibandhanaḥ tad pramāṇakaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanv astu grāhyabhedo bhede pramāṇam. anākārāṇāṃ tu kenātmanā bheda ity eva duṣpratipādam
analyzed: nanu astu grāhya bhedaḥ bhede pramāṇam anākārāṇām tu kena ātmanā bhedaḥ iti eva duṣpratipādam

original: ata āha -- nirākāratveti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kim idam anākāratvaṃ saṃvidām. yadi nirasvabhāvatvaṃ,

original: tanneṣyate viṣayavaśonnīyamānaprakāśasvabhāvatvāt. atha nīlādyākāravirahaḥ,
analyzed: tat na iṣyate viṣaya vaśa unnīyamāna prakāśa svabhāva tvāt atha nīla ādi ākāra virahaḥ

original: na. ākāśakālātmadikkarmasu tadabhāve 'pi bhedābhyupagamāt. ato yathā nīlādyākārā eva bhāvā ākāravattvenābhinnā api paraspareṇa bhinnā bhāsante,
analyzed: na ākāśa kāla ātma diś karmasu tad abhāve pi bheda abhyupagamāt atas yathā nīla ādi ākārāḥ eva bhāvāḥ ākāravat tvena abhinnāḥ api paraspareṇa bhinnāḥ bhāsante

original: evam anākāratvenābhinnāny api jñānāni grāhyabhedonnīyamānenātmanā bhetsyante svabhāvād eveti // 117 //
analyzed: evam an ākāra tvena abhinnāni api jñānāni grāhya bheda unnīyamānena ātmanā bhetsyante svabhāvāt eva iti

original: smaraṇāc cānumānukīti yad uktaṃ tad idānīm upanyasya dūṣayati -- smṛter iti. mithyaivaitad
analyzed: smaraṇāt ca anumānukī iti yat uktam tat idānīm upanyasya dūṣayati smṛteḥ iti mithyā eva etat

original: bauddhair gīyata ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ mithyā ata āha -- tadaiveti. tadaiva khalv idaṃ
analyzed: bauddhaiḥ gīyate iti arthaḥ katham mithyā atas āha tadā eva iti tadā eva khalu idam

original: grāhakākāraṃ jñānaṃ saṃvedyate. ghaṭo hi tatra smaryate. tatsmaraṇānyathānupapattyā

original: ca tatkāraṇabhūtaṃ jñānam arthāpattyā kalpyate. nūnaṃ mayā ghaṭo jñātaḥ,

original: katham anyathā smaryate. tatraiva cārthāpattivedye[727]jñāne 'jñāsiṣam iti padaprayogaḥ,
analyzed: katham anyathā smaryate tatra eva iti pada prayogaḥ

original: na tu jñānam api pūrvaṃ gṛhītam iti // 118 //
analyzed: na tu jñānam api pūrvam gṛhītam iti

original: [727] dye jñāsi (KHA)
analyzed: dye jñā asi kha

original: {2,147} yat punardvyākāravedane pūrvam uktam abhedaṃ cābhyupetyāyam ity atra katham
analyzed: yat punar dvi ākāra vedane pūrvam uktam abhedam ca abhyupetya ayam iti atra katham

original: ekasmin gṛhyamāṇe paro na gṛhyata iti. tad dūṣayati -- gṛhītam itīti. yad asmābhir
analyzed: ekasmin gṛhyamāṇe paraḥ na gṛhyate iti tat dūṣayati gṛhītam iti iti yat asmābhiḥ

original: aṃśadvayāgrahaṇe nimittam anuyukto bhavān kim ubhayātmakaṃ na gṛhyata iti,
analyzed: aṃśa dvaya agrahaṇe nimittam anuyuktaḥ bhavān kim ubhaya ātmakam na gṛhyate iti

original: nānenāsmākaṃ vākyapravṛttimātram eva bhavato 'bhimataṃ yathā tathā vā tāvad abhyadhāstvam iti. api tu agrahaṇakāraṇaṃ vā tvayā vaktavyam. vāstavaṃ
analyzed: na anena asmākam vākya pravṛtti mātram eva bhavataḥ bhimatam yathā tathā vā tāvat abhyadhāḥ tvam iti api tu agrahaṇa kāraṇam vā tvayā vaktavyam vāstavam

original: na tv abhedād dvyātmakaṃ gṛhītam iti vākpravṛttimātreṇāsmābhir mucyasa iti // 119 //

original: paramārthatas tu grāhyagrāhakākāravedanaṃ nāstīty uktam evety āha -- grāhyeti. syād
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu grāhya grāhaka ākāra vedanam na asti iti uktam eva iti āha grāhya iti syāt

original: etat. mā nāma pratyakṣeṇa dvyātmakaṃ gṛhyatām. anumānena tūbhayākāravedanaṃ sādhayāmaḥ.
analyzed: etat mā nāma pratyakṣeṇa dvi ātmakam gṛhyatām anumānena tu ubhaya ākāra vedanam sādhayāmaḥ

original: grāhakātmā gṛhīto grāhyābhedāt,
analyzed: grāhaka ātmā gṛhītaḥ grāhya abhedāt

original: tadātmavad ity ata āha -- pratyakṣeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pratyakṣaṃ jñānam iti vaḥ
analyzed: tad ātma vat iti atas āha pratyakṣa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pratyakṣam jñānam iti vaḥ

original: pakṣaḥ. na cāsmin pakṣe 'numānena grahaṇasādhanaṃ yuktam. yadi hi dvyākāraṃ jñānam utpannaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: pakṣaḥ na ca asmin pakṣe numānena grahaṇa sādhanam yuktam yadi hi dvi ākāram jñānam utpannam bhavet

original: tathaiva prakāśeta. ato naiṣā dvyākāropalabdhir ānumānikī pratyakṣajñānapakṣe syāt. na ca pratyakṣeṇa dvyākāraṃ jñānaṃ kaiścid upalabhyata  #
analyzed: tathā eva prakāśeta atas na eṣā dvi ākāra upalabdhiḥ ānumānikī pratyakṣa jñāna pakṣe syāt na ca pratyakṣeṇa dvi ākāram jñānam kaiścid upalabhyata

original: iti na dvyākāratā jñānasyeti // 120 //

analyzed: atra codayati grāhyā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat etat anyatara aṃśa grahaṇe bhinna tvāt aparasya api grahaṇam āpāditam bhavatā tat ayuktam

original: abhede hi saty{2,
analyzed: abhede hi

original: 148}etat syāt. na tu grāhyagrāhakāṃśayoḥ parasparam abhedaḥ. jñānaṃ hi tatrābhinnam
analyzed: syāt na tu grāhya grāhaka aṃśayoḥ parasparam abhedaḥ jñānam hi tatra abhinnam

original: aṃśau ca parasparaṃ bhinnāv eva. ato yathaindravāyavādigrahāḥ parasparaṃ bhinnā api jyotiṣṭo(?ma /
analyzed: aṃśau ca parasparam bhinnau eva atas yathā aindra vāyava ādi grahāḥ parasparam bhinnāḥ api jyotiṣṭoma

original: māṅga)tvena na bhidyanta iti mīmāṃsakā manyante,
analyzed: mā aṅga tvena na bhidyante iti mīmāṃsakāḥ manyante

original: iti nirākṛtasvapakṣasya bauddhasya pratyavasthānam iti. siddhāntavādī tu -- na tāvad
analyzed: iti nirākṛta sva pakṣasya bauddhasya pratyavasthānam iti siddhāntavādī tu na tāvat

analyzed: tat nūnam aikāntikaḥ eva anena grāhya grāhakayoḥ bhedaḥ bhihitaḥ iti manvānaḥ āha siddha

original: iti. itaraḥ svābhiprāyam āviṣkartuṃ parapakṣaniṣedhaṃ tāvad āha -- neti. kāraṇam
analyzed: iti itaraḥ sva abhiprāyam āviṣkartum parapakṣa niṣedham tāvat āha na iti kāraṇam

original: āha -- jñānatvād abhedataḥ. ayam arthaḥ -- naivam api bhavatpakṣasiddhiḥ,
analyzed: āha jñāna tvāt abhedataḥ ayam arthaḥ nā evam api bhavat pakṣa siddhiḥ

original: jñānatvenāṃśayor abhedād ity uktam eveti // 122 //
analyzed: jñāna tvena aṃśayoḥ abhedāt iti uktam eva iti

original: itara idānīṃ siddhāntahānim āpādayaṃs tam evaṃvādinaṃ nigṛhṇāti -- bhinneti. sāṅkhyā
analyzed: itaraḥ idānīm siddhānta hānim āpādayan tam evaṃvādinam nigṛhṇāti bhinnā iti sāṅkhyā

analyzed: hi prakṛti vikārayoḥ atyanta bhedam an icchantaḥ vikāra ātmanā prakṛtau bhedam tad ātmanā

analyzed: ca vikārāṇām abhedam saṅgirante tat yathā sāṅkhya matena bhinna abhinna ātmakam vastu parikalpyate

original: tathā kathaṃ tvayā bhrāntacittena buddhaśāsanam uktvā bhinnābhinnatvam ekasya jñānātmanaḥ parikalpitam. asmākaṃ tv anekāntavādinām upapanno  #
analyzed: tathā katham tvayā bhrānta cittena buddha śāsanam uktvā bhinna abhinna tvam ekasya jñāna ātmanaḥ parikalpitam asmākam tu anekāntavādinām

original: jyotiṣṭome tathābhyupagama iti // 123 //

original: bhavatas tu yadi grāhyagrāhakātmakaṃ dvayaṃ jñānātmanaikaṃ,

original: tato bhinnatvavāganupapannā,

original: noced ekatvam ity āha -- ekam iti // 124 //

original: evaṃ cātra bhavanmatāśrayaṇenaikātmyam āpādayituṃ śakyam ity āha -- eketi. grāhyagrāhakāv ekātmānau,

original: ekarūpāt jñānātmano 'bhedāt. tadātmavad eva. grāhyagrāhakayor mithaḥ parasparam ekatvena kāraṇena jñānaṃ grāhyātmakaṃ grāhakātmakaṃ vā bhaved  #
analyzed: eka rūpāt jñāna ātmanaḥ bhedāt tad ātma vat eva grāhya grāhakayoḥ mithas parasparam eka tvena kāraṇena jñānam grāhya ātmakam grāhaka ātmakam vā bhavet
iti

original: {2,149} tatra caikātmakatva āpanne grāhyagrāhakayor anyatarasyāpāye jāte parasyāpītaravidhurasyānupapatter
analyzed: tatra ca eka ātmaka tve āpanne grāhya grāhakayoḥ anyatarasya apāye jāte parasya api itara vidhurasya anupapatteḥ

original: iti śūnyatā pramāṇārthayoḥ syād ity āha -- tatreti // 126 //
analyzed: iti śūnyatā pramāṇa arthayoḥ syāt iti āha tatra iti

original: evaṃ tāvad abhinnātmano jñānād abhedād aṃśayor abheda āpāditaḥ. idānīṃ bhinnābhyāṃ

original: vāpy aṃśābhyām abhinnatvāt jñānātmano bhedam āpādayati -- bhinnābhyām iti. evaṃ cātyantabhede
analyzed: vā api aṃśābhyām abhinna tvāt jñāna ātmanaḥ bhedam āpādayati bhinnābhyām iti evam ca atyanta bhede

original: grāhyagrāhakayoḥ siddhaṃ dvaitam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tataś ceti // 127 //
analyzed: grāhya grāhakayoḥ siddham dvaitam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tatas ca iti

original: evaṃ dvaitasiddhau yadi jñānam iti saṃjñāmātram eva grāhyagrāhakayoḥ kartum abhimataṃ bhavatāḥ,
analyzed: evam dvaita siddhau yadi jñānam iti saṃjñā mātram eva grāhya grāhakayoḥ kartum abhimatam bhavatāḥ

original: tadabhyupagacchāma eveti sopahāsam āha -- tayor iti. athavā kiṃ pāribhāṣikeṇa jñānaśabdena,
analyzed: tat abhyupagacchāmaḥ eva iti sa upahāsam āha tayoḥ iti athavā kim pāribhāṣikeṇa jñāna śabdena

original: asmākam ivaika evāyaṃ jñānaśabdo 'kṣādivat sādhāraṇatayārthajñānayor vyutpattibhedena
analyzed: asmākam iva ekaḥ eva ayam kṣa ādi vat sādhāraṇa tayā artha jñānayoḥ vyutpatti bhedena

original: vartata ity āha -- athāpi veti. yadi jñāyata iti jñānaṃ karmaṇi lyuḍanto jñānaśabdo 'nuśiṣyate,

original: tato 'rtho jñānam. atha tu jñaptir jñānaṃ jñāyate 'neneti vā bhāvakaraṇayor vyutpādyate,
analyzed: tatas rthaḥ jñānam atha tu jñaptiḥ jñānam jñāyate nena iti vā bhāva karaṇayoḥ vyutpādyate

original: tato dhīr eva jñānam ity ubhayajñānatopapattir iti // 128 //
analyzed: tatas dhīḥ eva jñānam iti ubhaya jñāna tā upapattiḥ iti

original: sarvathāpi hi jñānaśabdavyutpattau vastubhedas tāvat siddha eva. śabdas tu yathāruci jñānārthayor anyataratra pravartatām. nātra no vipratipattir  #
analyzed: sarvathā api hi jñāna śabda vyutpattau vastu bhedaḥ tāvat siddhaḥ eva śabdaḥ tu yathāruci jñāna arthayoḥ anyataratra pravartatām na atra naḥ vipratipattiḥ

original: ity āha -- sarvatheti // 129 //
analyzed: iti āha sarvathā iti

original: {2,150} atrāpare bauddhā vadanti -- satyam asti grāhyagrāhakayor bhedaḥ. naivam api bahirarthaḥ sidhyatīti,
