original: jñānasyaivātītasyottarajñānagrāhyatvāt. ata evedambhāvaḥ,
analyzed: jñānasya eva atītasya uttara jñāna grāhya tvāt atas eva idambhāvaḥ

original: paragocaratvāt saṃvidaḥ. katham atītaṃ grāhyam iti ced,
analyzed: para gocara tvāt saṃvidaḥ katham atītam grāhyam iti ced

original: na. hetutvasyaiva grāhyatvāt. yad etad uttarajñānajanane svākārasamarpaṇena pūrvasya hetutvaṃ tad eva tasya grāhyatvam. yathāhuḥ --
analyzed: na hetu tvasya eva grāhya tvāt yat etat uttara jñāna janane sva ākāra samarpaṇena pūrvasya hetu tvam tat eva tasya grāhya tvam yathā āhuḥ

original: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhya tām viduḥ

original: hetutvam eva yuktijñā jñānākārārpaṇakṣamam //
analyzed: hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam

original: iti. ayaṃ ca sautrāntikavaibhāṣikayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ślokaḥ. tad etad upanyasyati -- atheti. yady api grāhakād bhinnaṃ grāhyaṃ,
analyzed: iti ayam ca sautrāntika vaibhāṣikayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ślokaḥ tat etat upanyasyati atha iti yadi api grāhakāt bhinnam grāhyam

original: tathāpi jñānāntaram eva tadatītaṃ na tv artha iti. etad api dūṣayati -- jñānatva
analyzed: tathā api jñāna antaram eva tad atītam na tu arthaḥ iti etat api dūṣayati jñāna tva

original: iti. tasya grāhyatvābhimatasya jñānasya jñānatve yuktir na kācid astīti bhāva iti.
analyzed: iti tasya grāhya tva abhimatasya jñānasya jñāna tve yuktiḥ na kācid asti iti bhāvaḥ iti

original: yadi tu pūrvoktayā karmavyutpattyā jñānaṃ tad iṣyate tad asmābhir iṣyate ity āha
analyzed: yadi tu pūrva uktayā karma vyutpattyā jñānam tat iṣyate tat asmābhiḥ iṣyate iti āha

original: -- pūrveti // 130 //
analyzed: pūrvā iti

original: jñānaṃ jñānam ity anugataṃ tu rūpaṃ na dvayor grāhyagrāhakayor avagamyata ity āha
analyzed: jñānam jñānam iti anugatam tu rūpam na dvayoḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ avagamyate iti āha

original: -- jñānam iti. akṣādivat sādhāraṇaśabdatām abhyupagacchāmaḥ na tv ākṛtiśabdatām iti.
analyzed: jñānam iti akṣa ādi vat sādhāraṇa śabdatām abhyupagacchāmaḥ na tu ākṛti śabdatām iti

original: upetyāpi brūmaḥ. tat khalu sāmānyaṃ pūrvottarayor anuyāyi tābhyāṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ
analyzed: upetya api brūmaḥ tat khalu sāmānyam pūrva uttarayoḥ anuyāyi tābhyām bhinnam a bhinnam

original: vā. na tāvad bhinnaṃ tair upeyata ity āha -- vyatiriktam iti // 131 //
analyzed: vā na tāvat bhinnam taiḥ upeyate iti āha vyatiriktam iti

original: ayaṃ cāparo vyatireke doṣa ity āha -- vyatireka iti. tayoḥ pūrvottarayor grāhyagrāhakayoḥ. jñānasāmānyād vyatireke iṣṭe,
analyzed: ayam ca aparaḥ vyatireke doṣaḥ iti āha vyatireke iti tayoḥ pūrva uttarayoḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ jñāna sāmānyāt vyatireke iṣṭe

original: tasmiṃs tābhyāṃ bhinna iti yāvat. tayor jñānātmakatā na syāt,
analyzed: tasmin tābhyām bhinnaḥ iti yāvat tayoḥ jñāna ātmaka tā na syāt

original: tenaiva rūpeṇa jñānatvābhyupagamād{2,
analyzed: tena eva rūpeṇa

original: 151}iti. kim ato yady evam ata āha -- tadrūpeti. jñānarūparahitatve satyajñānātmano vastuno 'bhāvāt pūrvottarayor jñānayor abhāva evāpadyata  #
analyzed: kim atas yadi evam atas āha tad rūpa iti jñāna rūpa rahita tve satya jñāna ātmanaḥ vastunaḥ bhāvāt pūrva uttarayoḥ jñānayoḥ abhāvaḥ eva āpadyata
iti

original: api ca tatsāmānyaṃ tābhyāṃ sambadhyamānaṃ pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena sambadhyate bhūtakarmaguṇavat,
analyzed: api ca tat sāmānyam tābhyām sambadhyamānam pratyekam kārtsnyena sambadhyate bhūta karma guṇavat

original: vyatiṣajya vā mālāguṇavat. pūrvasmin kalpe bhedaḥ. uttarasmin sāvayavatvam iti vaiśeṣikādivad doṣaprasañjanaṃ kartavyam ity āha -- tābhyām
analyzed: vyatiṣajya vā mālā guṇa vat pūrvasmin kalpe bhedaḥ uttarasmin sāvayavatvam iti vaiśeṣika ādi vat doṣa prasañjanam kartavyam iti āha tābhyām

original: vaiśeṣikādivad ity etad vivṛṇoti -- yatheti. yathaiva vaiśeṣikādīnāṃ parair bauddhair eva jātyādāv ete doṣā uktāḥ,
analyzed: vaiśeṣika ādi vat iti etat vivṛṇoti yathā iti yathā eva vaiśeṣika ādīnām paraiḥ bauddhaiḥ eva jāti ādau ete doṣāḥ uktāḥ

original: tathaivaiṣāṃ bauddhādīnām api bhinnayoḥ pūrvottarajñānayor abhinnasya jñānasāmānyasya saṅgatau sambandhe ete doṣā iti // 134 //
analyzed: tathā eva eṣām bauddha ādīnām api bhinnayoḥ pūrva uttara jñānayoḥ abhinnasya jñāna sāmānyasya saṅgatau sambandhe ete doṣāḥ iti

original: yadi tu tābhyām avyatiriktaṃ sāmānyām iṣyate,
analyzed: yadi tu tābhyām avyatiriktam sāmānyām iṣyate

original: tato yo 'sau bhinnābhyām abhinnatvāt prāg bheda āpāditaḥ sa evāpadyata ity āha --
analyzed: tatas yaḥ sau bhinnābhyām abhinna tvāt prāk bhedaḥ āpāditaḥ saḥ eva āpadyate iti āha

original: tābhyām iti. api ca kim ātmakaṃ tat sāmānyam ity api cintanīyam eva. tatrāsmadabhimatasāmānyāśrayaṇe
analyzed: tābhyām iti api ca kim ātmakam tat sāmānyam iti api cintanīyam eva tatra asmad abhimata sāmānya āśrayaṇe

original: tāvaduktaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. sādṛśyarūpam apoharūpaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ parastān nirākariṣyata
analyzed: tāvat uktaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sādṛśya rūpam apoha rūpam ca sāmānyam parastāt nirākariṣyata

original: ity āha -- sādṛśyeti // 135 //
analyzed: iti āha sādṛśya iti

original: api cātrāpoharūpasāmānyābhyupagame 'dhiko doṣa ity āha -- vastvantarasyeti. etad
analyzed: api ca atra apoha rūpa sāmānya abhyupagame dhikaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha vastu antarasya iti etat

original: eva vivṛṇoti -- neti. ajñānanivṛttyā jñānaṃ grahītavyam. na ca jñānamātravādino 'jñānaṃ
analyzed: eva vivṛṇoti  na iti ajñāna nivṛttyā jñānam grahītavyam na ca jñāna mātra vādinaḥ jñānam

original: nāma kiñcidapohyam astīti // 136 //
analyzed: nāma kiñcid apohyam asti iti

original: {2,152} na cātyantāsata evāpiho ghaṭate ity āha -- apoha iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
analyzed: na ca atyanta asataḥ eva apihaḥ ghaṭate iti āha apohaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: yadi jñānābhāvamātram ajñānaṃ tat tarhy avasturūpaṃ katham apohakriyākarma bhaviṣyatīti.
analyzed: yadi jñāna abhāva mātram ajñānam tat tarhi avastu rūpam katham apoha kriyā karma bhaviṣyati iti

original: apohyatvābhyupagame vā abhāvasyāpi vastvanta(?rā /
analyzed: apohya tva abhyupagame vā abhāvasya api vastu antarā

original: ratā)pattir ity āha -- vastvantaram iti. kāraṇam āha -- apohyatvāc ca vastuteti. caśabdo hetāv iti // 137 //
analyzed: rata āpattiḥ iti āha vastu antaram iti kāraṇam āha apohya tvāt ca vastu tā iti caśabdaḥ hetau iti

original: ato 'vaśyaṃ jñānābhāvasyānapohyatvād ajñānanivṛttau jñāne iṣyamāṇe jñānād anyadajñānam
analyzed: atas vaśyam jñāna abhāvasya anapohya tvāt ajñāna nivṛttau jñāne iṣyamāṇe jñānāt anyat ajñānam

original: artha eva te prasajyata ity āha -- teneti. atra kiñcidāśaṅkte -- kalpitam iti. jñeyādiśabdeṣu
analyzed: arthaḥ eva te prasajyate iti āha tena iti atra kiñcid āśaṅkte kalpitam iti jñeya ādi śabdeṣu

original: hi bauddhair uktam --
analyzed: hi bauddhaiḥ uktam

original: ajñeyaṃ kalpitaṃ kṛtvā jñeyaśabdaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: ajñeyam kalpitam kṛtvā jñeya śabdaḥ pravartate

original: iti. tad ihāpi samānam. ajñānakalpanayā tadapohena jñānaśabdo vartiṣyate. tena nāpohyābhāvo
analyzed: iti tat iha api samānam ajñāna kalpanayā tad apohena jñāna śabdaḥ vartiṣyate tena na apohya abhāvaḥ

original: na ca vastvantaratāpattir iti. etad api dūṣayati -- neti. yad eva hi kvacid dṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: na ca vastu antara tā āpattiḥ iti etat api dūṣayati na iti yat eva hi kvacid dṛṣṭam

original: tad evānyatra kalpyate. atyantāsatas tu jñānād anyasyābuddhiviṣayasya kalpanā keti // 138 //
analyzed: tat eva anyatra kalpyate atyanta asataḥ tu jñānāt anyasya a buddhi viṣayasya kalpanā kā iti

original: tad evaṃ kalpanīyāntarābhāvād ajñānākārā buddhir evājñānatayā kalpanīyāpannety āha -- buddhir iti. tatra cāyaṃ doṣa ity āha -- tataś ceti //
analyzed: tat evam kalpanīya antara abhāvāt ajñāna ākārā buddhiḥ eva ajñāna tayā kalpanīya āpannā iti āha buddhiḥ iti tatra ca ayam doṣaḥ iti āha tatas ca iti

original: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- na ceti. na jñānāntarāpohena jñānam eva grahītuṃ śakyata
analyzed: kim atas yadi evam atas āha na ca iti na jñāna antara apohena jñānam eva grahītum śakyata

original: iti. atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- vṛkṣa iti. na hi vṛkṣārtho vṛkṣāpohena pratyetuṃ śakyata iti // 140 //
analyzed: iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha vṛkṣaḥ iti na hi vṛkṣa arthaḥ vṛkṣa apohena pratyetum śakyate iti  /

original: {2,153} api ca yāsāv ajñānanirbhāsā buddhir ajñānatayā kalpitā,
analyzed: api ca yā asau ajñāna nirbhāsā buddhiḥ ajñāna tayā kalpitā

original: tasyā jñānatvaṃ na bhavet. na hi yadrūpaṃ yadapohena pratīyate tatraiva tad bhavati. vṛkṣatvasyāvṛkṣeṣv apohyeṣu ghaṭādiṣv abhāvād ity āha  #
analyzed: tasyāḥ jñāna tvam na bhavet na hi yad rūpam yat apohena pratīyate tatra eva tat bhavati vṛkṣa tvasya a vṛkṣeṣu apohyeṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu abhāvāt iti āha

original: -- apohya iti // 141 //
analyzed: apohyaḥ iti

original: evañ ca tasyājñānatvābhimatasya jñānatvābhāvād arthatvam evāpannam. ato 'jñānavācoyuktyārtha
analyzed: evam ca tasya ajñāna tva abhimatasya jñāna tva abhāvāt artha tvam evā āpannam atas jñāna vācoyuktyā artha

original: evābhimata ity abhinnārthatvam ity āha -- tataś ceti. kiñ caivam api cāyam ajñānāpohavādī
analyzed: eva abhimataḥ iti abhinna artha tvam iti āha tatas ca iti kim ca evam api ca ayam ajñāna apoha vādī

original: vaktavyaḥ kim ālambano 'yam ajñānapratyaya iti. na tāvad bāhyālambanaṃ kiñcid bhavadbhir
analyzed: vaktavyaḥ kim ālambanaḥ yam ajñāna pratyayaḥ iti na tāvat bāhya ālambanam kiñcid bhavadbhiḥ

original: jñānam iṣyate. na cāsya svāṃśālambanatvaṃ jñānāntarālambanatvaṃ vā sambhavatīty anantaram
analyzed: jñānam iṣyate na ca asya sva aṃśa ālambana tvam jñāna antara ālambana tvam vā sambhavati iti anantaram

original: eva vakṣyatīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- ajñāneti. tan na tāvad jñānamātravādinām ajñānaṃ
analyzed: eva vakṣyati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha ajñāna iti tat na tāvat jñāna mātra vādinām ajñānam

original: nāma kiñcid asti yad asyālambanaṃ syād ity āha -- neti. atra codayati -- nanv iti.
analyzed: nāma kiñcid asti yat asya ālambanam syāt iti āha na iti atra codayati nanu iti

original: asyārthaḥ -- vastvātmakaṃ hi jñānātiriktam asmābhir niṣiddham. abhāvātmakaṃ tv ajñānaṃ
analyzed: asya arthaḥ vastu ātmakam hi jñāna atiriktam asmābhiḥ niṣiddham abhāva ātmakam tu ajñānam

original: kim ajñānapratyayena nāvalambyata iti // 143 //
analyzed: kim ajñāna pratyayena na avalambyate iti

original: pariharati -- bhāva iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yena tāvadābālam āsthaviraṃ ca prasiddhā mahīmahīdharodadhiprabhṛtayo grāhyā apalapitāḥ,
analyzed: pariharati bhāvaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yena tāvat ābālam āsthaviram ca prasiddhāḥ mahī mahīdhara udadhi prabhṛtayaḥ grāhyāḥ apalapitāḥ

original: tasya kim iti sūkṣmanyāyavedanīyo bhāvo grāhyo bhaviṣyati tanmate ca sarvopākhyānavirahalakṣaṇa iti. api ca yad bhāvadhiyāṃ svāṃśaparyavasāne  #
analyzed: tasya kim iti sūkṣma nyāya vedanīyaḥ bhāvaḥ grāhyaḥ bhaviṣyati tad mate ca sarva upākhyāna viraha lakṣaṇaḥ iti api ca yat bhāva dhiyām sva aṃśa paryavasāne

original: kāraṇam uktaṃ,
analyzed: kāraṇam uktam

original: tadabhāvabuddher apy aviśiṣṭam. ataḥ katham asau bāhyābhāvālambanaṃ syād ity āha -- svāṃśeti // 144 //
analyzed: tad abhāva buddheḥ api aviśiṣṭam atas katham asau bāhya abhāva ālambanam syāt iti āha sva aṃśa iti  /

original: {2,154} tadavaśyaṃ pāriśeṣyād ajñānapratyayasyāpi jñānāntaraṃ vā svāṃśo vā grāhyo 'bhyupagantavya ity āha -- teneti. astu tad eva grāhyaṃ,
analyzed: tat avaśyam pāriśeṣyāt ajñāna pratyayasya api jñāna antaram vā sva aṃśaḥ vā grāhyaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ iti āha tena iti astu tat eva grāhyam

original: ko doṣo 'ta āha -- svarūpeti. jñānāntaraṃ svātmā vā jñānasya jñānasvabhāvatvān nājñānapratyayena
analyzed: kaḥ te āha sva rūpa iti jñāna antaram sva ātmā vā jñānasya jñāna svabhāva tvāt na ajñāna pratyayena

original: viṣayīkartuṃ śakyate. svarūpaviparītasyāgrāhyatvād yadākāro hi pratyayas tadākāram
analyzed: viṣayīkartum śakyate sva rūpa viparītasya a grāhya tvāt yad ākāraḥ hi pratyayaḥ tad ākāram

original: eva grāhyam avasthāpayati. ajñānākāraś ca pratyayaḥ kathaṃ jñānam ālambanīkartuṃ
analyzed: eva grāhyam avasthāpayati ajñāna ākāraḥ ca pratyayaḥ katham jñānam ālambanīkartum

original: śaknoti. svarūpaviparītaṃ na grāhyam iti // 145 //
analyzed: śaknoti svarūpa viparītam na grāhyam iti

original: etad eva darśayati -- yatheti. ataḥ siddhaṃ na jñānamātratve 'pohyam astīty āha --
analyzed: etat eva darśayati yathā iti atas siddham na jñāna mātra tve pohyam asti iti āha

original: teneti. evaṃ cāsaty apohye 'pohasvarūpasyāpy abhāvān na tenātmanāpi grāhyagrāhakayor
analyzed: tena iti evam ca asati apohye poha svarūpasya api abhāvāt na tena ātmanā api grāhya grāhakayoḥ

original: jñānayor jñānātmanā samānatvam ity āha -- grāhyagrāhakayor iti. evañ cobhayoḥ sādhāraṇarūpābhāvād
analyzed: jñānayoḥ jñāna ātmanā samāna tvam iti āha grāhya grāhakayoḥ iti evam ca ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇa rūpa abhāvāt

original: grāhyagrāhakayor anyataratra grāhye grāhake vā jñānatvam abhyupagantuṃ yuktam ity
analyzed: grāhya grāhakayoḥ anyataratra grāhye grāhake vā jñāna tvam abhyupagantum yuktam iti

original: āha -- tasmād iti // 147 //
analyzed: āha tasmāt iti

original: tathāpi ko niścayaḥ grāhakaṃ jñānaṃ na tu grāhyam ity ata āha -- atreti. ubhayasiddhaṃ
analyzed: tathā api kaḥ niścayaḥ grāhakam jñānam na tu grāhyam iti atas āha atra iti ubhaya siddham

original: hi grāhakasya jñānatvaṃ grāhyasya tv asmākam asiddham iti. evaṃ tāvad jñānaṃ grāhakam
analyzed: hi grāhakasya jñāna tvam grāhyasya tu asmākam asiddham iti evam tāvat jñānam grāhakam

original: artho grāhya iti sādhitam. atha vā kiṃ no 'nena vyasanena. tattvabhedo hi no dvaitānuguṇatayā
analyzed: arthaḥ grāhyaḥ iti sādhitam atha vā kim naḥ nena vyasanena tattva bhedaḥ hi naḥ dvaita anuguṇa tayā

original: sādhyaḥ. sa tāvat siddhaḥ. siddhe ca tasmin yathāruci vyapadeśo 'stu nāmety āha -- vastv iti // 148 //
analyzed: sādhyaḥ sa tāvat siddhaḥ siddhe ca tasmin yathāruci vyapadeśaḥ stu nāma iti āha vastu iti

original: yathāruci vyapadeśam eva darśayati -- jñānam iti. ubhayaṃ vā jñānaśabde vācyam astu artho jñānaṃ ca. artha eva vā jñānaśabdavācyaḥ na jñānam{2,
analyzed: yathāruci vyapadeśam eva darśayati jñānam iti ubhayam vā jñāna śabde vācyam astu arthaḥ jñānam ca arthaḥ eva vā jñāna śabda vācyaḥ na

original: 155}ity arthaḥ. grāhaka eva vārthaśabdavācyo 'bhidhīyatām. naivam api kācit pakṣakṣatiḥ.
analyzed: arthaḥ grāhakaḥ eva vā artha śabda vācyaḥ bhidhīyatām na evam api kācid pakṣa kṣatiḥ

original: siddhatvād dvaitasyety abhiprāyeṇāha -- grāhaka iti. bhāṣyakāreṇa tv atītabuddher
analyzed: siddha tvāt dvaitasya iti abhiprāyeṇa āha grāhakaḥ iti bhāṣyakāreṇa tu atīta buddheḥ

original: grāhyatvanirākaraṇārthaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ kāraṇam uktaṃ yenaivam āha -- arthaviṣayā hi pratyakṣabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: grāhya tva nirākaraṇa artham kṣaṇika tvam kāraṇam uktam yena evam āha artha viṣayā hi pratyakṣa buddhiḥ

original: na buddhiviṣayā. kṣaṇikā hi sā,
analyzed: na buddhi viṣayā kṣaṇikā hi sā

original: na buddhyantarakālam avasthāsyate iti. tad upanyasyati -- buddhyor iti. atītā hi
analyzed: na buddhi antara kālam avasthāsyate iti tat upanyasyati buddhyoḥ iti atītā hi

original: pūrvā buddhir nāsāv uttarayā grahītuṃ śakyate. tatkāle 'satyā vartamānavad grahītum
analyzed: pūrvā buddhiḥ na asau uttarayā grahītum śakyate tad kāle satyāḥ vartamāna vat grahītum

original: aśakyatvād grāhyasya cedaṃ nīlam iti vartamānavadbhāsād iti. ataḥ kṣaṇikatvāt kāraṇād
analyzed: aśakya tvāt grāhyasya ca idam nīlam iti vartamāna vat bhāsāt iti atas kṣaṇika tvāt kāraṇāt

original: buddheḥ grahītum aśakyatvāt asmanmatāśrayaṇenārthātmakataiva buddher upeyety āha
analyzed: buddheḥ grahītum aśakya tvāt asmad mata āśrayaṇena artha ātmaka tā eva buddheḥ upeyā iti āha

original: -- artha iti. yadi tūcyate mā bhūd atītāyā buddher grāhyatvaṃ,
analyzed: arthaḥ iti yadi tu ucyate mā bhūt atītāyāḥ buddheḥ grāhya tvam

original: sahabhāvinos tu jñānayor grāhyagrāhakatvaṃ na nopapannam iti. tadayuktaṃ sahabhāvānupapatteḥ.
analyzed: sahabhāvinoḥ tu jñānayoḥ grāhya grāhaka tvam na na upapannam iti tat ayuktam sahabhāva anupapatteḥ

original: kathaṃ hi samanantarapratyayādhīnātmalābham uttaraṃ tena sahotpadyata iti sambhāvayāmaḥ.

original: sahatve 'pekṣānupapatteḥ. astu vā janmayaugapadyaṃ jñānayoḥ. evam api na mānameyatā

analyzed: saha janmanoḥ anyonya nirapekṣa tvāt tat idam āha anyonya iti katham nirapekṣam atas āha kriyā iti yadi hi jñānayoḥ kaścid kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ

original: evam apekṣā bhavet. na cāsau sahotpattau sambhavati. svākārārpaṇena hetutvaṃ nirākṛtam eveti. nanu tavāpy arthajñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve kriyākārakasambandhaḥ
analyzed: evam apekṣā bhavet na ca asau saha utpattau sambhavati sva ākāra arpaṇena hetu tvam nirākṛtam eva iti nanu tava api artha jñānayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāve kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ

original: ata āha -- artheti. yena vyāpāreṇa buddheḥ pramāṇatvaṃ sā mitiḥ kaś cāsau. yad etad

analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sā hi buddhi arthābhyām sahitābhyām bhāvyate yāvat hi na arthaḥ dhī viṣayaḥ

original: tatkarma bhavati. buddhiś ca janmani kartrī. na tāvan nirviṣayā{2,

ity arthaḥ. na caiṣa prakāro bauddhamate sambhavati,

original: bhāsata iti. etāvac ca viparyayasya tattvaṃ yad anyādṛśasyānyathāprakāśanam iti sūktaṃ

analyzed: tad nirākaraṇāt iti tasmin eva sādhye hetu dṛṣṭānta antaram āha tad rūpa iti atītaḥ rthaḥ na pratyakṣa buddhi viṣayaḥ

original: na tena śaktyarpaṇaṃ,

original: api ca,
analyzed: api ca

original: dvyākāratve pūrvajñānaṃ tadaiva svakāla eva saṃvedeta. tatrāsya svasaṃvittaye bodhakāntarajñānāpekṣā na yuktety āha -- saṃvedyeteti // 167

original: api ca yadi pūrvajñānaṃ dvyākāram,

iti

original: ity āha -- etayaiveti. eṣā cātra dik. na jñānaṃ dviśaktikaṃ,

original: jñānotpatteḥ,

original: svaśaktivat. tathā na jñānaṃ dviśaktikaṃ,
analyzed: sva śakti vat tathā na jñānam dvi śaktikam

original: jñānatvād anyatarāṃśavat. anyatarāṃśo hi jñānam eva. na cāsau dviśaktikaḥ,
analyzed: jñāna tvāt anyatara aṃśa vat anyatara aṃśaḥ hi jñānam eva na ca asau dvi śaktikaḥ

original: dvaividhyābhyupagamāt. itarathā cāturvidhyaprasaṅga iti // 177 //
analyzed: dvaividhya abhyupagamāt itarathā cāturvidhya prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: nanu śakyam anenaiva prakāreṇa (?nā/

original: ā)tmano 'pi vastutvād ghaṭavad dviśaktikatvaṃ vārayitum ata āha -- pramāṇeti. darśitaṃ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ api vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat dvi śaktika tvam vārayitum atas āha pramāṇa iti darśitam

original: hy asmatprayogasambhinnabodhabodhyatvād ātmano dvirūpatvam. na tadanumānena vārayituṃ śakyate,

analyzed: pratyakṣa bādhaka prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ jñāne tu na ātma vat dvi śaktika tvam śakyate kalpayitum

original: pramāṇāntarābhāvād iti. etad apy uktam ity āha -- na tv atreti. yata evam ekasya dvirūpatvam anupapannam,

original: evañ ca pramāṇabalād āpadyamāno vastubhedo na kalpanāgauravam āpādayatīti // 178 //

original: yad uktam anekakalpanāyā ekakalpanā jyāyasīti,

original: tat parihṛtaṃ,
analyzed: tat parihṛtam

original: na khalu pratyakṣasiddho 'rthaḥ kalpanīyaḥ. na ca tadbalabhāvinī jñānakalpanā śakyate vārayitum. pramāṇavanti subahūny apy adṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāny  #
analyzed: na khalu pratyakṣa siddhaḥ rthaḥ kalpanīyaḥ na ca tad bala bhāvinī jñāna kalpanā śakyate vārayitum pramāṇavanti su bahūni api adṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni

original: eva. ata evobhaya{2,
analyzed: eva ata

original: 165}siddhatvād jñānasyākārakalpanā nyāyyeti yad uktaṃ tad api pratyākhyātam. yadi
analyzed: jñānasya ākāra kalpanā nyāyyā iti yat uktam tat api pratyākhyātam yadi

original: hi vayam ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyāyam iti tadāśrayam anvicchema tadobhayasiddhatvād jñānākāro

analyzed: yam iti ucyeta api pratiṣṭhita āśrayam eva tu pratyakṣa sāmarthyāt ākāram

original: nāsyāśrayāntaramīhāmahe. na caivāsmākam asiddhe 'rthākāre jñānam api siddhaṃ yenobhayasiddhaṃ

original: bhavet. na hi tannirākāram anubhūyate. pratyakṣeṇārtha eva hi jñātas tasya pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: bhavet na hi tat nirākāram anubhūyate pratyakṣeṇa arthaḥ eva hi jñātaḥ tasya pramāṇam

original: bhaviṣyati. sa ced aniṣṭo nāsya kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇam astīti katham ubhayasiddhatvaṃ,
analyzed: bhaviṣyati sa ced aniṣṭaḥ na asya kalpanāyām pramāṇam asti iti katham ubhaya siddha tvam

original: tad etad āha -- tasmād iti. ādiśabdena śaktimātrasya bheda iti yad uktaṃ tadupādatta
analyzed: tat etat āha tasmāt iti ādi śabdena śakti mātrasya bhedaḥ iti yat uktam tat upādatta

original: iti. uktadoṣaparihāraprapañcam ataḥ paramārabhamāṇaḥ yat tāvad uktam upāyatvād jñānam

original: eva prathamam avagantavyam upāyādhīnasiddhitvād upeyānām,
analyzed: eva prathamam avagantavyam upāya adhīna siddhi tvāt upeyānām

original: na ca tadākāram antareṇa pratīyata iti jñānākāra evāyam iti,
analyzed: na ca tad ākāram antareṇa pratīyate iti jñāna ākāraḥ eva ayam iti

original: tat tāvat pariharati -- upāyeti. satyam arthasiddhāv upāyo jñānaṃ,
analyzed: tat tāvat pariharati upāya iti satyam artha siddhau upāyaḥ jñānam

original: na tv avaśyam upāyagrahaṇādhīnam upeyāvadhāraṇam. na hi cakṣū rūpaparicchedopāya iti tataḥ pūrvam anubhūyate. yat tūpāyatvāt prathamam avagantavyam
analyzed: na tu avaśyam upāya grahaṇa adhīnam upeya avadhāraṇam na hi cakṣuḥ rūpa pariccheda upāyaḥ iti tatas pūrvam anubhūyate yat tu upāya tvāt prathamam avagantavyam

original: tat tair eva cakṣurādibhir anaikāntikam iti nopāyasya sato jñānasya pūrvānubhavaṃ sādhayitum alam iti // 179 //
analyzed: tat taiḥ eva cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam iti na upāyasya sataḥ jñānasya pūrva anubhavam sādhayitum alam iti

original: yat punar uktam -- utpannasya sato 'pratibaddhasya jñānasya nāgrahaṇakāraṇam asti ato grahītavyam iti,
analyzed: yat punar uktam utpannasya sataḥ pratibaddhasya jñānasya na agrahaṇa kāraṇam asti atas grahītavyam iti

original: tad anubhāṣya pariharati -- yad apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyaṃ jñānam utpannam apratibaddhaṃ kenacit. na tv etāvataiva grahītavyaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tat anubhāṣya pariharati  yat api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam jñānam utpannam apratibaddham kenacid na tu etāvatā eva grahītavyam bhavati

original: grāhakābhāvenāgrahaṇopapatteḥ. na tāvad idam ātmanātmānaṃ grahītuṃ śakyam ity uktam. anyac ca,
analyzed: grāhaka abhāvena agrahaṇa upapatteḥ na tāvat idam ātmanā ātmānam grahītum śakyam iti uktam anyat ca

original: jñānaṃ tadā notpannam eva arthāpattir hi sā. sā ca paścād eva bhaviṣyatīty ataḥ sato 'pi jñānasya grahaṇakāraṇābhāvād agrahaṇaṃ yuktam evety  #
analyzed: jñānam tadā na utpannam eva arthāpattiḥ hi sā sā ca paścāt eva bhaviṣyati iti atas sataḥ pi jñānasya grahaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt agrahaṇam yuktam eva iti

original: āha -- teneti // 181 //
analyzed: āha tena iti

original: {2,166} yadi svakāle nāvagataṃ,

original: kathaṃ tarhi paścād avagamyate. ata āha -- nānyatheti. asti hi khalu paścād jñānāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam arthāpattiḥ. jñātārthānyathānupapattiprabhavā  #
analyzed: katham tarhi paścāt avagamyate atas āha na anyathā iti asti hi khalu paścāt jñāna avadhāraṇe pramāṇam arthāpattiḥ jñāta artha anyathā anupapatti prabhavā  /

original: sā prāgajñāte 'rthe na jāyate,
analyzed: sā prāk ajñāte rthe na jāyate

original: paścādupajāyata iti yuktam eva pramāṇasadbhāvād uttarakālam eva grahaṇam. paricodanāparihāraś cokta eveti neha pratanyata iti // 182 //
analyzed: paścāt upajāyate iti yuktam eva pramāṇa sadbhāvāt uttara kālam eva grahaṇam paricodanā parihāraḥ ca uktaḥ eva iti na iha pratanyate iti  /

original: nanv astu tāvat parastāt pramāṇasadbhāvaḥ,
analyzed: nanu astu tāvat parastāt pramāṇa sadbhāvaḥ

original: pūrvam api tv apratibandhasya kasmād agrahaṇam ata āha -- na ceti. na hy apratibandham
analyzed: pūrvam api tu apratibandhasya kasmāt agrahaṇam atas āha na ca iti na hi apratibandham

original: ity eva vastūpalabhyate. apratibandhasyāpy anupalambhanāt. kāraṇasāmagrīviśeṣasamavadhānasampāditaṃ
analyzed: iti eva vastu upalabhyate apratibandhasya api anupalambhanāt kāraṇa sāmagrī viśeṣa samavadhāna sampāditam

analyzed: hi bhāvānām grahaṇam tad apratibandhānām api tad abhāve na bhavati kim anupapannam iti

original: kā punarjñānagrahaṇe sāmagrī. yadi jñānaṃ, kim a(?nya/
analyzed: kā punar jñāna grahaṇe sāmagrī yadi jñānam kim anya

original: sya) jñānāntareṇa. nanv idam eva svabhāvato jñānaṃ prakāśātmakam,

analyzed: aprakāśa ātmanām tu bhāva antarāṇām apratibaddhānām api astu prakāśa antara apekṣā atas eva uktam

original: na cāprakāśarūpatvam iti. ato notpannasya jñānasyāgrahaṇe kāraṇam upalabhāmahe --
analyzed: na ca a prakāśa rūpa tvam iti atas na utpannasya jñānasya a grahaṇe kāraṇam upalabhāmahe

original: ata āha -- vyāpṛtam iti. satyam prakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ,

analyzed: tathā api na ātmānam prakāśayati artha saṃvittau vyāpṛta tvāt na hi bahis viṣaya prakāśane

analyzed: atha vā prakāśakam jñānam iti eva kutas

original: arthāparokṣībhāvo hi tasya tathātve pramāṇam. tataś cārthānubhavasvabhāvam eva tat sidhyatīti na svātmānam api prakāśayatīty āha - īdṛśam iti.  #
analyzed: artha aparokṣībhāvaḥ hi tasya tathātve pramāṇam tatas ca artha anubhava svabhāvam eva tat sidhyati iti na sva ātmānam api prakāśayati iti āha īdṛśam iti

original: evam api svātmānaṃ prakāśayed{2,

analyzed: prakāśakam tena sarvasya eva prakāśakena bhavitavyam na hi cakṣuḥ ādīni indriyāṇi prakāśakāni

original: api viṣayataḥ saṅkīryante,
analyzed: api viṣayataḥ saṅkīryante

original: vyavasthāyā uktatvāt. evam ihāpi bāhyasya prakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ,

analyzed: na ātmanaḥ iti na na upapannam iti āha sati iti sārdhena prakāśaka pada upacāraḥ tu kathañcid

analyzed: yat tu uktam

original: iti, tad dūṣayitum anubhāṣate -- anyeneti sārthena. evaṃ hi parair uktaṃ - yadi kila jñānāntareṇa jñānaṃ jāyate,

original: tatas tasya tasya jñānasya smaraṇāt pūrvānubhavakalpanāyām anavasthā bhavet. ekena
analyzed: tatas tasya tasya jñānasya smaraṇāt pūrva anubhava kalpanāyām anavasthā bhavet ekena

original: tu jñānena viṣayākāre svākāre ca pravedite sarvam eva grāhyagrāhakākārasmaraṇaṃ tatraiva
analyzed: tu jñānena viṣaya ākāre sva ākāre ca pravedite sarvam eva grāhya grāhaka ākāra smaraṇam tatra eva

original: syāt. tathā cānavasthā parihṛtā bhavati. tasmān na jñānāntareṇa vedyaṃ jñānam iti // 188 //
analyzed: syāt tathā ca anavasthā parihṛtā bhavati tasmāt na jñāna antareṇa vedyam jñānam iti

original: evam anubhāṣite dūṣaṇam āha -- tatrāpīti. yad etad ucyate tatra tatra smaraṇadarśanena sarvatrānubhavakalpanāyām anavastheti,
analyzed: evam anubhāṣite dūṣaṇam āha tatra api iti yat etat ucyate tatra tatra smaraṇa darśanena sarvatra anubhava kalpanāyām anavasthā iti

original: tad ayuktam. smṛtyasiddheḥ. gṛhītaviṣayā hi smṛtir bhavatīti nāgṛhītaṃ jñānaṃ smartuṃ
analyzed: tat ayuktam smṛti asiddheḥ gṛhīta viṣayā hi smṛtiḥ bhavati iti na agṛhītam jñānam smartum

original: śakyam. gṛhītasmaraṇe tu yāvadgrahaṇam eva smaraṇavyavasthānānnānavastheti vakṣyate. bhavati hi{2,
analyzed: śakyam gṛhīta smaraṇe tu yāvat grahaṇam eva smaraṇa vyavasthānāt na anavasthā iti vakṣyate bhavati

original: 168}kadācid etad dvitrāṇi jñānāny anubhūtapūrvāṇi smaryanta iti. vijñānasantānasmaraṇaṃ tv alaukikam eveti // 189 //
analyzed: etat dvitrāṇi jñānāni anubhūta pūrvāṇi smaryante iti vijñāna santāna smaraṇam tu alaukikam eva iti

original: yadi tv arthajñātatānyathānupapattyā jñānam avagamya punas tajjñātatāvaśena tadviṣayaṃ jñānāntaraṃ kalpayati,
analyzed: yadi tu artha jñāta tā anyathā anupapattyā jñānam avagamya punar tad jñāta tā vaśena tad viṣayam jñāna antaram kalpayati

original: punaś cānenaiva krameṇa yāvacchramaṃ jñānāni jñātāni. tato yāvajjñātasmaraṇād nānavasthety āha -- ghaṭādāv iti sārdhena. yat tu prāganavagatānām  #
analyzed: punar ca anena eva krameṇa yāvacchramam jñānāni jñātāni tatas yāvat jñāta smaraṇāt na anavasthā iti āha ghaṭa ādau iti sārdhena yat tu prāk anavagatānām

original: eva jñānānāṃ smaraṇam ucyate,
analyzed: eva jñānānām smaraṇam ucyate

original: tad vandhyāsutādismaraṇatulyam aśakyam eva vaktum ity āha -- tadeti // 191 //
analyzed: tat vandhyā suta ādi smaraṇa tulyam aśakyam eva vaktum iti āha tadā iti

original: yat tu bhikṣuṇā siddhavat tatrāpi smṛtir ity uktaṃ,
analyzed: yat tu bhikṣuṇā siddha vat tatra api smṛtiḥ iti uktam

original: tad bhrāntabhāṣitam eva. asti ca bhrāntau nibandhanam. artho hi tatra smaryate. tatsmaraṇānyathānupapattyā
analyzed: tat bhrānta bhāṣitam eva asti ca bhrāntau nibandhanam arthaḥ hi tatra smaryate tad smaraṇa anyathā anupapattyā

original: ca tasya prāg jñātatvam eva kalpyate. tato 'pi prācīnajñānakalpanā. tad iha saṃsargamohitadhiyāṃ
analyzed: ca tasya prāk jñāta tvam eva kalpyate prācīna jñāna kalpanā tat iha saṃsarga mohita dhiyām

original: jñāne 'pi smṛtivibhramaḥ. na tvādyajñānasmaraṇam apy āśaṅkyam. prāg eva santānasmaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: jñāne smṛti vibhramaḥ na tu ādi ajñāna smaraṇam api āśaṅkyam prāk eva santāna smaraṇam

original: tad etad āha -- smṛtibhrāntir iti. arthasmṛteḥ khalv iyaṃ tajjñānādipramāṇatā vilasati,
analyzed: tat etat āha smṛti bhrāntiḥ iti artha smṛteḥ khalu iyam tad jñāna ādi pramāṇa tā vilasati

original: yad etajjñāne 'pi smṛtibhramo bhavati. arthasmṛtyā hi jñāne pramīyamāṇe smṛtiviṣayārthasannikarṣād
analyzed: yat smṛti bhramaḥ bhavati artha smṛtyā hi jñāne pramīyamāṇe smṛti viṣaya artha sannikarṣāt

original: jñāne 'pi smaraṇam iti bhrāmyati. ādiśabdena cātra jñānajñānam upādīyata iti // 192 //
analyzed: jñāne smaraṇam iti bhrāmyati ādi śabdena ca atra jñāna jñānam upādīyate iti

original: smṛtyāpi jñānapramāyāṃ yāvacchramaṃ tadgrahaṇād viṣayāntarasañcāropapattir ity abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: smṛtyā api jñāna pramāyām yāvacchramam tad grahaṇāt viṣaya antara sañcāra upapattiḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: -- yāvad iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvanti jñānāni jāyante yadi tu jñātum iṣyante
analyzed: yāvat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvanti jñānāni jāyante yadi tu jñātum iṣyante

original: yāvacchramaṃ tadbuddhir bhaviṣyati yāvanti jñānāni budhyamāno na śrāmyati. smṛtyanusāreṇāpi tāvad bhotsyate{2,

original: syād etat. katham atītā arthā asanto jñānāvalambanam iti. uktaparihāratvāt. uktaṃ hi pratyakṣadharmo vartamānasannihitaviṣayatā jñānāntarāṇāṃ{2,
analyzed: syāt etat katham atītāḥ arthāḥ asantaḥ jñāna avalambanam iti ukta parihāra tvāt uktam hi pratyakṣa dharmaḥ vartamāna sannihita viṣaya tā

original: 173} neti nirālambana eva,
analyzed: na iti nirālambanaḥ eva

analyzed: na jñānam eva api ca

original: -- vāsaneti // 205 //

original: teṣv eva kutaścit kāraṇadoṣād duṣṭaṃ vijñānam anyathāsthitam ākāraṃ gṛhṇāti. aduṣṭaṃ

original: 175}iti tad eva dvyaṇukādikrameṇāśrīyate. śiraśchedaś cānyagocaro 'vagataḥ svasambandhitayāvagamyata ity anyathā vyavasthānam iti // 207 //

iti

original: āha -- dṛṣṭair iti. na tārakādāv adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ liṅgaṃ,

original: iti. kiṃ punar dṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ yenātmanā strītvādīnīṣyante ata āha -- saṃstyānaprasavasthānair (iti.)

original: sattvarajastamasāṃ guṇānāṃ yathottaram upacayaḥ saṃstyānaprasavasthānāni. te ca guṇāḥ prāṇyaprāṇisadbhāvasādhāraṇā eva sarveṣu tadrūpapratyabhijñānāt.{2,
analyzed: sattva rajaḥ tamasām guṇānām yathottaram upacayaḥ saṃstyāna prasava sthānāni te ca guṇāḥ prāṇi a prāṇi sadbhāva sādhāraṇāḥ eva sarveṣu

original: 177}sukhaduḥkhamohādibhedavanto hi sarve bhāvāḥ āśrayatayā janakatvena ca prāṇinaḥ

original: sukhayanti duḥkhayanti mohayanti ca. sukhādayaś ca sattvādidharmāḥ,

original: taddarśanāt traiguṇyaṃ sarvabhāvānām avasīyate. tad yadā sattvopacayaḥ saṃstyānābhidhāno 'vagamyate tadā puṃstvaṃ pratīyate. rajasas tūpacaye  #
analyzed: tad darśanāt traiguṇyam sarva bhāvānām avasīyate tat yadā sattva upacayaḥ saṃstyāna abhidhānaḥ avagamyate tadā puṃstvam pratīyate rajasaḥ tu upacaye

original: prasave gamyamāne strītvaṃ,

original: tasmād anākāram eva vastu jñānākāra evāyam iti. evaṃ hi pratītibhedadarśanād anekākārakalpanaivāśrayitum ucitā. na tv anākārakalpanety āha  #
analyzed: tasmāt anākāram eva vastu jñāna ākāraḥ eva ayam iti evam hi pratīti bheda darśanāt aneka ākāra kalpanā eva āśrayitum ucitā na tu anākāra kalpanā iti āha
na iti

original: syād etat. santv ekasminn apy aviruddhānekākārāḥ,
analyzed: syāt etat santu ekasmin api a viruddha aneka ākārāḥ

original: iti saṃvitsākṣikaṃ tad yatraiva bhavato viruddhābhimānaḥ tatra saṃvidbalād avirodham

original: eva vakṣyāma ity abhiprāyaḥ. etac cānvāruhyavacanam apekṣya,
analyzed: eva vakṣyāmaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ etat ca anvāruhya vacanam apekṣya

original: bhedāt tv avirodho darśita eveti. bhaved apy anekākāradarśanād ekasyānākārakalpanā yady ekam ekākāram ity atra{2,
analyzed: bhedāt tu avirodhaḥ darśitaḥ evā iti bhavet api aneka ākāra darśanāt ekasya an ākāra kalpanā yadi ekam eka ākāram iti

original: 181}yuktir bhavet. tām antareṇa tv idam īśvarājñātulyam eva bhāṣitaṃ bhavet. tac cāyuktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- ekākāram iti // 219 //
analyzed: bhavet tām antareṇa tu idam īśvara ājñā tulyam eva bhāṣitam bhavet tat ca ayuktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha eka ākāram iti

original: saṃvidekādhīnatā hi vastūnāṃ vyavasthitiḥ. ato yad eva yenātmanā saṃvidā vyavasthāpyate
analyzed: saṃvid eka adhīna tā hi vastūnām vyavasthitiḥ atas yat eva yena ātmanā saṃvidā vyavasthāpyate

original: tat tenaiva rūpeṇābhyupetavyam ity āha -- tathā hīti. kiñcaikatve 'pi vastuno nāsmākam
analyzed: tat tena eva rūpeṇa abhyupetavyam iti āha tathā hi iti kiñca ekatve vastunaḥ na asmākam

original: ekāntavādaḥ yenaivam upālabhyemahi katham ekam anekākāram iti. tad api hy ekānekātmakam
analyzed: ekānta vādaḥ yena evam upālabhyemahi katham ekam aneka ākāram iti tat api hi eka aneka ātmakam

original: evānekāntavādinām asmākam ity āha -- na ceti // 220 //
analyzed: eva anekāntavādinām asmākam iti āha na ca iti  /

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ deśakālāvasthopādhisadbhāvanimittaiḥ pratyayair vidyamānā eva vastvākārā
analyzed: atas siddham deśa kāla avasthā upādhi sadbhāva nimittaiḥ pratyayaiḥ vidyamānāḥ eva vastu ākārā

original: udbhavābhibhavātmakāḥ pṛthag bhedena gṛhyanta ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. deśādayaś
analyzed: udbhava abhibhava ātmakāḥ pṛthak bhedena gṛhyante iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti deśa ādayaḥ

original: cākārodbhavābhibhavadvāreṇa pratyayānāṃ nimittam iti // 221 //

original: ye tarhi yugapad eva grahītṝṇāṃ ghaṭatvādyākārā nirbhāsante tatra katham. na hi ta āpekṣikāḥ,

original: svābhāvikatvābhyupagamāt. uktaṃ ca ghaṭatvapārthivadravyeti. tatra kaḥ parihāraḥ ata āha -- yugapad iti. yady apy atra naupādhikatvān na codbhavābhibhavau,
analyzed: svābhāvika tva abhyupagamāt uktam ca ghaṭa tva pārthiva dravya iti tatra kaḥ parihāraḥ atas āha yugapad iti yadi api atra na aupādhika tvāt na ca udbhava abhibhavau

original: tathāpi nānākāre vastuni yo yasya vastu(?ni/

original: naḥ) (?yo) yasya vastubhāgasya śabdaṃ smarati,

original: sa taṃ vikalpyāmuko 'yam iti jānāti netara iti vyavasthāsiddhir iti // 222 //

original: atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- nityam iti. rūpādayo hi ghaṭe nityaṃ santa{2,

original: tathāpi na sarve sarvair anubhūyante grāhakāṇāṃ cakṣur ādīnāṃ viṣayavyavasthānād iti // 223 /

original: evaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati -- evam iti // 224 //

original: nanu bahir deśam arthaṃ tāvadindriyāṇi na prāpnuvanti aprāpyaprakāśe naivānavasthā. ato na bahissato 'rthasya kathañcid avagatir upapadyate,
analyzed: nanu bahis deśam artham tāvat indriyāṇi na prāpnuvanti a prāpya prakāśe na eva anavasthā atas na bahis sataḥ rthasya kathañcid avagatiḥ upapadyate

original: ata āha -- tasmād iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- siddhaṃ tāvat pratītibalād bāhyālambanaṃ jñānam iti,

original: sa bāhyo 'rthātmā prāpyaivendriyaiḥ prakāśyata ity uktam. prāpyakāritā copapāditā yadi kṛtaṃ na nirvahati kāmaṃ,
analyzed: sa bāhyaḥ rtha ātmā prāpya eva indriyaiḥ prakāśyate iti uktam prāpya kāri tā ca upapāditā yadi kṛtam na nirvahati kāmam

original: tathāpi nānālambanaṃ jñānaṃ,
analyzed: tathā api na anālambanam jñānam

original: savidvirodhāt. aprāpyakāriṇām evendriyāṇāṃ kañcit kāryavaśonnīyamānam atiśayaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ,

original: yadbalenāprāptam api bāhyam arthaṃ prakāśayanti,
analyzed: yad balena aprāptam api bāhyam artham prakāśayanti

original: na punaḥ svāṃśālambanaṃ jñānam iti kalpanā pramāṇavatīti // 225 //

original: yad apy uktaṃ vaktāraś cāpi dṛśyante iti,
analyzed: yat api uktam vaktāraḥ ca api dṛśyante iti

original: tat pariharati -- vadantīti. yad etallaukikā vadanti nīlo 'yam artho yatas tadrūpā matir utpadyate iti,
analyzed: tat pariharati vadanti iti yat etat laukikāḥ vadanti nīlaḥ yam arthaḥ yatas tad rūpā matiḥ utpadyate iti

analyzed: katham nāma vadanti atas āha grāhaka tvena iti vidite khalu nīle svayam vā jāta vicikitsaḥ pramāṇa tathātva niścaya purassaram

original: arthatathātvaṃ niścinoti,
analyzed: artha tathātvam niścinoti

original: nedam anyādṛśaṃ hi jñānaṃ no 'rthānāṃ grāhakaṃ tad yathārthaṃ samarpayati tathāsau tadupādhikatvāt tasya. iha ca prathamaṃ{2,
analyzed: na idam anyādṛśam hi jñānam no rthānām grāhakam tat yathārtham samarpayati tathā asau tad upādhika tvāt tasya iha ca

original: 183}tāvajjñānena nīlaṃ samarpitam. tathaiva cādyayāvadanuvartamānaṃ jñānam asti yannīlam
analyzed: nīlam samarpitam tathā eva ca ādya yāvat anuvartamānam jñānam asti yat nīlam

original: nānena jñānasya pūrvagrahaṇam āpādayituṃ śakyata iti // 227 //
analyzed: na anena jñānasya pūrva grahaṇam āpādayitum śakyate iti

original: evaṃ tāvat parīkṣitā pratyakṣaśaktiḥ. nirṇītaṃ ca yathā bāhya eva pravartituṃ śaktam

original: bāhyārthavādibhiḥ. ataś ca tadabhāvadvārikāṃ jñānānubhavakalpanām atikramya tair

original: syād etat -- bahissantam evārthaṃ laukikā budhyante,

original: parīkṣakās tu yuktito 'vasthāpayitum aśaknuvantaḥ svāṃśālambanatvaṃ saṃvidāṃ pratipadyante ata āha -- yatheti. ayam arthaḥ -- yathā tasyārthasya  #

original: loke buddhir utpadyate,

original: parīkṣakair api tathaiva vācyam. ayathārthaṃ jñānaṃ hi vadanto na parīkṣakā eva bhaveyuḥ. idaṃ tu parīkṣakāṇāṃ tattvaṃ yat pramāṇaśaraṇatvam,

original: asati tasmiṃs tattvahānir eva teṣām iti. laukikāś ca nāntarākāravad bāhyaṃ vastu budhyanta iti. pratītim evānu(?sā/

analyzed: bhavet asmākam iva ātmanaḥ iti

original: tadākṣipati -- utpadyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -{2,
analyzed: tat ākṣipati utpadya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: 184}tad bāhyāpalāpavādinā vaktavyaṃ yat tadabhāvānuguṇam,
iha cotpadyamānāyā buddher arthasya ca grahaṇam ācakṣaṇo nārthābhāvaṃ darśayatīti nedaṃ pūrvapakṣavādino vaktum ucitam iti. syād etat. nedaṃ
analyzed: iha ca utpadyamānāyāḥ buddheḥ arthasya ca grahaṇam ācakṣaṇaḥ na artha abhāvam darśayati iti na idam pūrvapakṣa vādinaḥ vaktum ucitam iti syāt etat na idam

original: kin tv idam arthāntarabhūtam aparam eva buddhāvāgataṃ siddhāntino 'sammatam ity etāvataivocyate
analyzed: kin tu idam artha antara bhūtam aparam eva buddhāvāgatam siddhāntino sammatam iti etāvatā evā ucyate

original: siddhāntāntaram asya dūṣayitum ata āha -- katham iti. pūrvapakṣānaupayikam arthāntaraṃ

original: bruvāṇasya siddhāntāntaradūṣaṇaṃ nigrahasthānam iti bhāvaḥ // 230 //

original: evam ākṣipya samādadhāti -- bāhyeti. idam anena granthena bāhyārthavādinaṃ pūrvapakṣavādī

original: mīmāṃsakaṃ brūte -- kiṃ bhavān bāhyārthagrahaṇasamaye jñānasya pratibandhābhāvaṃ

original: necchati yenārthākāro 'yam iti bravīti. kathaṃ hy apratibandhasyāgrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: na icchati yena artha ākāraḥ yam iti bravīti katham hi a pratibandhasya agrahaṇam bhaviṣyati

original: kathaṃ cānākārasya grahaṇam. ato jñānākārakalpanaiva sādhīyasīty abhiprāyaḥ // 231 //

original: atrottaraṃ bhāṣyaṃ tan na. na hy ajñāte 'rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate. jñāte tv
analyzed: atra uttaram bhāṣyam tat na na hi ajñāte rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate jñāte tv

original: anumānād avagacchatītyādi. tasyām abhiprāyam āha -- uttaram iti. asyārthaḥ -- viditapūrvapakṣavādyabhiprāyaḥ

analyzed: siddhānta vādī vadati satyam utpattau buddheḥ apratibandhaḥ

original: grāhakābhāvāt tu tadānīm agrahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: grāhaka abhāvāt tu tadānīm agrahaṇam

original: tadabhāvaś ca tatkāraṇasya liṅgasya jñātatādipadāspadasyābhāvād iti. anyathotpadyamānaivetyādibhāṣyābhiprāyam
analyzed: tad abhāvaḥ ca tad kāraṇasya liṅgasya jñāta tā ādi pada āspadasya abhāvāt iti anyathā utpadyamānā eva ityādi bhāṣya abhiprāyam

original: āha -- anyeti. anyatarkeṣu sthitvedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇocyate utpadyamānaivetyādi. etad
analyzed: āha anyā iti anya tarkeṣu sthitvā idam bhāṣyakāreṇa ucyate utpadyamānā eva ityādi etat

original: uktaṃ bhavati -- bāhyārthavādyekadeśimatopanyāso 'yaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa kṛtas tannirākaraṇārtham iti // 232 //
analyzed: uktam bhavati bāhya artha vādi eka deśi mata upanyāsaḥ yam bhāṣyakāreṇa kṛtaḥ tad nirākaraṇa artham iti

original: ekadeśimatam evopanyasyati -- te(ṣv iti.)
analyzed: eka deśi matam eva upanyasyati teṣu iti

original: tarkāntareṣv arthajñānakāla eva jñānam avagamyata itīṣyate. evaṃ hi manyante svaprakāśam eva vijñānam{2,
analyzed: tarka antareṣu artha jñāna kāle eva jñānam avagamyate iti iṣyate evam hi manyante sva prakāśam eva

original: 185}ātmānaṃ viṣayaṃ ca vyavasthāpayatīti. etac cāsmābhiḥ prāg eva prapañcitam iti.
analyzed: viṣayam ca vyavasthāpayati iti etat ca asmābhiḥ prāk eva prapañcitam iti

original: yady evaṃ kim asya nirākaraṇe prayojanam. evam api dvaitaṃ sidhyaty evāta āha --
analyzed: yadi evam kim asya nirākaraṇe prayojanam evam api dvaitam sidhyati eva atas āha

original: tatheti. yadi hi samasamayam ubhayam upalabhyata ity āśrīyate,
analyzed: tathā iti yadi hi sama samayam ubhayam upalabhyate iti āśrīyate

original: tato buddher anākārāyā boddhum aśakyatvād ekākāropalambhāc ca ekam eva sākāraṃ bhavet
analyzed: tatas buddheḥ anākārāyāḥ boddhum aśakya tvāt eka ākāra upalambhāt ca ekam eva sa ākāram bhavet

original: sahopalambhaniyamāc cābhedaḥ parokto nāpākartuṃ śakyate. tatrārthanāśa evāpadyeta.
analyzed: saha upalambha niyamāt ca abhedaḥ para uktaḥ na apākartum śakyate tatra artha nāśaḥ eva āpadyeta

original: na hy abhyupagamamātreṇārthaḥ sidhyatīty etan matanirākaraṇaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇopadiśyata iti // 233 //
analyzed: na hi abhyupagama mātreṇa arthaḥ sidhyati iti etat mata nirākaraṇam bhāṣyakāreṇa upadiśyate iti

original: aparam api -- nanūtpannāyām eva buddhāv artho jñāta ity ucyate nānutpannāyām. ataḥ pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate paścād jñāto 'rtha iti bhāṣyaṃ,
analyzed: aparam api nanu utpannāyām eva buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti ucyate na anutpannāyām atas pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate paścāt jñātaḥ rthaḥ iti bhāṣyam

original: tadākṣipati -- nanv itīti. paricodanā hi nāmāniṣṭāpādanena bhavati. na cedam aniṣṭaṃ
analyzed: tat ākṣipati nanu iti iti paricodanā hi nāma aniṣṭa āpādanena bhavati na ca idam aniṣṭam

original: mīmāṃsakasya yad utpannāyāṃ buddhāv artho jñāta iti. tasmād anupapannā paricodaneti.
analyzed: mīmāṃsakasya yat utpannāyām buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti tasmāt anupapannā paricodanā iti

original: pūrvaṃ buddhir bhavati paścād jñāto 'rtha iti ca paurvāparyābhidhānaṃ pūrvoktena
analyzed: pūrvam buddhiḥ bhavati paścāt jñātaḥ rthaḥ iti ca paurvāparya abhidhānam pūrva uktena

original: yugapadupalambhena virudhyate ity āha -- paurvāparyeti. utpadyamānaivāsāv ityādinā
analyzed: yugapad upalambhena virudhyate iti āha paurvāparya iti utpadyamānā eva asau ityādinā

original: bhāṣyeṇa yugapad jñānārthayor upalambho 'bhihitaḥ. tat katham idānīṃ paurvāparyam

original: yuktaḥ katham adya yāvadavasthā(?pya/

original: sya)te. ayaṃ cārtho jñāta iti niṣṭhārthabhūtakālāśrayaṇena bhāṣyakāreṇoktaḥ. ato na kaścit pūrvāparavirodha iti,

analyzed: eva buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati iti

analyzed: vyavahāri

original: loke hi niyāmyaikadeśadarśana eva niyāmakaikadeśajñānam anumānam iti prasiddham iti.

original: asty api hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaikadeśo labhyate. api cāsannikṛṣṭe 'rtha iti vadati.

original: na ca vyāpakadṛśas sāhacaryamātrāt vyāpyasmṛtir asannikṛṣṭaviṣayā. pūrvapramāṇānadhikārthāviṣayatvāt

original: smṛteḥ. vyāpyād eva tv anubhūtapūrvaniyamād vyāpakaviśiṣṭaḥ parvatādir avagamyate.

original: ata upapanno viśiṣṭaikadeśalābha iti. yat tu jñātasambandhasyaikadeśasyety atra ṣaṣṭhyā

original: anityatāyā hetur iti vyavahāraḥ. vyāpikā cānityatā kṛtakatvasya. tasmād aviśeṣitopādāne

original: 'pi vyākhyānatas sambandhaviśeṣād (eka)
analyzed: vyākhyānataḥ sambandha viśeṣāt eka

original: deśaviśeṣalābho nānupapannaḥ. bhavati hi vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattir na tu sandehād alakṣaṇam iti sūktaṃ pramātā jñātasambandha iti.
analyzed: deśa viśeṣa lābhaḥ na anupapannaḥ bhavati hi vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣa pratipattiḥ na tu sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti su uktam pramātā jñāta sambandhaḥ iti

original: {3,5} vyākhyānāntaram āha -- ekadeśīti. ekadeśau hi naikadeśinam antareṇa syātām iti ākṣiptasyaikadeśino yuktam anyapadārthatvam.
analyzed: vyākhyāna antaram āha eka deśi iti eka deśau hi na ekadeśinam antareṇa syātām iti ākṣiptasya ekadeśinaḥ yuktam anya padārtha tvam

original: nanv evaṃ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśino ya ekadeśas tasyaikadeśasya darśanād ity ucyamāne
analyzed: nanu evam jñāta sambandhasya eka deśinaḥ yaḥ eka deśaḥ tasya eka deśasya darśanāt iti ucyamāne

original: sa eva darśanopasarjanatvād ekadeśasyaikadeśinaḥ sambandhas sambandhiviśeṣāpekṣasya
analyzed: saḥ eva darśana upasarjana tvāt eka deśasya eka deśinaḥ sambandhaḥ sambandhi viśeṣa apekṣasya

original: vā samāsadoṣaḥ prasajyate. bhaved etad evam. yady ekadeśavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī syāt.
analyzed: vā samāsa doṣaḥ prasajyate bhavet etat evam yadi eka deśa vyatireka janitā ṣaṣṭhī syāt

original: iyaṃ tv ekadeśadarśanavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī tad api paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa
analyzed: iyam tu eka deśa darśana vyatireka janitā ṣaṣṭhī tat api paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa

original: ityādi darśayitavyam. ato na tāvat pratyakṣā vyāptiḥ. na cānumānikī. pramāṇābhāvād

original: na ca sahitāvadhāritayor asatyāṃ vyāptau kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma.
analyzed: na ca sahita avadhāritayoḥ asatyām vyāptau kiñcid anupapannam nāma

analyzed: abhāva pramāṇikā na syāt eva

analyzed: niyamyeta katham asatā niyamyate iti ced kaḥ doṣaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ hi niyamaḥ

original: atraivodāharaṇam āha -- kṛttikodayam iti. yatra hi kṛttikodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā rohiṇyāsattiḥ kathyate -- anantaram udeṣyati rohiṇīti,
analyzed: atra eva udāharaṇam āha kṛttikā udayam iti yatra hi kṛttikā udayam dṛṣṭvā rohiṇī āsattiḥ kathyate anantaram udeṣyati rohiṇī iti

original: tasminn anumāne viśeṣasyaiva viśeṣeṇa vyāptiḥ. na hi tayos sāmānyam asti. vyaktibhede pramāṇābhāvāt. pratyabhijñāyate hi saiveyaṃ kṛttikā,
analyzed: tasmin anumāne viśeṣasya eva viśeṣeṇa vyāptiḥ na hi tayoḥ sāmānyam asti vyakti bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyabhijñāyate hi sā eva iyam kṛttikā

original: saiveyaṃ rohiṇīti. katham anyā bhaviṣyati. atas siddhaṃ viśeṣayor evātra vyāptir iti.

original: yadi tarhi vyāptir anumānāṅgam,

original: asti khalv asau hiṃsātvasyādharmatvena bāhyahiṃsāsv ity ataḥ kratāv api hiṃsātvād adharmatvam anumīyate. tatra{3,

original: anupāttatvāt. na hy atraikadeśī kenacicchabdenopāttaḥ. atas tadanupādānān nyūnaṃ

original: lakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha -- upātta iti. yady api svaśabdena naikadeśyupāttas tathāpy
analyzed: lakṣaṇam iti āśaṅkya āha upāttaḥ iti yadi api sva śabdena na ekadeśi upāttaḥ tathā api

original: ekadeśaśabdābhyām evārthād ākṣipyata iti na nyūnatvadoṣa iti // 23 //
analyzed: eka deśa śabdābhyām eva arthāt ākṣipyate iti na nyūna tva doṣaḥ iti

original: arthākṣepe kāraṇam āha -- aparārtha iti. na hi dhūmādisvarūpamātram aparārthībhūtam
analyzed: artha ākṣepe kāraṇam āha apara arthaḥ iti na hi dhūma ādi svarūpa mātram aparārthībhūtam

original: ekadeśapadāspadaṃ bhavati. na ca parasparāpekṣayaikadeśavācoyuktir upapadyate. na
analyzed: eka deśa pada āspadam bhavati na ca paraspara apekṣayā eka deśa vācoyuktiḥ upapadyate na

original: hy agnyaikadeśo dhūma iti kasyacit pratipattir asti. na cāgṛhīte 'gnau tadekadeśatayā
analyzed: hi agni aika deśaḥ dhūmaḥ iti kasyacid pratipattiḥ asti na ca agṛhīte gnau tad eka deśa tayā

original: dhūmo 'vagantuṃ śakyate. gṛhīte ca tasminn anumeyābhāvaḥ. ata ekadeśatvānupapattyaiva
analyzed: dhūmaḥ vagantum śakyate gṛhīte ca tasmin anumeya abhāvaḥ atas eka deśa tva anupapattyā eva

original: tadāśrayaḥ kaścid ekadeśy avagamyata iti siddham iti // 23 //
analyzed: tad āśrayaḥ kaścid eka deśī avagamyate iti siddham iti

original: nanv ākṣipyatām ekadeśaśabdābhyām ekadeśī. tad ekatvaṃ tu kuto vagamyate. ataḥ kvacid
analyzed: nanu ākṣipyatām eka deśa śabdābhyām eka deśī tat eka tvam tu kutas atas kvacid

original: eva dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kvacid ekadeśyantare 'numānaṃ na syāt. aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tv ekadeśayor na sidhyati,
analyzed: eva dhūmam dṛṣṭvā kvacid eka deśi antare numānam na syāt aikādhikaraṇyam tu eka deśayoḥ na sidhyati

original: anupādānād ity ata āha -- sa eveti. pūrvaprakṛtam ekadeśavān iti vivakṣitaikasaṅkhyam
analyzed: anupādānāt iti atas āha saḥ eva iti pūrva prakṛtam eka deśavān iti vivakṣita eka saṅkhyam

original: ekadeśinaṃ pratyavamṛśati sa eveti. sa khalv eka evaikadeśī gamyagamakarūpaḥ ubhayātmakatvāt.
analyzed: ekadeśinam pratyavamṛśati saḥ eva iti sa khalu ekaḥ eva ekadeśī gamya gamaka rūpaḥ ubhaya ātmaka tvāt

original: tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇātmānau staḥ,
analyzed: tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇa ātmānau staḥ

original: yaddvirūpatvam arhati. nanv ekatvaṃ naikadeśino 'nupāttaṃ labhyata ity uktam. na. jñātasambandhasyety ekavacanenaivopādānāt. ekadeśini hy anyapadā(?
analyzed: yat dvi rūpa tvam arhati nanu eka tvam na eka deśinaḥ labhyate iti uktam na jñāta sambandhasya iti ekavacanena eva upādānāt eka deśini hi anya padā

original: rthaikasyai/
analyzed: rtha ekasyai

original: rthe e)katvam ekavacanenopāttaṃ,
analyzed: rthe eka tvam eka vacanena upāttam

original: pramātṛpakṣe 'pi prathamoccaritenaikadeśaśabdena svāśraya ekadeśiny ākṣipte dvitīyāpekṣākṣaṇe
analyzed: pramātṛ pakṣe pi prathama uccaritena eka deśa śabdena sva āśraye eka deśini ākṣipte dvitīya apekṣā akṣaṇe

original: 'pi sa eva buddhau viparivartamānas tadāśrayatvenāvagamyate nānyaḥ. tatparityāge kāraṇābhāvāt,
analyzed: saḥ eva buddhau viparivartamānaḥ tad āśraya tvena avagamyate na anyaḥ tad parityāge kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: tathā vyutpattidarśanāc ca. yathā devadattasyaikatra kare kaṅkaṇam aṅgulīyakaṃ karāntara
analyzed: tathā vyutpatti darśanāt ca yathā devadattasya ekatra kare kaṅkaṇam aṅgulīyakam kara antara

original: iti na bhinnaḥ karāśrayo 'vagamyate. api tarhi devadatta eka eva. atas siddham eka
analyzed: iti na bhinnaḥ kara āśrayaḥ vagamyate api tarhi devadattaḥ ekaḥ eva atas siddham eka

original: evaikadeśī gamyagamakarūpa iti // 24 //
analyzed: eva eka deśī gamya gamaka rūpaḥ iti

original: {3,25} ubhayātmā san gamyagamaka ity uktam. tāv evobhayātmānau darśayati -- asiddheneti. yadi hy asāv ekadeśyasiddha eva syāt siddho vā,
analyzed: ubhaya ātmā san gamya gamakaḥ iti uktam tau eva ubhaya ātmānau darśayati asiddhena iti yadi hi asau eka deśya siddhaḥ eva syāt siddhaḥ vā

original: tadā na dvirūpatāṃ labhate. sa tu dhūmavadādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣasiddho 'gnimadādinā
analyzed: tadā na dvi rūpa tām labhate sa tu dhūmavat ādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣa siddhaḥ gnimat ādinā

original: cāsiddha iti dvyātmakatvād ubhayopapattir iti. āha -- astv arthād upātta ekadeśī.
analyzed: ca asiddhaḥ iti dvi ātmaka tvāt ubhaya upapattiḥ iti āha astu arthāt upāttaḥ eka deśī

original: sa caiko gamyo gamaka iti. sa tu kathaṃ pramātṛbhir upādātavya iti. na ca tadupādānaprakāraḥ
analyzed: sa ca ekaḥ gamyaḥ gamakaḥ iti sa tu katham pramātṛbhiḥ upādātavyaḥ iti na ca tad upādāna prakāraḥ

original: kaścid bhāṣyakāreṇopāttaḥ. ataḥ punar api nyūnatvam ity ata āha -- ātta iti. tatra
analyzed: kaścid bhāṣyakāreṇa upāttaḥ atas punar api nyūna tvam iti atas āha āttaḥ iti tatra

original: nāma viśeṣopādānam āśrīyate,
analyzed: nāma viśeṣa upādānam āśrīyate

original: yatra viśeṣavivakṣā. na tv iha viśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ. sa hy ekadeśī pramātṛvivakṣāvaśena pṛthagabhinno vaikadeśaśabdābhyām upātto bhavatu. ubhayathānumānavyavahāradarśanād  #
analyzed: yatra viśeṣa vivakṣā na tu iha viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sa hi eka deśī pramātṛ vivakṣā vaśena pṛthak abhinnaḥ vā eka deśa śabdābhyām upāttaḥ bhavatu ubhayathā anumāna vyavahāra darśanāt
iti

original: tam evobhayathā vyavahāraṃ darśayati -- anitya iti. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ // 26 //
analyzed: tam eva ubhayathā vyavahāram darśayati anityaḥ iti nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ

original: ekadeśī gamyo gamako bhedābhedābhyām upātta iti darśitam. kiyati punar anumānasya
analyzed: eka deśī gamyaḥ gamakaḥ bheda abhedābhyām upāttaḥ iti darśitam kiyati punar anumānasya

original: vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. bhavati hi viśiṣṭārthapratītāv api viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ bhavati hi viśiṣṭa artha pratītau api viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi

original: pramāṇam. yathā śabdaḥ. sa khalv ākṛtiviśiṣṭāyāṃ vyaktau dhiyam ādadhāti,
analyzed: pramāṇam yathā śabdaḥ sa khalu ākṛti viśiṣṭāyām vyaktau dhiyam ādadhāti

original: atha cānvayavyatirekābhyām ākṛtimātraparyavasāyīti niścīyate. tad ihāpi yadi tadvad eva viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi pramāṇam iṣyate,
analyzed: atha ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām ākṛti mātra paryavasāyi iti niścīyate tat iha api yadi tadvat eva viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi pramāṇam iṣyate

original: tatas siddhasādhyatvam. siddhaṃ hi sambandhajñānakāle 'gnimātram. kiṃ tadanumānena.
analyzed: tatas siddha sādhya tvam siddham hi sambandha jñāna kāle gni mātram kim tad anumānena

original: yadi tu dvikhaṇḍadaṇḍyādiśabdavadviśiṣṭam evānumānaṃ gocarayatītīṣyate. tatra sambandhagrahaṇābhāvād a(na)
analyzed: yadi tu dvi khaṇḍa daṇḍi ādi śabda vat viśiṣṭam eva anumānam gocarayati iti iṣyate tatra sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt

original: numeyatvam. na hy agnimadviśeṣeṇa parvatādinānvito dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ. na ca samastāgnimatsādhāraṇaṃ{3,
analyzed: numeya tvam na hi agnimat viśeṣeṇa parvata ādinā anvitaḥ dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca

original: 26}sāmānyaṃ kiñcit samasti. tadbhāve 'pi punar api siddhasādhyataiva. ata evāhuḥ --
analyzed: kiñcid samasti tad bhāve pi punar api siddha sādhya tā eva atas eva āhuḥ

original: anumābhaṅgapaṅke 'smin nimagnā vādidantinaḥ /
analyzed: an umā bhaṅga paṅke smin nimagnāḥ vādi dantinaḥ

original: viśeṣe 'nugamābhāvas sāmānye siddhasādhyatā //
analyzed: viśeṣe nugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhya tā

original: ity ata āha -- ekadeśeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- daṇḍyādiśabdavad viśiṣṭaviṣayam evānumānam.
analyzed: iti atas āha eka deśa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ daṇḍi ādi śabda vat viśiṣṭa viṣayam eva anumānam

original: na ca sambandhagrahaṇābhāvaḥ. sakalopādhiparityāgena dhūmavanmātrasyāgnimattayā sambandhāvagamād
analyzed: na ca sambandha grahaṇa abhāvaḥ sakala upādhi parityāgena dhūmavat mātrasya agnimat tayā sambandha avagamāt

original: ity uktam asmābhiḥ. asaty api sāmānye kenacid ekenopādhinānantānām api bhāvānāṃ sambandho
analyzed: iti uktam asmābhiḥ asati api sāmānye kenacid ekena upādhinā anantānām api bhāvānām sambandhaḥ

original: gṛhyata eva. yady api dhūmavān agnimān iti sāmānyato 'vagatam,
analyzed: gṛhyate eva yadi api dhūmavān agnimān iti sāmānyatas vagatam

original: tathāpy ayam asāv iti viśeṣarūpeṇa pratyabhijñānāt pramāṇaviṣayatvam apy upapannam ity uktam eveti. kasmāt punarviśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyy eva  #
analyzed: tathā api ayam asau iti viśeṣa rūpeṇa pratyabhijñānāt pramāṇa viṣaya tvam api upapannam iti uktam eva iti kasmāt punar viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi eva

original: pramāṇaṃ neṣyate,
analyzed: pramāṇam na iṣyate

original: ata āha -- na hīti // 27 //
analyzed: atas āha na hi iti

original: asambhavam eva darśayati -- na dharmeti. dharmamātraṃ hi sambandhagrahaṇakāle siddham
analyzed: asambhavam eva darśayati na dharma iti dharma mātram hi sambandha grahaṇa kāle siddham

original: iti bhavataivoktam iti. evam eva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā
analyzed: iti bhavatā eva uktam iti evam eva dharmi mātra anumāne svatantra ubhaya anumāne vā siddha sādhya tā

original: darśayitavyety āha -- tatheti // 28 //
analyzed: darśayitavyā iti āha tathā iti

original: dharmadharmyubhayeṣv evānumeyeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dūṣaṇāntarāṇy āha -- ekadeśasyeti // 29 //
analyzed: dharma dharmi ubhayeṣu eva anumeyeṣu yathāsaṅkhyam dūṣaṇa antarāṇi āha eka deśasya iti

original: {3,27} etad eva vivṛṇoti -- anityatvādaya iti. pakṣaikadeśo hi liṅgaṃ bahvati. na
analyzed: etat eva vivṛṇoti anitya tva ādayaḥ iti pakṣa eka deśaḥ hi liṅgam bahu ati na

original: cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti katham apakṣadharmo
analyzed: ca anitya tva ākhyasya dharmasya svatantra pakṣīkṛtasya kṛtaka tvam dharmaḥ iti katham

original: liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati. evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi svatantre pakṣīkṛte na kṛtakatvasya tenānugamaś
analyzed: liṅgam bhaviṣyati evam dhvani mātre svatantre pakṣīkṛte na kṛtaka tvasya tena anugamaḥ

original: śakyo darśayitum. na hi yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvanir iti niyamas sambhavati.
analyzed: śakyaḥ darśayitum na hi yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra tatra dhvaniḥ iti niyamaḥ sambhavati

original: tathobhayasya dhvanyanityatvātmakasyobhayena pakṣadharmatvānugamātmakena na sambandha
analyzed: tathā ubhayasya dhvanya nitya tva ātmakasya ubhayena pakṣa dharma tva anugama ātmakena na sambandha

original: ity anāgataṃ sambandhaśabdaṃ pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyeti.
analyzed: iti anāgatam sambandha śabdam pūrva aparābhyām sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā iti

original: samadhigataṃ tāvad dharmadharmyubhayeṣāṃ vyastasamastānāṃ na sādhyatvam iti // 30 //
analyzed: samadhigatam tāvat dharma dharmī ubhayeṣām vyasta samastānām na sādhya tvam iti

original: atha kasmād dharmadharmisambandha eva sādhyo na bhavatīty ata āha -- sambandha iti.
analyzed: atha kasmāt dharma dharmi sambandhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ na bhavati iti atas āha sambandhaḥ iti

original: mitāv iti sādhanavākyam apadiśati. na khalu parīkṣakas sādhanavākye sambandhavācinā
analyzed: mitau iti sādhana vākyam apadiśati na khalu parīkṣakaḥ sādhana vākye sambandha vācinā

original: kenacin nāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate. na hy evaṃ prayujyate,
analyzed: kenacid nāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandhaḥ upādīyate na hi evam prayujyate

original: agniparvatayor asti sambandhaḥ dhūmavattvād iti. nāpi parvatasyāgnir iti. deśam eva tv agnyādinā viśiṣṭam anumimānā dṛśyante. yad evaṃ prayuñjate,
analyzed: agni parvatayoḥ asti sambandhaḥ dhūmavat tvāt iti nā api parvatasya agniḥ iti deśam eva tu agni ādinā viśiṣṭam anumimānāḥ dṛśyante yat evam prayuñjate

original: agnimān parvata iti. sambandho 'pi nānumīyata ity atītena sambandha iti. na paraṃ pratijñāyāṃ nopādīyate,
analyzed: agnimān parvataḥ iti sambandhaḥ u pi na anumīyate iti atītena sambandhaḥ iti na param pratijñāyām na upādīyate

original: udāharaṇe 'pi na tenānugamo liṅgasya nirdiśyate. na hi bhavati darśanaṃ,
analyzed: udāharaṇe na tena anugamaḥ liṅgasya nirdiśyate na hi bhavati darśanam

original: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatrāgnisambandha iti. bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so gnimān iti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ,
analyzed: yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agni sambandhaḥ iti bhavati tu yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa saḥ gnimān iti deśaḥ eva nidarśanam

original: tad etad āha -- na cāpīti. iheti mitiṃ pratyavamṛśati. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- na sādhanavākye
analyzed: tat etat āha na ca api iti iha iti mitim pratyavamṛśati etat uktam bhavati na sādhana vākye

original: sambandhas sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā nirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sādhya tayā upādīyate nā api dṛṣṭānta tayā nirdiśyate na ca ayathā pratibhāsam

original: parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktum ucitam iti // 31 //
analyzed: parīkṣakāṇām vaktum ucitam iti

original: {3,28} api cāyaṃ sambandhas sādhyamānas sanmātratayā vā sādhyate,
analyzed: api ca ayam sambandhaḥ sādhyamānaḥ sat mātra tayā vā sādhyate

original: kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ. na tāvad vastusattāmātram anumānasya viṣayaḥ. na ca parvatādivat siddhasādhyarūpam ākāradvayaṃ sambandho vahati,
analyzed: kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ na tāvat vastu sattā mātram anumānasya viṣayaḥ na ca parvata ādi vat siddha sādhya rūpam ākāra dvayam sambandhaḥ vahati

original: yenānumānasya viṣayo bhavet. tasmān na kathañcit sambandhas sādhya ity āha -- na ceti. nanv asati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate.  #
analyzed: yena anumānasya viṣayaḥ bhavet tasmāt na kathañcid sambandhaḥ sādhyaḥ iti āha na ca iti nanu asati sambandhe viśiṣṭaḥ eva sādhayitum na śakyate

original: nāsti nāma sa prakāraḥ,
analyzed: na asti nāma sa prakāraḥ

original: yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatas tadviśiṣṭo bhavatīty ata āha -- tasmād iti vyāntena. na(nu)
analyzed: yat asambandhyamānaḥ eva agninā parvataḥ tad viśiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti atas āha tasmāt iti vyāntena nanu

original: satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati,
analyzed: satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭaḥ na bhavati

original: na tv etāvatā sambandhasādhyatā sidhyati,
analyzed: na tu etāvatā sambandha sādhya tā sidhyati

original: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tv arthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā
analyzed: viśiṣṭa sādhyatva anyathā anupapattyā eva tu artha gṛhītā matup arthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā

original: na punaḥ svatantrasyeti. atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha -- yatheti. daṇḍyādiśabdā hi daṇḍādiviśiṣṭam
analyzed: na punar svatantrasya iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ hi daṇḍa ādi viśiṣṭam

original: evābhidadhānās sambandham apy arthād upādadate,
analyzed: eva abhidadhānāḥ sambandham api arthāt upādadate

original: na tv abhidadhati. tadvad ihāpi parvato 'gnimān iti sādhyamāne 'rthagṛhīto 'gnisambandhaḥ,
analyzed: na tu abhidadhati tadvat iha api parvataḥ gnimān iti sādhyamāne rtha gṛhītaḥ gni sambandhaḥ

original: na punas sa eva sādhyate. yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako bhavati,
analyzed: na punar saḥ eva sādhyate yathā daṇḍi ādi śabdataḥ viśiṣṭa artha pratītau satyām sambandhaḥ nāntarīyakaḥ bhavati

original: evam atrāpi viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne nuniṣpādī bhavatīty arthaḥ.
analyzed: evam atra api viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: idaṃ tu cintanīyam. kathaṃ daṇḍyādiśabdā viśiṣṭavacanā iti. matvarthīyapratyayāntā hi te. sa cāsyāsmin nāstīti sambandhe smaryate,
analyzed: idam tu cintanīyam katham daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ viśiṣṭa vacanāḥ iti matvarthīya pratyaya antāḥ hi te sa ca asya asmin na asti iti sambandhe smaryate

original: atas sambandha evātra pratyayārthaḥ. sa ca pradhānaḥ. prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ

original: hetus tv aviśiṣṭa eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyata ity uktam. tatrāviśeṣita eva prayukte
analyzed: hetuḥ tu aviśiṣṭaḥ eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyate iti uktam tatra aviśeṣite eva prayukte

original: bhavati pradhānabhūtadharmasambandhāśaṅketi. yas tu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ
analyzed: bhavati pradhāna bhūta dharma sambandha āśaṅkā iti yaḥ tu vadati ṣaṣṭhī antena dhvaninā anitya tvam

original: viśeṣyate dhvaner anityatvam iti. evaṃ ca kṛtakatvād ity asyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena
analyzed: viśeṣyate dhvaneḥ anitya tvam iti evam ca kṛtaka tvāt iti asya avipariṇata vibhaktikena

original: dhvaninaiva sambandhaḥ sphuṭo bhavati. dharmasambandha eva yathāvad vibhaktivipariṇāmena
analyzed: dhvaninā eva sambandhaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhavati dharma sambandhaḥ eva yathāvat vibhakti vipariṇāmena

original: syāt. sa cānyāyya iti sa vaktavyaḥ. nirākṛto 'yaṃ pakṣo vārtikakṛtaiva --
analyzed: syāt sa ca anyāyyaḥ iti sa vaktavyaḥ nirākṛtaḥ yam pakṣaḥ vārtikakṛtā eva

original: sambandho 'py anupādānān nāmnā ṣaṣṭhy api vā mitau
analyzed: sambandhaḥ u pi an upādānāt nāmnā ṣaṣṭhī api vā mitau

original: iti. ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet. tasya ca sādhyatā nirākṛtaiva. viśiṣṭasādhyapakṣa eva sthitvā dharmiviśiṣṭatā adharmasyedānīṃ{3,
analyzed: iti ṣaṣṭhī nirdeśe hi sambandhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ bhavet tasya ca sādhya tā nirākṛtā eva viśiṣṭa sādhya pakṣe eva sthitvā dharmi viśiṣṭa tā

original: 33}nirākriyate. kim atra sambandhasādhyatvaṃ punar upakṣipyate. tadalam anena bālabhāṣiteneti // 38 //
analyzed: kim atra sambandha sādhya tvam punar upakṣipyate tat alam anena bāla bhāṣitena iti

original: api ca agner deśaviśiṣṭatve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇasamastapakṣaprakārāṇām asambhavo
analyzed: api ca agneḥ deśa viśiṣṭa tve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇa samasta pakṣa prakārāṇām

original: 'pīty āha -- agner iti. dūṣaṇāntarasamuccaye cakāraḥ. etad iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇapratinirdeśa
analyzed: pi iti āha agneḥ iti dūṣaṇa antara samuccaye cakāraḥ etat iti vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇa pratinirdeśa

original: iti. tān eva pakṣaprakārān vaktuṃ saṃkṣipya pratijānīte -- viśiṣṭeti // 39 //
analyzed: iti tān eva pakṣa prakārān vaktum saṃkṣipya pratijānīte viśiṣṭa iti

original: idānīṃ vibhajya tān eva darśayati -- yo 'gnir itītyantena. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ.
analyzed: idānīm vibhajya tān eva darśayati yaḥ gniḥ iti iti antena nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ

original: vivekas tu pakṣāṇāṃ praṇihitair avagamyata iti. ihacādyayor dvayoḥ pakṣayos siddhasādhyatā
analyzed: vivekaḥ tu pakṣāṇām praṇihitaiḥ avagamyate iti iha ca ādyayoḥ dvayoḥ pakṣayoḥ siddha sādhya tā

original: doṣaḥ. siddho hi kvacid agniḥ,
analyzed: doṣaḥ siddhaḥ hi kvacid agniḥ

original: dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇas siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)
analyzed: dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ pūrva deśa adhikaraṇaḥ siddhaḥ eva kim tat

original: dhānena. pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ity āha -- iha tv iti. siddhasādhyatā suprakāśaiva // 40 -- 42 //
analyzed: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ iti āha iha tu iti siddha sādhya tā su prakāśā eva

original: virodhaṃ prapañcayati -- vyāptir iti. yat tāvat yo 'gniḥ so 'nena yukta ity uktaṃ
analyzed: virodham prapañcayati  vyāptiḥ iti yat tāvat yaḥ gniḥ saḥ nena yuktaḥ iti uktam

original: tad ayuktam. na hy anena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt,
analyzed: tat ayuktam na hi anena deśena sarva agnayaḥ vyāpyante deśasya avaibhavāt sarva agnīnām ca atra asannidhānāt

original: tadbhāvo hy atrābhāvena virudhyata iti // 42 //
analyzed: tad bhāvaḥ hi atra abhāvena virudhyate iti

original: {3,34} yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yad uktaṃ tad dūṣayati -- nāpi pūrvasyeti. dṛṣṭasyāpy
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ nena saḥ yat uktam tat dūṣayati na api pūrvasya iti dṛṣṭasya api

original: agner anena deśena vyāptir na vidyata ity arthaḥ. yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇety atra dūṣaṇam
analyzed: agneḥ anena deśena vyāptiḥ na vidyate iti arthaḥ yaḥ yam sa deśa mātreṇa iti atra dūṣaṇam

original: āha -- nāpīti deśairantena. na hy eṣa puraḥsthito vahniḥ sarvair deśair viśeṣyate
analyzed: āha na api iti deśaiḥ antena na hi eṣa puras sthitaḥ vahniḥ sarvaiḥ deśaiḥ viśeṣyate

original: sarvatra tasyābhāvād iti. pūrveṇa vāpy ayam ity atra virodham āha -- pūrveṇeti. pūrveṇa
analyzed: sarvatra tasya abhāvāt iti pūrveṇa vā api ayam iti atra virodham āha pūrveṇa iti pūrveṇa

original: deśenāsyāgner viśeṣyatā nāsty eva,
analyzed: deśena asya agneḥ viśeṣya tā na asti eva

original: pūrvadeśasyātrābhāvāt,
analyzed: pūrva deśasya atra abhāvāt

original: asya ca tatra. pūrvānubhūtasya tv agner deśamātreṇa sambandhaḥ puraḥsthitavahneḥ
analyzed: asya ca tatra pūrva anubhūtasya tu agneḥ deśa mātreṇa sambandhaḥ puras sthita vahneḥ

original: sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti // 43 //
analyzed: sarva deśa sambandha nirākaraṇena eva tulya nyāya tayā nirākṛtaḥ iti na pṛthak upanyasya dūṣitaḥ iti

original: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣv aṣṭamaḥ pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etad deśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yam
analyzed: evam saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣu aṣṭamaḥ pakṣaḥ etat deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā yaḥ yam

original: agnir iti tannirākaroti -- etad iti. ayaṃ puraḥsthito 'gnir anena deśena viśiṣṭa
analyzed: agniḥ iti tat nirākaroti etat iti ayam puras sthitaḥ gniḥ anena deśena viśiṣṭa

analyzed: iti nā etat sādhayitum śakyam na hi apratyakṣa deśaḥ vahniḥ ayam iti nirdeṣṭum śakyaḥ

original: nitarāṃ viśiṣṭatayā sādhayitum. yas tu vadati smṛta eva vahnir anena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyata iti,
analyzed: nitarām viśiṣṭatayā sādhayitum yaḥ tu vadati smṛtaḥ eva vahniḥ anena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyate iti

original: sa vaktavyaḥ. svadeśakālavartty eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham asāv anena deśena
analyzed: sa vaktavyaḥ sva deśa kāla varttī eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham asau anena deśena

original: viśeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ. tad evaṃvādinā nāpi pūrvasyety api nālocitam. anavacchinnasmṛtāv
analyzed: viśeṣṭum śakyaḥ tat evaṃvādinā nā api pūrvasya iti api na ālocitam anavacchinna smṛtau

original: api ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇam iti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam. dharmāṇāṃ dharmiviśeṣaṇatayaiva
analyzed: api ca dharmaḥ dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam iti nā idam yukti sādhyam dharmāṇām dharmi viśeṣaṇa tayā eva

original: sarvadāvagater ity alam aneneti. deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatām arhatīty abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: sarvadā avagateḥ iti alam anena iti deśaḥ eva tu pūrva avagataḥ viśeṣya tām arhati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: -- agner iti // 44 -- 45 //
analyzed: agneḥ iti

original: yadi cāgnir viśeṣyo bhavet tatas tasyaivāyam ādyo jñānakālo bhavet,
analyzed: yadi ca agniḥ viśeṣyaḥ bhavet tatas tasya eva ayam ādyaḥ jñāna kālaḥ bhavet

original: prasiddhasyāprasiddhena viśeṣaṇāt. iha tv ādau parvata eva jñāyate. katham asau paścāt
analyzed: prasiddhasya a prasiddhena viśeṣaṇāt iha tu ādau parvataḥ eva jñāyate katham asau paścāt

original: pratyeṣyamāṇasyāgner viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tajjñāneti. tadvṛttenāgniṃ nirdiśati.
analyzed: pratyeṣyamāṇasya agneḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavati iti āha tad jñāna iti tad vṛttena agnim nirdiśati

original: agner jñānakāle hi sa eva deśo buddhaḥ,
analyzed: agneḥ jñāna kāle hi saḥ eva deśaḥ buddhaḥ

original: nāgniḥ,
analyzed: na agniḥ

original: ataḥ kasya{3,
analyzed: a taḥ

original: 35}deśo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kīdṛgdharmo 'yam iti. tathā ca deśa iti sa eva pramitsyate,
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam bhavati pramitam hi vastu apramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitam bhavati kīdṛś dharmaḥ yam iti tathā ca deśaḥ iti saḥ eva pramitsyate

original: pramīyate ca,
analyzed: pramīyate ca

original: na punaragnir iti. nanu deśo 'pi pratyakṣāvagata eveti katham asāv anumānasya viṣayo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- deśasyeti. svarūpamātram eva hi  #
analyzed: na punar agniḥ iti nanu pratyakṣa avagataḥ eva iti katham asau anumānasya viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha deśasya iti svarūpa mātram eva hi

original: deśasya pratyakṣeṇāvagatam,
analyzed: deśasya pratyakṣeṇa avagatam

original: anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvam iti. ato dharmy eva dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ na dharmo dharmi viśiṣṭa ity  #
analyzed: anumānena tu pāvaka ādi viśiṣṭa tā tasya anumīyate iti na gṛhīta grāhi tvam iti atas dharmī eva dharma viśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ na dharmaḥ dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ iti

original: āha -- tasmād iti // 46 -- 47 //
analyzed: āha tasmāt iti

original: evaṃ ca deśa evāgniviśiṣṭaḥ prameyo 'vatiṣṭhate. sa hi dharmī,
analyzed: evam ca deśaḥ eva agni viśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ vatiṣṭhate sa hi dharmī

original: tadāśrayatvād agneḥ. na tv agniḥ,
analyzed: tad āśraya tvāt agneḥ na tu agniḥ

original: atadāśrayatvād deśasyety āha -- sā deśasyeti. anye tu pūrvāvagatadhūmam apy agniviśiṣṭam
analyzed: a tad āśraya tvāt deśasya iti āha sā deśasya iti anye tu pūrva avagata dhūmam api agni viśiṣṭam

original: anumānasya prameyaṃ manyante. tad api sādhv evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- dhūmasyānyaiś
analyzed: anumānasya prameyam manyante tat api sādhu eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dhūmasya anyaiḥ

original: ca kalpiteti. sā prameyateti sambandhaḥ. atra codayati -- nanv iti. viśiṣṭo 'numānasya
analyzed: ca kalpitā iti sā prameya tā iti sambandhaḥ atra codayati nanu iti viśiṣṭaḥ numānasya

original: viṣaya ity uktam. nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena liṅgam api śabdavad viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyy
analyzed: viṣayaḥ iti uktam na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇa nyāyena liṅgam api śabda vat viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi

original: eva yuktam. śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ity ākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti // 48 //
analyzed: eva yuktam śabdaḥ hi viśeṣaṇa mātre eva vartate iti ākṛti adhikaraṇe vakṣyate iti

original: pariharati -- naivam iti. kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. anekaśaktikalpanābhayena hi śabdasya
analyzed: pariharati na evam iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti aneka śakti kalpanā bhayena hi śabdasya

original: viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasānam iṣṭam. liṅgaṃ tu pūrvāvagatapratibandhabalena pratibandhakadhiyam
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasānam iṣṭam liṅgam tu pūrva avagata pratibandha balena pratibandhaka dhiyam

original: upakalpayati. tad yāvataiva pratibaddham avagataṃ tāvaty eva pratibandhake dhiyam
analyzed: upakalpayati tat yāvatā eva pratibaddham avagatam tāvati eva pratibandhake dhiyam

original: ādadhāti. sarvopādhiparityāgenāgnimanmātreṇa dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddham avagatam ity
analyzed: ādadhāti sarva upādhi parityāgena agnimat mātreṇa dhūmavat tvam pratibaddham avagatam iti

original: agnimattvam evānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti. na ca viśeṣaṇamātram anumeyaṃ siddhasādhyatvād
analyzed: agnimat tvam eva anumāpayati iti na kaścid doṣaḥ iti na ca viśeṣaṇa mātram anumeyam siddha sādhya tvāt

original: ity uktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -{3,
analyzed: iti uktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: 36}na ceti. viśeṣyo 'pi parvatādisvarūpeṇāvadhāritaḥ so 'pi nānumeya ity āha -- viśeṣya iti // 49 //
analyzed: ca iti parvata ādi sva rūpeṇa avadhāritaḥ saḥ u pi na anumeyaḥ iti āha viśeṣyaḥ iti

original: ato viśiṣṭatvenaiva rūpeṇājñānāt tasyaivānumeyatvam ity āha -- viśiṣṭatveneti. atra codayati -- nanv iti. dhūmo 'py agniviśiṣṭo 'numīyata ity
analyzed: atas viśiṣṭa tvena eva rūpeṇa ajñānāt tasya eva anumeya tvam iti āha viśiṣṭa tvena iti atra codayati nanu iti agni viśiṣṭaḥ numīyate iti

original: tad ayuktam. pratijñārthaikadeśatvād iti // 50 //
analyzed: tat ayuktam pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt iti

original: pariharati -- naitad iti. sāmānyaviśeṣyātmā hi dhūmaḥ,
analyzed: pariharati na etat iti sāmānya viśeṣya ātmā hi dhūmaḥ

original: tatra viśeṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyātmanā hetutvam iti na pakṣaikadeśateti. samadhigataṃ tāvadanumānasya viśiṣṭo viṣaya iti,
analyzed: tatra viśeṣa ātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānya ātmanā hetu tvam iti na pakṣa eka deśa tā iti samadhigatam tāvat anumānasya viśiṣṭaḥ viṣayaḥ iti

original: svarūpam eva kim asyeti na jñāyate. tad yadi dhūmatajjñānādīnām anumānatvam iṣyate,
analyzed: svarūpam eva kim asya iti na jñāyate tat yadi dhūma tad jñāna ādīnām anumāna tvam iṣyate

original: tataḥ pramāṇaphalayor viṣayabhedaḥ sa cāyuktaḥ. ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekam eva jñānaṃ
analyzed: tatas pramāṇa phalayoḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ sa ca ayuktaḥ atas eva bhikṣuṇā ekam eva jñānam

original: pramāṇaphalarūpam iti pratyakṣam uktvā tad evānumāne 'py atidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalam
analyzed: pramāṇa phala rūpam iti pratyakṣam uktvā tat eva anumāne pi atidiṣṭam pūrvavat phalam

original: asyeti. yadi tv anumeyajñānam eva pramāṇam iṣyate tato 'py atiriktaphalābhāvaḥ. ato
analyzed: asya iti yadi tu anumeya jñānam eva pramāṇam iṣyate atirikta phala abhāvaḥ

original: vaktavyam anumānasya svarūpam ity ata āha -- dhūmatajjñāneti. yat tāvat bhikṣuṇā pramāṇa(?phala)
analyzed: vaktavyam anumānasya svarūpam iti atas āha dhūma tad jñāna iti yat tāvat bhikṣuṇā

original: m eva phalam ity ekaviṣayatvalābhād āśritaṃ,
analyzed: eva phalam iti eka viṣaya tva lābhāt āśritam

original: tat pratyakṣavad ihāpi pratiṣeddhavyam. na hi sādhyasādhanayor abhedaṃ laukikā manyante.
analyzed: tat pratyakṣa vat iha api pratiṣeddhavyam na hi sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhedam laukikāḥ manyante

original: ko hi vṛkṣacchidayā sārdhaṃ paraśor ekatvam ātiṣṭhate. viṣayabhedaparihāras tu pratyakṣokta
analyzed: kaḥ hi vṛkṣacchidayā sārdham paraśoḥ eka tvam ātiṣṭhate viṣaya bheda parihāraḥ tu pratyakṣa ukta

original: evehāpy anusandhātavyaḥ. yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt
analyzed: eva iha api anusandhātavyaḥ yathā hi indriya ādi pramāṇa pakṣe yatra phalam niṣpadyate tad viṣaya vyāpārāt

original: samānaviṣayatvam upapāditam. evam ihāpi dhūmādipramāṇapakṣe tadvyāpārād eva puroditaṃ
analyzed: samāna viṣaya tvam upapāditam evam iha api dhūma ādi pramāṇa pakṣe tad vyāpārāt eva purā uditam

original: viṣayaikatvam atideṣṭavyam. ato dhūmas tajjñānaṃ vā sambandhas tatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇam astu,
analyzed: viṣaya eka tvam atideṣṭavyam atas dhūmaḥ tad jñānam vā sambandhaḥ tad smaraṇam vā pramāṇam astu

original: vivakṣādhīnatvāt pramāṇaphalabhāvasyeti. yat tu buddheḥ{3,
analyzed: vivakṣā adhīna tvāt pramāṇa phala bhāvasya iti yat tu

original: tve phalābhāva ity uktam. bhāṣyakāro hi buddhir eva pramāṇam iti darśayati yat kāraṇam asannikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhir iti vadati. na ca phalābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tve phala abhāvaḥ iti uktam bhāṣyakāraḥ hi buddhiḥ eva pramāṇam iti darśayati yat kāraṇam asannikṛṣṭe rthe buddhiḥ iti vadati na ca phala abhāvaḥ

original: hānāder eva phalatvāt. na ca sajātīyam eva phalam iti rājājñā. upayogād dhi sajātīyam

original: pratijñayaiva bādhyate. na hy anuktā satī pratijñā bhavati. uktimātreṇa ca maunaṃ
