original: bādhyate. ataḥ pratijñāśarīrāntargatenoktimātreṇa bādhād bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ.
analyzed: bādhyate atas pratijñā śarīra antargatena ukti mātreṇa bādhāt bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ

original: sarvavākyamṛṣātvapakṣas tu dharmoktyā bādhyate. sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanam api
analyzed: sarva vākya mṛṣātva pakṣaḥ tu dharma uktyā bādhyate sarva mṛṣātve hi pratijñā vacanam api

original: mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet. tadamṛṣātve vā na sarvamithyātvam. tad iha pratijñāntargatadharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt
analyzed: mṛṣā iti na itarat mṛṣā bhavet tad amṛṣātve vā na sarva mithyātvam tat iha pratijñā antargata dharma saṃsarga asambhava parāmarśāt

original: pakṣabādha iti dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam. pūrvatra tv aviśiṣṭamuktimātram eva maunaṃ
analyzed: pakṣa bādhaḥ iti dharma ukti virodha abhidhānam pūrvatra tu aviśiṣṭa mukti mātram eva maunam

original: bādhate ity uktimātreṇety uktam. ātmabādhanam iti. dharmabādhanam ity arthaḥ. dharma
analyzed: bādhate iti ukti mātreṇa iti uktam ātma bādhanam iti dharma bādhanam iti arthaḥ dharma

original: evāyukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat. vandhyā me jananīti pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate.
analyzed: eva ayuktaḥ ātmānam bādhate iti yāvat vandhyā me jananī iti pakṣaḥ dharmi uktyā bādhyate

original: jananītve hy uddiṣṭamātre na{3,
analyzed: jananī tve hi uddiṣṭa mātre

original: 48}vandhyātvam āspadaṃ labhate. na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ity api vaktavyam. ahaṃ yato
analyzed: āspadam labhate na ca gauṇaḥ jananī śabdaḥ iti api vaktavyam aham yatas

original: jāta iti viśeṣaṇāt. evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati. etac
analyzed: jātaḥ iti viśeṣaṇāt evam viśeṣite pakṣe dharmi ukti virodhaḥ iti uktam bhavati etat

original: cābhyupagamavādenoktam. na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhis
analyzed: ca abhyupagama vādena uktam na tu śruti smṛti atirekīṇi jalpāka vacanāni gauṇa tva ādibhiḥ

original: samīkartuṃ śakyante. sarvadūṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgāt. pramādājñānajāny eva hi dūṣaṇāni
analyzed: samīkartum śakyante sarva dūṣaṇa uccheda prasaṅgāt pramāda ajñāna jāni eva hi dūṣaṇāni

original: bhavanti. teṣu kathañcit samādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhaved iti // 62 -- 63 //
analyzed: bhavanti teṣu kathañcid samādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇam nāma bhavet iti

original: pūrvasañjalpavirodham udāharati bauddhasyeti. anityaś śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ
analyzed: pūrva sañjalpa virodham udāharati bauddhasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bauddhena ukte katham

original: kṣaṇikād agṛhītasambandhād arthapratyaya ity anuyuktena tenaiva yadā punar ucyate
analyzed: kṣaṇikāt agṛhīta sambandhāt artha pratyayaḥ iti anuyuktena tena eva yadā punar ucyate

original: nityas tarhīti tadā tasya pūrvābhyupagamavirodhaḥ. yady api cātra nyāyabalābalānusārī
analyzed: nityaḥ tarhi iti tadā tasya pūrva abhyupagama virodhaḥ yadi api ca atra nyāya bala abala anusārī

original: bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ

original: tathāpy evaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāram apekṣate. sambhāvito hi pratijñāyām artho nyāyena sādhyate.  #
analyzed: tathā api evaṃvidhā pūrva apara viruddhā pratijñā eva ātmānam na labhate iti na nyāya avatāram apekṣate sambhāvitaḥ hi pratijñāyām arthaḥ nyāyena sādhyate  /

original: asambhāvite tu nāyāpekṣā nāsty eva,
analyzed: asambhāvite tu nāya apekṣā na asti eva

original: svarasabhaṅguratvāt. ataś śabdavirodha evainam antarbhāvayati. śabdasandarbha eva
analyzed: sva rasa bhaṅgura tvāt atas śabda virodhe eva enam antarbhāvayati śabda sandarbhe eva

original: hi tādṛśaḥ pūrvāparaviruddhaḥ pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣām abhiprāya iti. sarvalokaprasiddhivirodhasyodāharaṇam
analyzed: hi tādṛśaḥ pūrva apara viruddhaḥ pakṣam vināśayati iti teṣām abhiprāyaḥ iti sarva loka prasiddhi virodhasya udāharaṇam

original: āha -- candreti. atrāpi mahājanaviparītārthaś śabdasaṃsargaḥ svarasād eva bhajyate
analyzed: āha candra iti atra api mahājana viparīta arthaḥ śabda saṃsargaḥ svarasāt eva bhajyate

original: na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti // 64 //
analyzed: na pramāṇam yāvat apekṣate iti śabda bādhaḥ udāhṛtaḥ iti

original: upamānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- jñāteti. yena hi nagare gavākāro dṛṣṭaḥ samprati cāraṇye gavayākāraḥ,
analyzed: upamāna virodha udāharaṇam āha jñātā iti yena hi nagare gavākāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ samprati ca araṇye gavaya ākāraḥ

original: taṃ prati gaur gavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti.{3,
analyzed: tam prati gauḥ gavaya sadṛśaḥ na bhavati iti pakṣaḥ upamānena virudhyata

original: 49}parokṣe gavi sādṛśyam upameyam. pratyakṣe tu pratyakṣam eva. ata eva jñātagogavayākāram iti kramo vivakṣita iti // 65 //
analyzed: gavi sādṛśyam upameyam pratyakṣe tu pratyakṣam eva atas eva jñāta go gavaya ākāram iti kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti

original: arthāpattivirodham idānīṃ vivakṣan bhāṣyakārānusāreṇābhāvapūrvikāyās tāvadudāharaṇam āha -- geheti // 66 //
analyzed: arthāpatti virodham idānīm vivakṣan bhāṣyakāra anusāreṇa abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ tāvat udāharaṇam āha geha iti  /

original: pratyakṣapūrvikām udāharati -- agnāv iti. adāhaka iti. atacchaktiyukta ity arthaḥ.
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvikām udāharati agnau iti adāhakaḥ iti atacchakti yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anumānapūrvikām udāharati -- śabde cānabhidhāyaka iti. śabdaśravaṇānantaram arthapratītiṃ
analyzed: anumāna pūrvikām udāharati śabde ca anabhidhāyakaḥ iti śabda śravaṇa anantaram artha pratītim

original: ceṣṭayānumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam ity unnīyate. atas sarvakārakāṇāṃ kriyāvinābhāvād
analyzed: ceṣṭayā anumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam iti unnīyate atas sarva kārakāṇām kriyā vinābhāvāt

original: abhidhābhidhāno vyāpāraḥ,
analyzed: abhidhā abhidhānaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: tadanupapattyā cārthāpattyā tacchaktisiddhir iti // 67 //
analyzed: tad anupapattyā ca arthāpattyā tad śakti siddhiḥ iti

original: tathendriyāpalāpapakṣo 'pi pratyakṣapūrvikayārthāpattyā virudhyata ity āha -- śrotreti.
analyzed: tathā indriya apalāpa pakṣaḥ api pratyakṣa pūrvikayā arthāpattyā virudhyate iti āha śrotra iti

original: yady api pratyakṣapūrvikodāhṛtaiva tathāpi pakṣadoṣodbhāvanacchalenendriyāpalāpapakṣasyāpy
analyzed: yadi api pratyakṣa pūrvikā udāhṛtā eva tathā api pakṣa doṣa udbhāvana chalena indriya apalāpa pakṣasya api

original: ayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā punastadvirodho 'bhihitaḥ. atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā
analyzed: ayam doṣaḥ iti vivakṣatā punar tad virodhaḥ bhihitaḥ atra eva ādi śabdena upamāna pūrvikayā

original: virodho darśayitavyaḥ -- yathā gavayopamitāyā gos tajjñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti.
analyzed: virodhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ yathā gavaya upamitāyāḥ goḥ tad jñāna grāhya śakti apahnavaḥ iti

original: arthāpattipūrvikayā virodham udāharati -- śabdeti. arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā
analyzed: arthāpatti pūrvikayā virodham udāharati śabda iti artha abhidhāna anyathā anupapattyā

original: hi vācakaśaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthāpattyantareṇa śabdanityatvam
analyzed: hi vācaka śaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punar tad anupapattyā arthāpatti antareṇa śabda nitya tvam

original: avagamyata iti // 67 //
analyzed: avagamyate iti

original: śabdapūrvikārthāpattivirodham udāharati -- śrutārthāpattibādha iti. kiṃ punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcenodāhriyate,
analyzed: śabda pūrvikā arthāpatti virodham udāharati śruta arthāpatti bādhaḥ iti kim punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcena udāhriyate

original: tadvirodhapratipādanaṃ hi yayākayācid ekayāpi sidhyaty eva. tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu
analyzed: tad virodha pratipādanam hi yayā a kayācid ekayā api sidhyati eva tathā ca pramāṇa antara virodheṣu

original: prapañco na darśitaḥ. arthāpattivad vā pramāṇāntaravirodho 'pi prapañcena vācyaḥ.
analyzed: prapañcaḥ na darśitaḥ arthāpatti vat vā pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ pi prapañcena vācyaḥ

original: satyam. ṣoḍhā bhinnair eva ṣaḍbhir atra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ,
analyzed: satyam ṣoḍhā bhinnaiḥ eva ṣaḍbhiḥ atra virodhaḥ vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ

original: tatpradarśanārtham eva ṣaṭpramāṇaprasūtārthāpattir udāhṛtā. tenaiva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇāntareṣv api prapañco darśayitavyaḥ.{3,
analyzed: tad pradarśana artham eva ṣaṣ pramāṇa prasūtā arthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā tena eva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇa antareṣu api

original: 50}yathā tāvat pratyakṣabādha evānubhūtismṛtyanumānādibhiḥ ṣaṣṭhavarjaṃ ṣoḍhā bhidyate.
analyzed: tāvat pratyakṣa bādhaḥ eva anubhūti smṛti anumāna ādibhiḥ ṣaṣṭha varjam ṣoḍhā bhidyate

original: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate.
analyzed: svedyamānasya vādinaḥ nuṣṇaḥ vahniḥ iti pratijñā anubhava sthena eva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate

original: anāsannāgnes tu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate,
analyzed: an āsanna agneḥ tu sā eva pratijñā smṛti sthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate

original: yadā khalv ayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijānāti tadainam itaraḥ smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtam agner uṣṇatvaṃ yad evam āttheti,
analyzed: yadā khalu ayam vāda kāle nu uṣṇaḥ vahniḥ iti pratijānāti tadā enam itaraḥ smārayati kim na smarasi pūrva anubhūtam agneḥ uṣṇa tvam yat evam āttha iti

original: sa tat smṛtvā tataḥ pratyakṣānnivartata iti bhavati smṛtapratyakṣabādhaḥ.
analyzed: sa tat smṛtvā tatas pratyakṣāt nivartate iti bhavati smṛta pratyakṣa bādhaḥ

original: anumitapratyakṣabādhas tu yatrāptamukhe ceṣṭāviśeṣādarśanena tadavagatatiktādir asanivāraṇaṃ pratijñāyate,
analyzed: anumita pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu yatra āpta mukhe ceṣṭā viśeṣa adarśanena tad avagata tikta ādiḥ pratijñāyate

original: mukhavairūpyeṇa hi tasya tiktānubhavo 'numīyate atas tadviparītapakṣasyānumitapratyakṣabādhaḥ.
analyzed: mukha vairūpyeṇa hi tasya tikta anubhavaḥ numīyate atas tad viparīta pakṣasya anumita pratyakṣa bādhaḥ

original: śrutapratyakṣabādhas tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhir dṛṣṭo 'yam
analyzed: śruta pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yam

original: artha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate. na caiṣa śabdabādhaḥ. na hy atra tair
analyzed: arthaḥ iti sākṣi pratyakṣeṇa bādhaḥ abhidhīyate na ca eṣa śabda bādhaḥ na hi atra taiḥ

original: artho 'bhidhīyate. kin tu darśanam. atas taddarśanānusāry eva nirṇayaḥ. darśanaṃ
analyzed: arthaḥ bhidhīyate kin tu darśanam atas tad darśana anusārī eva nirṇayaḥ darśanam

original: tu taiḥ svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam.
analyzed: tu taiḥ sva śabdena pratyāyyate iti śabda avagata pratyakṣa virodhaḥ eva ayam

original: upamānaṃ tu pramāṇāntaraprasiddhavastusādṛśyamātraviṣayam ity anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyaṃ
analyzed: upamānam tu pramāṇa antara prasiddha vastu sādṛśya mātra viṣayam iti anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyam

original: gocarayati. yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi
analyzed: gocarayati yathā dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñāyām yādṛśī sva ātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tām paratra api

original: dṛṣṭvopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā,
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā upaminoti mama eva asya api dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā

original: katham anyathā pūrvedyur ardhakṛtakarmasamāpane paredyuḥ pravartate. iha ca ceṣṭayā
analyzed: katham anyathā pūrvedyus ardha kṛta karma samāpane paredyus pravartate iha ca ceṣṭayā

original: tadanurūpaṃ paragocaram anumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate. yady api cātrānumānāvagatapratyakṣabādha
analyzed: tad anurūpam para gocaram anumāya sva jñāna sādṛśyam tatra upamīyate yadi api ca atra anumāna avagata pratyakṣa bādha

original: eva śakyo darśayitum,
analyzed: eva śakyaḥ darśayitum

original: tathāpi svajñānasādṛśyaparicchede śakyaṃ darśayitum iti tadavagatapratyakṣabādho
analyzed: tathā api sva jñāna sādṛśya paricchede śakyam darśayitum iti tad avagata pratyakṣa bādho

original: 'bhidhīyate. pratyakṣasattaivopamānena pramīyate. arthāpattyavagatapratyakṣabādhas
analyzed: abhidhīyate pratyakṣa sattā eva upamānena pramīyate arthāpatti avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ

original: tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ. yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākam ekas tadāharaṇāya
analyzed: tu evam darśayitavyaḥ yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toya arthiṣu taṭākam ekaḥ tad āharaṇāya

original: prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣam arthāpattyā
analyzed: prasthitaḥ vilambate tadā tad vilambana anyathā anupapattyā tadīyam toya pratyakṣam arthāpattyā

original: pramīyate. tatra tadviparīto nistoyataṭākapakṣo 'rthāpattisiddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate.
analyzed: pramīyate tatra tad viparītaḥ nistoya taṭāka pakṣaḥ rthāpatti siddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate

original: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagatapratyakṣavirodho nehodāhriyate.
analyzed: abhāvena tu bhāva rūpam pratyakṣam na avagamyate iti tad anavagata pratyakṣa virodhaḥ na iha udāhriyate

original: ṣoḍhā vibhaktam anumānabādhamataḥparam anusandhāsyāmaḥ -- dhūmāvagatavahnipratiṣedhe
analyzed: ṣoḍhā vibhaktam anumāna bādham atas param anusandhāsyāmaḥ dhūma avagata vahni pratiṣedhe

original: tāvat pratyakṣapūrvānumānabādhaḥ. dhūmānumitād eva bahner uṣṇatve 'numite tadviparītapakṣo
analyzed: tāvat pratyakṣa pūrva anumāna bādhaḥ dhūma anumitāt eva bahneḥ uṣṇa tve numite tad viparīta pakṣaḥ

original: 'numitānumānena bādhyate. yatra tu devasya tveti nirvapati{3,
analyzed: numita anumānena bādhyate yatra tu devasya tvā iti

original: 51}iti pratītaviniyogān mantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparītaḥ pakṣo gṛhyate,
analyzed: pratīta viniyogāt mantra śeṣe tad viparītaḥ pakṣaḥ gṛhyate

original: tatrāgamānumānabādhaḥ.
analyzed: tatra āgama anumāna bādhaḥ

original: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu vrīhibhir
analyzed: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tad sadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣu upamiteṣu vrīhibhiḥ

original: yajeteti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate. vrīhyavayavā hi tadviṣayatayā jñātasambandhāstām
analyzed: yajeta iti codanā nīvāra viṣaya tvena anumīyate vrīhi avayavāḥ hi tad viṣaya tayā jñāta sambandhāḥ tām

original: anumāpayanti. na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtāḥ,
analyzed: anumāpayanti na hi tasyāḥ sva rūpeṇa vrīhayaḥ viṣaya bhūtāḥ

original: tadavayavās tu cūrṇībhūtā vrīhiśāstrārthaḥ. te ca nīvāreṣv api santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī
analyzed: tad avayavāḥ tu cūrṇībhūtāḥ vrīhi śāstra arthaḥ te ca nīvāreṣu api santi iti vrīhi avayava sāmānya upamita nīvāra gāminī

original: vrīhicodanānumīyate. tad ihātadgocaratvapakṣasyopamānapūrvakānumānabādhaḥ.
analyzed: vrīhi codanā anumīyate tat iha a tad gocara tva pakṣasya upamāna pūrvaka anumāna bādhaḥ

original: arthāpattipūrvakānumānabādhas tu śrāvaṇatvapakṣe 'bhihita eva. yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ
analyzed: arthāpatti pūrvaka anumāna bādhaḥ tu śrāvaṇa tva pakṣe bhihitaḥ eva yatra dūrāt vṛkṣa abhāvam

original: viditvā tacchāyābhāvo 'numīyate tatrābhāvapūrvakānumānena chāyāsadbhāvapakṣo bādhyate.
analyzed: viditvā tat chāyā abhāvaḥ numīyate tatra abhāva pūrvaka anumānena chāyā sadbhāva pakṣaḥ bādhyate

original: pratyakṣaśabdabādhas tu tridhā darśita eva. anyo 'pi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ darśayitavyaḥ.

original: dvayor apy anyatarasa vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati. evaṃ tāvat sandehaviparyayābhyām

original: nanu svarūpāsiddhyā hetur duṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kas tasya doṣaḥ ata āha -- jñāte 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svarūpeṇa hetur gamakaḥ,

original: api tu{3,
analyzed: api

original: mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi kṛtakatāṃ śabdasya. tad evamādāv ubhayasampratipater abhāvān na hetubhāvo 'vatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- itarad

analyzed: na vyoma ādau iti

original: naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetavaḥ prayujyeran. prayoktāras tv ekam eva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyad
analyzed: na ekasmin sādhye na eka hetavaḥ prayujyeran prayoktāraḥ tu ekam eva sādhyam kiñca anyat

original: itaś ceti nānāsādhanais sādhayanto dṛśyante. tasmād virodhanibandhana eva saṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: itas ca iti nānā sādhanaiḥ sādhayantaḥ dṛśyante tasmāt virodha nibandhanaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ

original: na tu nānātvanibandhana ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pratyekam iti. pūrvaṃ tu pratyekaṃ saṃśayahetvor
analyzed: na tu nānātva nibandhanaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha pratyekam iti pūrvam tu pratyekam saṃśaya hetvoḥ

original: eva militayor nirṇayahetutvam uktam. atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāv api saṃhatau ca gamakāv
analyzed: eva militayoḥ nirṇaya hetu tvam uktam atra tu pratyekam gamakau api saṃhatau ca gamakau

original: iti pratipāditam iti // 95 //
analyzed: iti pratipāditam iti

original: tasmād viruddhārthāv eva bhinnau saṃśayahetutvena darśanīyau. yathāsmābhir uktaṃ na tu bhinnatāmātreṇety āha -- tasmād iti. vyākhyātastriprakāro{3,
analyzed: tasmāt viruddha arthau eva bhinnau saṃśaya hetu tvena darśanīyau yathā asmābhiḥ uktam na tu bhinna tā mātreṇa iti āha tasmāt iti

original: 67}pi saṃśayahetuḥ viparītaprakārān pratijānāti - ṣaḍhā viruddhatām āhur iti. dharmadharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣobhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣaiḥ
ṣaṭprakārāṃ viruddhatām eke bruvata ity arthaḥ. anye tūbhayavirodhayoḥ pratyekapakṣānatirekāt
analyzed: ṣaṣ prakārām viruddha tām eke bruvate iti arthaḥ anye tu ubhaya virodhayoḥ pratyeka pakṣa anatirekāt

original: cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ity āha -- caturdhā veti. vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikam
analyzed: cāturvidhyam pratipannāḥ iti āha caturdhā vā iti vayam tu iṣṭa vighāta mātreṇa ekam

original: eva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ity āha -- ekadhāpi veti. pūrvoktapakṣadvayanivṛttāv api
analyzed: eva prakāram saṅgirāmahe iti āha ekadhā api vā iti pūrva ukta pakṣa dvaya nivṛttau api

original: vāśabdaḥ. api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syād iti pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kim avāntarabhedopanyāseneti.
analyzed: vā śabdaḥ api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt iti pakṣa bādhaḥ eva viruddha tve kāraṇam kim avāntarabheda upanyāsena iti

original: triṣv api ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatām
analyzed: triṣu api ca prakāreṣu śruti artha upāttasya pratijñāta arthasya bādhāyām viruddha tām

original: āhur ity āha -- śrutyarthoktasyeti. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpaṃ śrutyuktaṃ,
analyzed: āhuḥ iti āha śruti artha uktasya iti dharma dharmi ubhaya svarūpam śruti uktam

original: tadviśeṣās tu prāyeṇārthoktāḥ. te ca svarūpasvaviśeṣāḥ pratijñārthaśabdenopādīyante.
analyzed: tad viśeṣāḥ tu prāyeṇa artha uktāḥ te ca svarūpa sva viśeṣāḥ pratijñā artha śabdena upādīyante

original: sarve hi te vaktur abhipretāḥ. na tu dharmādiviśeṣās sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ.
analyzed: sarve hi te vaktuḥ abhipretāḥ na tu dharma ādi viśeṣāḥ sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ

original: tad asmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetor viruddhatā bhavatīti. tatpunar idaṃ
analyzed: tat asmin pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetoḥ viruddha tā bhavati iti tat punar idam

original: vipratiṣiddham iva manyāmahe. kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetur viruddho
analyzed: vipratiṣiddham iva manyāmahe katham hi pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetuḥ viruddhaḥ

original: bhavati. sa hi pratijñārthaṃ viruṇaddhīti viroddheti vaktum ucitaḥ,
analyzed: bhavati sa hi pratijñā artham viruṇaddhi iti viroddhā iti vaktum ucitaḥ

original: bādhaka iti vā. na cāyam eva pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya. prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ,
analyzed: bādhakaḥ iti vā na ca ayam eva pratijñā arthena bādhyate yat viruddhaḥ bhavet prasiddha tvāt asya prasiddham hi ghaṭasya kṛtaka tvam

original: na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā bādhituṃ śakyam. ato bādhaka ity evāyaṃ vaktavyaḥ. vārtikakṛtā
analyzed: na tad aprasiddhayā nitya tayā bādhitum śakyam atas bādhakaḥ iti eva ayam vaktavyaḥ vārtika kṛtā

original: tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ity uktam iti veditavyam iti. tatra dharmasvarūpabādhena
analyzed: tu para prasiddhi mātreṇa viruddhaḥ iti uktam iti veditavyam iti tatra dharma svarūpa bādhena

original: tāvad viruddhatām udāharati -- nityatve iti // 97 //
analyzed: tāvat viruddha tām udāharati nitya tve iti

original: dharmaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ prayukte bhavatīty āha -- bādha iti. tam eva prayogaṃ
analyzed: dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam prayukte bhavati iti āha bādhaḥ iti tam eva prayogam

original: darśayati -- arthavad iti pādatrayeṇa. svarūpābhidhānavādino hy āhuḥ -- gaur ayam
analyzed: darśayati arthavat iti pāda trayeṇa svarūpa abhidhāna vādinaḥ hi āhuḥ gauḥ ayam

original: iti śabdākāraviśiṣṭo 'rtho 'vagamyate. na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ
analyzed: iti śabda ākāra viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ avagamyate na ca viśeṣaṇam an abhidhāya viśiṣṭaḥ abhidhātum

original: śakyata iti svarūpam eva tāvad ādau śabdo{3,
analyzed: śakyate iti svarūpam eva tāvat ādau

original: 68}bhidhatte tato viśiṣṭam. api cārthaśabdo vyabhicarati,
analyzed: tatas viśiṣṭam api ca artha śabdaḥ vyabhicarati

original: ajñātasambandhasya tadanavagateḥ. svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāg api tadavagamāt,
analyzed: ajñāta sambandhasya tad anavagateḥ svarūpam tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāk api tad avagamāt

original: avyabhicārī ca śabdārtha iti yuktam. ataḥ svarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhidheyaṃ śabdānāṃ,
analyzed: avyabhicārī ca śabda arthaḥ iti yuktam atas svarūpam tāvat avaśya abhidheyam śabdānām

original: tadabhidhānottarakālaṃ tu viśiṣṭābhidhānam api bhavatu nāmeti. evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogam āhuḥ -- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad
analyzed: tad abhidhāna uttara kālam tu viśiṣṭa abhidhānam api bhavatu nāma iti evam prasādhya ante prayogam āhuḥ śabda svarūpam sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāk artha vat

original: agṛhītasambandho 'pi hi svādivibhaktiyuktān śabdānavagacchati. yadā ca vibhaktiyogaḥ
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhaḥ u pi hi sva ādi vibhakti yuktān śabdān avagacchati yadā ca vibhakti yogaḥ

original: tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād iti. kathaṃ punar evaṃ prayujyamāne
analyzed: tadā arthavat tvam dṛṣṭam yathā sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt iti katham punar evam prayujyamāne

original: dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavaty ata āha -- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti. yadā hi svarūpeṇārthenārthavattvaṃ
analyzed: dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ bhavati atas āha sva rūpeṇa iti ca āśritaḥ iti yadā hi sva rūpeṇa arthena arthavat tvam

original: prathamam āśrityārthavattāmātraviśiṣṭaṃ sādhyate,
analyzed: prathamam āśritya arthavat tā mātra viśiṣṭam sādhyate

original: tadārthād idam avagamyate -- svarūpārthavattvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti. evaṃ ca
analyzed: tadā arthāt idam avagamyate svarūpa arthavat tvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti evam ca

original: bhavaty arthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti. kathaṃ punas svarūpeṇeti cāśrite
analyzed: bhavati artha ākṣiptasya dharma viśeṣasya bādhaḥ iti katham punar sva rūpeṇa iti ca āśrite

original: dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate. ata āha -- asvarūpeti. vibhaktimattvaṃ hi svarūpātirekeṇārthāntareṇārthavattvam
analyzed: dharma viśeṣaḥ bādhyate atas āha asvarūpa iti vibhaktimat tvam hi sva rūpa atirekeṇa artha antareṇa arthavat tvam

original: avinābhāvabalena śabdasyāvagamayati,
analyzed: avinābhāva balena śabdasya avagamayati

original: sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād arthāntarasya darśanāt. ato vyāptibalena tad eva vibhaktimattayā
analyzed: sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt artha antarasya darśanāt atas vyāpti balena tat eva vibhaktimat tayā

original: sādhyate. ato 'rthavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ hetur ayaṃ viruṇaddhīti
analyzed: sādhyate atas ṛthavat tāyāḥ viśeṣam sva svarūpa arthavat tvam hetuḥ ayam viruṇaddhi iti

original: bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti // 99 //
analyzed: bhavati dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti

original: dharmisvarūpabādhodāharaṇam āha -- ihapratyayeti. yadā hi samavāyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatirekas sādhyate,
analyzed: dharmi svarūpa bādhā udāharaṇam āha iha pratyaya iti yadā hi samavāyam dharmiṇam kṛtvā tasya dravya ādi vyatirekaḥ sādhyate

original: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ ca hetur ucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti saṃyogo dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
analyzed: ihapratyaya hetu tvam ca hetuḥ ucyate iha ayam ghaṭaḥ iti saṃyogaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadā dharmisvarūpabādha ity abhiprāyaḥ // 100 //
{3,69} kathaṃ punar atrodāharaṇe dharmisvarūpabādhaḥ,
analyzed: katham punar atra udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ

original: ata āha -- atrāpīti. atrāpy udāharaṇe dharmisvarūpasya samavāyātmano vaiparītyāpādanād
analyzed: atas āha atra api iti atra api udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpasya samavāya ātmanaḥ vaiparītya āpādanāt

original: dhetor viruddhatā bhāvati. ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hy asamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyaṃ
analyzed: dhetoḥ viruddha tā bhāvati iha pratyaya hetu tvam hi asamavāya ātmanaḥ eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyam

original: virundhyād iti dharmisvarūpabādha iti // 101 //
analyzed: virundhyāt iti dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ iti

original: asminn eva ca dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi darśayitavya ity āha -- yac ceti. samavāyo hi
analyzed: asmin eva ca dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ api darśayitavyaḥ iti āha yat ca iti samavāyaḥ hi

original: sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante. so 'py asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyogavadbhedāpatter
analyzed: sattā sāmānya vat eka rūpaḥ iti kāṇādāḥ manyante saḥ pi asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyoga vat bheda āpatteḥ

original: bādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho hetur iti // 102 //
analyzed: bādhyate iti bhavati dharmi viśeṣa viruddhaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: ubhayasvarūpabādhāyām udāharaṇam āha -- nityam ātmāstiteti. yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati -- ātmā nityaḥ niravayatvāt vyomavad
analyzed: ubhaya svarūpa bādhāyām udāharaṇam āha nityam ātma astitā iti yadā kaścid sautrāntikam prati evam sādhayati ātmā nityaḥ niravaya tvāt vyoma vat

original: tadā dharmadharmidvayasya bādhanaṃ bhavati. sautrāntikasya hy avayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tadā dharma dharmi dvayasya bādhanam bhavati sautrāntikasya hi avayava abhāvaḥ vyomni abhāvena eva sambaddhaḥ bhimataḥ iti ātmanaḥ tadvat abhāvam

original: āvaraṇābhāvamātraṃ hi nabhaḥ,
analyzed: āvaraṇa abhāva mātram hi nabhaḥ

original: na punas tattvāntaram iti bauddhā manyante. ato 'navayavatvād ātmanaḥ svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhād ubhayabādha iti // 103
analyzed: na punar tattva antaram iti bauddhāḥ manyante atas nava yava tvāt ātmanaḥ sva rūpasya tad dharmasya ca nitya tvasya bādhāt ubhaya bādhaḥ iti

original: ubhayaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ sādhyamāne bhavatīty āha -- tadeti. yadā hi parārthāś cakṣurādayas saṅghātatvāt śayanādivad iti sādhyate,
analyzed: ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam sādhyamāne bhavati iti āha tadā iti yadā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt śayana ādi vat iti sādhyate

original: tadobhayaviśeṣabādha ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ punar atrobhayaviśeṣabādhaḥ,
analyzed: tadā ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ katham punar atra ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ

original: ata āha -- śayana iti. śayanīye{3,
analyzed: atas āha śayane iti

original: 70}hi khaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvād iti hetur vyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyam eva sādhayet. ātmānaṃ ca prati  #
analyzed: khaṭvā ādau mahābhūta saṃhata śarīra pārārthyena saṅghāta tvāt iti hetuḥ vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti saṃhata pārārthyam eva sādhayet ātmānam ca prati

original: pārārthyaṃ sādhayitum abhimatam,
analyzed: pārārthyam sādhayitum abhimatam

original: tan na sidhyet. so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ
analyzed: tat na sidhyet saḥ yam tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yaḥ viśeṣaḥ bhimataḥ ātma pārārthyam

original: sa tāvad bādhyate. cakṣurāder api dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'py anenaiva
analyzed: sa tāvat bādhyate cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ āhaṅkārika tvam nāma saḥ u pi anena eva

original: hetunā bādhyate. saṃhatātmakatvaṃ hi śayanādāvanāhaṅkārikatvena vyāptaṃ dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: hetunā bādhyate saṃhata ātmaka tvam hi śayana ādau anāhaṅkārika tvena vyāptam dṛṣṭam

original: bhautikā hi te,
analyzed: bhautikāḥ hi te

original: atas tannidarśanena cakṣurādayo 'pi bhautikā bhaveyuḥ. āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilās saṅgirante,
analyzed: atas tad nidarśanena cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ bhautikāḥ bhaveyuḥ āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi iti kāpilāḥ saṅgirante

original: teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayogaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto
analyzed: teṣām ca ayam prayogaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ saṃhata pārārthya bhautika tvābhyām

original: hetur yasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyam asiddham iti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati.
analyzed: hetuḥ yasmin śayane tatra ātma pārārthyam asiddham iti dharma viśeṣa bādhanam tāvat bhavati

original: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavyāptyā sūtrito 'nantaram eva vivariṣyata iti na kevalam
analyzed: dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ pi bhautika vyāptyā sūtritaḥ nantaram eva vivariṣyate iti na kevalam

original: ātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati,
analyzed: ātma pārārthyam na sidhyati

original: asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotīty āha --
analyzed: asaṃhata rūpa ātma pārārthye ca iṣṭe vyāpti balena ātmanaḥ u pi saṃhata tā prāpnoti iti āha

original: asaṃhateti. anena cāniṣṭāntarāpattir āpāditeti veditavyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati. nānena
analyzed: asaṃhatā iti anena ca aniṣṭa antara āpattiḥ āpāditā iti veditavyam etat uktam bhavati na anena

original: hetunāsaṃhatarūpātmārthatā sidhyati. pratyuta saṃhatataivātmano bhaved iti // 106 //
analyzed: hetunā asaṃhata rūpa ātma artha tā sidhyati pratyuta saṃhata tā eva ātmanaḥ bhavet iti

original: dharmiviśeṣabādhaṃ vivṛṇoti -- anāhaṅkārikatvam iti. vyākhyātacaraṃ cedam // 106 //
analyzed: dharmi viśeṣa bādham vivṛṇoti anāhaṅkārika tvam iti vyākhyāta caram ca idam  /

original: evaṃ tāvad jñātasambandhapadavyāvartanīyo viruddhaḥ prapañcitaḥ. idānīṃ tadvyāvartyā
analyzed: evam tāvat jñāta sambandha pada vyāvartanīyaḥ viruddhaḥ prapañcitaḥ idānīm tad vyāvartyā

original: eva dṛṣṭāntābhāsā darśayitavyāḥ. tair hi nānumānāṅgasambandho jñāpayituṃ śakyate.
analyzed: eva dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ darśayitavyāḥ taiḥ hi na anumāna aṅga sambandhaḥ jñāpayitum śakyate

original: atas te 'pi jñātasambandhapadenaiva vyāvartyante. idaṃ cāsmābhiḥ prāg evoktam. anyatrāpy āha --

original: jñātasambandhavācā ca trayo 'trāniyatādayaḥ /
analyzed: jñāta sambandha vācā ca

original: hetudṛṣṭāntayor doṣā bhāṣyakāreṇa vāritāḥ //
{3,71}iti. atas tannirākaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam eva tāvad avatārayati -- gamakasyeti.
analyzed: atas tad nirākaraṇa artham dṛṣṭānta vacanam eva tāvat avatārayati gamakasya iti

original: vyāptipradarśanāya dvividho dṛṣṭāntas tāvad sādhanavākye darśayitavyaḥ. sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ
analyzed: vyāpti pradarśanāya dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tāvat sādhana vākye darśayitavyaḥ sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa pratipādyata ity arthaḥ // 107 //

original: tatra sādharyyadṛṣṭāntaprakāram āha -- tatreti. asyārthaḥ -- udāharaṇasādharmyāl liṅgasya prasādhakatvavacanaṃ hetuḥ. yadāhuḥ --

original: atra bhāṣyam -- tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca. tatra pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ yathā -- dhūmākṛtidarśanād{3,

original: uktam iti. atra kecin nītijñammanyā avadhṛtasvalakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyato

original: yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati. arthāpattir hy anyathopapattyā
analyzed: yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati arthāpattiḥ hi anyathā upapattyā

original: parihriyate nānumānam. yadi tv avicchinnotpattayas saṃyogavibhāgāḥ kriyānumāne kāraṇam,
analyzed: parihriyate na anumānam yadi tu avicchinna utpattayaḥ saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ kriyā anumāne kāraṇam

original: evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatir anumīyeta,
analyzed: evam tarhi na kācid gatiḥ anumīyeta

original: bhaviṣyatsaṃyogavibhāgānāṃ pramāṇāgocaratvāt. prathamaṃ ca katipayānām evāvagateḥ.
analyzed: bhaviṣyat saṃyoga vibhāgānām pramāṇa agocara tvāt prathamam ca katipayānām eva avagateḥ

original: atha svadeśasaṃyogavibhāgahetukaṃ kriyānumānam. na ca sthāṇoḥ śyeno deśa ity ucyate.
analyzed: atha sva deśa saṃyoga vibhāga hetukam kriyā anumānam na ca sthāṇoḥ śyenaḥ deśaḥ iti ucyate

original: evam api matsyeṣu prasaṅgānativṛttir eva,
analyzed: evam api matsyeṣu prasaṅga anativṛttiḥ eva

original: teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva. parokṣavyomavādināṃ ca vihaṅgame gacchatīti kriyāpratyayānupapattiḥ,
analyzed: teṣām hi jalam sva deśe eva parokṣa vyoma vādinām ca vihaṅgame gacchati iti kriyā pratyaya anupapattiḥ

original: vyomasaṃyogavibhāgayor apratyakṣatvāt tābhyāṃ tadanumānānupapatteḥ. na ca viyadvitatālokāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgāvagamanibandhano vihaṅgame calatīti
analyzed: vyoma saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ apratyakṣa tvāt tābhyām tad anumāna anupapatteḥ na ca viyat vitata āloka avayava saṃyoga vibhāga avagama nibandhanaḥ vihaṅgame calati iti

original: santamase 'pi bhāvāt. na ca tamo nāma kiñcid vastv asti bhavatsiddhānte,
analyzed: bhāvāt na ca tamaḥ nāma kiñcid vastu asti bhavat siddhānte

original: bhāso 'bhāvamātratvāt tasya. atas tatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāyaś śakyate
analyzed: bhāsaḥ bhāva mātra tvāt tasya atas tad saṃyoga vibhāga hetukaḥ pi na kriyā avasāyaḥ śakyate

original: samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhyopapattiḥ. yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe
analyzed: samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhya upapattiḥ yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe

original: ity apratyakṣatoktā,
analyzed: iti apratyakṣa tā uktā

original: tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. rūpaśabdāvibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam
analyzed: tām tatra eva anyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ rūpa śabda avibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam

original: eva karmety āsthitam. apūrvādhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti vacanaṃ
analyzed: eva karma iti āsthitam apūrva adhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇaḥ rūpam upalabhāmahe iti vacanam

original: yathācoditavitatapūrvāparībhūtābhivyaktāvasthitakarmarūpānupalabdhyabhiprāyam eva.
analyzed: yathā codita vitata pūrva aparībhūta abhivyakta avasthita karma rūpa anupalabdhi abhiprāyam eva

original: itarathā hy upalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet.
analyzed: itarathā hi upalabdhi mātra pratiṣedhe śaśa śṛṅga ādi vat nitya abhāvaḥ eva karmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: na hi tatra pratyakṣopalabdhimātram eva pratiṣiddham. yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatīti
analyzed: na hi tatra pratyakṣa upalabdhi mātram eva pratiṣiddham yat āśrayam deśa antaram prāpayati iti

original: ca na phalānumeyatvābhiprāyam. kiṃ tarhi. āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na
analyzed: ca na phala anumeya tva abhiprāyam kim tarhi āśrayasya deśa antara prāpaka tva rūpeṇa na

original: svarūpataḥ karmāstīty apūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati. ihāpi devadattasya
analyzed: svarūpataḥ karma asti iti apūrva ātmanā karmaṇaḥ darśayati iha api devadattasya

original: gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyeti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gater
analyzed: gati pūrvikām deśa antara prāptim upalabhya iti vadan devadatte pratyakṣa tām eva gateḥ

original: darśayati. anyathā tu devadattādityayor ubhayor api karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye
analyzed: darśayati anyathā tu devadatta ādityayoḥ ubhayoḥ api karmaṇaḥ kena viśeṣeṇa āditye

original: gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate. devadatte 'pi hi sāmānyato dṛṣṭād eva
analyzed: gati anumānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭatayā udāhriyate devadatte hi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭāt eva

original: gatisiddhiḥ. ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktam anupapannam
analyzed: gati siddhiḥ atas nā evaṃvidham granthataḥ yuktitaḥ vā ghaṭate iti su uktam anupapannam

original: iti. pratiyoginor hi parasparam asaṅkare dvaividhyaṃ bhavati. iha tu yat{3,
analyzed: iti pratiyoginoḥ hi parasparam asaṅkare dvaividhyam bhavati iha tu

original: 85}pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginor  #
analyzed: pratiyogitayā upāttam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham tatra api gati prāpti ākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe eva sambandhaḥ iti na pratiyoginoḥ

original: asaṅkara iti // 138 //
analyzed: asaṅkare iti

original: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtād ity agater apratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭas
analyzed: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣa tāyām api pakṣīkṛtāt iti agateḥ apratyakṣa tvāt na pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ

original: sambandha ity ucyate. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- āditye 'nupalabdhiś ced iti. idānīṃ
analyzed: sambandhaḥ iti ucyate tat etat āśaṅkate tāvat āditye n upalabdhiḥ ced iti idānīm

original: dūṣayati -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- deśe 'py adhunātana iti. deśe 'py adhunātane --
analyzed: dūṣayati na iti kāraṇam āha deśe pi adhunātane iti deśe pi adhunātane

original: samprati pramīyamāṇe,
analyzed: samprati pramīyamāṇe

original: apratyakṣatopalabdhir evety arthaḥ. yadi tv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ kvacin mahānasādau apratyakṣopalabdhir
analyzed: apratyakṣa tā upalabdhiḥ evā iti arthaḥ yadi tu agni dhūma ākṛtyoḥ kvacid mahānasa ādau apratyakṣā upalabdhiḥ

original: iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gateḥ pratyakṣatvād astīty āha -- kvacid iti // 139 //
analyzed: iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte gateḥ pratyakṣa tvāt asti iti āha kvacid iti

original: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ity uktam. idānīṃ sāmānyato
analyzed: evam tāvat pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa tā sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa tayā saṅkīryate iti uktam idānīm sāmānyatas

original: dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ity āha -- yadīti pādatrayeṇa.
analyzed: dṛṣṭa tā api pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa abhimata agni ākṛti anumāne saṅkīryate iti āha yadi iti pāda trayeṇa

original: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭateṣyate,
analyzed: yadi hi devadatta ādi dharmi antara apekṣā eva āditye gati anumānasya sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa tā iṣyate

original: sā tarhi mahānasādidharmyantarāpekṣayāgnidhūmayor api gamyagamakatvenāvasthitayoḥ prāpnoty eva. sāmānyato hy avivakṣitadeśādibhedam idam avagataṃ  #
analyzed: sā tarhi mahānasa ādi dharmi antara apekṣayā agni dhūmayoḥ api gamya gamaka tvena avasthitayoḥ prāpnoti eva sāmānyatas hi avivakṣita deśa ādi bhedam idam avagatam

original: dhūmavān agnimān iti,
analyzed: dhūmavān agnimān iti

original: yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇam iti. ataḥ pratiyogitvarahitam evedam
analyzed: yathā deśa antara prāpti adhikaraṇam gati adhikaraṇam iti atas pratiyogi tva rahitam eva idam

original: ubhayam iti dvaividhyānupapattir ity ākṣepaḥ. evam ākṣioya samādadhāti -- tasmād
analyzed: ubhayam iti dvaividhya anupapattiḥ iti ākṣepaḥ evam samādadhāti tasmāt

original: evaṃ pracakṣata iti. yathoktadvaividhyāsambhavād evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa dvaividhyaṃ
analyzed: evam pracakṣate iti yathā ukta dvaividhya asambhavāt evam vakṣyamāṇa prakāreṇa dvaividhyam

original: varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ // 140 //
analyzed: varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: tatra pratyakṣasambandhaṃ tāvad udāharati -- pratyakṣeti yudhyate 'ntena. yadā hi yayor evāgnidhūmaviśeṣayoḥ,
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa sambandham tāvat udāharati pratyakṣa iti yudhyate ntena yadā hi yayoḥ eva agni dhūma viśeṣayoḥ

original: gomayendhano yam agniḥ -- gomayam indhanam asyeti{3,
analyzed: gomaya indhanaḥ yam agniḥ gomayam indhanam

original: tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣa iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaś ca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra
analyzed: tad janyaḥ yam dhūma viśeṣaḥ iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matim kṛtvā punar ca kiyatā vilambanena anyatra

original: kvacid gatvā gatas san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tam evāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate,
analyzed: kvacid gatvā gataḥ san tad deśa sthena tena eva dhūma viśeṣeṇa tam eva agni viśeṣam budhyate

original: tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandham anumānaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ. anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭam
analyzed: tadā tad pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa sambandham anumānam bhavati iti arthaḥ anena ca viśeṣa dṛṣṭam

original: eva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam. pratyakṣaśabdena hi viśeṣo lakṣyate.
analyzed: eva pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa śabdena ucyate iti vyākhyātam pratyakṣa śabdena hi viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate

original: pratyakṣeṇa hy ayam evaṃvidho 'vāntaraviśeṣo gomayendhanatajjanyatvādirūpaś śakyate
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa hi ayam evaṃvidhaḥ vāntara viśeṣaḥ gomaya indhana tad janya tva ādi rūpaḥ śakyate

original: 'vagantum. na pramāṇāntareṇa. taddvāreṇa tv anumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti
analyzed: avagantum na pramāṇa antareṇa tad dvāreṇa tu anumānasya api tādṛśaḥ viśeṣaḥ viṣayaḥ bhavati iti

original: yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā. viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati
analyzed: yuktā eva pratyakṣa śabdena viśeṣa lakṣaṇā viśeṣa dṛṣṭam ca sāmānyatas dṛṣṭasya bhavati

original: pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattir iti bhāvaḥ. nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ nāma (na)
analyzed: pratiyogi iti dvaividhya upapattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu viśeṣa dṛṣṭam nāma na

original: pramāṇabhedaḥ. na cedaṃ pramāṇam,
analyzed: pramāṇa bhedaḥ na ca idam pramāṇam

original: gṛhītaviṣayatvāt. taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminn eva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgnir anumīyate. ato deśabhedābhāvād aprāmāṇyam eva,
analyzed: gṛhīta viṣaya tvāt tad deśa sthitena eva hi dhūmena tasmin eva deśe saḥ eva gomaya indhana janya agniḥ anumīyate atas deśa bheda abhāvāt aprāmāṇyam eva

original: ata āha -- tasyeti pādatrayeṇa. tasyaivaṃvidhasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt
analyzed: atas āha tasya iti pāda trayeṇa tasya evaṃvidhasya pratyakṣa dṛṣṭasya sandihyamāna sadbhāva vastu bodhāt

original: pramāṇatā bhavati. yady api deśabhedo nāsti. kālabhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśayocchedadvāreṇa
analyzed: pramāṇa tā bhavati yadi api deśa bhedaḥ na asti kāla bhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśaya uccheda dvāreṇa

original: prāmāṇyam avihatam iti. etac ca vindhyavāsināpi viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenodāhṛtam ity āha --
analyzed: prāmāṇyam avihatam iti etat ca vindhyavāsinā api viśeṣa dṛṣṭa tvena udāhṛtam iti āha

original: viśeṣadṛṣṭam iti // 143 //
analyzed: viśeṣa dṛṣṭam iti

original: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇam idaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam. evaṃ hi viśeṣa
analyzed: yadi viśeṣa dṛṣṭa udāharaṇam idam katham tarhi bhāṣye ākṛti grahaṇam evam hi viśeṣa

original: eva darśayitavyo bhavet. ata āha -- ākṛtyor eveti. ayam arthaḥ -- kenacid gomayendhanatvādināyāntaraviśeṣeṇopadarśitayor{3,
analyzed: eva darśayitavyaḥ bhavet atas āha ākṛtyoḥ eva iti ayam arthaḥ kenacid

original: 87}ākṛtyor evātra hetusādhyatvam. evaṃ hy atra pratyayaḥ. sa evāyam adya yāvadanuvartamāno
analyzed: eva atra hetu sādhya tvam evam hi atra pratyayaḥ saḥ eva ayam adya yāvat anuvartamānaḥ

original: gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate. ata eva tadindhanayonir agnir anuvartata
analyzed: gomaya indhana vikārasya dhūmasya ākāraḥ dṛśyate atas eva tad indhana yoniḥ agniḥ anuvartata

original: ity ato nānupapannam ākṛtigrahaṇam iti // 144 //
analyzed: iti atas na anupapannam ākṛti grahaṇam iti

original: yady evam avivakṣitāvāntaraviśeṣam agnidhūmāntaram eva sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇatayā
analyzed: yadi evam avivakṣita avāntara viśeṣam agni dhūma antaram eva sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa udāharaṇatayā

original: vācyam. kim ādityodāharaṇena. ata āha -- agnidhūmāntaratve ceti. yathā hy agnidhūmākṛtyos
analyzed: vācyam kim āditya udāharaṇena atas āha agni dhūma antara tve ca iti yathā hi agni dhūma ākṛtyoḥ

original: tṛṇadārugomayenthanādijanmā suvyakto viśeṣaḥ sarvapramātṛsvasaṃvedyo bhavati,
analyzed: tṛṇa dāru gomaya inthana ādi janmā su vyaktaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarva pramātṛ sva saṃvedyaḥ bhavati

original: naivaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ. ataḥ prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānam āditya ekāntatas sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham iti yuktam evādityodāharaṇam  #
analyzed: na evam gati prāpti ākṛtyoḥ atas prāpti ākṛti mātrāt gati ākṛti mātra anumānam ādityaḥ ekāntataḥ sāmānyataḥ dṛṣṭa sambandham iti yuktam eva āditya udāharaṇam  /
iti

original: kiṃ punas sāmānyatas sambandhagrahaṇe pramāṇam. na hy agṛhītayos sambandhinos sambandhagrahaṇam
analyzed: kim punar sāmānyatas sambandha grahaṇe pramāṇam na hi agṛhītayoḥ sambandhinoḥ sambandha grahaṇam

original: asti. na ca sāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣagrahaṇaṃ sambhavati. tasya svalakṣaṇaikaviṣayatvāt.
analyzed: asti na ca sāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣa grahaṇam sambhavati tasya sva lakṣaṇa eka viṣaya tvāt

original: nānumānam anavasthāpātāt. ata āha -- pratyakṣaviṣayatvam iti. bhaved anavasthā,
analyzed: na anumānam anavasthā pātāt atas āha pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam iti bhavet anavasthā

original: yady anumānena sāmānyagrahaṇam iṣyate. tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvam
analyzed: yadi anumānena sāmānya grahaṇam iṣyate tasya tu sa vikalpaka siddhau pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam

original: upapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ pratyakṣatvam atas siddhaṃ sāmānyasyeti. nanu vastv eva na
analyzed: upapādya ante upasaṃhṛtam pratyakṣa tvam atas siddham sāmānyasya iti nanu vastu eva na

original: sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti nāma. tasya bhinnābhinnasyānirūpaṇād ata āha -- vastutvaṃ ceti.
analyzed: sāmānyam kiñcid asti nāma tasya bhinna abhinnasya anirūpaṇāt atas āha vastu tvam ca iti

original: vastutvam apy ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate. pratyakṣaviṣayatāpratipādanena
analyzed: vastu tvam api ākṛti granthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate pratyakṣa viṣaya tā pratipādanena

original: ca pratyakṣe 'pi prasādhitaprāyam eva. atra ca asti sāmānyavastuṣv ity anvayopapādanāya
analyzed: ca pratyakṣe pi prasādhita prāyam eva atra ca asti sāmānya vastuṣu iti anvaya upapādanāya

original: sāmānyasya vastutvam upanyastam eva. ayaṃ tu hetukathanārthaḥ punarupanyāsa iti.
analyzed: sāmānyasya vastu tvam upanyastam eva ayam tu hetu kathana arthaḥ punar upanyāsaḥ iti

original: yas tu haituko na hetum antareṇa pramāṇāntarasiddhāv ādriyate. taṃ prati hetunaivobhayam
analyzed: yaḥ tu haitukaḥ na hetum antareṇa pramāṇa antara siddhau ādriyate tam prati hetunā eva ubhayam

original: upapādayiṣyāma ity āha -- atreti // 146 //
analyzed: upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti āha atra iti

original: {3,88} tatra vastutvaprasādhanārthaṃ tāvad hetum āha -- dhūmād agnyanumānasyeti.
analyzed: tatra vastu tva prasādhana artham tāvat hetum āha dhūmāt agni anumānasya iti

original: bauddhā hy avastusāmānyālambanam anumānam ācakṣate. sāmānyasya vikalpākāramātrābhyupagamāt.
analyzed: bauddhāḥ hi avastu sāmānya ālambanam anumānam ācakṣate sāmānyasya vikalpa ākāra mātra abhyupagamāt

original: ata eva bhrāntir evānumānaṃ,
analyzed: atas eva bhrāntiḥ eva anumānam

original: sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpam upasthāpayatīti pramāṇam ity āhuḥ. tān eva pratīdam
analyzed: sambandha balena sva lakṣaṇa rūpam upasthāpayati iti pramāṇam iti āhuḥ tān eva prati idam

original: ucyate -- vastv ālambanam anumānam abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt yathā svārthe śrotrādibuddhiḥ.
analyzed: ucyate vastu ālambanam anumānam abhāva anya pramāṇa tvāt yathā svārthe śrotra ādi buddhiḥ

original: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhir indriyair buddhir janyate,
analyzed: yā hi sva viṣaye śrotra ādibhiḥ indriyaiḥ buddhiḥ janyate

original: sā vastv ālambanaiva. yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārthaḥ prāpyakāritvād
analyzed: sā vastu ālambanā eva yena ca yat indriyam sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārthaḥ prāpya kāri tvāt

original: indriyāṇām. tad iha mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānanirākaraṇārthaṃ svārthaviśeṣaṇam. aviśeṣeṇopādāne
analyzed: indriyāṇām tat iha mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna nirākaraṇa artham svārtha viśeṣaṇam aviśeṣeṇa upādāne

original: tu nābhāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet. bhrāntīnām ubhayavikalatvāt.
analyzed: tu na abhāva anya pramāṇa tvasya vastu ālambana tayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet bhrāntīnām ubhaya vikala tvāt

original: na hi tāḥ pramāṇam. na ca vastv ālambanāḥ. anyasamprayuktendriyasya hi tā anyaviṣayā
analyzed: na hi tāḥ pramāṇam na ca vastu ālambanāḥ anya samprayukta indriyasya hi tāḥ anya viṣayā

original: jāyante. īdṛśam eva jñānam avastvālambanaṃ,
analyzed: jāyante īdṛśam eva jñānam avastu ālambanam

original: na punaratyantāsadartham. evaṃ vastvālambanatve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ
analyzed: na punar atyanta asat artham evam vastu ālambana tve numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyam

original: vastv ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ cāvastvālambanatvam anumānasyārthapadaṃ prayuñjānena
analyzed: vastu iti uktam bhavati idam ca avastu ālambana tvam anumānasya artha padam prayuñjānena

original: bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam. anarthaviṣayam anumānam iti bauddhā manyante. yadvad iti(?)
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam anartha viṣayam anumānam iti bauddhāḥ manyante yadvat iti

original: svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntir apy arthasambandhena pravṛttes tadavyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti,
analyzed: sva pratibhāse na arthe rtha adhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhena pravṛtteḥ tad avyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti

original: teṣām idam uttaram arthas sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva. na vikalpākāramātram ity ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyata iti // 147
analyzed: teṣām idam uttaram arthaḥ sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayaḥ bāhyaḥ eva na vikalpa ākāra mātram iti ākṛti granthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate iti

original: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati -- sāmānyasya ca vastutvam iti.
analyzed: evam arthāt vastu tvam prasādhya āhratya prasādhayati sāmānyasya ca vastu tvam iti

original: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvād asādhāraṇavastuvad iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha
analyzed: sāmānyam vastu abhāva anya prameya tvāt asādhāraṇa vastu vat iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha

original: iti. pratyakṣaviṣayatām idānīṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- pratyakṣeti pādatrayeṇa. yadabhāvānyaprameyaṃ
analyzed: iti pratyakṣa viṣaya tām idānīm prayogeṇa darśayati pratyakṣa iti pāda trayeṇa yad abhāva anya prameyam

original: tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata eva. yathā saugatānām evāsādhāraṇaṃ vastv iti // 148 //
analyzed: tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate eva yathā saugatānām eva asādhāraṇam vastu iti

original: {3,89} bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānām anavasthā prasajyata ity āha -- sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ
analyzed: bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumāna eka viṣayam manvānānām anavasthā prasajyate iti āha sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ

original: yadi tūcyate liṅgabhūtasāmānyagrahaṇārtham anumānāpekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati,
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate liṅga bhūta sāmānya grahaṇa artham anumāna apekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati

original: na tadgrahaṇārtham anumānam apekṣyate,
analyzed: na tad grahaṇa artham anumānam apekṣyate

original: dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanaprabhavavikalpavedyatvāt tasya. na cāsāv apramāṇam,
analyzed: dhūma ādi sva lakṣaṇa darśana prabhava vikalpa vedya tvāt tasya na ca asau apramāṇam

original: arthakriyāsamarthavastupratilambhāt. na ca pramāṇam anarthaviṣayatvāt. ato 'nirvacanīyavikalpasiddhatvāt
analyzed: artha kriyā samartha vastu pratilambhāt na ca pramāṇam anartha viṣaya tvāt atas nirvacanīya vikalpa siddha tvāt

original: liṅgasya nānavasthā bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- atheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pramāṇam
analyzed: liṅgasya na anavasthā bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha atha iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat pramāṇam

original: apramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati. viruddhasvabhāvayor ekatra pratiṣedhe 'nyatarāpatter
analyzed: apramāṇam ca jñānam sambhavati viruddha svabhāvayoḥ ekatra pratiṣedhe nyatara āpatteḥ

original: aparihāryatvāt. apramāṇasya ca prameyavyavasthāpanāśakter avaśyaṃ pramāṇam eva tajjñānam
analyzed: aparihārya tvāt apramāṇasya ca prameya vyavasthāpana aśakteḥ avaśyam pramāṇam eva tat jñānam

original: abhyupagantavyam. pratyakṣānumānānabhyupagamāc ca pramāṇāntaram evāpadyeta.{3,
analyzed: abhyupagantavyam pratyakṣa anumāna anabhyupagamāt ca pramāṇa antaram

original: 90}pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sad yathā talliṅgasaṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate,
analyzed: ca sat yathā tat liṅga saṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate

original: evaṃ liṅginy api prāpnoti. evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇaprasaṅgo bhavet. pramāṇād apramāṇād veti vadannanirdhāritobhayarūpatāṃ vikalpasya darśayatīti
analyzed: evam liṅginī api prāpnoti evam ca vakṣyamāṇa prasaṅgaḥ bhavet pramāṇāt apramāṇāt vā iti vadan anirdhārita ubhaya rūpa tām vikalpasya darśayati iti

original: astu tarhi liṅgino 'pi tathaivāvagamaḥ,
analyzed: astu tarhi tathā eva avagamaḥ

original: ko doṣaḥ,
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: ata āha -- evam apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumānocchedāpādanam
analyzed: atas āha evam api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumāna uccheda āpādanam

original: abhimatam. pramāṇāntarābhyupagame 'pi cānumānocchedo bhavaty eva. tad eva hi pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: abhimatam pramāṇa antara abhyupagame ca anumāna ucchedaḥ bhavati eva tat eva hi pramāṇam

original: tadā sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisāmānyasyāvabodhakaṃ bhaved iti // 155 //
analyzed: tadā sarvasya liṅga liṅgi sāmānyasya avabodhakam bhavet iti

original: yadi tv ekarūpābhyupagame 'pramāṇatvam eva liṅgajñānasyeṣyate,
analyzed: yadi tu eka rūpa abhyupagame pramāṇa tvam eva liṅga jñānasya iṣyate

original: tato 'pramāṇāvagatāl liṅgāl liṅgijñānam api mithyā bhavet. bāṣpād iva dhūmasaṃviditād
analyzed: pramāṇa avagatāt liṅgāt liṅgi jñānam api mithyā bhavet bāṣpāt iva dhūma saṃviditāt

original: agnijñānam. evaṃ ca nānumānam iti. sa evānumānasya nityocchedaṃ ity abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: agni jñānam evam ca na anumānam iti saḥ eva anumānasya nitya ucchedam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: -- apramāṇāvabuddhād iti // 156 //
analyzed: a pramāṇa avabuddhāt iti

original: atra codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hy apramāṇam eva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅgajñānam api bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ // 157
analyzed: atra codayati nanu iti yathā hi apramāṇam eva sambandha smaraṇam pramāṇa kāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅga jñānam api bhaviṣyati iti arthaḥ  /

original: pariharati -- tatreti. smṛtir hi pūrvajñānād bhavantī tadupasthāpanadvāreṇānumāyām upayujyate. tac ca pramāṇam eveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta  #
analyzed: pariharati tatra iti smṛtiḥ hi pūrva jñānāt bhavantī tad upasthāpana dvāreṇa anumāyām upayujyate tat ca pramāṇam eva iti tad anusārī nirṇayaḥ
iti

original: {3,91} na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. na hy atra prāg api liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate,
analyzed: na ca eṣa prakāraḥ liṅga gatau sambhavati iti āha na tu iti na hi atra prāk api liṅga avagame pramāṇam kiñcid upapadyate

original: yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti. na ca liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eveti vācyam. pūrvapramāṇābhāvād evety āha -- tadabhāvād iti // 159 //
analyzed: yat pramāṇa jñānena upasthāpyate iti na ca liṅga jñānam api smṛtiḥ evā iti vācyam pūrva pramāṇa abhāvāt evā iti āha tad abhāvāt iti

original: nanu nirvikalpakagṛhītadhūmādisvalakṣaṇapariprāpakatayā liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eva.
analyzed: nanu nirvikalpaka gṛhīta dhūma ādi sva lakṣaṇa pariprāpaka tayā liṅga jñānam api smṛtiḥ eva

original: ato 'trāpi nirvikalpakapramāṇāntarato nirṇayo yukta eva. ata āha -- smārtam iti.
analyzed: nirvikalpaka pramāṇa antarataḥ nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ eva atas āha smārtam iti

original: yathā samprati sambandhajñānaṃ gṛhītaprāpakatayā smaraṇam,
analyzed: yathā samprati sambandha jñānam gṛhīta prāpaka tayā smaraṇam

original: evam etad api liṅgajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtam iti yo
analyzed: evam etat api liṅga jñānam nirvikalpaka gṛhīta prāpaka tayā tad abhedena smārtam iti yo

original: vadati tasya vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaśaktir anivāritā. gṛhītaviṣayā hi smṛtir iti
analyzed: vadati tasya vandhyā sute smaraṇa śaktiḥ a nivāritā gṛhīta viṣayā hi smṛtiḥ iti

original: sthitiḥ. na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanam iti kathaṃ
analyzed: sthitiḥ na ca liṅga sāmānya jñānam nirvikalpaka gṛhīta sva lakṣaṇa ālambanam iti katham

original: smṛtiḥ. yad atra prakāśate tan na gṛhītaṃ,
analyzed: smṛtiḥ yat atra prakāśate tat na gṛhītam

original: yac ca gṛhītaṃ tan na prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam. agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti // 160 //
analyzed: yat ca gṛhītam tat na prakāśate iti na smṛti tvam agṛhīta gocarāyām tu smṛtau vandhyā sute smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: nanv anumānena liṅgasāmānyajñāne 'navasthā bhavati,
analyzed: nanu anumānena liṅga sāmānya jñāne navasthā bhavati

original: yadi sāmānyātmakam eva liṅgaṃ tadgrahaṇārtham iṣyate,
analyzed: yadi sāmānya ātmakam eva liṅgam tad grahaṇa artham iṣyate

original: tasyānumānavedyatvāt. asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: tasya anumāna vedya tvāt asādhāraṇaḥ eva artha ātmā sāmānya jñāne liṅgam bhaviṣyati

original: sa ca pratyakṣa eveti nānavasthā. ata āha -- na ceti. kiṃ na kāraṇam ata āha -- yasmād
analyzed: sa ca pratyakṣaḥ eva iti na anavasthā atas āha na ca iti kim na kāraṇam atas āha yasmāt

original: iti. dṛṣṭāvinābhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāvaḥ kathañcid
analyzed: iti dṛṣṭa avinābhāvam liṅgam bhavati na ca asya tena sāmānyena avinābhāvaḥ kathañcid

original: deśataḥ kālato vā dṛṣṭaḥ. asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣv anusyūtyasambhavād ekatra dṛṣṭasya
analyzed: deśataḥ kālataḥ vā dṛṣṭaḥ asādhāraṇasya bhāva antareṣu anusyūti asambhavāt ekatra dṛṣṭasya

original: ca tatraiva niruddhatvād iti // 161 //
analyzed: ca tatra eva niruddha tvāt iti

original: {3,92} sambandhadarśanābhyupagame vā kṛtakatvādivat sāmānyarūpatāpattir ity āha -- syād veti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti // 162 //
analyzed: sambandha darśana abhyupagame vā kṛtaka tva ādi vat sāmānya rūpatā āpattiḥ iti āha syāt vā iti atra kāraṇam āha na hi iti

original: itaś cāsādhāraṇo 'rthātmā na liṅgam ity āha -- na ceti. dhūmādir hi dhūmo 'yam ityādivikalpāspadīkṛto
analyzed: itas ca asādhāraṇaḥ rtha ātmā na liṅgam iti āha na ca iti dhūma ādiḥ hi dhūmaḥ yam ityādi vikalpa āspadīkṛtaḥ

original: 'gnyāder liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam. asādhāraṇas tu kenacid rūpeṇāpy avyapadeśyaḥ kathaṃ liṅga
analyzed: gni ādeḥ liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam asādhāraṇaḥ tu kenacid rūpeṇa api a vyapadeśyaḥ katham liṅga

original: bhaved iti. liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. nanu tiraścām asaty
analyzed: bhavet iti liṅga tvam nā upapadyate iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti nanu tiraścām asati

original: eva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśinām evānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvād aliṅgatvam
analyzed: eva śabda ullekhe sādhāraṇa rūpa darśinām eva anumānam dṛṣṭam atas na avyapadeśya tvāt aliṅga tvam

original: ata āha -- vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
analyzed: atas āha vikalpa iti pāda trayeṇa ayam abhiprāyaḥ mā nāma tiraścām śabda ullekhaḥ bhavet

original: arthavikalpas tu teṣām api pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'sty eva. ato yuktam eva teṣām
analyzed: artha vikalpaḥ tu teṣām api pūrva apara anusandhāna ātmakaḥ sti eva atas yuktam eva teṣām

original: anumāne 'vyapadeśyasyāpi liṅgatvam. asādhāraṇas tu pūrvāparānusandhānād vinārthavikalparahito
analyzed: anumāne vyapadeśyasya api liṅga tvam asādhāraṇaḥ tu pūrva apara anusandhānāt vinā artha vikalpa rahitaḥ

original: 'pīti kathaṃ liṅgam. na hi so 'yam ity anārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gner liṅgaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: pi iti katham liṅgam na hi saḥ yam iti an ārūḍhaḥ buddhau dhūmaḥ gneḥ liṅgam bhavati

original: na caivam asādhāraṇe sambhavati,
analyzed: na ca evam asādhāraṇe sambhavati

original: pūrvāparānusandhānāgocaratvāt tasyeti // 163 //
analyzed: pūrva apara anusandhāna agocara tvāt tasya iti

original: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'py anvayābhāvād aliṅgaṃ,
analyzed: asmad mate pi ye sādhāraṇa ātmānaḥ dhūma ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ vikalpyante te pi anvaya abhāvāt aliṅgam

original: kim aṅga punarnirvikalpakaikagocaro 'sādhāraṇo 'rthātmā ity āha -- kalpyanta iti. anvayābhāvād evāsādhāraṇajñānam api liṅgisāmānyajñāne na  #
analyzed: kim aṅga punar nirvikalpaka eka gocaraḥ sādhāraṇaḥ rtha ātmā iti āha kalpyante iti anvaya abhāvāt eva asādhāraṇa jñānam api liṅgi sāmānya jñāne na

original: liṅgam ity āha -- etasmād eveti // 164 //
analyzed: liṅgam iti āha etasmāt eva iti

original: yadi tv anvayasiddhyartham asādhāraṇasya sāmānyarūpateṣyate,

original: tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt tasyāpy anavadhāraṇam ity āha -{3,
analyzed: tatas liṅga sāmānya grahaṇe iva anavasthā prasaṅgāt tasya api anavadhāraṇam iti āha

original: 93}sāmānyeti. yadi tu kasmiṃścid evāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe nyadarśināpi
analyzed: yadi tu kasmiṃścid eva asādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñāta sambandhe nyadarśinā api

original: sāmānyam anumīyate. evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet. aviśeṣād ity
analyzed: sāmānyam anumīyate evam tarhi sarvaḥ eva sarvasya pratyāyakaḥ bhavet aviśeṣāt iti

original: āha -- kvacid veti // 165 //
analyzed: āha kvacid vā iti

original: evaṃ tāvan na liṅgāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam astīty uktam. idānīm anvayagrahaṇakāle liṅgijñāne
analyzed: evam tāvat na liṅga avadhāraṇe pramāṇam asti iti uktam idānīm anvaya grahaṇa kāle liṅgi jñāne

original: 'pi na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty āha -- sambandhānubhava iti. nāgṛhīte liṅgini tatsambaddhaṃ
analyzed: na kiñcid pramāṇam asti iti āha sambandha anubhavaḥ iti na agṛhīte liṅgini tat sambaddham

original: liṅgaṃ śakyate 'vagantum. na cānumānapravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavanaḥ
analyzed: liṅgam śakyate vagantum na ca anumāna pravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānya ātmani bhavanaḥ

original: kiñcit pramāṇam asty asmākam iva pratyakṣam,
analyzed: kiñcid pramāṇam asti asmākam iva pratyakṣam

original: ato liṅginy apy avagamyamāne 'navasthāprasaṅga ity abhiprāyaḥ // 166 //
analyzed: atas liṅgini api avagamyamāne navasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: nanv anādikālīnavāsanāmātranibandhana evāyaṃ liṅgaliṅgisaṃvyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: nanu anādi kālīna vāsanā mātra nibandhanaḥ eva ayam liṅga liṅgi saṃvyavahāraḥ

original: kim ihātinirbandhena. kācid eva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcil liṅgākāraṃ vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī
analyzed: kim iha ati nirbandhena kācid eva hi vāsanā udbhūtā kiñcid liṅga ākāram vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī

original: kiñcid evānumānasaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati. yathāhuḥ -- sa evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro
analyzed: kiñcid eva anumāna saṃvyavahāram pravartayati yathā āhuḥ saḥ eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ

original: buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena,
analyzed: buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena

original: na bahissadasattvam apekṣata iti,
analyzed: na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti

original: ata āha -- na cāpīti. na vāsanāmātranirmitaṃ liṅgajñānam. vāsanā hi pūrvānubhavāhitas

original: saṃskāraḥ. nāsau liṅgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsatas sambhavatīti kathaṃ
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ na asau liṅga sāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat atyanta asataḥ sambhavati iti katham

original: vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti. tannibandhane ca liṅgajñāna iṣyamāṇe tadvad
analyzed: vāsanā mātrāt liṅga jñānasya sambhavaḥ iti tad nibandhane ca liṅga jñāne iṣyamāṇe tadvat

original: eva liṅgijñānopapatter anarthakaṃ trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam ity anumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam

original: ity āha -- liṅgijñānaṃ ceti // 167 //
analyzed: iti āha liṅgi jñānam ca iti

original: {3,94} nanv iyam anavasthā meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvānumāne bhavato 'pi samānaiva,
analyzed: nanu iyam anavasthā megha abhāvena vṛṣṭi abhāva anumāne bhavataḥ samānā eva

original: abhāvasyānupalabdhiliṅgatvāt. sajātīyaliṅgāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthāpadyate. ata āha -- yatreti. yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāv
analyzed: abhāvasya anupalabdhi liṅga tvāt sajātīya liṅga antara apekṣāyām anavasthā āpadyate atas āha yatra iti yatra hi vṛṣṭi abhāve megha abhāvaḥ liṅgam na asau

original: abhāvākhyapramāṇāntaragamyatvāt. ato nātra tulyajātīyāpekṣānibandhano 'navasthādoṣo jāyata iti // 168 //
analyzed: abhāva ākhya pramāṇa antara gamya tvāt atas na atra tulya jātīya apekṣā nibandhanaḥ navasthā doṣaḥ jāyate iti

original: pratyakṣasāmānyavādināṃ tu na naḥ kācid anavasthety āha -- pratyakṣāvagatād iti. ataḥ pratyakṣād ity arthaḥ // 169 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa sāmānya vādinām tu na naḥ kācid anavasthā iti āha pratyakṣa avagatāt iti atas pratyakṣāt iti arthaḥ  /

original: anumitānumāne tarhy anavasthā,
analyzed: anumita anumāne tarhi anavasthā

original: ata āha -- yatrāpīti. pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptir maulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
analyzed: atas āha yatra api iti pratyakṣā hi deśa antara prāptiḥ maulikam mūle bhavam liṅgam

original: tena gatim anumāyāditye gatisādhane 'numīyamāne nānavasthety abhiprāyaḥ // 170 //
analyzed: tena gatim anumāya āditye gati sādhane numīyamāne na anavasthā iti abhiprāyaḥ  /

original: nanv anityaś śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt,
analyzed: nanu anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt

original: kṛtakatvaṃ ca tatra darśanād ity evaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarād anumāne 'navasthā bhaved ata āha --  #
analyzed: kṛtaka tvam ca tatra darśanāt iti evam karma anantara bhāvi tayā kṛtaka tve sādhyamāne karmaṇaḥ u pi hetu antarāt anumāne navasthā bhavet atas āha  /

original: liṅgatvam iti.
analyzed: liṅga tvam iti

original: kṛtakatvānumāne hi karmaike tatra darśanād /
analyzed: kṛtaka tva anumāne hi karma eke tatra darśanāt

original: iti kārakavyāpārānantarabhāvitvaṃ liṅgam uktam. tatra ca kārakaviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakam anantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṃṣalliṅgam āpatati.
analyzed: iti kāraka vyāpāra anantara bhāvi tvam liṅgam uktam tatra ca kāraka viśiṣṭā kriyā tad viśiṣṭam vā kārakam anantara bhāvi tām viśiṃṣat liṅgam āpatati

original: 95}ca tatpratyakṣam. kriyāyās tāvat pratyakṣatvam anantaram eva sādhitam. kārakam
analyzed: tat pratyakṣam kriyāyāḥ tāvat pratyakṣa tvam anantaram eva sādhitam kārakam

original: api tadvat pratyakṣam eva. śaktis tu parokṣā. sā ca na tāvad iha liṅgam. na cānumeyā.
analyzed: api tadvat pratyakṣam eva śaktiḥ tu parokṣā sā ca na tāvat iha liṅgam na ca anumeyā

original: ataḥ kriyākārakayor ubhayor api pratyakṣatvān na dūragamanam. anumeyakarmavādinām
analyzed: atas kriyā kārakayoḥ ubhayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt na dūra gamanam anumeya karma vādinām

original: api hi phalāvadhyavasthānān nānavasthā,
analyzed: api hi phala avadhi avasthānāt na anavasthā

original: nitarām asmākam iti // 171 //
analyzed: nitarām asmākam iti

original: evaṃ tāvadanumānasyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityam uktam idānīṃ
analyzed: evam tāvat anumānasya asati sāmānyasya vastu tve pratyakṣa tve ca dausthityam uktam idānīm

original: sarvam eva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānyāśrayatvāt.
analyzed: sarvam eva pramāṇa jātam sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānya āśraya tvāt

original: na ca tadapramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇanyāyād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- evam iti // 172 //

original: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvam eṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyakṣatvam,

original: itarathā tv anavasthā prāpnotīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 173 //

original: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastunā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti,
analyzed: evam tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣa tvam vastunā ca upapāditāḥ idānīm viśeṣāḥ eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyante iti ye vadanti

original: tān pratyāha -- pratyakṣeti. viśeṣo hi yadi tāvadavayavī dravyam abhimataḥ,
analyzed: tān pratyāha pratyakṣa iti viśeṣaḥ hi yadi tāvat avayavī dravyam abhimataḥ

original: sa cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣas sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhiḥ kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti // 174 //
analyzed: sa ca avayava vastu antara apekṣaḥ sāmānya aṃśaḥ smābhiḥ kīrtyate iti katham pratyakṣaḥ iti

original: yadi tv avayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante,
analyzed: yadi tu avayavi rūpa ādayaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ iṣyante

original: tad apy ayuktam. te 'pi hi svaviśeṣanīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyam evety āha -- rūpādayo hīti.{3,
analyzed: tat api ayuktam te hi sva viśeṣa nīla ādi apekṣayā sāmānyam eva iti āha rūpa ādayaḥ

original: 96}yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam. tan na. teṣām apy avāntaranīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvād ity āha -- svaviśeṣān iti // 175 //
analyzed: tu nīla ādayaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ iti matam tat na teṣām api avāntara nīla ādi apekṣayā sāmānya rūpa tvāt iti āha sva viśeṣān iti

original: yadi tv ekabhramarādidravyanīlimaiva viśeṣa iṣyate,
analyzed: yadi tu eka bhramara ādi dravya nīlimā eva viśeṣaḥ iṣyate

original: tan na. tasyāpi pakṣādisvāvayavāśritanīlaviśeṣāpekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvāt. pakṣanīlimāpi

original: tadavayavanīlāpekṣayā sāmānyam eva. evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhyaḥ prasaṅgo darśayitavya
analyzed: tad avayava nīla apekṣayā sāmānyam eva evam ca a paramāṇubhyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ darśayitavya

original: ity āha -- te cāpīti. nirbhāgā hi paramāṇava iti tadrūpam asādhāraṇam eveti. tebhyas
analyzed: iti āha te ca api iti nirbhāgāḥ hi paramāṇavaḥ iti tad rūpam asādhāraṇam eva iti tebhyaḥ

original: tu prāk dvyaṇukarūpam api dvayos sādhāraṇam ity āha -- dvyaṇukasyāpīti // 176 //

original: nanv astu paramāṇurūpam eva viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: nanu astu paramāṇu rūpam eva viśeṣaḥ

original: sa eva naḥ pratyakṣo bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na cāntyeneti. vyavahārārthaṃ hi pramāṇam anusriyate,

original: na vyasanitayā. na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid astīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti. nanūpekṣāphalam api pramāṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
analyzed: na vyasani tayā na ca antyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid asti iti kim tad pratyakṣa tayā iti nanu upekṣā phalam api pramāṇam bhavati eva

original: ata āha -- na ceti. na naḥ paramāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti na naḥ paramāṇūnām rūpam sthūle vartamānānām tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣam vibhaktānām vā iti na kathañcid viśeṣa viṣaya tā

original: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnās sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyam ekam. ataḥ kathaṃ tatsāvayaveṣu
analyzed: nanu paramāṇavaḥ eva bhinnāḥ sañcitāḥ gṛhyante na kārya dravyam ekam atas katham tat sa avayaveṣu

analyzed: sāmānyam iti ucyate sañcitāḥ eva ca ananya vṛtti tayā viśeṣa asādhāraṇa ādi pada vācyāḥ iti

original: te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti. mā nāmaikaikataḥ paramāṇur akṣagocaro bhaved ata āha --
analyzed: te pratyakṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti mā nāma ekaikataḥ paramāṇuḥ akṣa gocaraḥ bhavet atas āha

original: bhedeneti. eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bhāvaḥ prakāśate na paramāṇubhedāḥ. na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo

analyzed: bhedaḥ gṛhyate iti sāmpratam saṃvid virodhāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu ayam eva

original: 97}yo 'yam abhinnaprakāśaḥ,

original: nanv asaty apy ekasmin samudāyālambano 'yam abhinnāvabhāso bhaviṣyatīty ata āha --
analyzed: nanu asati api ekasmin samudāya ālambanaḥ yam abhinna avabhāsaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha

analyzed: yad ālambanaḥ bhinna pratibhāsaḥ bhaviṣyati api ca sarvadā sarve ca ekam dravyam avabudhyante katham tat anyathā bhaviṣyati iti āha na ca sarvadā iti

original: kiñcāyaṃ samudāyo 'pi naikajātyā vinopapadyeta. na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu
analyzed: kiñca ayam samudāyaḥ na eka jātyā vinā upapadyeta na hi nānā jātīyeṣu vṛkṣa ghaṭa loṣṭeṣu

analyzed: kasyacid samudāya buddhiḥ asti atas samudāye pīṣyamāṇe ṇu tva sāmānyam abhyupagantavyam

original: āpadyeta bhavatām ity āha -- na ceti. hetau caḥ // 180 //
analyzed: āpadyeta bhavatām iti āha na ca iti hetau caḥ

original: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyam abhyupagantuṃ śakyam. na caindriyakaṃ jñānam etā(?v i/
analyzed: nanu na aneka avayava vṛtti anusandhānena vinā tat sāmānya rūpam dravyam abhyupagantum śakyam na ca aindriyakam jñānam etau iti

analyzed: vati samartham avikalpaka tvāt tasya atas āha sāmānyam iti iti yadi api aneka anugama kṷpteḥ

original: tannānāvayavavyāsaṅgi dravyaṃ sāmānyam ity evaṃ vikalpya na gṛhyate. tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ
analyzed: tat nānā avayava vyāsaṅgi dravyam sāmānyam iti evam vikalpya na gṛhyate tathā api tat eka rūpam

original: tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
analyzed: tāvat nirvikalpakena api gṛhyate eva iti na apahnotum śakyate iti vyāsajya vṛtti avayavi sāmānya nyāyena

original: prativyaktivartino 'pi gotvādisāmānyasyaindriyakatvaṃ darśayitavyam. tad api sāmānyam
analyzed: prati vyakti vartinaḥ go tva ādi sāmānyasya aindriyaka tvam darśayitavyam tat api sāmānyam

original: ity anena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastutas sāmānyam eva gṛhyate. śabdādismaraṇottarakālaṃ tv

original: na tu prativyaktiniveśina iti // 181 //
analyzed: na tu prati vyakti niveśinaḥ iti

original: {3,98} ubhayatrāpi pratyayāviśeṣād ity āha -- vyāsajyeti. tadanenaitadāpāditam -- kim idaṃ mudhaiva sāmānyasya pratyakṣatā neṣyate,
analyzed: ubhayatra api pratyaya aviśeṣāt iti āha vyāsajya iti tat anena etat āpāditam kim idam mudhā eva sāmānyasya pratyakṣa tā na iṣyate

original: viśeṣam api hi pratyakṣam icchadbhir balāt sāmānyam eva pratyakṣam āśrayaṇīyam,

original: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpādes sāmānyarūpatvād,
analyzed: sarvasya hi su nipuṇam nirūpyamāṇasya rūpa ādeḥ sāmānya rūpa tvāt

original: dravyasya ca nānāvayavasādhāraṇasya tādrūpyāt,

original: svatantraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt.

original: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇy eva pratyakṣāṇi na
analyzed: atas vayavi sāmānyam tad samavetāni ca go tva ādi sāmānyāni sarvāṇi eva pratyakṣāṇi na

original: viśeṣā eveti tātparyam. evamparatvād eva ca pradeśāntarasiddhasāmānyāvayavisāmānyapratyakṣatāpratipādanena
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ eva iti tātparyam evamparatvāt eva ca pradeśa antara siddha sāmānya avayavi sāmānya pratyakṣa tā pratipādanena

original: na punaruktatā codanīyeti // 182 //
analyzed: na punarukta tā codanīyā iti

original: nanu bhavadbhir mīmāṃsakais tāvadavaśyam abhyupagantavyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ. atas teṣām
analyzed: nanu bhavadbhiḥ mīmāṃsakaiḥ tāvat avaśyam abhyupagantavyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ atas teṣām

original: evobhayasiddhānāṃ param ekākārabuddhijananaśaktimātram evopakalpitam. kiṃ dharmikalpanayā.
analyzed: eva ubhaya siddhānām param eka ākāra buddhi janana śakti mātram evā upakalpitam kim dharmi kalpanayā

original: laghīyasī hi tatkalpanāto dharmakalpanā. ata āha -- mīmāṃsakaiś ceti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ.
analyzed: laghīyasī hi tad kalpanā atas dharma kalpanā atas āha mīmāṃsakaiḥ ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: yad dhi pramāṇenopanīyate,
analyzed: yat hi pramāṇena upanīyate

original: tad asmābhir iṣyate,

analyzed: darśitam ca kiñcid vidhi vivaraṇe iti alam anena ati parispandena iti yatas eva sārthavādakāt

original: pravṛttinivṛttijñānam,
ata eva vidhivācinaḥ pratyayamātrasya padamātrasya vā yajetety evamādikasya vidhiśrutāv
analyzed: atas eva vidhi vācinaḥ pratyaya mātrasya pada mātrasya vā yajeta iti evamādikasya vidhi śrutau

original: api na śāstratvam. yatra hi tryaṃśabhāvanāvacanam apy avāntaravākyam anapekṣitārthavādakaṃ

original: na pravṛttau samarthaṃ,
analyzed: na pravṛttau samartham

original: katham iva tatra padapratyayayoś śaktir bhaviṣyatīti duradhigamam ity āha -- na padādyata iti // 6 //
analyzed: katham iva tatra pada pratyayayoḥ śaktiḥ bhaviṣyati iti duradhigamam iti āha na pada ādyatas iti

original: {3,104} evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇānupapattyā dūṣitaṃ bhāṣyam upapādayati -- aparīkṣeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vedavyākhyā hi prakṛtā,
analyzed: evam lakṣya lakṣaṇa anupapattyā dūṣitam bhāṣyam upapādayati aparīkṣā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ veda vyākhyā hi prakṛtā

original: ato yad eva tadupayogi tad eva vācyam ity atikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣam eva
analyzed: atas yat eva tad upayogi tat eva vācyam iti atikramya api sāmānya prakramam viśeṣam eva

analyzed: lakṣitavān na hi iha lakṣaṇa karaṇam eva svarūpeṇa vivakṣitam aparīkṣāt chalena hi

original: lakṣaṇāni praṇīyante. tatrāpi yad eva prakṛtopayogiśāstralakṣaṇaṃ tad eva kṛtam.
analyzed: lakṣaṇāni praṇīyante tatra api yat eva prakṛta upayogi śāstra lakṣaṇam tat eva kṛtam

analyzed: tatas kim atas āha tatra iti yadā hi ayam jalpākaḥ iva na anupayuktam bhāṣate iti sthitam

analyzed: nanu yadi anupayuktam na lakṣaṇīyam

original: na hi tadantareṇa puraḥ -- prathamam eva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādy avadhārayituṃ śakyate,

original: āha -- yat tv iti // 10 //

original: ato liṅgam api parārthaprayoge yam eva prati prayujyate tam eva pratipādayatīti samānam. atha yatheṣṭaviniyogas saṅketo 'bhidhīyate,
