original: {3,117} tad imaṃ pratyakṣato bhedam abhyupetyānumānād bhedakāraṇaṃ nirākaroti -- tatrāpīti. evaṃ hi manyate -- yady anumānāparicchinnaviṣayatayā
analyzed: tat imam pratyakṣataḥ bhedam abhyupetya anumānāt bheda kāraṇam nirākaroti tatra api iti evam hi manyate yadi anumāna aparicchinna viṣaya tayā

original: tarhi puṃvākyānām anāgamatvam,
analyzed: tarhi puṃvākyānām anāgama tvam

original: pramāṇāntaraparicchinnaviṣayavāt,
vedavākyāny eva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ity avyāpako hetur iti. kiṃ punar idam aniṣṭam āpāditam,
analyzed: veda vākyāni eva tu māna antara aviṣaya arthāni bhidyante iti avyāpakaḥ hetuḥ iti kim punar idam aniṣṭam āpāditam

original: nanv iṣyata eva puṃvacasām anāgamatvam,
analyzed: nanu iṣyate eva puṃvacasām anāgama tvam

original: āgamo hi śāstram,
analyzed: āgamaḥ hi śāstram

original: aprāpte śāstram arthavad iti vakṣyati. imāni punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprāptaviṣayapratipādakānīty
analyzed: aprāpte śāstram arthavat iti vakṣyati imāni punar pramāṇa antara prāpta viṣaya pratipādakāni iti

original: anuvādavākyāny eva. ata eva śāstram eva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ śāstram
analyzed: anuvāda vākyāni eva atas eva śāstram eva veda vākyam bhinna tayā pakṣīkṛtam śāstram

original: arthe pravartata iti. tadbhedasyaivopayogād iti bhāvaḥ. tad etad āha -- tatheti.
analyzed: arthe pravartate iti tad bhedasya eva upayogāt iti bhāvaḥ tat etat āha tathā iti

original: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- pratyaya iti. evam ayaṃ puṃvacanāprāmāṇyavādī vaktavyaḥ. kim
analyzed: atra dūṣaṇam āha pratyayaḥ iti evam ayam puṃvacana aprāmāṇya vādī vaktavyaḥ kim

original: asti tebhyo 'rthapratyayo na vā,
analyzed: asti tebhyaḥ rtha pratyayaḥ na vā

original: na tāvan nāsti,
analyzed: na tāvat na asti

original: sarvalokavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt. satas tu nānimittotpattis sambhavatīti vimittaṃ
analyzed: sarva loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt sataḥ tu na a nimitta utpattiḥ sambhavati iti vimittam

original: vācyam. na ca śabdād anyannimittam asyopapadyata iti jātam asandigdham avādhitaṃ
analyzed: vācyam na ca śabdāt anyat nimittam asya upapadyate iti jātam asandigdham a vādhitam

original: ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇam eva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānam iti nāsyānāgamatvābhyupagamo
analyzed: ca jñāna antareṇa pramāṇam eva puṃvacana janitam jñānam iti na asya anāgama tva abhyupagamaḥ

original: yukta iti. itaras tv anumānāntarbhāvābhiprāyeṇāha -- vaktṛbuddher iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ iti itaraḥ tu anumāna antarbhāva abhiprāyeṇa āha vaktṛ buddheḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: -- visaṃvādabhūyiṣṭhāni hi puṃvacanāni,
analyzed: visaṃvāda bhūyiṣṭhāni hi puṃvacanāni

original: tannaitāni śrutamātrāṇy evārthaṃ niścāyayanti. na cāniścito 'rtho jñāto bhavati,
analyzed: tat na etāni śruta mātrāṇi eva artham niścāyayanti na ca aniścitaḥ rthaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati

original: niścayasyaiva jñānatvāt. ataḥ prāṅniścayotpatter jñānābhāva eveti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena. yadā tu vaktaivam avadhāritavyāptir bhavati -- na  #
analyzed: niścayasya eva jñāna tvāt atas prāk niścaya utpatteḥ jñāna abhāvaḥ eva iti kim nimitta prayatnena yadā tu vaktā evam avadhārita vyāptiḥ bhavati na

original: cāyam anavagataṃ bravītīti,
analyzed: ca ayam an avagatam bravīti iti

original: tadā tadvākyād eva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñānam anumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho
analyzed: tadā tad vākyāt eva jñāna kāryāt kāraṇa bhūtam jñānam anumāya jñānasya artha avyabhicāreṇa arthaḥ

original: niścīyate. tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ jñānaliṅgāvagatatvād arthasya vākyam anuvādakam eva.
analyzed: niścīyate tasyām ca avasthāyām jñāna liṅga avagata tvāt arthasya vākyam anuvādakam eva

original: ato nāgama iti. siddhāntavādī tv āha -- kuto nvasāv iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- avagatā
analyzed: atas na āgamaḥ iti siddhānta vādī tu āha kutas nu asau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ avagatā

original: hi buddhir arthaṃ niścāyayati. na cāsyāḥ kiñcid avagame kāraṇam astīti vakṣyāma iti // 39 //
analyzed: hi buddhiḥ artham niścāyayati na ca asyāḥ kiñcid avagame kāraṇam asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ iti

original: {3,118} ataḥ svayam evānavagatā nārthasya liṅgam ity āha -- neti. nanūktaṃ kāryāt śabdād anumāsyate,
analyzed: atas svayam eva anavagatā na arthasya liṅgam iti āha na iti nanu uktam kāryāt śabdāt

original: ata āha -- na śabda iti. yathā nobhayam ubhayatra liṅgaṃ,
analyzed: atas āha na śabdaḥ iti yathā na ubhayam ubhayatra liṅgam

original: tathā darśayati -- viśeṣa iti. anumānaṃ hi vyāptibalena bhavati,
analyzed: tathā darśayati viśeṣaḥ iti anumānam hi vyāpti balena bhavati

original: iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tat sidhyed,
analyzed: iha ca vākya sāmānyam jñāna sāmānyena vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tat sidhyet

original: jñānamātrāc cārthamātram,
analyzed: jñāna mātrāt ca artha mātram

original: na ceha tathā,
analyzed: na ca iha tathā

original: jñānārthaviśeṣayor anumitsitatvāt. tayoś ca sambandhagrahaṇābhāvenānanumeyatvāt.
analyzed: jñāna artha viśeṣayoḥ anumitsita tvāt tayoḥ ca sambandha grahaṇa abhāvena ananumeya tvāt

original: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tad eva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho
analyzed: nanu yatra āptaḥ vākyam prayuṅkte tat eva jñātvā prayuṅkte iti vijñāna viśeṣeṇa eva sambandhaḥ

original: 'vagataḥ. atas sa evānumāsyate. yady evam,
analyzed: atas saḥ eva anumāsyate yadi evam

original: avagatas tarhi prāg eva vākyād arthaḥ,
analyzed: avagataḥ tarhi prāk eva vākyāt arthaḥ

original: na hy anyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate vaktum. api cāvidite prathamam arthe kathaṃ jñānam anumātavyam. kim ajñāsīd ayaṃ vaktā kiñcid iti,
analyzed: na hi anyathā yatra prayuṅkte iti śakyate vaktum api ca avidite prathamam arthe katham jñānam anumātavyam kim ajñāsīt ayam vaktā kiñcid iti

original: āhosvid imam artham iti,
analyzed: āhosvit imam artham iti

original: nāpratipannam idamā śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum. na cārthoparāgam antareṇa jñānasya viśeṣas
analyzed: na a pratipannam śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum na ca artha uparāgam antareṇa jñānasya viśeṣaḥ

original: sambhavati yo 'numīyate. na cākarmakaṃ jñānamātram anumīyate. na ca tato 'rthaviśeṣas
analyzed: sambhavati yaḥ numīyate na ca akarmakam jñāna mātram anumīyate na ca tatas rtha viśeṣaḥ

original: sidhyati. na cāniścitaṃ jñānaṃ,
analyzed: sidhyati na ca aniścitam jñānam

original: saṃśayātmano vijñānavidhāyā darśitatvāt. na caivaṃ puṃvākyebhyas sandehaḥ. yā tu
analyzed: saṃśaya ātmanaḥ vijñāna vidhāyāḥ darśita tvāt na ca evam puṃvākyebhyaḥ sandehaḥ yā tu

original: kvacid vyabhicārād aprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ity uktam. yadi tv evaṃ
analyzed: kvacid vyabhicārāt aprāmāṇya āśaṅkā sā āpta tva ādinā nirākriyate iti uktam yadi tu evam

original: jñānaviśeṣāvagatir ucyate,
analyzed: jñāna viśeṣa avagatiḥ ucyate

original: ya evam avadhārito bhavati -- nāyam ananvitārthāni padāni prayuṅkte,
analyzed: yaḥ evam avadhāritaḥ bhavati na ayam ananvita arthāni padāni prayuṅkte

original: na cānavagatānvayāni,
analyzed: na ca anavagata anvayāni

original: tan nūnam amīṣām anenānvayo jñāta iti. kim idānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgatiḥ śrotā
analyzed: tat nūnam amīṣām anena anvayaḥ jñātaḥ iti kim idānīm vidita pada padārtha saṅgatiḥ śrotā

original: puṃvākyād arthaṃ na budhyata eva. yady evam anuttarā guravaḥ. jātā tu buddhir asandigdhāviparyastā
analyzed: puṃvākyāt artham na budhyate eva yadi evam anuttarāḥ guravaḥ jātā tu buddhiḥ asandigdhā aviparyastā

original: ca na vedavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta. śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā
analyzed: ca na veda vākya janitāyāḥ dhiyaḥ viśiṣyeta śaṅkā mātram tu kathañcid vede pi vākya tva ādinā

original: bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam. tābhyām iti. buddhiśabdābhyām ity arthaḥ // 40 //
analyzed: bhavati iti na tāvatā tad aprāmāṇyam tābhyām iti buddhi śabdābhyām iti arthaḥ

original: ato vaktrabhiprāyāvagatau pratyakṣādipramāṇāsambhavāt tadanavagame{3,
analyzed: atas vaktṛ abhiprāya avagatau pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa asambhavāt

original: 119}cārthānumānānupapatteś śrotur aprāptapūrvam arthaṃ prāpayantī puruṣoktir vedavadāgama evety āha -- teneti // 41 //
analyzed: śrotuḥ aprāpta pūrvam artham prāpayantī puruṣoktiḥ veda vat āgamaḥ eva iti āha tena iti

original: yad api cedam ucyate. vedas tāvad bhinnaviṣayatayā pramāṇāntaram eveti,
analyzed: yat api ca idam ucyate vedaḥ tāvat bhinna viṣaya tayā pramāṇa antaram eva iti

original: tad api manorathamātram evety āha -- na cāpīti. na śakyate vaktum ity abhiprāyaḥ.
analyzed: tat api manoratha mātram eva iti āha na ca api iti na śakyate vaktum iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: kim iti na śakyate. ata āha -- liṅgam iti. yadā pūrvoktair hetubhir aviśeṣeṇa sarvam
analyzed: kim iti na śakyate atas āha   iti

original: eva śābdam anumānād abhinnam ity uktaṃ,
analyzed: eva śābdam anumānāt abhinnam iti uktam

original: tadā kathaṃ tadgocarasyānanumeyatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ // 42 //
analyzed: tadā katham tad gocarasya ananumeya tvam bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanv arthātmanā tāvalliṅgenānanumitapūrvam arthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ
analyzed: nanu artha ātmanā tāvat liṅgena ananumita pūrvam artham vedaḥ bodhayati iti pramāṇa antaram

original: bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na ceti. dhūmavattvakṛtakatvādīnāṃ hi saty apy avāntarabhede
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca iti dhūmavat tva kṛtaka tva ādīnām hi sati api avāntarabhede

original: yathaiva trailakṣaṇyāparityāgenānumānatvam evam ihāpi syāt. yadi tu tad eva nāstīty ucyate,
analyzed: yathā eva trailakṣaṇya aparityāgena anumāna tvam evam iha api syāt yadi tu tat eva na asti iti ucyate

original: tat tarhi vacanīyam,
analyzed: tat tarhi vacanīyam

original: kim avāntarabhedopanyāseneti // 43 //
analyzed: kim avāntarabheda upanyāsena iti

original: anye tu prakṣīṇaśaktayo 'bhedam evāśrityaikadeśinaḥ pratyavasthitāḥ,
analyzed: anye tu prakṣīṇa śaktayaḥ bhedam eva āśritya eka deśinaḥ pratyavasthitāḥ

original: tad darśayati -- evaṃ sthita iti. ayaṃ hi teṣām abhiprāyaḥ -- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ,
analyzed: tat darśayati evam sthitaḥ iti ayam hi teṣām abhiprāyaḥ codanā prāmāṇyam hi pratijñātam

original: tac cānumānatve 'pi vedavacasas sidhyaty eva. yathaiva hi śabdamadhyād vedaḥ pramāṇam.
analyzed: tat ca anumāna tve veda vacasaḥ sidhyati eva yathā eva hi śabda madhyāt vedaḥ pramāṇam

original: evam anumānebhyo vedonumānam iti kim atiprayatnato bhedapratipādaneneti. nanu bhaviṣyatvād
analyzed: evam anumānebhyaḥ vedaḥ anumānam iti kim ati prayatnataḥ bheda pratipādanena iti nanu bhaviṣya tvāt

original: dharmo nānumīyate ity uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa. ato 'numānatvābhyupagame tadvirodho bhaved
analyzed: dharmaḥ na anumīyate iti uktam bhāṣyakāreṇa atas numāna tva abhyupagame tad virodhaḥ bhavet

original: ata āha -- bhaviṣyatīti. artharūpaliṅgābhiprāyeṇa tannirākṛtam ity arthaḥ // 44 //
analyzed: atas āha bhaviṣyati iti artha rūpa liṅga abhiprāyeṇa tat nirākṛtam iti arthaḥ

original: {3,120} etad api dūṣayati -- saṃjñeti. yadi paścānmānasāmānyād anumānatvaṃ tad astu,
analyzed: etat api dūṣayati saṃjñā iti yadi paścāt māna sāmānyāt anumāna tvam tat astu

original: na ca tadabhyupagame doṣa ity arthaḥ. lakṣaṇaikatvena tv abheda iṣṭe 'numānalakṣaṇābhāvāt
analyzed: na ca tad abhyupagame doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ lakṣaṇa ekatvena tu abhede iṣṭe numāna lakṣaṇa abhāvāt

original: pramāṇāntarānabhyupagamāc cāprāmāṇyam eva vedavacasām āpadyata ity āha -- lakṣaṇeneti // 46 //
analyzed: pramāṇa antara anabhyupagamāt ca aprāmāṇyam eva veda vacasām āpadyate iti āha lakṣaṇena iti

original: nanūktaṃ lakṣaṇaikatvam āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyād ity atrāha -- āptavādeti. puṃvākyānām anena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasām  #
analyzed: nanu uktam lakṣaṇa ekatvam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt iti atra āha āpta vāda iti puṃvākyānām anena prakāreṇa anumāna tvāt prāmāṇyam siddhi ati na veda vacasām

original: iti bhāvaḥ // 47 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: kim iti na siddhyati. ata āha -- vede tv iti. āptanarābhāvāt tāvannāptavādatvenāvisaṃvādād
analyzed: kim iti na siddhi ati atas āha vede tu iti āpta nara abhāvāt tāvat na āpta vāda tvena avisaṃvādāt

original: anumānam. na cātīndriyair arthair vedānāṃ sambandhānubhavas sidhyatīty apramāṇam
analyzed: anumānam na ca atīndriyaiḥ arthaiḥ vedānām sambandha anubhavaḥ sidhyati iti apramāṇam

original: eva bhaveyuḥ. nāptasandṛbdhā vedā iti vedādhikaraṇe vakṣyatīti // 48 //
analyzed: eva bhaveyuḥ na āpta sandṛbdhāḥ vedāḥ iti veda adhikaraṇe vakṣyati iti

original: nanu pramāṇāntarasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇy
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa antara saṅgatā arthāni veda eka deśa bhūtāni kṣepiṣṭha ādi vākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇi

original: apy agnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthāny anumāsyante. ato 'sti lakṣaṇenānumānatvam
analyzed: api agnihotra ādi vākyāni veda tvāt satya arthāni anumāsyante atas sti lakṣaṇena anumāna tvam

original: ity āha -- nanv iti // 49 //
analyzed: iti āha nanu iti

original: {3,121} etad api dūṣayati -- nādityeti. ādityayūpavākye vartamāno vedatvahetur anaikāntika iti. nanu nedaṃ vākyam asatyārtham,
analyzed: etat api dūṣayati na āditya iti āditya yūpa vākye vartamānaḥ veda tva hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ iti nanu na idam vākyam asatya artham

original: ādityaśabdo hi sārūpyād gauṇo yūpe vartata iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate,
analyzed: āditya śabdaḥ hi sārūpyāt gauṇaḥ yūpe vartate iti tad siddhi sūtre vakṣyate

original: ata āha -- tadvad iti. karmaphalasambandhavākyāny api tadvad eva gauṇāni bhaveyur
analyzed: atas āha tadvat iti karma phala sambandha vākyāni api tadvat eva gauṇāni bhaveyuḥ

original: iti. api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni. anumānatvābhyupagame
analyzed: iti api ca prāk sva mahimnā veda prāmāṇya balena aprāmāṇya anumānāni pratyuktāni anumāna tva abhyupagame

original: tulyabalatayā tāny api durvāraprasaraṇānīty āha -- nāta iti // 50 //
analyzed: tulya bala tayā tāni api durvāra prasaraṇāni iti āha na atas iti

original: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavanti. lokavedayoś ca samam eva pramāṇatā siddhety āha -- tasmād
analyzed: atas lakṣaṇa bhedena eva śabdasya pramāṇa antara tve iṣyamāṇe vedāḥ pramāṇam bhavanti loka vedayoḥ ca samam eva pramāṇa tā siddhā iti āha tasmāt

original: lakṣaṇam api yathā parair āśritam -- āptopadeśaś śabda iti,
analyzed: lakṣaṇam api yathā paraiḥ āśritam āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tathāpy āptābhāvān na prāmāṇyaṃ vedasyeti tannāśrayaṇīyam ity āha -- teneti vedāntena. loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇam ity āha -- loka
analyzed: tathā api āpta abhāvāt na prāmāṇyam vedasya iti tat na āśrayaṇīyam iti āha tena iti vedāntena loke na āpta tvam prāmāṇye kāraṇam iti āha loka

original: kāraṇam āha -- purastād iti. āptatvena hy apavādāśaṅkānirākaraṇamātram. prāmāṇyaṃ
analyzed: kāraṇam āha purastāt iti āpta tvena hi apavāda āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa mātram prāmāṇyam

original: tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajam eveti svataḥprāmāṇyavāde varṇitam iti. kiṃ tarhy āgamalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tu sarva saṃvidām sahajam eva iti svatas prāmāṇya vāde varṇitam iti kim tarhi āgama lakṣaṇam

original: ata āha -- tasmād iti. nirdoṣaśabdajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇam iti // 53 //
analyzed: atas āha tasmāt iti nirdoṣa śabda janitam vijñānam pramāṇam iti

original: {3,122} ekañjātīyakasya śabdasya cānumānena prāmāṇyam eva samaṃ,
analyzed: ekañjātīyakasya śabdasya ca anumānena prāmāṇyam eva samam

original: na lakṣaṇam ity āha -- anumāneneti // 53 //
analyzed: na lakṣaṇam iti āha anumānena iti

original: svamatenedānīṃ padasyānumānād bhedaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tatpratipādane kāraṇam āha -- pada iti. yady api padasya padārthe pramāṇatvān na tadbhedapratipādanam
analyzed: sva matena idānīm padasya anumānāt bhedam vadiṣyan tad pratipādane kāraṇam āha pade iti yadi api padasya padārthe pramāṇa tvāt na tad bheda pratipādanam

original: tathāpi paraiḥ padāny udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛta iti tadbhedam eva pratipādayāmaḥ. atreti. pada ity arthaḥ // 54 //
analyzed: tathā api paraiḥ padāni udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ iti tad bhedam eva pratipādayāmaḥ atra iti pade iti arthaḥ

original: tad idānīṃ bhedakāraṇam āha -- viṣaya iti. viṣayabhedam eva darśayati -- sāmānyeti. ākṛtyadhikaraṇe hi padasya sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ sthāpayiṣyata  #
analyzed: tat idānīm bheda kāraṇam āha viṣayaḥ iti viṣaya bhedam eva darśayati sāmānya iti ākṛti adhikaraṇe hi padasya sāmānya viṣaya tvam sthāpayiṣyata
iti

original: anumānaṃ tu dharmaviśiṣṭadharmiviṣayam ity anumānaparicchede sādhitam ity āha --
analyzed: anumānam tu dharma viśiṣṭa dharmi viṣayam iti anumāna paricchede sādhitam iti āha

original: dharmīti. liṅgam asyāstīti liṅgī. tasya viśiṣṭasya prasādhakaṃ liṅgam astīti. nanv
analyzed: dharmī iti liṅgam asya asti iti liṅgī tasya viśiṣṭasya prasādhakam liṅgam asti iti nanu

original: anumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyam anumīyata ity ata āha -- na tāvad iti. yāvat
analyzed: anumāne vyāpti balena dharma sāmānyam anumīyate iti atas āha na tāvat iti yāvat

original: tadanumānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ na bhavati tāvadanumānam eva na bhavati,

original: na dharmamā(?traṃ/
analyzed: na dharma mātram

original: traviṣayaṃ)
analyzed: tra viṣayam

original: siddhatvād ity uktam iti // 56 //
analyzed: siddha tvāt iti uktam iti

original: pāñcālarāja iti. tadā kevalād eva pāñcālarājapadāt kriyāviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣo 'vagamyate,
analyzed: pāñcāla rājaḥ iti tadā kevalāt eva pāñcāla rāja padāt kriyā viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ avagamyate

original: ata āha -- sāmānyād iti. yad eva{3,
analyzed: atas āha sāmānyāt iti yat

original: 123}kiñcit śābde sāmānyād atiriktam avagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣayaḥ. vākyam eva hi tadanuṣaktayātipadaṃ pāñcālarājo yātīti. nanv astu śrutasyānuṣaṅgaḥ,
analyzed: śābde sāmānyāt atiriktam avagamyate sa vākyasya eva viṣayaḥ vākyam eva hi tad anuṣakta yāti padam pāñcāla rājaḥ yāti iti nanu astu śrutasya anuṣaṅgaḥ

original: aśrute 'pi padāntare padād ekasmād viśiṣṭabodho dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: a śrute pi pada antare padāt ekasmāt viśiṣṭa bodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: yathā -- dvāram ity ukte vivriyatām iti,
analyzed: yathā dvāram iti ukte vivriyatām iti

original: atra katham ata āha -- sāmarthyād iti. kārakaṃ hi kriyayā viditavyāptikam,
analyzed: atra katham atas āha sāmarthyāt iti kārakam hi kriyayā vidita vyāptikam

original: vyāptisāmarthyād eva kriyāpadam anumāpayati. anumitakriyāpadād vākyād eva tatrāpi viśiṣṭārthapratyaya iti // 57 //
analyzed: vyāpti sāmarthyāt eva kriyā padam anumāpayati anumita kriyā padāt vākyāt eva tatra api viśiṣṭa artha pratyayaḥ iti

original: atra codayati -- saṅkhyeti. pariharati -- na tāvad iti. yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante
analyzed: atra codayati saṅkhyā iti pariharati na tāvat iti yatra hi saṅkhyā ādayaḥ vagamyante

original: tatra katham ata āha -- yatrāpīti. sambhavavyabhicārābhyāṃ hi viśeṣaṇam arthavad
analyzed: tatra katham atas āha yatra api iti sambhava vyabhicārābhyām hi viśeṣaṇam arthavat

original: bhavati. ākṛtis tu na tāvad ekatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
analyzed: bhavati ākṛtiḥ tu na tāvat eka tvam vyabhicarati

original: dvitvādayas tv ekatvān na sambhavantīti tadākṣiptāyā vyakter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ saṅkhyādaya iti // 58 //
analyzed: dvi tva ādayaḥ tu eka tvāt na sambhavanti iti tad ākṣiptāyāḥ vyakteḥ eva viśeṣaṇam saṅkhyā ādayaḥ iti

original: tad evaṃ tāvad anurañjanena vyakter viśeṣaṇam ity uktam,
analyzed: tat evam tāvat anurañjanena vyakteḥ viśeṣaṇam iti uktam

original: tādarthyena tu kriyāṃ bhāvanāṃ saṅkhyādayo viśiṃṣanti. tatra hi śrutyādibhir viniyujyante.

original: yathā paśor ekatve 'ruṇādiṣu ca vakṣyata ity āha -- padāntareti. padāntaratvenātyantaviprakṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇatāṃ
analyzed: yathā paśoḥ eka tve ruṇ ādiṣu ca vakṣyate iti āha pada antara iti pada antara tvena atyanta viprakṛṣṭa viśeṣaṇatām

original: darśayatīti // 58 //
analyzed: darśayati iti

original: yat tarhi vākyārthavṛttiviśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ gomadādipadaṃ tadanumānaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- vākyārtha iti. yady api tāvad idaṃ viśiṣṭārthagocaram,
analyzed: yat tarhi vākya artha vṛtti viśiṣṭa viṣayam gomat ādi padam tat anumānam bhaviṣyati atas āha vākya arthaḥ iti yadi api tāvat idam viśiṣṭa artha gocaram

original: tathāpi nānumānatvam. siddho hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇāsiddhena viśiṣṭas sādhyamānaḥ
analyzed: tathā api na anumāna tvam siddhaḥ hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇa asiddhena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyamānaḥ

original: pakṣo bhavati. iha tu padoccāraṇāt prāṅ na kiñcit pratipannam. uccaritre tu pade
analyzed: pakṣaḥ bhavati iha tu pada uccāraṇāt prāk na kiñcid pratipannam uccaritre tu pade

analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ pratipannaḥ eva iti kim sādhyam iti siddha tvam

original: 124}darśayati -- tāvān iti. na tāvadagṛhītasambandhaś śabdād viśiṣṭaṃ pratyeti. gṛhītasambandhas
analyzed: tāvān iti na tāvat agṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdāt viśiṣṭam pratyeti gṛhīta sambandhaḥ

original: tu pratipadyamāno vyutpattikālāvagatān na kiñcid adhikaṃ pratyetīti katham anumānaṃ bhavatīti // 60 //

analyzed: atra codayati  atha iti atra api śabdasya eva prathama avagatasya artha viśiṣṭa tvena sādhya tvāt na krama vyatikramaḥ bhaviṣyati iti  /

original: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- pratijñārtheti. pratijñārthaḥ pakṣaḥ,

original: tatpratyayānapāyād iti bhāvaḥ. api ca viśiṣṭatā sambandhe sati bhavati,

original: bhūmāvarthaḥ. nāpi śabdakāle,

original: param iti. pratītyā viśiṣṭe 'numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrvasiddhā grahītavyā. sā cet jñātā
analyzed: param iti pratītyā viśiṣṭe numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrva siddhā grahītavyā sā ced jñātā

original: kim aparam anumīyata iti. nanu sampratyupalabhyamānaṃ drutādiviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya tasya
analyzed: kim aparam anumīyate iti nanu sampratyupalabhyamānam druta ādi viśeṣam pakṣīkṛtya tasya

original: pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā sādhyate,

analyzed: sapakṣam

original: ubhayānugataṃ gośabdasāmānyaṃ hetuṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
analyzed: ubhaya anugatam go śabda sāmānyam hetum kariṣyāmaḥ

original: na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na pratyāyaneti ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
analyzed: na pratijñā artha eka deśa tā bhaviṣyati atas āha na pratyāyana iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: na drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ deśādinibandhano 'rthena sambandho vidyate. pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā
analyzed: na druta ādi viśeṣāṇām deśa ādi nibandhanaḥ rthena sambandhaḥ vidyate pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭa tā

analyzed: ca api teṣām na sambhavati iti

original: 'dhastādagnir astīti tadviśiṣṭo dhūmas sādhyo bhavati. naivaṃ drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyāyanaśaktiyogaḥ.
analyzed: asti iti tad viśiṣṭaḥ dhūmaḥ sādhyaḥ bhavati na evam druta ādi viśeṣāṇām pratyāyana śakti yogaḥ

original: teṣāṃ vyabhicāreṇāpratyāyakatvād iti. yat tu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabdas sa pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: teṣām vyabhicāreṇa apratyāyaka tvāt iti yat tu teṣām sāmānyam go śabdaḥ sa pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭaḥ

original: tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuś cety uktam evety āha sāmānyasyeti // 67 //

original: ato 'rthaviśiṣṭaś śabdo nānumeya ity upasaṃharann āha -- tasmād iti // 67 //

original: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ity uktam. yadi tv arthaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdo hetur ity ucyate.

original: tad apy ayuktam. apakṣadharmatvād ity āha -- kathaṃ ceti. kathaṃ ca nirūpyata iti bhāvaḥ // 68 //
analyzed: tat api ayuktam apakṣa dharma tvāt iti āha katham ca iti katham ca nirūpyate iti bhāvaḥ  /

original: kim iti na nirūpyate 'ta āha -- na kriyeti. kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
analyzed: kim iti na nirūpyate te āha na kriyā iti kasyāñcid kriyāyām kartṛ tayā sambaddham kiñcid kasyacid sambandhī bhavati

original: tāvat kriyākārakasambandhapūrvaka ity āha -- rājeti. prathamaṃ hi bharaṇakriyāyāṃ
analyzed: tāvat kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvakaḥ iti āha rājā iti prathamam hi bharaṇa kriyāyām

original: kartṛkarmabhāvam āpannau rājapuruṣau svasvāmisambandham anubhavata iti // 69 //
analyzed: kartṛ karma bhāvam āpannau rāja puruṣau sva svāmi sambandham anubhavataḥ iti

original: {3,127} evam avayavāvayavisambandho 'pi kriyāgarbha ity āha -- vṛkṣa iti. vṛkṣo 'vayavī
analyzed: evam avayava avayavi sambandhaḥ api kriyā garbhaḥ iti āha vṛkṣaḥ iti vṛkṣaḥ vayavī

original: hy avayaveṣu tiṣṭhatīti pratītiḥ. kadācit tv avayavā eva śākhādayas tasminn iti pritītiḥ.
analyzed: hi avayaveṣu tiṣṭhati iti pratītiḥ kadācid tu avayavāḥ eva śākhā ādayaḥ tasmin iti

original: tad evaṃ sthitikriyākartṛbhāvanibandhano 'vayavāvayavisambandha iti. evaṃ saṃyogo
analyzed: tat evam sthiti kriyā kartṛ bhāva nibandhanaḥ vayava avayavi sambandhaḥ iti evam saṃyogaḥ

original: 'pi kriyāgarbha evety āha -- deśa iti. agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato
analyzed: pi kriyā garbhaḥ eva iti āha deśe iti agnimat deśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmaḥ

original: deśasya saṃyogī bhavatīti // [70] //
analyzed: deśasya saṃyogī bhavati iti

original: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādayo 'pi sambandhāḥ kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakā ity āha -- kāryeti.
analyzed: evam kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādayaḥ api sambandhāḥ kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvakāḥ iti āha kārya iti

original: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyāḥ kāraṇam ity ucyate.
analyzed: kiṇvam hi surāyāḥ bījam surā ātmake pariṇāme kartṛ bhavat surāyāḥ kāraṇam iti ucyate

original: tathā samūhasamūhisambandho 'pi. senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayam aṃśena kurvan hastī senāyās
analyzed: tathā samūha samūhi sambandhaḥ senā kāryam pratipakṣa jayam aṃśena kurvan hastī senāyāḥ

original: sambandhitayocyata iti. śabdārthayos tu na kaścid evam ākāras sambandhasyāvagamyate.
analyzed: sambandhi tayā ucyate iti śabda arthayoḥ tu na kaścid evam ākāraḥ sambandhasya avagamyate

original: na cānirūpitākāras sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktum ity āha -- na ceti // [71] //
analyzed: na ca anirūpita ākāraḥ sambandhaḥ sti iti śakyate vaktum iti āha na ca iti

original: na ca sambandham antareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti
analyzed: na ca sambandham antareṇa pakṣasya dharmaḥ iti vigraha gatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣa dharmaḥ iti

original: ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ity āha -- na cāstīti. vṛttivigrahāv api nopapannāv
analyzed: ca tatpuruṣa samāsaḥ vā ghaṭate iti āha na ca asti iti vṛtti vigrahau api na upapannau

original: iti. upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 72 //
analyzed: iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: anye tu śabdo 'rthaviṣaya ity evaṃ taddharmatām āhuḥ. yathānupalabdhir abhāve prameya iti vakṣyate. tad etad upanyasyati -- nivṛtta iti //
analyzed: anye tu śabdaḥ rtha viṣayaḥ iti evam tad dharmatām āhuḥ yathā anupalabdhiḥ abhāve prameyaḥ iti vakṣyate tat etat upanyasyati nivṛttaḥ iti

original: {3,128} etad api nopapannam ity āha -- tair apīti. na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ity arthaḥ. yathā na ghaṭate tad etad āha  #
analyzed: etat api na upapannam iti āha taiḥ api iti na kena api prakāreṇa viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ ghaṭate iti arthaḥ yathā na ghaṭate tat etat āha

original: -- na tad iti // 74 //
analyzed: na tat iti

original: sarvaprakārāsambhavāt pāriśeṣyeṇa tadviṣayabuddhijanakatayā tadviṣayatā vaktavyā,
analyzed: sarva prakāra asambhavāt pāriśeṣyeṇa tad viṣaya buddhi janaka tayā tad viṣaya tā vaktavyā

original: evaṃ ca tadviṣayabuddhijanakatvasya vācyavācakabhāvam antareṇānupapattes tadabhyupagamaḥ
analyzed: evam ca tad viṣaya buddhi janaka tvasya vācya vācaka bhāvam antareṇa anupapatteḥ tad abhyupagamaḥ

original: kāryaḥ. tatsiddhau ca na pratītyaṅgaṃ pakṣadharmatā. na cāpakṣadharmajanitā pratītir
analyzed: kāryaḥ tad siddhau ca na pratīti aṅgam pakṣa dharma tā na ca apakṣa dharma janitā pratītiḥ

original: anumānam ity āha -- tasmād iti dvayena // 75 -- 76 //
analyzed: anumānam iti āha tasmāt iti dvayena

original: yadi tu pakṣadharmataiva tadviṣayabuddhijanane hetur iṣyate. tatas tadvyatirekeṇa
analyzed: yadi tu pakṣa dharma tā eva tad viṣaya buddhi janane hetuḥ iṣyate tatas tad vyatirekeṇa

original: pakṣadharmatāyā evānupapatter itaretarāśrayatvam ato neyam api kalpanā ghaṭata ity
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ eva anupapatteḥ itaretara āśraya tvam atas na iyam api kalpanā ghaṭate iti

original: āha -- gamakatvād iti // 77 //
analyzed: āha gamaka tvāt iti

original: itaś ca na pakṣadharmatety āha -- na ceti. anavagatavācyavācakasambandhāḥ svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti. yena pakṣadharmabuddhiś  #
analyzed: itas ca na pakṣa dharma tā iti āha na ca iti anavagata vācya vācaka sambandhāḥ svarūpa atirekeṇa na śabdam kasyacid dharma tayā jānanti yena pakṣa dharma buddhiḥ

original: śabde bhaved iti // 78 //
analyzed: śabde bhavet iti

original: {3,129} svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetuḥ,
analyzed: sva rūpa mātra vijñānam tu na dhūma ādau pakṣa dharma tāyām hetuḥ

original: api tu dharmisambandhaḥ. na cāsāv astīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- na ceti. nanv atrāpy arthena dharmiṇā prathamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva,
analyzed: api tu dharmi sambandhaḥ na ca asau asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ca iti nanu atra api arthena dharmiṇā prathamam vyutpatti kāle sambandhaḥ vagataḥ eva

original: āha -- na cāpīti // 79 //
analyzed: āha na ca api iti

original: pūrvasambandhanirapekṣa evāyam avyutpannasambandhasyāpi pakṣadharmasambandho bhāsate,
analyzed: pūrva sambandha nirapekṣaḥ eva ayam avyutpanna sambandhasya api pakṣa dharma sambandhaḥ bhāsate

original: na cātra tathety āha -- dhūmavān iti matirantena. yata eva tannirapekṣo 'yaṃ pakṣadharmasambandhaḥ,
analyzed: na ca atra tathā iti āha dhūmavān iti matiḥ antena yatas eva tad nirapekṣaḥ yam pakṣa dharma sambandhaḥ

original: ata eva taduttarasmāt sapakṣasattvalakṣaṇād bhidyate,
analyzed: atas eva tad uttarasmāt sapakṣa sattva lakṣaṇāt bhidyate

original: anyathā tadabheda eva syād ity āha -- teneti. trīṇi hetor lakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā
analyzed: anyathā tad abhedaḥ eva syāt iti āha tena iti trīṇi hetoḥ lakṣaṇāni pakṣa dharma tā

original: sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛttiḥ. tatra ca pakṣadharmatāyā uttaraṃ sapakṣasambandham
analyzed: sapakṣe sattā vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ tatra ca pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ uttaram sapakṣa sambandham

original: uttaralakṣaṇam apadiśatīti // 80 //
analyzed: uttara lakṣaṇam apadiśati iti

original: śabde tv evaṃ nāstīty āha -- na tv atreti. pūrvasambandhāpekṣayā ceyam avagamyamānārthapratītyuttarakālam avagamyate. ato na tadaṅgam ity āha  #
analyzed: śabde tu evam na asti iti āha na tu atra iti pūrva sambandha apekṣayā ca iyam avagamyamāna artha pratīti uttara kālam avagamyate atas na tat aṅgam iti āha
na ca iti

original: itaś ca na pakṣadharmatety āha -- na ca dharmīti. arthād anyas tāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāvaḥ // 82 //
analyzed: itas ca na pakṣa dharma tā iti āha na ca dharmī iti arthāt anyaḥ tāvat dharmī na pramīyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: yas tv asāv artho dharmitayā kalpanīyaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ tu asau arthaḥ dharmi tayā kalpanīyaḥ

original: yaddharmatayāvagataś śabdaḥ{3,
analyzed: yad dharma tayā avagataḥ

original: 130}pakṣadharmo bhavati,
analyzed: bhavati

original: parastād api sa tāvān eva pramātavyaḥ. tad yadi pakṣadharmatvam avagantum asau prathamam evāvagamyate,
analyzed: parastāt api sa tāvān eva pramātavyaḥ tat yadi pakṣa dharma tvam avagantum asau prathamam evā avagamyate

original: tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatety āha -- yaś ceti dvayena // 83 -- 84 //
analyzed: tatas gṛhīte tasmin kim para bhāvinā pakṣa dharma ādi jñānena atas na anumāna tā iti āha yaḥ ca iti dvayena

original: anvayam idānīṃ dūṣayati -- anvaya iti. kathaṃ na nirūpyate,
analyzed: anvayam idānīm dūṣayati anvayaḥ iti katham na nirūpyate

original: ata āha -- vyāpāreṇeti // 85 //
analyzed: atas āha vyāpāreṇa iti

original: etad eva darśayati -- yatreti. iha tv evaṃ nāstīty āha -- na tv iti // 86 //
analyzed: etat eva darśayati yatra iti iha tu evam na asti iti āha na tu iti

original: kathaṃ nety ata āha -- na tāvad iti. idaṃ ca pūrvam evoktam iti. nanu vaibhavāc chabdasya
analyzed: katham na iti atas āha na tāvat iti idam ca pūrvam eva uktam iti nanu vaibhavāt śabdasya

original: nityatvāc cārthasya śabdārthayoś śakyate 'nvayo darśayitum ity āha -- bhaved iti.
analyzed: nitya tvāt ca arthasya śabda arthayoḥ śakyate nvayaḥ darśayitum iti āha bhavet iti

original: pariharati -- sarvārtheṣv iti // 87 //
analyzed: pariharati sarva artheṣu iti

original: kim ato yady evam ata āha -- teneti // 88 //
analyzed: kim atas yadi evam atas āha tena iti

original: prakārāntareṇa sambandham āśaṅkate -- athaivam iti // 89 //
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa sambandham āśaṅkate atha evam iti

original: {3,131} etad api dūṣayati -- naivam iti. kāraṇam āha -- dṛṣṭo hīti (asmā)
analyzed: etat api dūṣayati na evam iti kāraṇam āha dṛṣṭaḥ hi iti asmai

original: bhirantena. kva dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: bhiḥ antena kva dṛṣṭaḥ

original: ata āha -- avyutpanneti // 90 //
analyzed: atas āha avyutpanna iti

original: nanu dvitīyādiprayoge śabdārthapratyayayor anvayo grahīṣyata ity āśaṅkate -- dvitīyādīti.
analyzed: nanu dvitīya ādi prayoge śabda artha pratyayayoḥ anvayaḥ grahīṣyate iti āśaṅkate dvitīya ādi iti

original: etad api dūṣayati -- śatakṛtva iti. śatakṛtvaḥ prayoge 'py ajijñāsur na sambandhaṃ
analyzed: etat api dūṣayati śata kṛtvas iti śata kṛtvas prayoge pi ajijñāsuḥ na sambandham

original: budhyate. aviditasambandhaś ca nārthaṃ pratyetīti // 91 //
analyzed: budhyate a vidita sambandhaḥ ca na artham pratyeti iti

original: nanu jñātasambandhasya tāvan na śabdajñānam arthajñānaṃ vyabhicarati. tasyaiva cānumānatvam iṣyata ity āha -- nanv iti. pariharati -- yady  #
analyzed: nanu jñāta sambandhasya tāvat na śabda jñānam artha jñānam vyabhicarati tasya eva ca anumāna tvam iṣyate iti āha nanu iti pariharati yadi

original: evam iti. yadi jñātasambandhasyānvayaḥ,
analyzed: evam iti yadi jñāta sambandhasya anvayaḥ

original: anya eva tarhi sambandhaś śabdārthayor abhyupagamyata iti // 92 //
analyzed: anyaḥ eva tarhi sambandhaḥ śabda arthayoḥ abhyupagamyate iti

original: tataḥ kim ata āha -- nāṅgam iti. yadi nāṅgaṃ,
analyzed: tatas kim atas āha na aṅgam iti yadi na aṅgam

original: kiṃ jātam ata āha -- anvayeti. asaty anvaye jñānaṃ nānumānam iti bhāvaḥ // 93 //
analyzed: kim jātam atas āha anvaya iti asati anvaye jñānam na anumānam iti bhāvaḥ

original: anvayas tu pūrvāvagatapratītisāmarthyānusāreṇaiva jāyamāno nārthapratītau kāraṇam ity āha -- jñāta iti // 94 //
analyzed: anvayaḥ tu pūrva avagata pratīti sāmarthya anusāreṇa eva jāyamānaḥ na artha pratītau kāraṇam iti āha jñātaḥ iti

original: {3,132} upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. anumāne tu nānvayāt pūrvaṃ gamakatvasiddhir ity āha -- na ceti // 95 //
analyzed: upasaṃharati tasmāt iti anumāne tu na anvayāt pūrvam gamaka tva siddhiḥ iti āha na ca iti

original: vyatirekam idānīṃ dūṣayati -- vyatireka iti. na hy anavagate 'rthe tajjñānena vinā
analyzed: vyatirekam idānīm dūṣayati vyatireke iti na hi anavagate rthe tad jñānena vinā

original: śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatirekaś śakyate 'vagantum. avagataś ced arthaḥ kiṃ vyatirekāśrayaṇeneti // 96 //
analyzed: śabda jñānam bhavati iti vyatirekaḥ śakyate vagantum avagataḥ ced arthaḥ kim vyatireka āśrayaṇena iti

original: kim idānīm anupayogināv anvayavyatirekau śabde nety āha -- sambandham iti. śaktini(ṣkarṣe ta)
analyzed: kim idānīm anupayoginau anvaya vyatirekau śabde na iti āha sambandham iti śakti niṣkarṣe

original: yor vyāpāro vācyavācakarūpaś śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti // 97 //
evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati -- tasmād
analyzed: evam ca trailakṣaṇya parityāgena ananumāna tvam prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati tasmāt

original: iti. śabdo nānumānaṃ trairūpyarahitatvāt pratyakṣavat. tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt. tadvad
analyzed: iti śabdaḥ na anumānam trairūpya rahita tvāt pratyakṣa vat tādṛś viṣaya varjanāt tadvat

original: eva tādṛk. viṣayavarjanaṃ ca sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ hītyādinā varṇitam eveti // 98 //
analyzed: eva tādṛś viṣaya varjanam ca sāmānya viṣaya tvam hi ityādinā varṇitam eva iti

original: idaṃ ca padasyānumānād bhedapratipādanaṃ prauḍhipradarśanārtham asmābhiḥ kṛtam. na tu padaṃ pramāṇam ity āha -- satīti // 99 //
analyzed: idam ca padasya anumānāt bheda pratipādanam prauḍhi pradarśana artham asmābhiḥ kṛtam na tu padam pramāṇam iti āha sati iti

original: {3,133} yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati -- padam iti. tān eva caturaḥ prakārānāha -- pratyakṣa iti // 100 //
analyzed: yathā na pramāṇam tathā darśayati padam iti tān eva caturaḥ prakārān āha pratyakṣaḥ iti

original: eṣv artheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha -- tatreti // 101 //
analyzed: eṣu artheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyam tathā āha tatra iti

original: adṛṣṭapūrve tu samprati pratyakṣe 'nutpattilakṣaṇam evāprāmāṇyam ity āha -- adṛṣṭapūrva
analyzed: adṛṣṭa pūrve tu samprati pratyakṣe n utpatti lakṣaṇam eva aprāmāṇyam iti āha adṛṣṭa pūrva

original: iti. sambandhajñānam eva vā tadā jāyata ity āha -- sambandheti. na ca sambandha eva
analyzed: iti sambandha jñānam eva vā tadā jāyate iti āha sambandha iti na ca sambandhaḥ eva

original: padasya prameya iti vācyam,
analyzed: padasya prameyaḥ iti vācyam

original: tasyārthāpattiprameyatvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sambandha iti. tadarthas tu pratyakṣād avagata ity āha -- yo 'rtha iti // 102 //
analyzed: tasya arthāpatti prameya tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha sambandhaḥ iti tad arthaḥ tu pratyakṣāt avagataḥ iti āha yaḥ rthaḥ iti

original: ananubhūtapūrve parokṣe ca jñānānutpattir evety āha -- parokṣa iti. anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtir ity āha -- parokṣa iti // 103 //
analyzed: ananubhūta pūrve parokṣe ca jñāna anutpattiḥ eva iti āha parokṣe iti anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtiḥ iti āha parokṣe iti

original: nanu smṛtim eva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- pramita iti. pramitaviṣayā hi smṛtiḥ,
analyzed: nanu smṛtim eva janayat pramāṇam bhaviṣyati atas āha pramitaḥ iti pramita viṣayā hi smṛtiḥ

original: sannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ ca pramāṇam iti sthitir iti. kathaṃ punaḥ pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇam ata āha -- paricchedeti. paricchedaphalaṃ hi pramāṇam.  #
analyzed: sannikṛṣṭa artha gocaram ca pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ iti katham punar pramita viṣayam na pramāṇam atas āha pariccheda iti pariccheda phalam hi pramāṇam

original: na ca smṛtyā kiñcit paricchidyate,
analyzed: na ca smṛtyā kiñcid paricchidyate

original: pūrvavijñānamātropasthāpakatvād iti // 104 //
analyzed: pūrvavijñāna mātra upasthāpaka tvāt iti

original: {3,134} atra codayati -- tādātviketi. yady api pūrvam asāv artho 'vagataḥ,
analyzed: atra codayati tādātvikā iti yadi api pūrvam asau arthaḥ vagataḥ

original: tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ kim iti na bhavatīti // 105 //
analyzed: tathā api tadānīm sattām bodhayantī pratyabhijñāna vat smṛtiḥ pramāṇam kim iti na bhavati iti

original: pariharati -- yāvān iti. utpadyate smṛtir anyadā,
analyzed: pariharati yāvān iti utpadyate smṛtiḥ anyadā

original: na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastunas sattāṃ niścāyayati,
analyzed: na tu pratyabhijñāna vat tadanīm vastunaḥ sattām niścāyayati

original: pūrvajñānānusāritvād iti // 106 //
analyzed: pūrva jñāna anusāri tvāt iti

original: nanu pūrvasaṃskāramātrajā hi smṛtiḥ,
analyzed: nanu pūrva saṃskāra mātra jā hi smṛtiḥ

original: idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇam eva,
analyzed: idam tu pratyutpanna kāraṇakam padāt padārtha jñānam grahaṇam eva

original: kathaṃ smṛtir ucyate. ata āha -- padam iti. mā bhūt smaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: katham smṛtiḥ ucyate atas āha padam iti mā bhūt smaraṇam

original: grahaṇam apīdam anadhikaviṣayam evādhikapratibhāsābhāvāt,
analyzed: grahaṇam api idam anadhika viṣayam eva adhika pratibhāsa abhāvāt

original: ato na padaṃ smārakebhyas sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ity apramāṇam iti. nanu kriyākārakayor
analyzed: atas na padam smārakebhyaḥ sadṛśa adṛṣṭa ādibhyaḥ viśiṣyate iti apramāṇam iti nanu kriyā kārakayoḥ

original: anyataroccāraṇe 'vaśyam anyatarasyānyataravyatiṣaṅgo buddhau bhavati. ataḥ katham
analyzed: anyatara uccāraṇe vaśyam anyatarasya anyatara vyatiṣaṅgaḥ buddhau bhavati atas katham

original: ucyate nādhikyam avagamyata ity ata āha -- yadādhikyam iti. padāntarasyaivāsau prasādo
analyzed: ucyate na ādhikyam avagamyate iti atas āha yat ādhikyam iti pada antarasya eva asau

original: na padasyaikasyaivety arthaḥ // 107 //
analyzed: na padasya ekasya eva iti arthaḥ

original: vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayāja iti. dharmaniyama eva hi tatra sādṛśyam,
analyzed: vede ca vasiṣṭha atri ādīnām narāśaṃsaḥ dvitīyaḥ prayājaḥ iti dharma niyamaḥ eva hi tatra sādṛśyam

original: prakṛtivikṛtikarmaṇoś ca dharmasāmānyam eva sādṛśyam ity uktam eva. ete ca jātyādaya
analyzed: prakṛti vikṛti karmaṇoḥ ca dharma sāmānyam eva sādṛśyam iti uktam eva ete ca jāti ādayaḥ

original: ekaikaśo dviśastriśas samastaśaś ca samānā bhavantas sādṛśyasya vicitratām āpādayantīti // 20 //
analyzed: ekaikaśas dviśas triśas samastaśas ca samānāḥ bhavantaḥ sādṛśyasya vicitra tām āpādayanti iti

original: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate. yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ,
analyzed: nanu yatra sādṛśyam samavaiti tat sadṛśa buddhyā gṛhyate yadi ca avayava sāmānyāni sādṛśyam

original: tāni tarhy avayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣv eva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyuḥ. atha teṣāṃ bhūyastā,
analyzed: tāni tarhi avayaveṣu samavayanti iti teṣu eva sadṛśa dhiyam janayeyuḥ atha teṣām bhūyaḥ tā

original: sā cāvayavasāmānyeṣv iti tāny eva sadṛśāni syuḥ. kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhir
analyzed: sā ca avayava sāmānyeṣu iti tāni eva sadṛśāni syuḥ katham jāti antare sadṛśa buddhiḥ

original: ata āha -- na dharmā iti. satyam. ata eva hetor na dharmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadbhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ,
analyzed: atas āha na dharmāḥ iti satyam atas eva hetoḥ na dharma ākhya avayava sāmānyāni tad bhūyastāḥ vā sādṛśyam

original: teṣu sādṛśyabuddhyanutpatteḥ. yad eva hi teṣāṃ bhūyas tayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi,
analyzed: teṣu sādṛśya buddhi anutpatteḥ yat eva hi teṣām bhūyaḥ tayā yuktam jāti antaram gavaya ādi vyakti antaram vā āgneya saurya ādi

original: tad eva sadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate. ato jātyantarasamavāya eva teṣāṃ sādṛśyam. svarūpatas
analyzed: tat eva sadṛśa buddhyā gṛhyate atas jāti antara samavāyaḥ eva teṣām sādṛśyam svarūpatas

original: tv ekaikaśastāni sāmānyāni pradhānasāmānyavadekatvabuddhinibandhanam eva. piṇḍitāni
analyzed: tu ekaikaśas tāni sāmānyāni pradhāna sāmānya vat ekatva buddhi nibandhanam eva piṇḍitāni

original: tu jātyantarasamavāyopahitāni sādṛśyam,
analyzed: tu jāti antara samavāya upahitāni sādṛśyam

original: ayaṃ ca bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyety asyaiva prapañca iti // 21 //
analyzed: ayam ca bhūyas vayava sāmānyā iti asya eva prapañcaḥ iti

original: {3,148} atra codayati -- yamayor iti. jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇaḥ paricodanam
analyzed: atra codayati yamayoḥ iti jāti antarasya iti yāvat śruta grāhinaḥ paricodanam

original: idam -- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogatas sādṛśyaṃ kathaṃ yamayor vyaktisādṛśyam
analyzed: idam yadi jāti antarasya bhūyaḥ vayava sāmānya yogataḥ sādṛśyam katham yamayoḥ vyakti sādṛśyam

original: iti. itaras tu -- pradarśanamātraṃ jātyantarasyeti keyam atraivāsthā,
analyzed: iti itaraḥ tu pradarśana mātram jāti antarasya iti kā iyam atra eva āsthā

original: tad ayam arbhako varāka ity apahasati -- dṛṣṭatvād iti. yatraiva sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā,
analyzed: tat ayam arbhakaḥ varākaḥ iti apahasati dṛṣṭa tvāt iti yatra eva sādṛśyam dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā

original: tatraiva tadāśrayaṇīyam. kim ekatraivāsthāṃ badhnāsīti. syād etat. ekasvabhāvā hi
analyzed: tatra eva tat āśrayaṇīyam kim ekatra eva āsthām badhnāsi iti syāt etat eka svabhāvāḥ hi

original: bhāvā jātyādayaḥ. tad idaṃ sādṛśyam api tathaiva yuktam. yadi tāvadalpavṛttisvabhāvaṃ
analyzed: bhāvāḥ jāti ādayaḥ tat idam sādṛśyam api tathā eva yuktam yadi tāvat alpa vṛtti svabhāvam

original: vyaktyor eva yuktam,
analyzed: vyaktyoḥ eva yuktam

original: atha bahuvṛttisvabhāvaṃ tato jātyor eva. ardhavaiśasaṃ tv avastutām āpādayatīti,
analyzed: atha bahu vṛtti svabhāvam tatas jātyoḥ eva ardha vaiśasam tu avastu tām āpādayati iti

original: ata āha -- kvacid dhīti. pratītyavisaṃvādād ubhayopapattir iti bhāvaḥ // 22 //
analyzed: atas āha kvacid dhī iti pratītya visaṃvādāt ubhaya upapattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu sāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ,
analyzed: nanu sāmānyāni sādṛśyam

original: tāni ca vyaktināśena naśyeyuḥ. ato nityaṃ sāmānyam iti siddhāntahānir ata āha -- sāmānyānīti. etāni tāvannāśīni bhavantu,
analyzed: tāni ca vyakti nāśena naśyeyuḥ atas nityam sāmānyam iti siddhānta hāniḥ atas āha sāmānyāni iti etāni tāvat nāśīni bhavantu

original: sāmānyāntarāṇi gotvādīni nityāny eveti na kaścil lokavirodha iti // 23 //
analyzed: sāmānya antarāṇi go tva ādīni nityāni eva iti na kaścid loka virodhaḥ iti

original: kaḥ punas sāmānyāntareṣu viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: kaḥ punar sāmānya antareṣu viśeṣaḥ

original: ata āha -- ananteti. ananto hi gotvādīnām āśrayaḥ. tadekasya nāśe 'py āśrayāntare
analyzed: atas āha ananta iti anantaḥ hi go tva ādīnām āśrayaḥ tad ekasya nāśe pi āśraya antare

original: pratyabhijñānānnaikāntiko nāśa iti. nityasāmānyavādo 'pi na nas sārvatrika ity āha -- teneti // 24 //
analyzed: pratyabhijñānāt na aikāntikaḥ nāśaḥ iti nitya sāmānya vādaḥ pi na naḥ sārvatrikaḥ iti āha tena iti

original: {3,149} athavāvayavasāmānyānām api nātyantiko nāśo 'stīty āha -- sāmānyasyeti. kāraṇam āha -- sarvasyeti // 25 //
analyzed: athavā avayava sāmānyānām api na ātyantikaḥ nāśaḥ sti iti āha sāmānyasya iti kāraṇam āha sarvasya iti

original: yady asti tatrāpi sādṛśyadhiyā bhavitavyam ata āha -- teṣām iti. bhūyas tayā teṣāṃ sādṛśyam atiriktaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yadi asti tatra api sādṛśya dhiyā bhavitavyam atas āha teṣām iti bhūyas tayā teṣām sādṛśyam atiriktam bhavati

original: na tv ekaikaśo na santīti. na kevalaṃ sāmānyam anaśvaram iti deśāntarādiṣv āśrayasadbhāvaḥ
analyzed: na tu ekaikaśas na santi iti na kevalam sāmānyam anaśvaram iti deśa antara ādiṣu āśraya sadbhāvaḥ

original: kalpyate. api tu pratyakṣe 'pi kvacid arthe tāny upalabhyanta evety āha -- tānīti // 26 //
analyzed: kalpyate api tu pratyakṣe kvacid arthe tāni upalabhyante eva iti āha tāni iti

original: nanv akṣyādīnāṃ svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā sādṛśyam uktaṃ,
analyzed: nanu akṣi ādīnām sva avayava sāmānya bhūmnā sādṛśyam uktam

original: tadavayavānāṃ tu kathaṃ sādṛśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- sadṛśeti. yathā mahāvayavino ye 'vayavāḥ svāvayavasāmānyais sadṛśā bhavanti,
analyzed: tad avayavānām tu katham sādṛśyam bhaviṣyati atas āha sadṛśa iti yathā mahā avayavinaḥ ye vayavāḥ sva avayava sāmānyaiḥ sadṛśāḥ bhavanti

original: evaṃ yatra nāmāvayaveṣv api sadṛśāvayavatvam avagamyate te 'py avāntarāvayavasāmānyais sadṛśā bhavantīti na kāścad doṣa iti // 27 //
analyzed: evam yatra nāma avayaveṣu api sadṛśa avayava tvam avagamyate te pi avāntara avayava sāmānyaiḥ sadṛśāḥ bhavanti iti na kāścad doṣaḥ iti

original: tāvac caivaṃ darśayitavyaṃ yāvannirbhāgā bhāgā ity āha -- evam iti. tataḥ paraṃ paramāṇutvam eva kevalaṃ sāmānyam ity āha -- tata iti // 28
analyzed: tāvat ca evam darśayitavyam yāvat nirbhāgāḥ bhāgāḥ iti āha evam iti tatas param parama aṇu tvam eva kevalam sāmānyam iti āha tatas iti

original: nanu yadi sāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ gotvādau prasaṅgaḥ,
analyzed: nanu yadi sāmānyāni sādṛśyam go tva ādau prasaṅgaḥ

original: tattvābhedād ity ata āha -- pradhānānām iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- saṃvinniṣṭhā hi no{3,
analyzed: tattva abhedāt iti atas āha pradhānānām iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ saṃvid niṣṭhā hi

original: ato yatsadṛśabuddhim utpādayati tatsādṛśyam. pradhānāvayavināṃ tu yatra gotvādisāmānyam ekaṃ pratīyate,
analyzed: atas yat sadṛśa buddhim utpādayati tat sādṛśyam pradhāna avayavinām tu yatra go tva ādi sāmānyam ekam pratīyate

original: tatra sa eveti pratibhāso bhavati,
analyzed: tatra saḥ eva iti pratibhāsaḥ bhavati

original: na sa iveti. ataḥ pradhānasāmānyaṃ na sadṛśabuddher hetur iti na sādṛśyam. tadbhede pradhānasāmānyabhede gogavayayos sādṛśyabuddhir bhavati,
analyzed: na saḥ iva iti atas pradhāna sāmānyam na sadṛśa buddheḥ hetuḥ iti na sādṛśyam tad bhede pradhāna sāmānya bhede go gavayayoḥ sādṛśya buddhiḥ bhavati

original: na ca tayor itaretarasādṛśyabuddhiḥ. ato yatra gotvādisāmānyaṃ vartate na tatra sadṛśabuddhiḥ.
analyzed: na ca tayoḥ itaretara sādṛśya buddhiḥ atas yatra go tva ādi sāmānyam vartate na tatra sadṛśa buddhiḥ

original: yatra sadṛśabuddhir na tatra tadvartata iti tadvartīny avayavasāmānyāny eva piṇḍitāni
analyzed: yatra sadṛśa buddhiḥ na tatra tat vartate iti tad vartīni avayava sāmānyāni eva piṇḍitāni

original: sadṛśabuddher hetutvāt sādṛśyam iti siddham. evaṃ ca yannibandhanakāreṇa sādṛśyasya
analyzed: sadṛśa buddheḥ hetu tvāt sādṛśyam iti siddham evam ca yat nibandhana kāreṇa sādṛśyasya

original: tattvāntaratve kāraṇam uktaṃ gotvādāv api prasaṅga iti,
analyzed: tattva antara tve kāraṇam uktam go tva ādau api prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: tat pratyuktam iti // 29 //
analyzed: tat pratyuktam iti

original: citrādāv avayavasāmānyābhāvāt sādṛśyānupapattir iti codayati -- citrādāv iti. pariharati
analyzed: citra ādau avayava sāmānya abhāvāt sādṛśya anupapattiḥ iti codayati citra ādau iti pariharati

original: -- tatrāpīti. pāriṇāmikāvayavasamavetasāmānyābhāve 'pi pṛthivyaṃśe śuklādayo varṇaviśeṣāḥ
analyzed: tatra api iti pāriṇāmika avayava samaveta sāmānya abhāve pi pṛthivī aṃśe śukla ādayaḥ varṇa viśeṣāḥ

original: parimāṇaś ca tais sādṛśyam upapāditam iti. kiṃ punar idaṃ jātisādṛśyaṃ vyaktisādṛśyaṃ
analyzed: parimāṇaḥ ca taiḥ sādṛśyam upapāditam iti kim punar idam jāti sādṛśyam vyakti sādṛśyam

original: vā. nedam ubhayam api sambhavati,
analyzed: vā na idam ubhayam api sambhavati

original: ubhayābhāvāt. na hi citrādau naratvādijātayas tadvyaktayo vā sambhavanti. svabhāvanirmitapāṇyādyavayavasamavāyitvād vyakteḥ,
analyzed: ubhaya abhāvāt na hi citra ādau nara tva ādi jātayaḥ tad vyaktayaḥ vā sambhavanti svabhāva nirmita pāṇi ādi avayava samavāyi tvāt vyakteḥ

original: tatsamavāyitvāc ca jāteḥ. ucyate. vyaktir evātra sadṛśī. yady api cātra naratvaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: tad samavāyi tvāt ca jāteḥ ucyate vyaktiḥ evā atra sadṛśī yadi api ca atra nara tvam nā asti

original: dravyatvaṃ tv astīti tadvyaktis sadṛśatayā pratīyate. prāyeṇa cākṛtisādṛśyam eva tatrāvagamyate. kuśalas tu citrakāro vyaktisādṛśyam unmīlayatīti
analyzed: dravya tvam tu asti iti tad vyaktiḥ sadṛśa tayā pratīyate prāyeṇa ca ākṛti sādṛśyam eva tatra avagamyate kuśalaḥ tu citrakāraḥ vyakti sādṛśyam unmīlayati iti

original: nanu piṇḍitāny evāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyam. evaṃ guṇasāmānyāny api militāni sādṛśyam
analyzed: nanu piṇḍitāni eva avayava sāmānyāni sādṛśyam evam guṇa sāmānyāni api militāni sādṛśyam

original: ity uktam. citrādau tu rūpamātram eva samānaṃ na gandhādayaḥ. ata āha -- rūpeti.
analyzed: iti uktam citra ādau tu rūpa mātram eva samānam na gandha ādayaḥ atas āha rūpa iti

original: rūpādīnāṃ madhye kasyacid ekasyāpi{3,
analyzed: rūpa ādīnām madhye kasyacid

original: 151}tulyatayā sādṛśyaṃ bhavaty eva. uktam asakṛt yathā darśanaṃ tadāśrīyata iti. tad iha citrādau varṇasāmānyam eva. kusumādigandhaviśeṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: sādṛśyam bhavati eva uktam asakṛt yathā darśanam tat āśrīyate iti tat iha citra ādau varṇa sāmānyam eva kusuma ādi gandha viśeṣāṇām

original: kṣīraśarkarādau rasasāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam. avaśyaṃ sarvaguṇasāmānyasamavāyo nānusartavya iti // 31 //
analyzed: kṣīra śarkarā ādau rasa sāmānyam sādṛśyam avaśyam sarva guṇa sāmānya samavāyaḥ na anusartavyaḥ iti

original: parihārāntaram āha -- pṛthivyādiṣv iti. evaṃ hi satkāryavādino vadanti -- nātyantam asatkartuṃ śakyaṃ,
analyzed: parihāra antaram āha pṛthivī ādiṣu iti evam hi satkārya vādinaḥ vadanti na atyantam asatkartum śakyam

original: gaganakusumavat,
analyzed: gagana kusuma vat

original: ato 'sataḥ kāryatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ sattāṃ gamayati. ato narādyavayavasāmānyāny api nātyantam
analyzed: atas sataḥ kārya tvam nivṛttam sattām gamayati atas nara ādi avayava sāmānyāni api na atyantam

original: asanti jāyante. kin tu santy eva svakāraṇeṣu pṛthivyādiṣu bhūteṣu pariṇāmād abhivyajyante.
analyzed: asanti jāyante kin tu santi eva sva kāraṇeṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu bhūteṣu pariṇāmāt abhivyajyante

original: sā ca teṣāṃ pāriṇāmikyabhivyaktir yathādarśanam evāvadhārayitavyā. yathā ca tāni
analyzed: sā ca teṣām pāriṇāmikī abhivyaktiḥ yathādarśanam evā avadhārayitavyā yathā ca tāni

original: pāṇyādimatsu devadattādiṣu dṛśyante,
analyzed: pāṇi ādimatsu devadatta ādiṣu dṛśyante

original: evaṃ citrādibhāgeṣv itīti tatra kim iti nābhyupagamyante. ato 'vayavasāmānyāny eva citrādāv api sādṛśyam iti // 32 //
analyzed: evam citra ādi bhāgeṣu iti iti tatra kim iti na abhyupagamyante atas vayava sāmānyāni eva citra ādau api sādṛśyam iti

original: prāksattve kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. idaṃ ca prāg evoktam iti. yat tu sādṛśyaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ veti vikalpyāvastutvam āpāditam,
analyzed: prāk sattve kāraṇam āha na hi iti idam ca prāk eva uktam iti yat tu sādṛśyam bhinnam abhinnam vā iti vikalpya avastu tvam āpāditam

original: tatrottaram āha -- dharmāṇām iti. sarvadharmāṇām eva jātyādīnāṃ na dharmiṇo nānātvam,
analyzed: tatra uttaram āha dharmāṇām iti sarva dharmāṇām eva jāti ādīnām na dharmiṇaḥ nānātvam

original: atha cāvāntarasthitir api dharmadharmikṛtāsty eva. evaṃ sādṛśye 'pi. ato nānena tadapalapituṃ śakyate. sarvatrānaikānta eva pratīty avisaṃvādāt  #
analyzed: atha ca avāntara sthitiḥ api dharma dharmi kṛtā asti eva evam sādṛśye atas na anena tat apalapitum śakyate sarvatra anaikānte eva prati iti avisaṃvādāt

original: samarthanīya iti // 33 //
analyzed: samarthanīyaḥ iti

original: tad evaṃ sādṛśyasya vastutve siddhe cakṣuṣā sambaddhasya sator dvayor dharmiṇor yugapadīkṣamāṇasyaikatra vā pratyakṣatvaṃ siddham ity āha --  #
analyzed: tat evam sādṛśyasya vastu tve siddhe cakṣuṣā sambaddhasya satoḥ dvayoḥ dharmiṇoḥ yugapad īkṣamāṇasya ekatra vā pratyakṣa tvam siddham iti āha  /

original: vastutve iti // 34 //
analyzed: vastu tve iti

original: {3,152} vṛttiparicodanāyām uttaram āha -- sāmānyavad iti. kāraṇam āha -- pratiyogīti. jātyādivadupapattir iti // 35 //
analyzed: vṛtti paricodanāyām uttaram āha sāmānya vat iti kāraṇam āha pratiyogi iti jāti ādi vat upapattiḥ iti

original: pratyekaṃ kṛtsnasamavāye cāsannihite 'pi gotve smṛtisthe gavayasthasya sannihitasya sādṛśyasyendriyagocaratā siddhety upasaṃharann āha -- tatreti
analyzed: pratyekam kṛtsna samavāye ca asannihite go tve smṛti sthe gavaya sthasya sannihitasya sādṛśyasya indriya gocara tā siddhā iti upasaṃharan āha tatra iti

original: svamatenedānīm upamānasya prameyaṃ darśayati -- tasmād iti. yathā vivakṣaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti // 37 //
analyzed: sva matena idānīm upamānasya prameyam darśayati tasmāt iti yathā vivakṣam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ iti  /

original: nanu gauḥ smaryate sādṛśyaṃ ca pratyakṣeṇa gamyata iti na prameyam upamānasya paśyāmaḥ. ata āha -- pratyakṣeṇeti // 38 //
analyzed: nanu gauḥ smaryate sādṛśyam ca pratyakṣeṇa gamyate iti na prameyam upamānasya paśyāmaḥ atas āha pratyakṣeṇa iti

original: atra dṛṣṭāntam āha -- pratyakṣe iti // 39 //
analyzed: atra dṛṣṭāntam āha pratyakṣe iti

original: kā punar atra vyabhicāraśaṅkā,
analyzed: kā punar atra vyabhicāra śaṅkā

original: yannirākaraṇārthaṃ lakṣaṇapraṇayanam,
analyzed: yat nirākaraṇa artham lakṣaṇa praṇayanam

original: ata āha -- yatra tv iti // 40 //
analyzed: atas āha yatra tu iti

original: {3,153} ābhāsetaraviveke kāraṇam āha -- bādhaketi. atrodāharaṇam āha -- yatheti // 41 //
analyzed: ābhāsa itara viveke kāraṇam āha bādhaka iti atra udāharaṇam āha yathā iti

original: kathaṃ punas tadābhāsatvam ata āha -- samīpastha iti. bādhakaṃ hi tatra jñānam utpadyata iti bhāvaḥ. neti pratyayābhāve tu paramārthasādṛśyam  #
analyzed: katham punar tad ābhāsa tvam atas āha samīpa sthaḥ iti bādhakam hi tatra jñānam utpadyate iti bhāvaḥ na iti pratyaya abhāve tu paramārtha sādṛśyam

original: ity āha -- na bādhyata iti // 42 //
analyzed: iti āha na bādhyate iti

original: sarvam evālocitānugamanam anumānam iti manyamānā ye 'syānumānāntarbhāvam icchanti
analyzed: sarvam eva ālocita anugamanam anumānam iti manyamānāḥ ye sya anumāna antarbhāvam icchanti

original: tān pratyāha -- na ceti. pakṣadharmādyasambhavam eva darśayati -- prāg iti. dhūmādir
analyzed: tān pratyāha na ca iti pakṣa dharma ādi asambhavam eva darśayati prāk iti dhūma ādiḥ

original: hi prameyasya parvatāder dharmatayānumānotpatteḥ prāgavagataḥ pakṣadharmo bhavati.
analyzed: hi prameyasya parvata ādeḥ dharma tayā anumāna utpatteḥ prāk avagataḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ bhavati

original: iha ca gauḥ prameyaḥ. na copamānotpatteḥ prāk taddharmatayā sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate. atas
analyzed: iha ca gauḥ prameyaḥ na ca upamāna utpatteḥ prāk tad dharma tayā sādṛśyam gṛhyate atas

original: tāvan na pakṣadharmaḥ. gavayaśṛṅgitvādīnāṃ tu pakṣadharmatopariṣṭānnirākariṣyata iti // 43 //
analyzed: tāvat na pakṣa dharmaḥ gavaya śṛṅgi tva ādīnām tu pakṣa dharma tā upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyate iti

original: gavayagatam api sādṛśyam apakṣadharmatvān na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭānāṃ gavām anumāpakam ity āha -- gavaya iti. gogataṃ ca pratijñārthaikadeśatvān liṅgam  #
analyzed: gavaya gatam api sādṛśyam apakṣa dharma tvāt na sādṛśya viśiṣṭānām gavām anumāpakam iti āha gavayaḥ iti go gatam ca pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt liṅgam

original: ity āha -- pratijñārtheti // 44 //
analyzed: iti āha pratijñā arthā iti

original: {3,154} gavayo 'py apakṣadharmatvān na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭasya gor liṅgam ity āha -- gavayaś
analyzed: gavayaḥ pi apakṣa dharma tvāt na sādṛśya viśiṣṭasya goḥ liṅgam iti āha gavayaḥ

original: ceti. anvayo 'pi tasya sādṛśyaviśiṣṭena gavā nāvaśyaṃ viditapūrva ity āha -- sādṛśyam
analyzed: ca iti tasya sādṛśya viśiṣṭena gavā na avaśyam vidita pūrvaḥ iti āha sādṛśyam

original: iti. dvedhāpy upamānasya prameyaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo vā gaus tad vā goviśiṣṭam,
analyzed: iti dvedhā api upamānasya prameyam sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ vā gauḥ tat vā go viśiṣṭam

original: ubhayasyāpi gavayānvayo na dṛṣṭapūrva iti // 45 //
analyzed: ubhayasya api gavaya anvayaḥ na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ iti

original: nanu yugapad ubhayaṃ paśyatāṃ sādṛśyagavayayos sambandho 'vagata evāta āha -- ekasminn iti. satyam avagataṃ,
analyzed: nanu yugapad ubhayam paśyatām sādṛśya gavayayoḥ sambandhaḥ vagataḥ eva atas āha ekasmin iti satyam avagatam

original: na tu sarveṇety uktam asmābhiḥ. yadi cānvayo jñānāṅgaṃ syāt,
analyzed: na tu sarveṇa iti uktam asmābhiḥ yadi ca anvayaḥ jñāna aṅgam syāt

original: ekasyāpy agṛhītānvayasya jñānaṃ na syād iti // [46] //
analyzed: ekasya api agṛhīta anvayasya jñānam na syāt iti

original: yadi tu śṛṅgitvāder gavā sambandho 'vagataḥ,
analyzed: yadi tu śṛṅgi tva ādeḥ gavā sambandhaḥ

original: atas tadgavaye gṛhyamāṇaṃ gavi liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ucyate. tan na. teṣām avayavabhūtānāṃ gavayāvayavijñānavyāpāraṃ pratyupakṣīṇatvād ity āśaṅkayā  #
analyzed: atas tat gavaye gṛhyamāṇam gavi liṅgam bhaviṣyati iti ucyate tat na teṣām avayava bhūtānām gavaya avayavi jñāna vyāpāram pratyupakṣīṇa tvāt iti āśaṅkayā

original: sahāha -- śṛṅgitvāder iti // 47 //
analyzed: saha āha śṛṅgi tva ādeḥ iti

original: yadi tu gavayajñānaṃ pratyanupakṣīṇāni svarūpeṇaiva śṛṅgitvādīni liṅgam iṣyante,
analyzed: yadi tu gavaya jñānam pratyanupakṣīṇāni svarūpeṇa eva śṛṅgi tva ādīni liṅgam iṣyante

original: tatas tebhyaḥ pūrvāvagatasambandhānusāreṇa nissādṛśyam eva gosmaraṇaṃ syād ity āha -- yadīti. kathaṃ nissādṛśyam ity ata āha -- na gaur iti
analyzed: tatas tebhyaḥ pūrva avagata sambandha anusāreṇa nissādṛśyam eva go smaraṇam syāt iti āha yadi iti katham nissādṛśyam iti atas āha na gauḥ iti

original: ayaṃ tu pratītikrama ity āha -- sadṛśeti. śṛṅgādipratyayāt{3,
analyzed: ayam tu pratīti kramaḥ iti āha sadṛśa iti

original: 155}parāvartinaṃ sādṛśyapratyayam apekṣya gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyayād eva punas tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagojñānam upajāyate,
analyzed: sādṛśya pratyayam apekṣya go sādṛśya viśiṣṭa gavaya pratyayāt eva punar tad sādṛśya viśiṣṭa go jñānam upajāyate

original: na punaḥ śṛṅgādipratyayamātrād iti // 49 //
analyzed: na punar śṛṅga ādi pratyaya mātrāt iti

original: nanu śṛṅgādayo 'pi parasparasadṛśā eveti kathaṃ tebhyo nissādṛśyā pratītir ucyate. ata āha -- sadṛśeti. yadi gavayādīnāṃ sadṛśāvayavatvam avagamyate,
analyzed: nanu śṛṅga ādayaḥ pi paraspara sadṛśāḥ eva iti katham tebhyaḥ nissādṛśyā pratītiḥ ucyate atas āha sadṛśa iti yadi gavaya ādīnām sadṛśa avayava tvam avagamyate

original: na tarhi te sadṛśatayā pramīyante. kin tv avayavā eva parasparaṃ sadṛśatayā. ato
analyzed: na tarhi te sadṛśa tayā pramīyante kin tu avayavāḥ eva parasparam sadṛśa tayā

original: na sādṛśyaviśiṣṭagopramitau śṛṅgitvādīnāṃ liṅgatvam. nissādṛśyaṃ tu tebhyo gosmaraṇamātraṃ
analyzed: na sādṛśya viśiṣṭa go pramitau śṛṅgi tva ādīnām liṅga tvam nissādṛśyam tu tebhyaḥ go smaraṇa mātram

original: syād iti. api cānumāne yad ekadeśatayā dhūmādir avagamyate prameyam apy agnyādi tadekadeśatayaiva.
analyzed: syāt iti api ca anumāne yat eka deśa tayā dhūma ādiḥ avagamyate prameyam api agni ādi tad eka deśa tayā eva

original: iha tu śṛṅgitvādayo gavayaikadeśatayā pramīyante. na ca tadekadeśo gaur apy anumīyata
analyzed: iha tu śṛṅgi tva ādayaḥ gavaya eka deśa tayā pramīyante na ca tad eka deśaḥ gauḥ api anumīyata

original: ity āha -- na ceti // 50 //
analyzed: iti āha na ca iti

original: yadi tu kaścid vaiyātyād evam evānumāsyata iti brūyāt,
analyzed: yadi tu kaścid vaiyātyāt evam eva anumāsyate iti brūyāt

original: taṃ pratyāha -- ittham iti. bhrāntir iyam abhāvavirodhād iti. nagarasthagojñānam
analyzed: tam pratyāha ittham iti bhrāntiḥ iyam abhāva virodhāt iti nagara stha go jñānam

original: aviśeṣitaṃ sādṛśyena smṛtir evety āha -- nagarastham iti. viṣayatātsthyād jñāne 'pi
analyzed: aviśeṣitam sādṛśyena smṛtiḥ eva iti āha nagara stham iti viṣaya tātsthyāt jñāne pi

original: tātsthyavyapadeśaḥ tadadhīnatvāt tasyeti // 51 //
analyzed: tātsthya vyapadeśaḥ tad adhīna tvāt tasya iti

original: kaḥ punar upamānasya vedārtha upayogaḥ. yadi prākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vikṛtau prāptir ucyate,
analyzed: kaḥ punar upamānasya veda arthe upayogaḥ yadi prākṛtānām dharmāṇām vikṛtau prāptiḥ ucyate

original: tan na. anumānād eva tatsiddheḥ. prākṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmais sambaddhaṃ kiñcid vikṛtau
analyzed: tat na anumānāt eva tad siddheḥ prākṛtam liṅgam dharmaiḥ sambaddham kiñcid vikṛtau

original: dṛṣṭaṃ teṣām anumāpakaṃ bhaviṣyati. jaiminer apy etad evābhimatam iti lakṣyate. yad
analyzed: dṛṣṭam teṣām anumāpakam bhaviṣyati jaimineḥ api etat eva abhimatam iti lakṣyate yat

original: evam āha -- yasya liṅgam arthasaṃyogād iti. atra hi vyaktam eva laiṅgikīṃ dharmaprāptim
analyzed: evam āha yasya liṅgam artha saṃyogāt iti atra hi vyaktam eva laiṅgikīm dharma prāptim

original: apadiśati. ata āha -- bhinneti.{3,
analyzed: apadiśati atas āha

original: 156}ayaṃ bhāvaḥ -- pratibandhadarśino hi pratibandhakajñānam anumānam. na ceha sauryādivākyānām
analyzed: bhāvaḥ pratibandha darśinaḥ hi pratibandhaka jñānam anumānam na ca iha saurya ādi vākyānām

original: āgneyādividhyantena pratibandho 'vagataḥ. na ca dravyadevatayoḥ. na karmaṇaḥ. ataḥ
analyzed: āgneya ādi vidhi antena pratibandhaḥ na ca dravya devatayoḥ na karmaṇaḥ atas

original: kathaṃ tajjñānam anumānam iti. pramāṇāntarād evopamānāt prākṛtavidhyantaprāptir adhyavasātavyā.
analyzed: katham tat jñānam anumānam iti pramāṇa antarāt eva upamānāt prākṛta vidhi anta prāptiḥ adhyavasātavyā

original: vaikṛtāni hi pradhānāny aśrutavidhyantāni na tam antareṇa paryavasyanti. yat kiñcid
analyzed: vaikṛtāni hi pradhānāni a śruta vidhi antāni na tam antareṇa paryavasyanti yat kiñcid

original: vidhyantāpekṣāṃ dravyadevatādisādṛśyadarśanotthāpitopamānaparyavasthāpitāgneyavidhyantāni
analyzed: vidhi anta apekṣām dravya devatā ādi sādṛśya darśana utthāpita upamāna paryavasthāpita āgneya vidhi antāni

original: itikartavyatām āpādya kṛtārthāni bhavanti. yathehaiva tāvat sauryāgneyayor ekadevatātvena
analyzed: itikartavya tām āpādya kṛtārthāni bhavanti yathā iha eva tāvat saurya āgneyayoḥ eka devatā tvena

original: taddhitadevatānirdeśenauṣadhadravyakatayā ca sādṛśyād upamānenāgneyadharmās saurya
analyzed: taddhita devatā nirdeśena auṣadha dravyaka tayā ca sādṛśyāt upamānena āgneya dharmāḥ saurya

original: unnīyante. ayaṃ cāvayavārthaḥ -- iyam upamā(numā)
analyzed: unnīyante ayam ca avayava arthaḥ iyam upamā anumā

original: nād bhinnoktā agnyādiyutam itikartavyatājātaṃ sādṛśyamātrāt kathaṃ nu pratyāyayodity
analyzed: nāt bhinna uktāḥ agni ādi yutam itikartavya tā jātam sādṛśya mātrāt katham nu

original: evam upayujyate. itarathā sauryādivākyais saha tasyādarśanān nānumānaṃ sambhavatīty
analyzed: evam upayujyate itarathā saurya ādi vākyaiḥ saha tasya adarśanāt na anumānam sambhavati iti

original: aprāptir eva syāt. agnyādiyutam iti. agnyādinā devatayāgneyādikarma lakṣayati. āgneyādinā
analyzed: aprāptiḥ eva syāt agni ādi yutam iti agni ādinā devatayā āgneya ādi karma lakṣayati āgneya ādinā

original: karmaṇā yuktam itikartavyatāmātram ity uktaṃ bhavatīti // 52 //
analyzed: karmaṇā yuktam itikartavya tā mātram iti uktam bhavati iti

original: prayojanāntaram āha -- pratinidhir apīti. darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prakrāntayor vrīhyapacāre yat tatsadṛśā nīvārāḥ pratinidhīyante,
analyzed: prayojana antaram āha pratinidhiḥ api iti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ prakrāntayoḥ vrīhi apacāre yat tad sadṛśāḥ nīvārāḥ pratinidhīyante

original: tad apy upamānasya phalam iti. idam aparaṃ prayojanam ity āha -- pratikṛtir iti yuktam
analyzed: tat api upamānasya phalam iti idam aparam prayojanam iti āha pratikṛtiḥ iti yuktam

original: antena. mukhyāpacāre gauṇe śāstrārtha āśrayitavye yatrātigauṇair jaghanyair dvitrādisāmānyaiḥ
analyzed: antena mukhya apacāre gauṇe śāstra arthe āśrayitavye yatra ati gauṇaiḥ jaghanyaiḥ dvitra ādi sāmānyaiḥ

original: pratikṛtiḥ sādṛśyaṃ bodhyate,
analyzed: pratikṛtiḥ sādṛśyam bodhyate

original: tatra susadṛśalābhe yanmandasadṛśaṃ,
analyzed: tatra su sadṛśa lābhe yat manda sadṛśam

original: mithyā bhavati,
analyzed: mithyā bhavati

original: tad apy upamānasya phalam iti. kathaṃ punarmandasadṛśaṃ mithyā, {3,
analyzed: tat api upamānasya phalam iti katham punar manda sadṛśam mithyā

original: 157}susadṛśalābhe 'pi hy alpayā mātrayā tatsadṛśam avagamyata eva. ato 'stu tatrālpaṃ
analyzed: hi alpayā mātrayā tad sadṛśam avagamyate eva atas stu tatra alpam

original: nāmāvayavasāmānyam ata āha -- matir iti. na kevalaṃ vastutas tayos susadṛśālpasadṛśayoḥ (?strīva /
analyzed: nāma avayava sāmānyam atas āha matiḥ iti na kevalam vastutas tayoḥ su sadṛśa alpa sadṛśayoḥ strī iva

original: tīvra)mandratvamatir (?apīti/
analyzed: tīvra mandra tva matiḥ api iti

original: api tu) tathaiva -- mukhyarūṣeṇaiva susadṛśe drāk śīghram utpadyate. ivaśabdo 'laṅkāre.
analyzed: api tu tathā eva mukhya rūṣeṇa eva su sadṛśe drāk śīghram utpadyate iva śabdaḥ laṅkāre

original: ato mandasadṛśasya mātrayā sādṛśyabodhe 'py anupādānalakṣaṇo bodho bhaviṣyatīty asti
analyzed: atas manda sadṛśasya mātrayā sādṛśya bodhe pi anupādāna lakṣaṇaḥ bodhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti asti

original: ity upādhyāyasucaritamiśrakṛtau kāśikāṭīkāyām
analyzed: iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau kāśikāṭīkāyām

original: upamānaparicchehaḥ samāptaḥ /
analyzed: upamāna paricchehaḥ samāptaḥ

original: 008 arthāpattipariccheda
analyzed: arthāpatti pariccheda

original: athārthāpattiparicchedaḥ
analyzed: atha arthāpatti paricchedaḥ

original: atra bhāṣyam. arthāpattir api dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata ity arthakalpanā.
analyzed: atra bhāṣyam arthāpattiḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ nyathā nā upapadyate iti artha kalpanā

original: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyādṛṣṭasya parikalpanā iti.
analyzed: yathā jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛha abhāva darśanena bahirbhāvasya adṛṣṭasya parikalpanā iti

original: asyārthaḥ -- arthāpattir api na parīkṣitavyā,
analyzed: asya arthaḥ arthāpattiḥ api na parīkṣitavyā

original: evaṃlakṣaṇakatvenāvyabhicārād iti. kiṃ punar anenārthāpatter lakṣaṇam uktam. artho
analyzed: evaṃlakṣaṇaka tvena avyabhicārāt iti kim punar anena arthāpatteḥ lakṣaṇam uktam

original: 'nyathānupapadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ kalpayati sārthāpattiḥ. yathā jīvato devadattasya
analyzed: nyathā anupapadyamānaḥ yat artha antaram kalpayati sā arthāpattiḥ yathā jīvataḥ devadattasya

original: gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvena vinā nopapadyamāno yad bahirbhāvaṃ kalpayati sārthāpattir ity uktam.
analyzed: gṛha abhāvaḥ bahirbhāvena vinā na upapadyamānaḥ yat bahirbhāvam kalpayati sā arthāpattiḥ iti uktam

original: yady evaṃ keyam anyathānupapattir nāma. yadi tāvad anena vināsya sadbhāvo nopapadyata iti,
analyzed: yadi evam kā iyam anyathā anupapattiḥ nāma yadi tāvat anena vinā asya sadbhāvaḥ na upapadyate iti

original: tad idaṃ kāryataḥ kāraṇānumānam upanyastaṃ,
analyzed: tat idam kāryataḥ kāraṇa anumānam upanyastam

original: na pramāṇāntaram. atha jñātasambandhasyānumānam,
analyzed: na pramāṇa antaram atha jñāta sambandhasya anumānam

original: arthāpattau na sambandhajñānam apekṣata ity ucyate,
analyzed: arthāpattau na sambandha jñānam apekṣate iti ucyate

original: tad ayuktam. na hy ajñāte sambandhe 'nena vinā nopapadyata iti śakyate vaktum.{3,
analyzed: tat ayuktam na hi ajñāte sambandhe nena vinā nā upapadyate iti śakyate

original: 158}yad eva hy asyedaṃ kāryam ityādinā rūpeṇa jñātasambandhaniyamaḥ,
analyzed: eva hi asya idam kāryam ityādinā rūpeṇa jñāta sambandha niyamaḥ

original: tad eva svakāraṇena vinā nopapadyata iti śakyam avasātum,
analyzed: tat eva sva kāraṇena vinā na upapadyate iti śakyam avasātum

original: dhūma ivāgninā vinā. ato 'vinābhāvasambandhabalottham evedaṃ jñānam iti śabdāntareṇoktam. syād etat. dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānam agnyādiṣu
analyzed: dhūmaḥ iva agninā vinā atas vinābhāva sambandha bala uttham eva idam jñānam iti śabda antareṇa uktam syāt etat dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam anumānam agni ādiṣu

original: adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayārthāpattiś śaktyādiṣūpajāyata iti. tan na. dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā jñātasambandham avagamyate 'nyathānupapattyā,
analyzed: adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya arthāpattiḥ śakti ādiṣu upajāyate iti tat na dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā jñāta sambandham avagamyate nyathā anupapattyā

original: kāryasāmānyaṃ hi kāraṇasāmānyena vinānupapadyamānaṃ yat tat kalpayati tad api sambandhajñānena

analyzed: kathañcid asti caitra anvayaḥ caitra abhāvaḥ iti hi sa pratīyate gṛham tu na kathañcid

original: caitrasambaddham avagamyate ity apakṣadharma ity āha -- tadabhāveti. itaś ca gṛhābhāvo
analyzed: caitra sambaddham avagamyate iti apakṣa dharmaḥ iti āha tad abhāva iti itas ca gṛha abhāvaḥ

original: na pakṣadharma ity āha -- gṛhābhāveti. gṛhīte hi pakṣe taddharmapratyayo bhavati.
analyzed: na pakṣa dharmaḥ iti āha gṛha abhāva iti gṛhīte hi pakṣe tad dharma pratyayaḥ bhavati

original: na ca caitrabahirdeśau gṛhe 'sattayā gamyete iti // 12 //
analyzed: na ca caitra bahis deśau gṛhe sat tayā gamyete iti

original: {3,166} gṛham eva tu tatra pratyakṣāvagatam iti taddharmapratītir evābhāve bhavatīty āha -- gamyate tu gṛham iti. na hi tatra gṛha eva caitro
analyzed: gṛham eva tu tatra pratyakṣa avagatam iti tad dharma pratītiḥ eva abhāve bhavati iti āha gamyate tu gṛham iti na hi tatra gṛhe eva caitraḥ

original: abhāvavirodhād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tatreti. adarśanaṃ hi caitrasambaddham avagatam iti talliṅgaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātreti. na ca  #
analyzed: abhāva virodhāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tatra iti adarśanam hi caitra sambaddham avagatam iti tat liṅgam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca atra iti na ca

original: darśanābhāvo bahirbhāve liṅgam,
analyzed: darśana abhāvaḥ bahirbhāve liṅgam

original: etadabhāve 'bhidhāsyata iti // 13 //
analyzed: etad abhāve bhidhāsyate iti

original: ato gṛhe 'darśanam api na hetur ity āha -- teneti. kiñ ca gṛhābhāvāvadhāraṇopakṣīṇe 'darśane bahirbhāvamatir bhavati,
analyzed: atas gṛhe darśanam api na hetuḥ iti āha tena iti kim ca gṛha abhāva avadhāraṇa upakṣīṇe darśane bahirbhāva matiḥ bhavati

original: katham asau taddhetukā bhaviyiṣyatīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- adarśanād iti. abhiprāyaṃ
analyzed: katham asau tad hetukā bhaviyiṣyati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha adarśanāt iti abhiprāyam

original: vivṛṇoti -- nāsāv iti. adarśanāvadhāritasya caitrabhāvasyaivānyatrānupayuktasya hetutvaṃ
analyzed: vivṛṇoti na asau iti adarśana avadhāritasya caitra bhāvasya eva anyatra anupayuktasya hetu tvam

original: sambhavati. taccāpakṣadharmatayā nirākṛtam ity āha -- caitrābhāvasyeti // 14 -- 15 //
analyzed: sambhavati tat ca apakṣa dharma tayā nirākṛtam iti āha caitra abhāvasya iti

original: evaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmatā nirākṛtā pakṣo 'py atrānumānāt pūrvaṃ nopalakṣyata ity āha -- pūrvaṃ na ceti // 16 //
analyzed: evam tāvat pakṣa dharma tā nirākṛtā pakṣaḥ u pi atra anumānāt pūrvam na upalakṣyate iti āha pūrvam na ca iti  /

original: {3,167} atra codayati -- nadīti. atra hy apratipanna evoparideśe pakṣe 'taddharmaḥ pūro liṅgaṃ tadvad ihāpi bhaviṣyatīti // 17 //
analyzed: atra codayati nadī iti atra hi apratipanne eva upari deśe pakṣe tad dharmaḥ pūraḥ liṅgam tadvat iha api bhaviṣyati iti  /

original: pariharati -- vṛṣṭimad iti. evaṃ tv anumīyamāne lokavirodhaḥ. na hy evaṃ laukikā
analyzed: pariharati vṛṣṭimat iti evam tu anumīyamāne loka virodhaḥ na hi evam laukikā

original: budhyante. ata āha -- yad veti. dṛṣṭasya nadīpūrasya kāraṇābhāvānupapattyopariṣṭād
analyzed: budhyante atas āha yat vā iti dṛṣṭasya nadīpūrasya kāraṇa abhāva anupapattyā upariṣṭāt

original: vṛṣṭiḥ kalpyate. idam api cānvārūḍhenoktam,
analyzed: vṛṣṭiḥ kalpyate idam api ca anvārūḍhena uktam

original: paramārthena tu vyāptibalottham idam anumānam eva. na cāpakṣadharmatādoṣaḥ. uparideśasya pūrasambaddhadeśasambandhāt,
analyzed: paramārthena tu vyāpti bala uttham idam anumānam eva na ca apakṣa dharma tā doṣaḥ upari deśasya pūra sambaddha deśa sambandhāt

original: asambaddho hi na hetur bhaviṣyatīti // 18 //
analyzed: asambaddhaḥ hi na hetuḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: itaś ca gṛhābhāvo na bahirbhāve liṅgam ity āha -- jīvataś ceti. niścitarūpaṃ hi liṅgam
analyzed: itas ca gṛha abhāvaḥ na bahirbhāve liṅgam iti āha jīvataḥ ca iti niścita rūpam hi liṅgam

original: anumāne gamakam. iha ca yo 'yaṃ jīvato gṛhābhāvaḥ sa pramāṇāntaravirodhān niścetum
analyzed: anumāne gamakam iha ca yaḥ yam jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvaḥ sa pramāṇa antara virodhāt niścetum

original: eva na śakyate. evaṃ hi tatra bhavati vitarkaḥ. jīvatā hi kvacid bhavitavyam,
analyzed: eva na śakyate evam hi tatra bhavati vitarkaḥ jīvatā hi kvacid bhavitavyam

original: katham iha na syāt. evaṃ cānadhyavasāyād apratiṣṭhito gṛhābhāvo 'siddhatvād aliṅgam. siddhis tu nānantarbhāvya bahirbhāvam asya bhavati,
analyzed: katham iha na syāt evam ca anadhyavasāyāt apratiṣṭhitaḥ siddha tvāt aliṅgam siddhiḥ tu na an antarbhāvya bahirbhāvam asya bhavati

original: tadantarbhāve ca parastāt prameyābhāva iti bhāvaḥ // 19 //
analyzed: tad antarbhāve ca parastāt prameya abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: anumāne tv anapekṣitaprameyam eva dhūmādiliṅgasya svarūpaṃ siddham avagamyata ity āha -- agnimatteti // 20 //
analyzed: anumāne tu anapekṣita prameyam eva dhūma ādi liṅgasya svarūpam siddham avagamyate iti āha agnimat tā iti

original: yadi tv ihāpi hetor anapekṣatvasiddhyarthaṃ gṛhābhāvamātram aviśeṣitaṃ jīvanena hetur iṣyate tato naikāntika ity āha -- geheti // 21 //
analyzed: yadi tu iha api hetoḥ anapekṣa tva siddhi artham gṛha abhāva mātram aviśeṣitam jīvanena hetuḥ iṣyate tatas na aikāntikaḥ iti āha geha iti  /

original: {3,168} kathaṃ ca vidyamānatvaviśiṣṭo gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvaṃ sādhayati kathaṃ ca śuddho
analyzed: katham ca vidyamāna tva viśiṣṭaḥ gṛha abhāvaḥ bahirbhāvam sādhayati katham ca śuddhaḥ

original: nety ubhayatra kāraṇam āha -- vidyamānatveti dvayena. vidyamānatvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭagṛhābhāvabuddhau
analyzed: na iti ubhayatra kāraṇam āha vidyamāna tva iti dvayena vidyamāna tva viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva buddhau

original: hi yāvad vidyamānatvasya viṣayo nāvasthāpyate tāvadabhāvaḥ pratyetum eva na śakyate,
analyzed: hi yāvat vidyamāna tvasya viṣayaḥ na avasthāpyate tāvat abhāvaḥ pratyetum eva na śakyate

original: tad yadā bhāvapratipakṣeṇābhāvena gṛham avaruddhaṃ tadā tatra tāvac caitrasya bhāvo
analyzed: tat yadā bhāva pratipakṣeṇa abhāvena gṛham avaruddham tadā tatra tāvat caitrasya

original: bhavituṃ na prabhavatīty āśrayāpekṣayā pāriśeṣyād bahir eva bhavatīti. śuddhābhāvapratītau

analyzed: tu āśraya apekṣā eva na asti iti kim bahirbhāva kalpanayā iti

original: nanu ca niścitasadbhāvasya caitrasya gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāvam antarbhāvya siddhyet.
analyzed: nanu ca niścita sadbhāvasya caitrasya gṛha abhāvaḥ bahirbhāvam antarbhāvya siddhyet

original: sandigdhasadbhāvasya tv anapekṣitabahirbhāva eva taṃ gamayiṣyatīty ata āha -- siddha
analyzed: sandigdha sadbhāvasya tu an apekṣita bahirbhāvaḥ eva tam gamayiṣyati iti atas āha siddha

original: iti. yadi caitrasadbhāve sandehaḥ,
analyzed: iti yadi caitra sadbhāve sandehaḥ

analyzed: na tarhi tad bahirbhāva avagatiḥ prasidhyet asandigdhe eva tu sadbhāva vijñāne bhāvena gehāt utkālitā utsāritā tad sattā bahis bhavati niyamena

original: itarathā tatrāpi sandeha eva bhavet. etena gṛhābhāvāpāditasandehaṃ vidyamānatvam

analyzed: asmābhiḥ iti

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ jīvananirapekṣasyābhāvasya vyabhicāraḥ avyabhicāriṇaś ca prameyānupraveśadvāraṇaiva samarthanam iti dhūmād ivailakṣaṇyān na liṅgatvam  #

analyzed: iti āha tena iti

original: {3,169} evam anumānād bhedaṃ prasādhitum upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti. anumānād bahirbhūtam idaṃ pramāṇaṃ sthitam iti // 26 //
analyzed: evam anumānāt bhedam prasādhitum upasaṃharati tasmāt iti anumānāt bahis bhūtam idam pramāṇam sthitam iti  /

original: evam eva hi sarvalaukikaparīkṣakā budhyante. na ca viparyayo deśāntarādiṣu dṛṣṭaḥ.

original: ataḥ pramāṇam evedam. yathā cānumāne niścitarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakam,

analyzed: kin tu niścita prāmāṇyayoḥ eva dvayoḥ samarthana apekṣā mātram katham idam ubhayam upapadyatām

analyzed: iti ṣoḍaśinaḥ iva grahaṇa agrahaṇa śāstrayoḥ na tatra eka parityāgena itarat upapādayitum

original: 170}samarthyate. tādrūpyeṇaiva pratibhānāt. vilakṣaṇāni hi pramāṇāni vilakṣaṇasāmagrīkāṇi. ata eva parasparato bhidyante. aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni  #
analyzed: tādrūpyeṇa eva pratibhānāt vilakṣaṇāni hi pramāṇāni vilakṣaṇa sāmagrīkāṇi atas eva parasparataḥ bhidyante aprāmāṇya kāraṇāni

original: ca saṃśayaviparyayāvajñānaṃ vā,

original: api tu bādhavirahaḥ. sa cehāpy aviśiṣṭa iti na kaścid doṣo 'rthāpattāv asmākaṃ pratibhātīti // 29 //
analyzed: api tu bādha virahaḥ sa ca iha api aviśiṣṭaḥ iti na kaścid doṣaḥ rthāpattau asmākam pratibhāti iti

original: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvam upapadyate ato nāntarīyakaḥ,

analyzed: nāntarīyakāt ca yat artha antara jñānam tat anumānam

analyzed: atas numānam eva idam bahirbhāva jñānam atas āha avinā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ nāntarīyaka artha darśanam tad vidaḥ numānam iti kecid paṭhanti

original: teṣām api tadvido nāntarīyakatāvida eva nāntarīyakadarśanam anumānam abhipretam,

original: na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam,
analyzed: na ca iha na antareṇa bahirbhāvam gṛha abhāvaḥ bhavati iti prāk avagatam

original: tadaiva hy arthāpattyā bahirbhāvaṃ parikalpyāyamanena vinā na bhavatīty avinābhāvitā kalpyate. atas sā svarūpasaty api na pūrvam avagateti  #
analyzed: tadā eva hi arthāpattyā bahirbhāvam parikalpya ayam anena vinā na bhavati iti avinābhāvitā kalpyate atas sā svarūpa satī api na pūrvam avagatā iti

original: na jñānotpattau kāraṇam iti // 30 //

original: nanv avagatasambandhasya tarhy anumānaṃ syād ata āha -- gṛhābhāveti tāntena. na tāvanniyamena sarvair eva dvayos sāhityam avagatam,
analyzed: nanu avagata sambandhasya tarhi anumānam syāt atas āha gṛha abhāva iti tāntena na tāvat niyamena sarvaiḥ eva dvayoḥ sāhityam avagatam

original: aviditasāhityasya tāvat siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaram ity abhiprāyaḥ. yenāpi tayos sāhityam avagataṃ tasyāpi nāgṛhītayos tayos sāhityagrahaḥ sambhavati,
analyzed: avidita sāhityasya tāvat siddham pramāṇa antaram iti abhiprāyaḥ yena api tayoḥ sāhityam avagatam tasya api na agṛhītayoḥ tayoḥ sāhitya grahaḥ sambhavati

original: na ca tayor ekagrahaṇe 'paradarśanam arthāpattyā vinā sambhavati. anyathānupapattyaiva tv ekena gṛhābhāvena{3,

original: 171}bahirbhāvena vā tayor ekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ. evaṃ cākalpyamāne nyatarasya sambandhino 'gṛhītatvāt sāhityapratītir eva na syāt,
analyzed: vā tayoḥ ekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ evam ca a kalpyamāne nyatarasya sambandhinaḥ gṛhīta tvāt sāhitya pratītiḥ eva na syāt

original: atas sāhityārtham arthāpattir arthanīyeti siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaram ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pramāṇaṃ ceti pratīyate 'ntena. abhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti --  #

tena iti

original: nanu ca nāvaśyam arthāpattyaivānyataras sambandhī grahītavyaḥ,

original: śakyate hi gṛhadvārāvasthitenābhāvapratyakṣābhyām ubhayaṃ viditvā sambandho 'nubhavitum,

original: tathā viditasambandhāc ca gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānam ity āśaṅkate tāvat -- gṛhadvārīti // 34 //
