analyzed: atra uttaram āha tadā api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ sidhyati evam gṛha abhāvāt bahirbhāva anumānam

original: na punar evam eva sarveṣām avagatiḥ,
analyzed: na punar evam eva sarveṣām avagatiḥ

original: agṛhītasambandhānām api pratītibhāvāt. eṣo 'pi ca prakāro naikatra bhāvena sarvatrābhāvāvagame sambhavati,
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhānām api pratīti bhāvāt ca prakāraḥ na ekatra bhāvena sarvatra abhāva avagame sambhavati

original: na hi jagadabhāvenaikatra bhāvo 'nvitaś śakyo 'vagantum. jagadabhāvasya pratyetum
analyzed: na hi jagat abhāvena ekatra bhāvaḥ nvitaḥ śakyaḥ vagantum jagat abhāvasya pratyetum

original: aśakyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. nanv evaṃ tadāvagataṃ yadāyam ekatra bhavati tadā paratra
analyzed: aśakya tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ nanu evam tadā avagatam yadā ayam ekatra bhavati tadā paratra

original: tatsamīpe na bhavatīti. evaṃ ca viditavyāpter ekadeśabhāne sarvatrābhāvānumānaṃ bhaviṣyati.

original: ata āha -- na ceti. na hy ekadeśanāstitayā trailokyābhāvena hetor vyāptis sidhyatīti // 35 //
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti na hi eka deśa na astitayā trailokya abhāvena hetoḥ vyāptiḥ sidhyati iti  /

original: kiṃ punar jagadabhāvena sambandho nāvagamyate,
analyzed: kim punar jagat abhāvena sambandhaḥ na avagamyate

original: tasyānavagater iti ced,
analyzed: tasya anavagateḥ iti ced

original: nanv anupalabdhir abhāvāvagame kāraṇam,
analyzed: nanu anupalabdhiḥ abhāva avagame kāraṇam

original: yathā caikatra san devadatto deśāntare{3,
analyzed: yathā ca ekatra san

original: 172}nupalabhyamāno nāstīti niścīyate. evam ekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyam avagantum. na hi darśanavadadarśanam  #
analyzed: na asti iti niścīyate evam ekatra san sarvatra na upalabhyate iti sarvatra eva na asti iti śakyam avagantum na hi darśanavat adarśanam

original: api prayatnam apekṣate,
analyzed: api prayatnam apekṣate

analyzed: darśana abhāvaḥ tu na kiñcid apekṣate iti codayati nanu atra iti atra iti eka deśam

analyzed: parāmṛśati atra khalu eka deśe n upalabdhitaḥ vidyamāna tvam avagamyate tat ca sarvatra api

original: samānam iti // 36 //
analyzed: samānam iti

original: atra parihāram āha -- naitayeti. kim iti na pratīyate ata āha -- taddeśeti. upalabdhiyogyasya hy anupalabdhir abhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayati,

original: dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvād eva satsv apy anupalabdhis sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti // 37 //

original: ihāpi bhaviṣyatīti. dhūmādayaś ca te vyatirekiṇaś ceti dhūmādivyatirekiṇaḥ. agnyādyabhāve
analyzed: iha api bhaviṣyati iti dhūma ādayaḥ ca te vyatirekiṇaḥ ca iti dhūma ādi vyatirekiṇaḥ agni ādi abhāve

original: vastvantarābhāvo hi tasya prameyaḥ,
analyzed: vastu antara abhāvaḥ hi tasya prameyaḥ

analyzed: mama tu sahacāriṇaḥ hetuḥ gamakaḥ

original: nanv anvayavādino 'py ajātātivṛttapratyutpannānantadeśavartivahnisahacaritadhūmadarśanaṃ durlabham eva. atha katipayāgnisāhityadarśanādevāsahitāvagatā  #

original: api vahnayo 'numīyante,

original: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadvartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva. atrāpi hy ekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa

original: tāvatā ca sarvatrābhāvo 'numāsyata ity āha -- nanv evam iti // 41 //

original: api tarhy ākṛtiviṣayam,

original: niyamārtham abhyarthyate. avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā -- kim ayam aupādhikas
analyzed: niyama artham abhyarthyate avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā kim ayam aupādhikaḥ

original: tad yadi dhūmo 'py agniṃ vyabhicaret,

original: asyāpi hi dvitricaturair eva darśanair vyabhicāro dṛśyeta,

analyzed: atra codayati nanu iti anumānena deśa antara abhāvaḥ caitrasya pratīyate evam hi parokṣāḥ sarva bhūmayaḥ caitra abhāva sambandhāḥ

analyzed: pariharati viruddha iti katham hi viruddha avyabhicāri tvam atas āha tadvat iti tadvat caitra vat deśa antaram iti atas rthāpattyā eva sarvatra abhāvaḥ

original: sarvavyāpinaḥ svāśrayavyāpinaś ca. pūrve gaganādayaḥ. uttare jātyādayaḥ. yad dhi sarvasaṃyogibhir anāgatair agataṃ sambadhyate,

original: pratihetuviruddhatvāt. yatra tu tulyabalam ubhayam ekatropanipatitaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: prati hetu viruddha tvāt yatra tu tulya balam ubhayam ekatra upanipatitam bhavati

original: tatrārthāntarakalpanayopapattir iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti. evaṃ tāvad abhāvapūrvikāyā
analyzed: tatra artha antara kalpanayā upapattiḥ iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti evam tāvat abhāva pūrvikāyā

original: arthāpatter anumānād bheda uktaḥ pratyakṣapūrvikāyā bhedam idānīṃ darśayituṃ tatpratijñāṃ
analyzed: arthāpatteḥ anumānāt bhedaḥ uktaḥ pratyakṣa pūrvikāyāḥ bhedam idānīm darśayitum tad pratijñām

original: tāvad āha -- yatra ceti. yatrāpi dāhādikāryadarśanād agnyādeḥ kāraṇasya śaktir astīti
analyzed: tāvat āha yatra ca iti yatra api dāha ādi kārya darśanāt agni ādeḥ kāraṇasya śaktiḥ asti iti

original: kalpyate tatrāpy arthāpattir eva prathamā. yadi tu paścādanumānaṃ bhavati bhavatu.
analyzed: kalpyate tatra api arthāpattiḥ eva prathamā yadi tu paścāt anumānam bhavati bhavatu

original: bhāṣyodāhṛtatvāc cābhāvapūrvikāyā eva prathamam anumānād bhedo varṇita iti // 46 -- 47 //
analyzed: bhāṣya udāhṛta tvāt ca abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ eva prathamam anumānāt bhedaḥ varṇitaḥ iti

original: atrānumānavādināṃ liṅgam upanyasyati -- kāryasyeti. evaṃ hi manyante -- dvividham
analyzed: atra anumāna vādinām liṅgam upanyasyati kāryasya iti evam hi manyante dvividham

original: anumānaṃ dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ ca. tatra tāvat dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ
analyzed: anumānam dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam ca tatra tāvat dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam

original: dhūmādināgnyanumānam,
analyzed: dhūma ādinā agni anumānam

original: adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgādibhya iva kriyādyanumānam. kāryaṃ hi kāraṇena
analyzed: adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam ca saṃyoga vibhāga ādibhyaḥ iva kriyā ādi anumānam kāryam hi kāraṇena

original: sāmānyato jñātasambandham iti tatas tatpratītir anumānam evedam iti. etad api dūṣayati
analyzed: sāmānyatas jñāta sambandham iti tatas tad pratītiḥ anumānam evā idam iti etat api dūṣayati

original: -- na sambandheti. yena hy ekadā bījād aṅkuro dṛṣṭaḥ so 'nyadā tathāvidhād eva punar
analyzed: na sambandha iti yena hi ekadā bījāt aṅkuraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ nyadā tathāvidhāt eva punar

original: anupalabhamānaḥ svabhāvānumānena janayitavyo 'nenāṅkura ity anumimāna evātrāśaṅkate
analyzed: anupalabhamānaḥ svabhāva anumānena janayitavyaḥ nena aṅkuraḥ iti anumimānaḥ eva atra āśaṅkate

original: katham aṅkuro na jāyata iti,
analyzed: katham aṅkuraḥ na jāyate iti

original: tataḥ kalpayati -- asti kaścid bījasamavāyī śaktibhedo yadvaśāt prāk kāryam āsīd
analyzed: tatas kalpayati asti kaścid bīja samavāyī śakti bhedaḥ yad vaśāt prāk kāryam āsīt

original: adya ca nāstīti. tac cedam anapekṣitasambandhasyaiva purātanedānīntanāṅkuradarśanādarśanavicārād
analyzed: adya ca nā asti iti tat ca idam an apekṣita sambandhasya eva purātana idānīntana aṅkura darśana adarśana vicārāt

original: eva jñānaṃ jāyamānaṃ katham anumānam iti. api ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnam eva sarvam
analyzed: eva jñānam jāyamānam katham anumānam iti api ca sambandha grahaṇa adhīnam eva sarvam

original: anumānaṃ na tadagṛhītayos sambandhinos sambhavati. na ceha tayor atīndriyā śaktiḥ{3,
analyzed: anumānam na tat agṛhītayoḥ sambandhinoḥ sambhavati na ca iha tayoḥ atīndriyā

original: 177}pramāṇāntareṇa śakyate 'nubhavitum,
analyzed: śakyate nubhavitum

original: ata eva ca na tadvato 'pi grahaṇaṃ sambhavati,
analyzed: atas eva ca na grahaṇam sambhavati

original: ataḥ katham agṛhītasambandhāt kāryāc chaktitadvatos siddhir iti. tad etad āha -- dṛṣṭveti. nanv avagataṃ tāvat kāryasāmānyaṃ kāraṇasāmānyena  #
analyzed: atas katham agṛhīta sambandhāt kāryāt śakti tadvatoḥ siddhiḥ iti tat etat āha dṛṣṭvā iti nanu avagatam tāvat kārya sāmānyam kāraṇa sāmānyena

original: vyāptam iti,
analyzed: vyāptam iti

original: atas tad anumāsyate. satyam,
analyzed: atas tat anumāsyate satyam

original: kin tu śaktikalpanayā vinā kāraṇākhyaiva na nivartate. aṅkuro hi bījabhāvabhāvī vyabhicaritabhāvāntaraś
analyzed: kin tu śakti kalpanayā vinā kāraṇa ākhyā eva na nivartate aṅkuraḥ hi bīja bhāva bhāvī vyabhicarita bhāva antaraḥ

original: ca bījakāraṇaka ity avagataḥ saty api tu bīje 'jāyamānas tad api vyabhicaratīti kāraṇāvagatir evāvasīdati,
analyzed: ca bīja kāraṇakaḥ iti avagataḥ sati api tu bīje jāyamānaḥ tat api vyabhicarati iti kāraṇa avagatiḥ eva avasīdati

original: tāṃ śaktikalpanayottabhnāti. kḷptāyāṃ ca śaktau kāraṇasambandhinyām arthāpattyā yadi
analyzed: tām śakti kalpanayā uttabhnāti kḷptāyām ca śaktau kāraṇa sambandhinyām arthāpattyā yadi

original: sambandho 'vagamyate tad astu siddhāntavacchaktisiddhāv arthāpattiḥ pramāṇam iti.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ avagamyate tat astu siddhānta vat śakti siddhau arthāpattiḥ pramāṇam iti

original: anumānalakṣaṇād vinārthāpattir jāyamānā pramāṇāntaram ity upasaṃharati -- arthāpatter iti // 49 //
analyzed: anumāna lakṣaṇāt vinā arthāpattiḥ jāyamānā pramāṇa antaram iti upasaṃharati arthāpatteḥ iti

original: vṛttyantarodāhṛtam udāharaṇa dūṣayati -- anumānād iti. jayo hi parājayena viditavyāptir
analyzed: vṛtti antara udāhṛtam udāharaṇa dūṣayati anumānāt iti jayaḥ hi parājayena vidita vyāptiḥ

original: iti tam ekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayo 'vagamyate. parājayadarśanena
analyzed: iti tam ekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayaḥ vagamyate parājaya darśanena

original: pratipakṣasya jaya iti. nedam arthāpattāv udāhāryam iti // 50 //
analyzed: pratipakṣasya jayaḥ iti na idam arthāpattau udāhāryam iti

original: śrutārthāpattir abhidhāsyata ity uktam,
analyzed: śrutā arthāpattiḥ abhidhāsyate iti uktam

original: tām idānīm udāharati -- pīna iti // 51 //
analyzed: tām idānīm udāharati pīnaḥ iti

original: asyāś ca viṣayaṃ pratyasti vivādaḥ. tam ekanirdhāraṇārtham upanyasyati -- tām artheti kalpayantyantena. sarve cāgamābahirbhūtām ātiṣṭhanta  #
analyzed: asyāḥ ca viṣayam prati asti vivādaḥ tam eka nirdhāraṇa artham upanyasyati tām arthā iti kalpayanti antena sarve ca āgama abahirbhūtām ātiṣṭhanta

original: ity āha -- āgamāc ceti //52 //
analyzed: iti āha āgamāt ca iti

original: {3,178} āgamābhedābhyupagame 'bhiprāyam āha -- prāyaśa iti. phalāpūrvavidhyantādisiddhau bhūyānasyā vede upayogaḥ,
analyzed: āgama abheda abhyupagame bhiprāyam āha prāyaśas iti phala apūrva vidhi anta ādi siddhau bhūyān asyāḥ vede upayogaḥ

original: sarvo 'nāgamatve 'vaidikaḥ syād iti // 53 //
analyzed: sarvaḥ na āgama tve vaidikaḥ syāt iti

original: āgamikatve py avāntaravipratipattim upanyasyati -- vacanasyeti [// 54 //]
analyzed: āgamika tve pi avāntara vipratipattim upanyasyati vacanasya iti

original: atra niṣkarṣaṃ darśayati -- na tāvad iti. kāraṇam āha -- na hīti. vākyaṃ tāvad avācakam,
analyzed: atra niṣkarṣam darśayati na tāvat iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti vākyam tāvat avācakam

original: prāg evānekeṣām arthānām iti // 55 //
analyzed: prāk eva anekeṣām arthānām iti

original: yady avācakaṃ kathaṃ vākyād arthapratītir ata āha -- padārtheti. etac ca tadbhūtādhikaraṇe
analyzed: yadi avācakam katham vākyāt artha pratītiḥ atas āha padārtha iti etat ca tad bhūta adhikaraṇe

original: vakṣyata iti. nanu rātryādivākyārtho yadi divāvākyenānabhihitaḥ padārthānvayarūpeṇaiva
analyzed: vakṣyate iti nanu rātri ādi vākya arthaḥ yadi divā vākyena anabhihitaḥ padārtha anvaya rūpeṇa eva

original: svārthavad gamayiṣyate. ata āha -- na rātryādīti. na hi divāvākye rātryādipadārthās santi,
analyzed: svārtha vat gamayiṣyate atas āha na rātri ādi iti na hi divā vākye rātri ādi padārthāḥ santi

original: kutas tatra teṣām anvaya iti // 56 //
analyzed: kutas tatra teṣām anvayaḥ iti

original: nanu divādipadārthānvayād eva rātryādivākyārthaḥ pratyeṣyate,
analyzed: nanu divā ādi padārtha anvayāt eva rātri ādi vākya arthaḥ pratyeṣyate

original: ata āha -- na divādīti // 57 //
analyzed: atas āha na divā ādi iti

original: {3,179} na hy anekārthateti yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti -- anyārtheti. ato vākyāntarasyaivāyam artho na divāvākyasyety āha -- tasmād iti // 58 //
analyzed: na hi aneka arthatā iti yat uktam tat vivṛṇoti anya artha iti atas vākya antarasya eva ayam arthaḥ na divāvākyasya iti āha tasmāt iti  /

original: evaṃ tāvan na mūlāgamasyāyam arthaḥ,
analyzed: evam tāvat na mūla āgamasya ayam arthaḥ

original: yena tu vākyāntareṇa buddhisthenāyam artho 'vagamyate,
analyzed: yena tu vākya antareṇa buddhi sthena ayam arthaḥ vagamyate

original: tasyaiva pratyakṣādiṣu madhye pramāṇaṃ nirdhāraṇīyam ity āha -- tasyeti // 59 //
analyzed: tasya eva pratyakṣa ādiṣu madhye pramāṇam nirdhāraṇīyam iti āha tasya iti

original: tatra pratyakṣaṃ tāvan na tatsiddhau pramāṇam ity āha -- na hīti. anumānam api tena sambaddhasya divāvākyasyādarśanān na sambhavatīty āha --  #
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣam tāvat na tad siddhau pramāṇam iti āha na hi iti anumānam api tena sambaddhasya divāvākyasya adarśanāt na sambhavati iti āha  /

original: nānumānam iti // 60 //
analyzed: na anumānam iti

original: aviditasambandhe tu divāvākye liṅga iṣyamāṇe 'vyavasthety āha -- yadi tv iti // 61 //
analyzed: a vidita sambandhe tu divāvākye liṅge iṣyamāṇe vyavasthā iti āha yadi tu iti

original: yadi tūcyate sambandham eva divāvākyasya rātrivākyena gṛhītvā tatas tadanumāsyata iti,
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate sambandham eva divāvākyasya rātrivākyena gṛhītvā tatas tat anumāsyate iti

original: sidhyaty evam,
analyzed: sidhyati evam

original: na tu śrutārthāpattivedyāni sarvāṇi lokavedavākyāni sarvaiḥ pratipādakavākyais sambaddhāny avagatāni. ataḥ kathaṃ tebhyas tāny anumīyanta ity  #
analyzed: na tu śruta arthāpatti vedyāni sarvāṇi loka veda vākyāni sarvaiḥ pratipādaka vākyaiḥ sambaddhāni avagatāni atas katham tebhyaḥ tāni anumīyante iti

original: āha -- na ceti // 62 //
analyzed: āha na ca iti

original: {3,180} itaś ca nānumānam ity āha -- na ceti. kenacid dhi sāmānyātmanā jñātasambandhena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcid anumīyate na vastusattāmātram. na ca
analyzed: itas ca na anumānam iti āha na ca iti kenacid hi sāmānya ātmanā jñāta sambandhena viśiṣṭam kiñcid anumīyate na vastu sattā mātram na ca

original: ajñātasambandhatvāt iha tu tadubhayaṃ viparītam iti // 63 //
analyzed: ajñāta sambandha tvāt iha tu tat ubhayam viparītam iti

original: yataś cātra vākyasvarūpam eva prameyam ataḥ parvatādir iva pūrvasiddhaḥ svatantro
analyzed: yatas ca atra vākya svarūpam eva prameyam atas parvata ādiḥ iva pūrva siddhaḥ svatantraḥ

original: 'sambaddhaḥ kenacid agnyādineva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣito dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo
analyzed: sambaddhaḥ kenacid agni ādinā iva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣitaḥ dharmī dharma viśiṣṭaḥ

original: nāstīty āha -- pūrvasiddha iti // 64 //
analyzed: na asti iti āha pūrva siddhaḥ iti

original: atha śrutam eva vākyaṃ dharmitayopādāyāśrutavākyaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tatas tadaprasiddher aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa ity āha -- atheti // 65
analyzed: atha śrutam eva vākyam dharmi tayā upādāya aśruta vākya viśiṣṭa tā sādhyate tatas tad aprasiddheḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ iti āha atha iti

original: api ca śrute vākye 'śrutavākyaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcil liṅgam upalabhyate,
analyzed: api ca śrute vākye śruta vākya viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcid liṅgam upalabhyate

original: na cāliṅgakam anumānaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: na ca aliṅgakam anumānam bhavati

original: tad yadi tad eva punarliṅgam iṣyate tataḥ pratijñārthaikadeśitvam,
analyzed: tat yadi tat eva punar liṅgam iṣyate tatas pratijñā artha eka deśi tvam

original: yathā pade pakṣīkṛte rthaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne 'bhihitam ity āha -- kiñ ceti // 66 //
analyzed: yathā pade pakṣīkṛte rtha viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne bhihitam iti āha kim ca iti

original: dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi divāvākyarātrivākyayoś śabdārthayor iva nirākārya ity āha -- tadvad eveti. yathā tatrārthe dharmiṇy apratipanne na padaṃ  #
analyzed: dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ pi divāvākya rātrivākyayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ iva nirākāryaḥ iti āha tadvat eva iti yathā tatra arthe dharmiṇi apratipanne na padam

original: taddharma ity uktam,
analyzed: tad dharmaḥ iti uktam

original: evam ihāpi nāpratipanne rātrivākye taddharmatayā{3,
analyzed: evam iha api na a pratipanne rātri vākye

original: 181}divāvākyaṃ pratīyate. atha tu pakṣadharmatāpratipattyarthaṃ tat prathamam avagatam ity ucyate tato 'numeyābhāva ity abhiprāyaḥ. abhiprāyaṃ  #
analyzed: pratīyate atha tu pakṣa dharmatā pratipatti artham tat prathamam avagatam iti ucyate tatas numeya abhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ abhiprāyam

original: vivṛṇoti -- nāgṛhīta iti // 67 //
analyzed: vivṛṇoti na a gṛhītaḥ iti

original: api ca tatraiva pade varṇitam -- na kriyākārakasambandhādṛte sambandho bhavatīti. ato yathā padasya na kaścit kriyānibandhano 'rthasambandho  #
analyzed: api ca tatra eva pade varṇitam na kriyā kāraka sambandhāt ṛte sambandhaḥ bhavati iti atas yathā padasya na kaścid kriyā nibandhanaḥ rtha sambandhaḥ

original: 'stīti na taddharma ity uktam,
analyzed: sti iti na tad dharmaḥ iti uktam

original: evaṃ divāvākyasyāpi rātrivākyadharmatā nirākāryety āha -- kriyeti. na cātra viṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpo 'pi dvayor vākyayoś śabdārthayor iva sambandho
analyzed: evam divā vākyasya api rātri vākya dharma tā nirākāryā iti āha kriyā iti na ca atra dvayoḥ vākyayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ iva sambandhaḥ

original: ucyate hi śabdenārthaḥ,
analyzed: ucyate hi śabdena arthaḥ

original: na tu vākyaṃ vākyāntarasya vācakam ity āha -- avācaketi. pade tv arthapratītijanakatvena
analyzed: na tu vākyam vākya antarasya vācakam iti āha avācaka iti pade tu artha pratīti janaka tvena

original: tadviṣayatām aṅgīkṛtyānumeyābhāvo darśitaḥ. iha tu vākyasyāvācakatvāt tadviṣayatvam
analyzed: tad viṣaya tām aṅgīkṛtya anumeya abhāvaḥ darśitaḥ iha tu vākyasya avācaka tvāt tad viṣaya tvam

original: eva pratyetuṃ na śakyate iti viśeṣaḥ // 68 //
analyzed: eva pratyetum na śakyate iti viśeṣaḥ

original: yadi tūcyate pratīyate tāvad divāvākyād rātrivākyam,
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate pratīyate tāvat divāvākyāt rātrivākyam

original: atas tasyāpi tadvācakatvam ity asti viṣayaviṣayilakṣaṇas sambandha iti,
analyzed: atas tasya api tad vācaka tvam iti asti viṣaya viṣayi lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ iti

original: tatraikaṃ vākyam anekārtham abhyupagataṃ bhavet,
analyzed: tatra ekam vākyam aneka artham abhyupagatam bhavet

original: svārthaṃ hi tatpratipādayati rātrivākyam api,
analyzed: sva artham hi tat pratipādayati rātri vākyam api

original: na caivaṃ nyāyyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pratīter iti. athocyeta -- mābhūd vācakatayā tadviṣayatvam,
analyzed: na ca evam nyāyyam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha pratīteḥ iti atha ucyeta mā abhūt vācaka tayā tad viṣaya tvam

original: tena tu tadvākyam anumīyate,
analyzed: tena tu tat vākyam anumīyate

original: atas talliṅgam anumānaviṣayatayā liṅgam eva divāvākyaṃ taddharmatayābhidhīyata iti.
analyzed: atas tat liṅgam anumāna viṣaya tayā liṅgam eva divāvākyam tad dharma tayā abhidhīyate iti

original: yat tāvadanumānaviṣayabhāvād utthitaṃ taddharmatvaṃ tadanumānasya pūrvasiddhatvān
analyzed: yat tāvat anumāna viṣaya bhāvāt utthitam tad dharma tvam tad anumānasya pūrva siddha tvān

original: niṣphalam ity āha -- anumeti // 69 //
analyzed: niṣphalam iti āha

original: evaṃ tāvad divāvākyam aliṅgam ity uktaṃ,
analyzed: evam tāvat divāvākyam aliṅgam iti uktam

original: tadgatapadārthānām apy evam eva liṅgatā nirākāryety āha -- padārthair iti. nanv agṛhītasambandhā eva padārthā{3,
analyzed: tad gata padārthānām api evam eva liṅga tā nirākāryā iti āha padārthaiḥ iti nanu agṛhīta sambandhāḥ eva

original: 182}yathā vākyārthaṃ gamayanti,
analyzed: vākya artham gamayanti

original: evaṃ rātrivākyam api kiṃ na gamayanti,
analyzed: evam rātri vākyam api kim na gamayanti

original: ata āha -- sāmānyeti. kriyāsāmānyaṃ kārakasāmānyaṃ vā pratipannam alabdhetaretaravyatiṣaṅgam anyathā na sidhyatīti taṃ viśeṣaṃ gamayati,
analyzed: atas āha sāmānya iti kriyā sāmānyam kāraka sāmānyam vā pratipannam alabdha itaretara vyatiṣaṅgam anyathā na sidhyati iti tam viśeṣam gamayati

original: yaś cāsau viśeṣaḥ sa eva tu vākyārtha ity ucyate iti // 70 //

original: na caiṣa prakāro rātrivākyapratipādane sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. anyo 'pi taddeśakālādisambandho na rātrivākyena divāvākyasya tatpadārthānāṃ  #
analyzed: na ca eṣa prakāraḥ rātri vākya pratipādane sambhavati iti āha na tu iti tad deśa kāla ādi sambandhaḥ na rātri vākyena divā vākyasya tad padārthānām

original: vāstīty āha -- na cāpīti // 71 //

original: syād etat, yady api divāvākyaṃ na rātrivākyasya vācakam,

original: tathāpi kalpayiṣyāmaḥ,
analyzed: tathā api kalpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tataś ca tatpratyeṣyata iti. tad idam āśaṅkate tāvat -- athaitadvācīty anyadantena.
analyzed: tatas ca tat pratyeṣyate iti tat idam āśaṅkate tāvat atha etat vāci iti anya antena

original: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- tathaiveti. atra tāvad evaṃ vākyāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇam eva

original: yad api kalpitaṃ vākyaṃ tad api na rātrivākyam avagamayituṃ śaktam. na ca tadasambaddham

analyzed: eva tasya gamakam iti yuktam punar api vākya antara kalpanāyām saḥ eva doṣaḥ evam yat

analyzed: atha tu antimam asambaddham eva gamakam iti kalpyate

original: tad varaṃ prathamasyaiva tathāvidhasya gamakatvaṃ kalpitum,
analyzed: tat varam prathamasya eva tathāvidhasya gamaka tvam kalpitum

original: kiṃ vākyāntarakalpanayā. na ca tad yuktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tataś ceti. evaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmatvādyasambhavena rātrivākyasyānumeyatvaṃ nirastam,
analyzed: kim vākya antara kalpanayā na ca tat yuktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tatas ca iti evam tāvat pakṣa dharma tva ādi asambhavena rātri vākyasya anumeya tvam nirastam

original: anvayavyatirekayor api padavat pratiṣedho darśayitavya ity āha -- anvayeti. na hi saty eva rātrivākye divāvākyaṃ{3,

original: 183}nāsatīty anvayavyatirekau staḥ,

analyzed: vijñāna uttara kāla bhāvinoḥ ca anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tad anupayogāt ityādi pada vat darśayitavyam iti abhiprāyaḥ  /

original: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamair na rātrivākyaṃ pratīyata ity uktam,

original: upamānam api tatra na pramāṇam iti darśayati -- śrutavākyeti tvamantena. divāvākyavac ca tadarthenāpi na rātrivākyam upamīyata ity āha -- arthasyeti
analyzed: upamānam api tatra na pramāṇam iti darśayati śruta vākya iti tvam antena divā vākya vat ca tad arthena api na rātri vākyam upamīyate iti āha arthasya iti

original: yathā ca rātrivākyasya divāvākyatadarthābhyām upamānaṃ nirastam evaṃ rātrivākyārthasyāpi tābhyāṃ nirasanīyam ity āha -- upamānatveti syādantena.  #

original: upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 75 //

original: pīnatvena divābhojanam,
analyzed: pīna tvena divā abhojanam

original: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- pīnatvaṃ hi bhojanapratiṣedho vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoś
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ pīna tvam hi bhojana pratiṣedhaḥ vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoḥ

analyzed: codayati asti iti ced antena pariharati na anapekṣaṇāt iti anapekṣa tvam eva darśayati

original: -- na hīti. nirūpito hi sambandhaḥ pramāṇotpattau kāraṇam anumāne,

original: na ceha tatheti // 81 //

original: pratyakṣottarakālaṃ tu nirūpaṇaṃ na pramāṇāṅgam ity āha -- yenāpīti // 82 //

original: api cāprāpyakārīndriyavādipakṣe svarūpasattvam api sambandhasya nāsty eva,
analyzed: api ca aprāpyakāri indriya vādi pakṣe svarūpa sattvam api sambandhasya na asti eva

original: ato yathā te pratyakṣajñānasya pramāṇatām icchanti,
analyzed: atas yathā te pratyakṣa jñānasya pramāṇa tām icchanti

original: evam ihāpi bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- aprāpyeti // 83 //
analyzed: evam iha api bhaviṣyati iti atas āha a prāpya iti

original: pramāṇam ity āśrayaṇīyam ity āha -- tasmād iti. jāyata ittyanutpattilakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyaṃ nirasyati,

analyzed: abhaṅguram iti saṃśaya viparyayau iti

original: {3,187} api cārthāpattir apramāṇam ity alaukiko vivāda iti. na hi tayā pravartamānānāṃ pravṛttiḥ pratihanyate. pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ ca prāmāṇyam.  #
analyzed: api ca arthāpattiḥ apramāṇam iti alaukikaḥ vivādaḥ iti na hi tayā pravartamānānām pravṛttiḥ pratihanyate pravṛtti sāmarthyam ca prāmāṇyam

analyzed: anumānāt bheda abhedayoḥ asti vivādaḥ

original: yady evam anumāne 'pi sambandho nāṅgam evāpadyetāta āha -- ṛta iti. tatra hi buddhir
analyzed: yadi evam anumāne sambandhaḥ na aṅgam eva āpadyeta atas āha ṛte iti tatra hi buddhiḥ

original: vedopayogam arthāpatter darśayati -- smṛtyeti. bhūyān khalu vedabhāgaḥ śrutārthāpattipramāṇakaḥ sa tām antareṇa na sidhyet,
analyzed: veda upayogam arthāpatteḥ darśayati smṛtyā iti bhūyān khalu veda bhāgaḥ śruta arthāpatti pramāṇakaḥ sa tām antareṇa na sidhyet

analyzed: yathā eva pāṭhaḥ pratipratti upāyaḥ tathā eva sāmarthyam api śrutīnām

analyzed: eva mūla tayā kalpyate tathā liṅga ādibhiḥ sva viniyojikā śrutiḥ upakalpyate yathā

analyzed: yat śaknuyāt iti upabandhena

original: lavane śaktam iti tad eva liṅge viniyujyate,
analyzed: lavane śaktam iti tat eva liṅge viniyujyate

original: padāntarāṇi tu tatsamabhivyāhārātmanā vākyenaiva. prakaraṇaviniyogas tu darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ samidādīnām,

original: te hi prayojanākāṅkṣāḥ,

analyzed: ādhvarya samākhyāteṣu padārtheṣu guṇa bhūtam kartāram apekṣamāṇeṣu samākhyayā kartṛ niyamaḥ

original: kriyate. bhavati cātra śrutiḥ,
analyzed: kriyate bhavati ca atra śrutiḥ

analyzed: adhvaryuḥ etān kuryāt iti a śruta phala itikartavya tākeṣu ca karmasu viśvajit saurya ādiṣu pūraṇa samarthā śrutiḥ kalpyate viśvajitā yajeta svarga kāma

analyzed: anumānāt eva sidhyati na hi atra anupapadyamānasya kalpanīyena sambandhaḥ kenacid

original: ato 'rthāpattir evātra śaraṇam. sambandhadṛg iti. buddhāv aupacāriko dṛgbhāva iti.

analyzed: arthāpatti paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ

analyzed: sarvāṇi api hi pramāṇāni itaretarābhāva rūpāṇi śakyante pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti vaditum na ca sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇam kiñcid ekam lakṣaṇam asti

original: bhavati. tad anena kiṃ vyavasthāpyata iti na vidmaḥ. nanūktaṃ nāstīty asyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasyeti.

original: śakyate 'vagantum. kasya ca pramāṇasya prameyam idam,
analyzed: śakyate vagantum kasya ca pramāṇasya prameyam idam

original: yaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāva ity ucyata iti. api ca -- iha ghaṭo nāstīti dhiyaḥ kim ālambanam iti vaktavyam. yadi bhūtalam eva,

original: tan na. ghaṭavaty api prasaṅgāt. kevalam eva bhūtalam ālambanam iti cet. kaḥ kevalārthaḥ. yadi bhūtalam eva,

original: 190}pratyanuyuktena tadaiva
analyzed: tadā eva

original: naindriyakam. na cāsya kiñcil liṅgaṃ janakam asti. anupalabdhir liṅgam iti cet. na.

analyzed: na ca tathā anupalabdhiḥ jñātā satya bhāvam prakāśayati tasyāḥ api abhāva rūpa tvena apara sajātīya apekṣāyām

analyzed: asti ca mīmāṃsakānām prasiddhiḥ ṣaṣṭham kila idam pramāṇam iti atas

analyzed: yam granthe iti tat ayuktam na hi anena pramāṇam

original: na ca yuktyā saṅgacchate,
analyzed: na ca yuktyā saṅgacchate

original: siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ veti vicāraṇā yuktā. na ca bhūtalopalambhād
analyzed: siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇam apramāṇam vā iti vicāraṇā yuktā na ca bhū tala upalambhāt

analyzed: anyat na asti iti vijñānam asti tat eva hi dvedhā prakāśate anya sahitam a sahitam ca

original: tanmātrabodhe tu nāstīti. na ca vācyaṃ satsv api sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātrabodho dṛṣṭaḥ.
analyzed: tanmātra bodhe tu nā asti iti na ca vācyam satsu api sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātra bodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: atas tatrāpi nāstīti prakāśata iti. tad eva hi dvedhā prakāśate. dvedhā hi tanmātrabodhaḥ,
analyzed: atas tatra api na asti iti prakāśate iti tat eva hi dvedhā prakāśate dvedhā hi tanmātra bodhaḥ

original: dṛśyate pratiyoginy adṛśye vā. tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabuddhiḥ saiva ghaṭāder
analyzed: dṛśyate pratiyogini adṛśye vā tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātra buddhiḥ sā eva ghaṭa ādeḥ

original: nāstitvam. yeṣām apy abhāvaḥ prameyas teṣām api dṛśyādarśanād eva nāstīty abhāvo
analyzed: nāstitvam yeṣām api abhāvaḥ prameyaḥ teṣām api dṛśya adarśanāt eva na asti iti abhāvaḥ

original: niścīyate. ato yeyaṃ sarvavādisiddhā tanmātrabuddhiḥ saiva nāstīti vyapadiśyate.
analyzed: niścīyate atas yā iyam sarva vādi siddhā tanmātra buddhiḥ sā eva na asti iti vyapadiśyate

original: yac cābhāvasya kāraṇam iṣyate tattanmātrabuddher evobhayavādisiddhāyāḥ kāraṇam āśrīyatām.
analyzed: yat ca abhāvasya kāraṇam iṣyate tad tanmātra buddheḥ evā ubhaya vādi siddhāyāḥ kāraṇam āśrīyatām

original: ato yatraiva prāk saṃsṛṣṭabuddhir āsīt tatraiva vilakṣaṇakāraṇopanipāte tanmātrabuddhir
analyzed: atas yatra eva prāk saṃsṛṣṭa buddhiḥ āsīt tatra eva vilakṣaṇa kāraṇa upanipāte tanmātra buddhiḥ

original: eva jāyate na punarghaṭādyabhāvaḥ. (avaśyaṃ)
analyzed: eva jāyate na punar ghaṭa ādi abhāvaḥ avaśyam

original: caitad evābhyupagantavyam. anyathā hi nābhāvo gṛhītuṃ śakyate,
analyzed: ca etat eva abhyupagantavyam anyathā hi nā abhāvaḥ gṛhītum śakyate

original: pramāṇābhāvo hi tatra pramāṇam,
analyzed: pramāṇa abhāvaḥ hi tatra pramāṇam

original: na cāgṛhītena sa pratipādayituṃ śakyate. asti hi suṣuptasyāpi pramāṇā ... (?taḥ/
analyzed: na ca agṛhītena sa pratipādayitum śakyate asti hi suṣuptasya api

original: bhāvaḥ). na ca nāstīti niścayaḥ. ato nāgṛhītam adarśanam abhāvaṃ niścāyayati,
analyzed: bhāvaḥ na ca na asti iti niścayaḥ atas na agṛhītam adarśanam abhāvam niścāyayati

original: tadgrahītir api cābhāvarūpatvād apareṇādarśanenety evam anavasthāpātaḥ. yadi ca sanmātram evādarśanaṃ niścāyayati,
analyzed: tad grahītiḥ api ca abhāva rūpa tvāt apareṇa adarśanena iti evam anavasthā pātaḥ yadi ca sat mātram eva adarśanam niścāyayati

original: tato nivṛtte 'py adarśane
analyzed: tatas nivṛtte pi adarśane

original: prāk devadatto{3,
analyzed: prāk

original: 191}nāsīd iti pratipattir na syāt. bhavati hi kadācid etat. yo yatra na dṛṣṭas tasmin
analyzed: iti pratipattiḥ na syāt bhavati hi kadācid etat yaḥ yatra na dṛṣṭaḥ tasmin

original: punardṛśyamāna evāsaty apy adarśane pracīnābhāvajñānaṃ tad asaty adarśane na syāt.

original: ataḥ pracīnādarśanavimarśajam eva tajjñānam iti vācyam. evaṃ ca gṛhyamāṇam eva tadabhāvaṃ

original: prakāśayati. grahaṇe cānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ. tanmātrasaṃvid eva tv adarśanam ity āśrīyamāṇe

original: ato na prameyāntaram abhāvaḥ. na ca nāstīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam,
analyzed: atas na prameya āntaram abhāvaḥ na ca na asti iti jñānam pramāṇam

original: ubhayor abhāvāt. jñānābhāva evāyaṃ jñānabhramaḥ,

original: kecit kilābhāvaṃ nāma pramāṇam ātiṣṭhante,
analyzed: kecid kila abhāvam nāma pramāṇam ātiṣṭhante

original: tannirākaraṇārtha evāyaṃ bhāṣyakārasya prayatnaḥ. katham anena nirākriyate. śrūyatām. yad eke vadanti -- nāstīty asyārthasya asannikṛṣṭasyeti,
analyzed: tad nirākaraṇa arthaḥ eva ayam bhāṣyakārasya prayatnaḥ katham anena nirākriyate śrūyatām yat eke vadanti na asti iti asya arthasya asannikṛṣṭasya iti

original: pratyakṣādyaviṣayasyābhāvaḥ pramāṇam iti,
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi aviṣayasya abhāvaḥ pramāṇam iti

original: tan na,

original: na ca tadvyavahārābhiprāyam,
analyzed: na ca tad vyavahāra abhiprāyam

analyzed: dvedhā vyākariṣyate

analyzed: nānā śabda vācyam ca viśeṣa rūpam śāvaleya ādi atas tra api aupacārikaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ

original: vivekajñasya. asati tu viveke ekaśabdanibandhanabhrama evāyam -- abhāvas sāmānyaviśeṣātmeti.
analyzed: viveka jñasya asati tu viveke eka śabda nibandhana bhramaḥ eva ayam abhāvaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa ātmā iti

original: ata āha -- na ceti. sati hi bādhake bhrāntir upacāro vā kalpyate,
analyzed: atas āha na ca iti sati hi bādhake bhrāntiḥ upacāraḥ vā kalpyate

original: na ceha tatheti bhāva iti // 10 //
analyzed: na ca iha tathā iti bhāvaḥ iti

original: {3,198} evaṃ tāvat nāstīty asyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya iti yad uktaṃ bhāṣye tad vivṛtam.
analyzed: evam tāvat na asti iti asya arthasya asat nikṛṣṭasya iti yat uktam bhāṣye tat vivṛtam

original: idānīṃ pramāṇābhāvaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe -- pratyakṣāder anutpattir iti. anutpattir eva
analyzed: idānīm pramāṇa abhāva śabdam vyācaṣṭe pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ iti anutpattiḥ eva

original: keti ced ata āha -- sātmana iti. ātmano hi jñānātmakaḥ pariṇāmaḥ. tad yadā ātmā bhūtalādau
analyzed: kā iti ced atas āha sa ātmanaḥ iti ātmanaḥ hi jñāna ātmakaḥ pariṇāmaḥ tat yadā ātmā bhū tala ādau

original: na ghaṭādijñānātmanā pariṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣādyanutpattiḥ svarūpāvasthānaṃ pramāṇābhāva ity ākhyāyate,
analyzed: na ghaṭa ādi jñāna ātmanā pariṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ sva rūpa avasthānam pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: tatprāmāṇye ca nāstīti jñānaṃ phalam. nāstīty eva vā bhāvajñānaṃ pratyakṣādyanutpattir ity ucyate,
analyzed: tad prāmāṇye ca na asti iti jñānam phalam na asti iti eva vā bhāva jñānam pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ iti ucyate

original: atas tad eva pramāṇam, (?nā/
analyzed: atas tat eva pramāṇam nā

original: hā)nādibuddhiḥ phalam iti vivekaḥ // 11 //
analyzed: hāna ādi buddhiḥ phalam iti vivekaḥ

original: nanu yadi dvyātmakaṃ vastu,
analyzed: nanu yadi dvi ātmakam vastu

original: tarhi sakṛd eva tathā pratibhātam iti kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇāta āha -- svarūpeti. svarūpeṇa
analyzed: tarhi sakṛt eva tathā pratibhātam iti kim pramāṇa antareṇa atas āha sva rūpa iti sva rūpeṇa

original: tadvastu gavādi sadrūpam aśvādirūpeṇa cāsadrūpam. tad asminn eva dvirūpe kiñcid eva
analyzed: tat vastu gavādi sat rūpam aśva ādi rūpeṇa ca asat rūpam tat asmin eva dvirūpe kiñcid eva

original: kadācit pratīyate na tu sarvātmakam eva gṛhītavyam iti niyama iti // 12 //
analyzed: kadācid pratīyate na tu sarva ātmakam eva gṛhītavyam iti niyamaḥ iti

original: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dvyātmakasyaikam eva rūpaṃ gṛhyate nāparaṃ kiñcid ata āha -- yasya yatreti. udbhūtaṃ hi gṛhyate nānudbhūtam,
analyzed: kim punar kāraṇam dvi ātmakasya ekam eva rūpam gṛhyate na aparam kiñcid atas āha yasya yatra iti udbhūtam hi gṛhyate na anudbhūtam

original: agner iva rātrau rūpaṃ na sparśaḥ,
analyzed: agneḥ iva rātrau rūpam na sparśaḥ

original: jighṛkṣitaṃ vā prāyeṇa. ato yad eva sadasator udbhūtaṃ bhavati tenaiva buddhivyapadeśau bhavataḥ. cetyate 'nubhava iti kim idam,
analyzed: jighṛkṣitam vā prāyeṇa atas yat eva sat asatoḥ udbhūtam bhavati tena eva buddhi vyapadeśau bhavataḥ cetyate nubhavaḥ iti kim idam

original: na hy anubhavaś cetyate,
analyzed: na hi anubhavaḥ cetyate

original: sa eva cetanā,
analyzed: saḥ eva cetanā

original: viṣayas tu cetyate. satyam. viṣayaprāptyanyathānupapattyānubhavo 'pi cety ata eva. tad anena prakāreṇa viṣayaprakāśam eva darśayatīty adoṣa  #
analyzed: viṣayaḥ tu cetyate satyam ca iti atas eva tat anena prakāreṇa viṣaya prakāśam eva darśayati iti adoṣa
iti

original: {3,199} udbhūtajighṛkṣitaikagrahaṇe cetaras tadanuguṇatayaiva līno bhūtvāvatiṣṭhate.
analyzed: udbhūta jighṛkṣita eka grahaṇe ca itaraḥ tad anuguṇa tayā eva līnaḥ bhūtvā avatiṣṭhate

original: sāmānyaviśeṣayor ivaikagrahaṇe 'nyatara ity āha -- tasyeti. idaṃ cānvāruhyavacanenāsmābhir
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ iva eka grahaṇe nyataraḥ iti āha tasya iti idam ca anvāruhya vacanena asmābhiḥ

original: uktam. asty eva tu bhāvābhāvapratītāv anyatarānugama ity āha -- ubhayor iti // 14 //
ubhayānugamam eva darśayati -- ayam eveti dvayena. ayam eveti. bhāvāntareṇāsaṅkīrṇa
analyzed: ubhaya anugamam eva darśayati ayam eva iti dvayena ayam eva iti bhāva antareṇa asaṅkīrṇa

analyzed: iti arthaḥ na hi apratisaṃhite bhāva antara abhāve saṅkīrṇa svabhāvaḥ na niścetum śakyate

original: nāstīty api pratiṣedhyapratiṣedhādhārabhāvopaṣṭhambhanavarjitaṃ na kiñcit jñānaṃ

original: jāyate. kiñcic chabdena bhāvasyābhāvānugamaśūnyam api jñānam asty eva,
analyzed: jāyate kiñcid śabdena bhāvasya abhāva anugama śūnyam api jñānam asti eva

original: na tv evam abhāvasyeti darśayati // 15 -- 16 //
analyzed: na tu evam abhāvasya iti darśayati  /

original: darśitaṃ tāvat sadasadātmakaṃ vastv iti. kadācit kiñcid anubhūyata iti ca. ubhayor aṃśayor idānīṃ pramāṇavibhāgaṃ darśayati -- pratyakṣādīti
analyzed: darśitam tāvat sat asat ātmakam vastu iti kadācid kiñcid anubhūyate iti ca ubhayoḥ aṃśayoḥ idānīm pramāṇa vibhāgam darśayati pratyakṣa ādi iti

original: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate,
analyzed: katham punar idam avagamyate

original: visphāritākṣasya hi sahasā neha ghaṭo 'sti,
analyzed: visphārita akṣasya hi sahasā na iha ghaṭaḥ sti

original: aghaṭaṃ vā bhūtalam ity abhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalajñānaṃ jāyamānam upalabhyate(?)
analyzed: aghaṭam vā bhū talam iti abhāva viśiṣṭam bhū tala jñānam jāyamānam upalabhyate

original: tadabhāvasyāpratyakṣatve nāvakalpate. na hy apratyakṣa eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣo bhavati,
analyzed: tad abhāvasya apratyakṣa tve na avakalpate na hi apratyakṣe eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavati

original: daṇḍa iva daṇḍī. na ca nāsty eva viśiṣṭā dhīr iti vaktavyam,
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ iva daṇḍī na ca nā asti eva viśiṣṭā dhīḥ iti vaktavyam

original: anāśrayābhāvasaṃvittyabhāvāt. api cātmā bhāvasyābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: anāśraya abhāva saṃvitti abhāvāt api ca ātmā bhāvasya abhāvaḥ

original: sa kathaṃ svatantro 'nubhūyate. na hi rūpādayo bhāvadharmāḥ svatantrā evāvasīyante. svatantrābhāvavādas tu svātantryam eva,
analyzed: sa katham svatantraḥ nubhūyate na hi rūpa ādayaḥ bhāva dharmāḥ svatantrāḥ eva avasīyante svatantra abhāva vādaḥ tu svātantryam eva

original: sadasadātmake vastunīti hi darśayati. bhāvāṃśo 'bhāvāṃśa iti ca vispaṣṭaṃ tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṇam ity āha. kiñcāsya svātantrye pramāṇam,
analyzed: sat asat ātmake vastuni iti hi darśayati bhāva aṃśaḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ iti ca vispaṣṭam tad abhāva viśiṣṭam grahaṇam iti āha kiñca asya svātantrye pramāṇam

original: na hy ayaṃ kadācid api tathāvasīyate. kim idānīm abhāvo nāvasīyata eva,
analyzed: na hi ayam kadācid api tathā avasīyate kim idānīm abhāvaḥ na avasīyate eva

original: svatantro vāvasīyate. na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ,
analyzed: svatantraḥ vā avasīyate na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ

original: tadavagame pramāṇāntarābhāvāt nityāsaṃvittiprasaṅgāt. na ca saṃyogapratiṣedhe svatantrābhāvāvasāyo 'sti,
analyzed: tad avagame pramāṇa antara abhāvāt nitya asaṃvitti prasaṅgāt na ca saṃyoga pratiṣedhe svatantra abhāva avasāyaḥ u sti

original: pratiyogisaṃyogapratiṣedhātmaiva hy abhāvaḥ,
analyzed: pratiyogi saṃyoga pratiṣedha ātmā eva hi abhāvaḥ

original: sa cādhāratantra eveti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā satīndriyasannikarṣe aindriyajñānagocara eva. ekaṃ kīdaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ jñānam.  #
analyzed: sa ca ādhāra tantraḥ eva iti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tva lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā sati indriya sannikarṣe aindriya jñāna gocaraḥ eva ekam kim idam viśiṣṭam jñānam

original: tadasyābhāvaḥ pramāṇam indriyaṃ vā,
analyzed: tat asya abhāvaḥ pramāṇam indriyam vā

original: yady abhāvaḥ sa tarhi bhāvam api gocarayet. na caitad iṣṭam. atas saty upalabhyamāne
analyzed: yadi abhāvaḥ sa tarhi bhāvam api gocarayet na ca etat iṣṭam atas sati upalabhyamāne

original: tadaiva yan nopalabhyate tan nāstīti sata eva prakāśakam asato 'pīti na pramāṇavibhāgaṃ
analyzed: tadā eva yat na upalabhyate tat na asti iti sataḥ eva prakāśakam asataḥ pi iti na pramāṇa vibhāgam

original: paśyāmaḥ. ata āha -- na tāvad iti. tāvacchabdo liṅgāpekṣayā. tac copariṣṭhān nirākariṣyata
analyzed: paśyāmaḥ atas āha na tāvat iti tāvat śabdaḥ liṅga apekṣayā tat ca upariṣṭhāt nirākariṣyata

original: iti. atra kāraṇam āha -- bhāvāṃśeti. yogyatā hi kāryadarśanasamadhigamyā,
analyzed: iti atra kāraṇam āha bhāva aṃśa iti yogyatā hi kārya darśana samadhigamyā

analyzed: sā ca indriyāṇām bhāva ātmaka grahaṇe eva upalabhyate na abhāve vinā api tu tena tad grahaṇāt

original: iti vakṣyāmaḥ. atra tu yogyatāsahitā prāptir indriyārthayos sambandha ity abhiprāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti vakṣyāmaḥ atra tu yogyatā sahitā prāptiḥ indriya arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: yat tv ekajñānasaṃsargiṇor ekapramāṇatvam iti. tan na. ekasyā api buddher nānākāraṇatvadarśanāt.
analyzed: yat tu eka jñāna saṃsargiṇoḥ eka pramāṇa tvam iti tat na ekasyāḥ api buddheḥ nānā kāraṇa tva darśanāt

original: ekaṃ hīdaṃ bhāvanendriyasabhāhārajaṃ pratyabhijñānam iti vakṣyāmaḥ. ekajñānapratibhāsinor
analyzed: ekam hi idam bhāvanā indriya sabhā āhāra jam pratyabhijñānam iti vakṣyāmaḥ eka jñāna pratibhāsinoḥ

analyzed: api ca gṛhyamāṇa smaryamāṇayoḥ vivekaḥ uktaḥ viviktāḥ eva te hi arthāḥ iti na hi smṛti upasthāpita nām

original: aviśiṣṭo ḍittho na pratyakṣo bhavati. nāma cāpratyakṣaṃ smaryamāṇatvāt,

original: tasyāgṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭo
analyzed: tasya a gṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ

original: nāvagamyate nāpratyakṣe. evam ihāpi pramāṇābhāvopanītābhāvaviśiṣṭe saty upalabhyamāne
analyzed: na avagamyate na apratyakṣe evam iha api pramāṇa abhāva upanīta abhāva viśiṣṭe sati upalabhyamāne

original: pratyayārtho na daṇḍo 'pi. pratyakṣaṃ tu yogyatayobhayatra pravartatāṃ nāma,
analyzed: pratyaya arthaḥ pratyakṣam tu yogyatayā ubhayatra pravartatām nāma

original: na caivam ubhayatrākṣāṇāṃ yogyatā. abhāvajñāne tadanapekṣāyā{3,
analyzed: na ca evam ubhayatra akṣāṇām yogyatā abhāva jñāne

original: 201} vakṣyamāṇatvāt. kim idānīm anumāne 'pi pratyakṣānumānasamāhārajo viśiṣṭabodhaḥ.
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa tvāt kim idānīm anumāne pratyakṣa anumāna samāhāra jaḥ viśiṣṭa bodhaḥ

original: na. anumānasyānvayādhīnajanmatvāt. viśiṣṭenaiva cānvayānugamāt. dhūmavān agnimān

original: yatpramāṇāntaraprāpitāśrayaṃ viśinaṣṭīti na kiñcid anupapannam. yac ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatayā indriyasannikarṣo 'bhāvasyety uktam,
analyzed: yat pramāṇa antara prāpita āśrayam viśinaṣṭi iti na kiñcid anupapannam yat ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tayā indriya sannikarṣaḥ bhāvasya iti uktam

original: tad ayuktam. asambaddhasya viśeṣaṇatvānupapatter atiprasakteḥ. itarathā viśeṣaṇārtham
analyzed: tat ayuktam asambaddhasya viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ atiprasakteḥ itarathā viśeṣaṇa artham

original: arthitenaiva sannikarṣopapattau vṛthaiva saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇārthatvāśrayaṇam ity alamaneneti // 18 //
analyzed: arthitena eva sannikarṣa upapattau vṛthā eva saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa artha tva āśrayaṇam iti alam anena iti

original: abhiprāyam ajānānaś codayati -- nanv iti. prāptimātraṃ hy arthendriyayos sannikarṣaḥ.
analyzed: abhiprāyam a jānānaḥ codayati nanu iti prāpti mātram hi artha indriyayoḥ sannikarṣaḥ

original: asti ca bhāvād abhinnasyābhāvasya bhāvavad evendriyaprāptir iti. atra ca yogyatāyā
analyzed: asti ca bhāvāt abhinnasya abhāvasya bhāva vat evā indriya prāptiḥ iti atra ca yogya tāyāḥ

original: uddhāṭanenaivottaraṃ deyam,
analyzed: uddhāṭanena eva uttaram deyam

original: tadupekṣyaiva tāvadatyantābhedam evāyam āha,
analyzed: tat upekṣya eva tāvat atyanta abhedam eva ayam āha

original: tad etam eva tāvannirākaro(?ṣī/
analyzed: tat etam eva tāvat nirākaroṣi

original: mī)ty abhiprāyeṇāha -- na hīti. yadi bhāvābhāvayor ekāntam abheda eva syāt tato bhāvendriyasannikarṣe tadabhinnasyābhāvasyāpi syāt,
analyzed: mā iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na hi iti yadi bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekāntam abhedaḥ eva syāt tatas bhāva indriya sannikarṣe tad abhinnasya abhāvasya api syāt

original: na tv evam asti. abhāvasyāpi rūpādivadatyantābhedābhāvād iti // 19 //
analyzed: na tu evam asti abhāvasya api rūpa ādi vat atyanta abheda abhāvāt iti

original: rūpāditulyatām evābhāvasya darśayati -- dharmayor iti. bhāvābhāvātmanor dharmayor
analyzed: rūpa ādi tulya tām eva abhāvasya darśayati dharmayoḥ iti bhāva abhāva ātmanoḥ dharmayoḥ

original: dharmyabhede 'pi sthite bhedo 'pīṣṭa ity arthaḥ. bhede kāraṇam āha -- udbhaveti.

original: bhāvābhāvayor apy u(?dbhavā /
analyzed: bhāva abhāvayoḥ api udbhavā

original: dbhūtā)bhibhūtayor grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavasthā dṛśyate. na caitad ekatve kalpite. na hy ekam eva tattvam udbhūtam abhibhūtaṃ ceti pratīyata iti
analyzed: dbhūta abhibhūtayoḥ grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā dṛśyate na ca etat eka tve kalpite na hi ekam eva tattvam udbhūtam abhibhūtam ca iti pratīyate iti

original: {3,202} idaṃ cānayor vivekakāraṇam ity āha -- idam eveti. akṣānapekṣatā cābhāvadhiyo vakṣyata iti // 21 //
analyzed: idam ca anayoḥ viveka kāraṇam iti āha idam eva iti akṣa anapekṣa tā ca abhāva dhiyaḥ vakṣyate iti

original: ayaṃ ca grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedo rūpādīnām iti kaiścid iṣyate. so 'nayor api
analyzed: ayam ca grāhaka bheda nibandhanaḥ bhedaḥ rūpa ādīnām iti kaiścid iṣyate saḥ nayoḥ api

original: śakyate 'vagantum ity āha -- rūpāder iti. evaṃ hi kecid vadanti -- yathā hy ekam
analyzed: śakyate vagantum iti āha rūpa ādeḥ iti evam hi kecid vadanti yathā hi ekam

original: eva mukhaṃ maratakapadmarāgādyupādhibhedād bhinnam iva pratibhāti,
analyzed: eva mukham marataka padmarāga ādi upādhi bhedāt bhinnam iva pratibhāti

original: yathā caika eva puruṣo 'pekṣābhedāt putrādibhedabhinna iva gṛhyate,
analyzed: yathā ca ekaḥ eva upekṣā bhedāt putra ādi bheda bhinnaḥ iva gṛhyate

original: yathaikam eva tattvaṃ śrotrādyupādhibhedād bhinnam iva pratibhāti,
analyzed: yathā ekam eva tattvam śrotra ādi upādhi bhedāt bhinnam iva pratibhāti

original: evam ihāpi bhāvābhāvayor aupādhiko bhedo bhaviṣyatīti. nanv evam aupādhike bhede tāttvikam ekatvaṃ prāpnoti. bhavatv asmin mate,
analyzed: evam iha api bhāva abhāvayoḥ aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti nanu evam aupādhike bhede tāttvikam ekatvam prāpnoti bhavatu asmin mate

original: tathāpi rūpādivyavasthā sidhyaty eveti // 22 //
analyzed: tathā api rūpa ādi vyavasthā sidhyati eva iti

original: idaṃ cānvāruhyavacanenāsmābhir uktam,
analyzed: idam ca anvāruhya vacanena asmābhiḥ uktam

original: na hi rūpādīnāṃ grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedaḥ,
analyzed: na hi rūpa ādīnām grāhaka bheda nibandhanaḥ bhedaḥ

original: kin tu buddhibhedanibandhana eva,
analyzed: kin tu buddhi bheda nibandhanaḥ eva

original: mukhaṃ hi pramāṇāntarād ekarūpam avagataṃ tadupādhibhedād bhidyata iti yuktam. na tv ekatve rūpādīnāṃ kiñcit pramāṇam asti,
analyzed: mukham hi pramāṇa antarāt eka rūpam avagatam tad upādhi bhedāt bhidyate iti yuktam na tu eka tve rūpa ādīnām kiñcid pramāṇam asti

original: nityam eva vailakṣaṇyāt. ayaṃ ca buddhibhedo bhedahetur bhāvābhāvayor api samāna evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- buddhimātreti. kaḥ punar ayaṃ bhāvābhāvātmako
analyzed: nityam eva vailakṣaṇyāt ayam ca buddhi bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ api samānaḥ eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha buddhi mātra iti kaḥ punar ayam bhāva abhāva ātmakaḥ

original: yaddharmau bhāvābhāvau,
analyzed: yad dharmau bhāva abhāvau

original: naikaṃ rūpādisamudāyād bhinnam upalabhyate,
analyzed: na ekam rūpa ādi samudāyāt bhinnam upalabhyate

original: vṛttyādivikalpākṣamatvāt. ato deśādyabhinnānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ samudāyo dharmī,
analyzed: vṛtti ādi vikalpa akṣama tvāt atas deśa ādi abhinnānām rūpa ādīnām samudāyaḥ dharmī

original: na tattvāntaram ata āha -- na ceti. nātra vana iva bādhikā buddhir astīti bhāvaḥ.
analyzed: na tattva antaram atas āha na ca iti na atra vane iva bādhikā buddhiḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: idaṃ ca savikalpakasiddhāv uktam apy abhāvāśrayasamarthanārtham atroktam ity apunaruktateti // 23 //
analyzed: idam ca savikalpaka siddhau uktam api abhāva āśraya samarthana artham atra uktam iti apunarukta tā iti

original: {3,203} evaṃ tāvadabhāvasya bhāvād bhedābhedau darśitau. tāv eva rūpādidṛṣṭāntena
analyzed: evam tāvat abhāvasya bhāvāt bheda abhedau darśitau tau eva rūpa ādi dṛṣṭāntena

original: draḍhayati -- sadguṇadravyeti. na hi rūpādayas sadādirūpeṇa na bhidyanta iti svarūpāpekṣayāpi
analyzed: draḍhayati sat guṇa dravya iti na hi rūpa ādayaḥ sat ādi rūpeṇa na bhidyante iti svarūpa apekṣayā api

original: teṣāṃ bhedaś śakyate vārayitum,
analyzed: teṣām bhedaḥ śakyate vārayitum

original: tathā vā bheda iti na sadādyātmanābhedaḥ pratikṣipyate. evam abhāvo 'pi bhāvadharmatayā tato bhinno 'pi svarūpāpekṣayābhinna iṣyate. dravyarūpeṇeti.  #
analyzed: tathā vā bhedaḥ iti na sat ādi ātmanā abhedaḥ pratikṣipyate evam abhāvaḥ pi bhāva dharmatayā tatas bhinnaḥ u pi svarūpa apekṣayā abhinnaḥ iṣyate dravya rūpeṇa iti

original: rūpādayo dravyād abhinnāḥ,
analyzed: rūpa ādayaḥ dravyāt abhinnāḥ

original: tac cābhinnam iti tadrūpeṇaiṣām abheda ity arthaḥ // 24 //
analyzed: tat ca abhinnam iti tad rūpeṇa eṣām abhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: svarūpāpekṣayā rūpādivad bhedānāśrayaṇe bhāvābhāvayor anyataratra na buddhes sadasadrūpatā bhaved ity āha -- yadīti // 25 //
analyzed: svarūpa apekṣayā rūpa ādi vat bheda anāśrayaṇe bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyataratra na buddheḥ sat asat rūpa tā bhavet iti āha yadi iti

original: asti tv asāv indriyasambandhāsambandhahetuko buddhibheda ity āha -- satsambandha iti. etena,
analyzed: asti tu asau indriya sambandha asambandha hetukaḥ buddhi bhedaḥ iti āha sat sambandhaḥ iti etena

original: yad āhuḥ -- na bhāvād bhedakam abhāvasya rūpam upalabhāmaha iti,
analyzed: yat āhuḥ na bhāvāt bhedakam abhāvasya rūpam upalabhāmahe iti

original: tannirākṛtam. sadasadrūpavivekād iti. yad indriyeṇa saṃyujyate bhūtalaṃ tad astīti pratīyate,
analyzed: tat nirākṛtam sat asat rūpa vivekāt iti yat indriyeṇa saṃyujyate bhū talam tat asti iti pratīyate

original: yan na sambadhyate ghaṭādi tannāstīti pratīyata iti // 26 //
analyzed: yat na sambadhyate ghaṭa ādi tat na asti iti pratīyate iti

original: nanv indriyavyāpārānantaram eveha ghaṭo nāstīti jñānam utpadyate,
analyzed: nanu indriya vyāpāra anantaram eva iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam utpadyate

original: tat kuto 'yaṃ viveko nendriyeṇābhāvabuddhir janyata iti. na hy asati tadvyāpāre bhāvabuddhivadabhāvabuddhir api jāyamānā dṛśyate. yady api  #
analyzed: tat kutas yam vivekaḥ na indriyeṇa abhāva buddhiḥ janyate iti na hi asati tad vyāpāre bhāva buddhi vat abhāva buddhiḥ api jāyamānā dṛśyate yadi api

original: bhāvād abhāvo bhidyate,
analyzed: bhāvāt abhāvaḥ bhidyate

original: tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena vā tadviśeṣaṇatayā vendriyasannikarṣo{3,
analyzed: tathā api tasya rūpa ādi vat saṃyukta samavāyena vā tad viśeṣaṇa tayā

original: 204}sty eva. atas tajjñānam aindriyakaṃ bhaved ata āha -- gṛhītveti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ
analyzed: eva atas tat jñānam aindriyakam bhavet atas āha gṛhītvā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ

original: -- nānāśrayo 'bhāvaḥ śakyate grahītum ity āśrayagrahaṇārtham evātrendriyāpekṣā nābhāvagrahaṇāya,
analyzed: nānā āśrayaḥ bhāvaḥ śakyate grahītum iti āśraya grahaṇa artham eva atra indriya apekṣā na abhāva grahaṇāya

original: yathā nāsmṛte pratiyoginy abhāvo gṛhyata iti tatsmaraṇārthaṃ prācīnajñānajanmanas saṃskārasyodbodho 'py apekṣitaḥ,
analyzed: yathā na asmṛte pratiyogini abhāvaḥ gṛhyate iti tad smaraṇa artham prācīna jñāna janmanaḥ saṃskārasya udbodhaḥ pi apekṣitaḥ

original: evam āśrayagrahaṇārtham indriyam. na ca prāptimātram aindriyakajñānajanmani kāraṇam. api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptir iti pratyakṣe varṇitam. na  #
analyzed: evam āśraya grahaṇa artham indriyam na ca prāpti mātram aindriyaka jñāna janmani kāraṇam api tu yogyatā sahitā prāptiḥ iti pratyakṣe varṇitam na

original: cendriyāṇām abhāvajñānajananayogyatā,
analyzed: ca indriyāṇām abhāva jñāna janana yogya tā

original: teṣv asatsv api tadbhāvād iti vakṣyate. mānasam iti ko 'rthaḥ. kiṃ sukhādijñānavanmanasā
analyzed: teṣu asatsu api tad bhāvāt iti vakṣyate mānasam iti kaḥ rthaḥ kim sukha ādi jñānavat manasā

original: janyata iti. yady evaṃ tathāpi pratyakṣataiva. na cāntar iva bahirmanasas svātantryam
analyzed: janyate iti yadi evam tathā api pratyakṣa tā eva na ca antar iva bahis manasaḥ svātantryam

original: asti. satyam. sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇas tu manaso vyāpāro 'tra kathitaḥ. kevalātmamanassannikarṣād
analyzed: asti satyam sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇaḥ tu manasaḥ kathitaḥ kevala ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt

original: eva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ity uktaṃ bhavati. gṛhītvā
analyzed: eva bāhya indriya anapekṣam pramāṇa abhāvena abhāva jñānam janyate iti uktam bhavati gṛhītvā

original: smṛtveti ca dharmadharmiṇor abhedāt samānakartṛkatvābhidhānam iti // 27 //
analyzed: smṛtvā iti ca dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedāt samāna kartṛkatva abhidhānam iti

original: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate bhāvagrahaṇam indriyāpekṣaṃ nābhāvagrahaṇam iti. samāno
analyzed: katham punar idam avagamyate bhāva grahaṇam indriya apekṣam na abhāva grahaṇam iti samānaḥ

original: hi tadbhāvabhāvaḥ. ata āha -- svarūpeti. yo hi gṛhasvarūpam evāvadhārya kvacidgataḥ
analyzed: hi tad bhāva bhāvaḥ atas āha svarūpa iti yaḥ hi gṛha svarūpam eva avadhārya kvacid gataḥ

original: pṛcchyate -- tatra caitro 'sti na veti,
analyzed: pṛcchyate tatra caitraḥ sti na vā iti

original: tadāsau pṛṣṭas tatra nāstitāṃ tadaiva pratipadyate. yadi tv indriyādhīnam abhāvajñānaṃ
analyzed: tadā asau pṛṣṭaḥ tatra nāstitām tadā eva pratipadyate yadi tu indriya adhīnam abhāva jñānam

original: bhavet nāsati tadvyāpāre jāyeta. na ca pūrvāvagatābhāvasmaraṇam eveti vācyam. na
analyzed: bhavet na asati tad vyāpāre jāyeta na ca pūrva avagata abhāva smaraṇam eva iti vācyam na

original: hy asati pratiyogismaraṇe bhāvo dṛśyate. na cāśrayagrahaṇakāle pratiyogismaraṇam
analyzed: hi asati pratiyogi smaraṇe bhāvaḥ dṛśyate na ca āśraya grahaṇa kāle pratiyogi smaraṇam

original: asti. bahūnām eva hi pṛṣṭenābhāvaḥ kathyate. na ca tāvatāṃ smaraṇaṃ tatrāsīd iti
analyzed: asti bahūnām eva hi pṛṣṭena abhāvaḥ kathyate na ca tāvatām smaraṇam tatra āsīt iti

original: cintayituṃ śakyate. yadi tūcyate sāmānyenābhāvo 'vagataḥ,
analyzed: cintayitum śakyate yadi tu ucyate sāmānyena abhāvaḥ vagataḥ

original: samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti,
analyzed: samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryate iti

original: tad ayuktam. na hy abhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyam asti,
analyzed: tat ayuktam na hi abhāva tvam nāma sāmānyam asti

original: viśeṣāṇām eva smṛtiviparivarttinām evābhāvo 'vasīyate. na ca sāmānyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti,
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām eva smṛti viparivarttinām eva abhāvaḥ vasīyate na ca sāmānyatas vagataḥ viśeṣeṇa smaryate iti

original: yuktam. pūrvānubhavāhitabhāvanābījā hi sā smṛtiḥ,
analyzed: yuktam pūrva anubhava āhita bhāvanā bījā hi sā smṛtiḥ

analyzed: na alpam avyatirekam gocarayitum utsahate atas tadānīm eva pratiyogi smaraṇa purassaram

original: indriyānapekṣam abhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharam idam. tad idam uktaṃ tadaiva pratipadyata
analyzed: indriya anapekṣam abhāva jñānam jāyate iti manoharam idam tat idam uktam tadā eva pratipadyata

original: iti. idaṃ ca pratyakṣaphalasmṛtinivṛttyā phalataḥ pratyakṣānavṛttir ity uktam eveti // 28 //
analyzed: iti idam ca pratyakṣa phala smṛti nivṛttyā phalataḥ pratyakṣa anavṛttiḥ iti uktam eva iti

original: {3,205} evaṃ tāvadakṣajatvam abhāvadhiyo nirākṛttam. idānīṃ laiṅgikatvaṃ nirākaroti -- na cāpy atreti. atra codayati -- bhāvāṃśeti.
analyzed: evam tāvat akṣa ja tvam abhāva dhiyaḥ nirākṛttam idānīm laiṅgika tvam nirākaroti na ca api atra iti atra codayati bhāva aṃśa iti

original: pariharati -- tadānīm iti matirantena. dvāv atra bhāvau pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhādhāraś ca,
analyzed: pariharati tadānīm iti matiḥ antena dvau atra bhāvau pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedha ādhāraḥ ca

original: tatra na tāvat pratiṣedhyo liṅgam,
analyzed: tatra na tāvat pratiṣedhyaḥ liṅgam

original: avagataṃ hi liṅgaṃ bhavati. na ca tadā ghaṭo gṛhyate,
analyzed: avagatam hi liṅgam bhavati na ca tadā ghaṭaḥ gṛhyate

original: na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyate. tad iha pratijñāhetvor virodhaḥ.
analyzed: na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāvaḥ grahītum śakyate tat iha pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ

original: sati bhāve tadabhāvo na pratijñātuṃ śakyate. satyāṃ tu pratijñāyāṃ nāsato 'dṛṣṭasya
analyzed: sati bhāve tad abhāvaḥ na pratijñātum śakyate satyām tu pratijñāyām na asataḥ dṛṣṭasya

original: liṅgatvam. ato nābhāve jighṛkṣitejighṛkṣitapratiṣedhyabhāvo liṅgam iti // 29 -- 30 //
analyzed: liṅga tvam atas na abhāve jighṛkṣita ijighṛkṣita pratiṣedhya bhāvaḥ liṅgam iti

original: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgam ata āha -- na caiṣa iti. eṣa iti paropasthitam aparokṣaṃ bhāvaṃ nirdiśati. yathārthe pakṣīkṛte padam  #
analyzed: astu tarhi pratiṣedha ādhāra bhāvaḥ liṅgam atas āha na ca eṣaḥ iti eṣaḥ iti para upasthitam aparokṣam bhāvam nirdiśati yathā arthe pakṣīkṛte padam

original: ataddharmatayā na hetur ity uktam,
analyzed: a tad dharma tayā na hetuḥ iti uktam

original: evam eṣo 'pi bhūtalabhāvo na ghaṭādyabhāvadharma iti. api cānvayādhīnātmalābham anumānajñānam,
analyzed: evam bhū tala bhāvaḥ na ghaṭa ādi abhāva dharmaḥ iti api ca anvaya adhīna ātma lābham anumāna jñānam

original: na ca bhūtalabhāvasya sarvair abhāvais sambandho jñāyate. tat kathaṃ tatas te pratyeṣyanta ity āha -- saheti // 31 //
analyzed: na ca bhū tala bhāvasya sarvaiḥ abhāvaiḥ sambandhaḥ jñāyate tat katham tatas te pratyeṣyante iti āha saha iti  /

original: astu tāvad abhāvānvayaḥ kvacid bhūtalādau bhāve,
analyzed: astu tāvat abhāva anvayaḥ kvacid bhū tala ādau bhāve

original: sadbhāvo 'pi yasya ghaṭādeḥ kadācit jñātaḥ tasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ity āha -- kvacid iti // 32 //
analyzed: sadbhāvaḥ pi yasya ghaṭa ādeḥ kadācid jñātaḥ tasya api tatra abhāvaḥ avagamyate iti āha kvacid iti

original: {3,206} na kevalaṃ yady atra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate,
analyzed: na kevalam yadi atra kadācid dṛṣṭam tanmātrasya tatra abhāvaḥ avagamyate

original: yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvas tasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ity āha -- yatreti // 33 //
analyzed: yasya api tu yatra abhāvaḥ na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ tasya api tatra abhāvaḥ vagamyate iti āha yatra iti

original: yadi tu yena kenacid ekenābhāvena gṛhītasambandhād bhāvād abhāvāntarānumānam iṣyate,
analyzed: yadi tu yena kenacid ekena abhāvena gṛhīta sambandhāt bhāvāt abhāva antara anumānam iṣyate

original: tato 'tiprasaktir ity āha -- kasyacid iti // 34 //
analyzed: ti prasaktiḥ iti āha kasyacid iti

original: na caivam astīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati -- gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naivābhāve 'nyavastunaḥ.
analyzed: na ca evam asti iti vyatirekeṇa darśayati gṛhīte ca bhāva aṃśe na eva abhāve

original: sarvasya matir ityantena. anaikāntikaś cāyaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvāntarair api sambandhāt.
analyzed: sarvasya matiḥ ityantena anaikāntikaḥ ca ayam bhāvaḥ bhāva antaraiḥ api sambandhāt

original: ato 'naikāntikatvād asya ghaṭāder abhāvaṃ gamayitum aliṅgatvam ity āha -- evaṃ vyabhicārād aliṅgateti // 35 //
analyzed: atas na aikāntika tvāt asya ghaṭa ādeḥ abhāvam gamayitum aliṅga tvam iti āha evam vyabhicārāt aliṅga tā iti  /

original: api ca sambandhagrahaṇaṃ sambandhigrahaṇādhīnam. tad ihābhāvākhye sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam ity āha -- sambandha iti
analyzed: api ca sambandha grahaṇam sambandhi grahaṇa adhīnam tat iha abhāva ākhye sambandhini grahītavye kim pramāṇam iti vaktavyam iti āha sambandhaḥ iti

original: na tāval liṅgam aviditasambandhaṃ tadavadhāraṇe pramāṇam,
analyzed: na tāvat liṅgam avidita sambandham tad avadhāraṇe pramāṇam

original: itaretarāśrayaṃ hi tathā syād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tadānīm iti. ato 'vaśyaṃ tadgrahaṇe pramāṇāntaram arthanīyam ity āha -- tatreti // 37 //
analyzed: itaretara āśrayam hi tathā syāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tadānīm iti atas vaśyam tad grahaṇe pramāṇa antaram arthanīyam iti āha tatra iti

original: {3,207} atredānīm anupalabdhiliṅgavādino bauddhasya pratyavasthānam āha -- pratyakṣāder iti. dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhair vibhajyante -- kāryaṃ  #
analyzed: atrā idānīm anupalabdhi liṅga vādinaḥ bauddhasya pratyavasthānam āha pratyakṣa ādeḥ iti dvedhā hi hetavaḥ bauddhaiḥ vibhajyante  kāryam

original: svabhāva iti,
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ iti

original: anupalabdhiś caikajñānasaṃsargiṇor ekopalabdhir eva,
analyzed: anupalabdhiḥ ca eka jñāna saṃsargiṇoḥ eka upalabdhiḥ eva

original: tasyāś ca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti jñānajñeyasvabhāvā. na hy asau svarūpam
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sva rūpam jñeya rūpam ca prakāśate iti jñāna jñeya svabhāvā na hi asau sva rūpam

original: iva jñeyasattām api vyabhicarati. tasyāś ca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa
analyzed: iva jñeya sattām api vyabhicarati tasyāḥ ca sva sādhyena na asti iti vikalpa śabda ātmaka vyavahāreṇa

original: tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyam eva pratibandhaḥ. na hy asau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati
analyzed: tad yogya tayā vā tādātmyam eva pratibandhaḥ na hi asau na asti iti vyavahāram vyabhicarati

original: śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām. tad evaṃ jñātapratibandhānupalabdhiḥ yo nāma bhrāmyan viviktadeśopalabdhāv
analyzed: śiṃśapā iva vṛkṣa tām tat evam jñāta pratibandha anupalabdhiḥ yaḥ nāma bhrāmyan vivikta deśa upalabdhau

original: api ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ vānumāpayati. evaṃ ca
analyzed: api ghaṭāya ghaṭate tam prati na asti iti vyavahāram tad yogyatām vā anumāpayati evam ca

original: ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaḥ -- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sad yatra nopalabhyate tat tatra
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi abhāva anupalabdhi prayogaḥ yat dṛśyam hi sat yatra na upalabhyate tat tatra

original: nāsti. nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti. etad api dūṣayati -- na
analyzed: na asti na upalabhyate ca upalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti etat api dūṣayati na

original: viśeṣaṇasambandhas tasyā iti. ya evānupalabdhyānumātum iṣyate ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ iti yaḥ eva anupalabdhyā anumātum iṣyate ghaṭa abhāvaḥ na asti iti

original: vyavahāras tadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhes sambandho 'vagataḥ,
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ tad yogya tā vā na ekena api viśeṣeṇa anupalabdheḥ sambandhaḥ vagataḥ

original: kathaṃ tato viśeṣānumānam. bhūtalopalabdhir hi sā,
analyzed: katham tatas viśeṣa anumānam bhū tala upalabdhiḥ hi sā

original: tasyāś ca nānāvidhānekaghaṭapaṭādiviṣayā nāstīti vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet. ghaṭānupalabdhir asau,
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca nānāvidha aneka ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣayā na asti iti vyavahārāḥ dṛśyante iti katham viśeṣeṇa ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vyavahārayet ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ asau

original: ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet. kas tasyā ghaṭena sambandhaḥ. deśopalabdhir hi sā,
analyzed: atas ghaṭa abhāvam tad vyavahāram vā prasādhayati iti ced kaḥ tasyāḥ ghaṭena sambandhaḥ deśa upalabdhiḥ hi sā

original: tāvad eva tasyā ghaṭānupalabdhitvam. tac ca sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭam iti katham ekenaiva
analyzed: tāvat eva tasyāḥ ghaṭa anupalabdhi tvam tat ca sarvān prati aviśiṣṭam iti katham ekena eva

original: vyapadiśyate na ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit. kasmāc ca saty api ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti
analyzed: vyapadiśyate na ced ghaṭa abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid kasmāt ca sati api ghaṭe ghaṭaḥ na asti iti

original: vyavahāro na pravartate. sadvyavahāravirodhād iti cet. kathaṃ ghaṭānupalabdhau sadvyavahāraḥ.
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ na pravartate sat vyavahāra virodhāt iti ced katham ghaṭa anupalabdhau sat vyavahāraḥ

original: asti hi tadānīm api deśopalabdhiḥ. viviktopalabdhir hi ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ,
analyzed: asti hi tadānīm api deśa upalabdhiḥ vivikta upalabdhiḥ hi ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ

original: nāsau ghaṭe satīti cet,
analyzed: na asau ghaṭe sati iti ced

original: ko vivekārtha iti. nanv ayam abhāva eva. tadabhāve 'narthakaṃ viviktavacanam,
analyzed: kaḥ viveka arthaḥ iti nanu ayam abhāvaḥ eva tad abhāve narthakam vivikta vacanam

original: ato 'nupalabdher ayam api viśeṣo dussādha eva,
analyzed: atas n upalabdheḥ ayam api viśeṣaḥ dussādhaḥ eva

original: yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti. yac cedaṃ ghaṭābhāvam atilaṅghya nāstīti
analyzed: yat asati ghaṭe na asti iti vyavahāraḥ na sati iti yat ca idam ghaṭa abhāvam atilaṅghya na asti iti

original: vyavahārānumānam avasthitaṃ tad api kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidmaḥ. so 'pi bhāvātirekī
analyzed: vyavahāra anumānam avasthitam tat api kena viśeṣeṇa iti na vidmaḥ bhāva atirekī

original: na kaścid upalabhyate. yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcid
analyzed: na kaścid upalabhyate yogyatā tad anatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhā eva iti na kiñcid

original: anumeyaṃ paśyāmaḥ. vārtikakāreṇa tv idam upekṣyaiva tāvad dūṣaṇāntaram
analyzed: anumeyam paśyāmaḥ vārtikakāreṇa tu idam upekṣya eva tāvat dūṣaṇa antaram

original: uktam iti // 38 //
analyzed: uktam iti

original: {3,208} abhāvasāmānyena tv anupalabdhes sambandhas sidhyaty eva,
analyzed: abhāva sāmānyena tu anupalabdheḥ sambandhaḥ sidhyati eva

original: na tv abhāvasāmānye pramāṇam upajāyata ity āha -- sāmānyeti. viśeṣās tv anaikāntikatayā nānupalabdhyā bodhayituṃ śakyanta ity āha -- vyabhicārād  #
analyzed: na tu abhāva sāmānye pramāṇam upajāyate iti āha sāmānya iti viśeṣāḥ tu anaikāntika tayā na anupalabdhyā bodhayitum śakyante iti āha vyabhicārāt
iti

original: api ca -- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgam anumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: api ca na anavagata rūpam liṅgam anumāne liṅgam bhavati

original: tad iyaṃ pratyakṣādyanutpattir abhāvatvād apareṇa liṅgenāvagantavyā. evaṃ hi vadanti,
analyzed: tat iyam pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ abhāva tvāt apareṇa liṅgena avagantavyā evam hi vadanti

original: yāvān kaścit pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvo 'nupalabdher eveti. evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta
analyzed: yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvaḥ nupalabdheḥ eva iti evam ca tatra tatra sadṛśa apara apara liṅga anusāreṇa anavasthā pāta

original: ity āha -- na ceti dvayena. etac copalabdhyabhāvo 'nupalabdhir ity āpādyoktam,
analyzed: iti āha na ca iti dvayena etat ca upalabdhi abhāvaḥ nupalabdhiḥ iti āpādya uktam

original: viviktetarapadārtho 'nupalabdhir iti tu pratyuktam iti // 40 -- 41 //
analyzed: vivikta itara padārthaḥ nupalabdhiḥ iti tu pratyuktam iti  /

original: evaṃ yo 'py asau liṅgirūpābhāvaḥ so 'pi sambandhagrahaṇārtham avaśyaṃ prathamam avagantavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam yaḥ u pi asau liṅgi rūpa abhāvaḥ saḥ u pi sambandha grahaṇa artham avaśyam prathamam avagantavyaḥ

original: tadavagame 'pi tadrūpāparaliṅgābhyupagamād anavasthaiva. ataḥ kvacid avaśyam anumānābhāvāt
analyzed: tad avagame pi tad rūpa apara liṅga abhyupagamāt anavasthā eva atas kvacid avaśyam anumāna abhāvāt

original: pramāṇāntaram abhyupagantavyam ity āha -- liṅgeti // 42 //
analyzed: pramāṇa antaram abhyupagantavyam iti āha liṅga iti

original: yadi tu nāstīti buddhir eva liṅgam ity ucyate tan na. phalaṃ hi sā,
analyzed: yadi tu na asti iti buddhiḥ eva liṅgam iti ucyate tat na phalam hi sā

original: pratyakṣādyanutpādasya kathaṃ talliṅgam,

original: tatsiddhyartham eva hi liṅgam iṣyate.{3,
analyzed: tad siddhi artham eva hi liṅgam

original: 209}siddhāyāṃ tu buddhau kiṃ liṅgena. tad etad āha -- neti. yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi
analyzed: tu buddhau kim liṅgena tat etat āha na iti yadi sā phalam kim tarhi

original: pramāṇam ata āha -- tasyaiveti. yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tad eva pratyakṣādyanutpatteḥ
analyzed: pramāṇam atas āha tasya eva iti yasya eva sā phalam tat eva pratyakṣa ādi anutpatteḥ

original: phalānantaryāt pramāṇam iti // 43 //
analyzed: phala ānantaryāt pramāṇam iti

original: kiñ ca saugatasamayasiddhānumānalakṣaṇagranthānusāreṇāpi na pratyakṣādyajanmano 'numānatvam
analyzed: kim ca saugata samaya siddha anumāna lakṣaṇa grantha anusāreṇa api na pratyakṣa ādya janmanaḥ numāna tvam

original: ity āha -- trilakṣaṇeti. evaṃ hi te paṭhanti. trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam iti.
analyzed: iti āha tri lakṣaṇa iti evam hi te paṭhanti tri rūpāt liṅgataḥ rtha dṛś anumānam iti

original: na cānutpattir utpatteḥ prāgabhāvo buddheḥ kenacij janyate,
analyzed: na ca anutpattiḥ utpatteḥ prāgabhāvaḥ buddheḥ kenacid janyate

original: prāg eva trilakṣaṇena hetuneti. nanu ca hetutayānupalabdhir anumānam iṣyate,
analyzed: prāk eva tri lakṣaṇena hetunā iti nanu ca hetu tayā anupalabdhiḥ anumānam iṣyate

original: na tv anumitir anumānam iti bhāvasādhanatayā. ataḥ kiṃ tannirāsena. satyam,
analyzed: na tu anumitiḥ anumānam iti bhāva sādhanatayā atas kim tad nirāsena satyam

original: ahetutayā tāvadanumānatvaṃ nirākṛtam eva. anena tu lakṣaṇānantaḥpāto varṇyata iti // 44 //

original: atra codayati -- (mānam iti)
analyzed: atra codayati mānam iti

original: pramāṇatā hi bhāvātmanā vyāptā pratyakṣādiṣv avagatā,
analyzed: pramāṇa tā hi bhāva ātmanā vyāptā pratyakṣa ādiṣu avagatā

original: tannivṛttyā nivartyata iti bhāvaḥ. itaras tu -- varṇito 'smābhiḥ prāgbhāvānām asaṅkaraś caturdhā. na ca tadbodhasya bhāvabodhavailakṣaṇyam
analyzed: tad nivṛttyā nivartyate iti bhāvaḥ itaraḥ tu smābhiḥ prāc bhāvānām asaṅkaraḥ caturdhā na ca tad bodhasya bhāva bodha vailakṣaṇyam

original: bādhavirahasāmānyāt. sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā. sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathaṃcit teṣu saṅgatā,
analyzed: bādha viraha sāmānyāt sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇam na bhāva svarūpa tā sā tu prāmāṇyam prati aprayojikā eva kathaṃcid teṣu saṅga tā

original: ato nābhāvatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati. bhāve tu prameye tadapramāṇam evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- prameyam iti. anurūpam evedaṃ yadabhāve 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇam  #
analyzed: atas na abhāva tvena aprāmāṇyam bhavati bhāve tu prameye tat apramāṇam eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha prameyam iti anurūpam eva idam yat abhāve bhāvaḥ pramāṇam

original: ity āha -- meya iti // 45 //
analyzed: iti āha meyaḥ iti

original: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā tadabhāve bhāva ity āha -- bhāvātmaka iti // 46 //
analyzed: yathā bhāva ātmake meye bhāvaḥ pramāṇam na anurūpam tathā tad abhāve bhāvaḥ iti āha bhāva ātmake iti

original: {3,210} na bhāvātmakam eva pramāṇam iti rājājñā,
analyzed: na bhāva ātmakam eva pramāṇam iti rājājñā

original: yad eva tu paricchedaphalaṃ tad eva tu pramāṇam,
analyzed: yat eva tu pariccheda phalam tat eva tu pramāṇam

original: tac ca pratyakṣādyajanmano 'pi samānam ity āha -- bhāvātmakasyeti // [47] //
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣa ādya janmanaḥ api samānam iti āha bhāva ātmakasya iti

original: syād etat -- vastuna eva prāmāṇyadarśanān nāvastuno 'nupalabdheḥ pramāṇatvam iti. tathā ca sati bauddhānām api liṅgaprameyatve na syātām,
analyzed: syāt etat vastunaḥ eva prāmāṇya darśanāt na avastunaḥ pramāṇa tvam iti tathā ca sati bauddhānām api liṅga prameya tve na syātām

original: te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ity āha -- yadīti sārdhena. anujñāne doṣam āha -- tathā satīti. na ca syād vyavahāro 'yam iti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto  #
analyzed: te hi na avastunaḥ dṛṣṭe iti āha yadi iti sārdhena anujñāne doṣam āha tathā sati iti na ca syāt vyavahāraḥ yam iti kāraṇa ādi vibhāgena uktaḥ

original: vyavahāra ity arthaḥ // 48 -- 49 //
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: apakṣadharmatvād api pratyakṣādyanutpattir na liṅgam ity āha -- pramāṇānām iti. nābhāve
analyzed: apakṣa dharma tvāt api pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ na liṅgam iti āha pramāṇānām iti na abhāve

original: pakṣīkṛte pratyakṣādyanutpattis taddharmatayāvagamyate. abhāvena sambandhābhāvād
analyzed: pakṣīkṛte pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ tad dharma tayā avagamyate abhāvena sambandha abhāvāt

original: ity abhiprāya iti. nanv abhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalaṃ sādhayiṣyāmaḥ,
analyzed: iti abhiprāyaḥ iti nanu abhāva viśiṣṭam bhū talam sādhayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tac ca pūrvam avagatam iti taddharmo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- yatreti. na hi bhūtale pratyakṣānutpattiḥ,
analyzed: tat ca pūrvam avagatam iti tad dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha yatra iti na hi bhū tale pratyakṣa anutpattiḥ

original: jñāyamānatvāt tasyeti // 50 //
analyzed: jñāyamāna tvāt tasya iti

original: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnām anutpatter ata āha -- ya iti. satyam. yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante taddharmatā  #
analyzed: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati tad gocare pratyakṣa ādīnām anutpatteḥ atas āha yaḥ iti satyam yatra pratyakṣa ādīni na utpadyante tad dharma tā

original: kathañcid bhaved api,
analyzed: kathañcid bhavet api

original: na tv asāv iha pramīyate. dharmadharmitvayor abhāvāt. na hi{3,

original: 211}taddharmiṇaṃ kṛtvābhāvaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tasyāpratīteḥ. nāpi tadviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalādi,
analyzed: kṛtvā abhāva viśiṣṭa tā sādhyate tasya apratīteḥ nā api tad viśiṣṭam bhū tala ādi

original: tadānīṃ tasya tatrābhāvād iti // 51 //
analyzed: tadānīm tasya tatra abhāvāt iti

original: abhāvasya tu sā dharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyāḥ. abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavaty eva. kin tu nāsañcetito 'bhāvo viṣayo bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: abhāvasya tu sā dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati tad viṣaya tvāt tasyāḥ abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgam bhavati eva kin tu na asañcetitaḥ bhāvaḥ viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: jñāte ca prameyābhāva ity āha -- abhāveneti // 52 //

original: yena taddharmatām anugamyānumānaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha -- saṃyoga iti. itaś cāpakṣadharmatvam
analyzed: yena tad dharma tām anugamya anumānam bhaviṣyati iti āha saṃyoge iti itas ca apakṣa dharma tvam

original: ity āha -- nāgṛhīta iti. na hy agṛhīte parvate dhūmas taddharmatayāvagamyate. atha
analyzed: iti āha na agṛhīte iti na hi agṛhīte parvate dhūmaḥ tad dharma tayā avagamyate atha

original: tadvadabhāvo 'pi prāk pratīyata ity ucyate,
analyzed: tadvat abhāvaḥ pi prāk pratīyate iti ucyate

analyzed: evam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām prasādhitam bhedam prayogeṇa darśayati abhāva śabda iti  /

original: prayogāntaram āha -- abhāvo 'pīti bhāvāntena. atas siddhaṃ bhāvātmakāt pramāṇād anyatvam abhāvasyety upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti // 55 //
analyzed: prayoga antaram āha abhāvaḥ pi iti bhāva antena atas siddham bhāva ātmakāt pramāṇāt anya tvam abhāvasya iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: vedopayogam abhāvasya darśayati -- karmāṇīti. yo 'yaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ phalāsaṅkaraḥ parasparāsaṅkaraś ca parasparam aṅgāṅgibhāvābhāvaḥ,
analyzed: veda upayogam abhāvasya darśayati karmāṇi iti yaḥ yam sarva karmaṇām phala asaṅkaraḥ paraspara asaṅkaraḥ ca parasparam aṅga aṅgi bhāva abhāvaḥ

original: nāsāv abhāvaprāmāṇyādṛte{3,
analyzed: na asau

original: yatheti. yāvat tāvad yathāvad iti.)
analyzed: yathā iti yāvat tāvat yathāvat iti

original: iheti. vedaṃ prati nirdeśa iti // 56 //
analyzed: iha iti vedam prati nirdeśaḥ iti

original: nanu ca vyāsamatānusāriṇopamānātiriktaṃ pramāṇadvayam upavarṇitam,
analyzed: nanu ca vyāsa mata anusāriṇā upamāna atiriktam pramāṇa dvayam upavarṇitam

original: ṛṣiṇā ca sambhavaitihyayor api pramāṇatvam āśritam,
analyzed: ṛṣiṇā ca sambhava aitihyayoḥ api pramāṇa tvam āśritam

original: tatparityāge kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ata āha -- yuktīti. pramāṇaṣaṭkam eva hi yuktyā saṅgacchate. āgamānugataś ca. āgamaś ca mīmāṃsātantram,
analyzed: tad parityāge kāraṇam vaktavyam atas āha yukti iti pramāṇa ṣaṭkam eva hi yuktyā saṅgacchate āgama anugataḥ ca āgamaḥ ca mīmāṃsā tantram

original: ato yuktyāgamābhyām iha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkam eva pravivicya tarkitam. yat tu dvayam adhikam iṣṭaṃ tad atraivāntargatam iti // 57 //
analyzed: atas yukti āgamābhyām iha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇa ṣaṭkam eva pravivicya tarkitam yat tu dvayam adhikam iṣṭam tat atra eva antargatam iti

original: (?kaḥ /kva) punas tasyāntargatir ata āha -- iha bhavatīti. yā tāvat sahasrācchate
