original: paśur iva yāge. ato vivakṣitam anayoḥ sāhityaṃ viśeṣaṇam ity aruṇaikahāyanyor ivānayor niyamaḥ sambandha iti. (?na tv e/
analyzed: paśuḥ iva yāge atas vivakṣitam anayoḥ sāhityam viśeṣaṇam iti aruṇa ekahāyanyoḥ iva anayoḥ niyamaḥ sambandhaḥ iti na tu eva

original: n ve)vam aruṇaikahāyanyoḥ śrūyamāṇayoḥ sāhityavivakṣā yuktā. samudāye hi tatra vākyaṃ samāpyate. (śabdārthau tu)
analyzed: n u evam aruṇa ekahāyanyoḥ śrūyamāṇayoḥ sāhitya vivakṣā yuktā samudāye hi tatra vākyam samāpyate śabda arthau tu

original: naiva pratītikriyā(yāṃ viśeṣa)
analyzed: na eva pratīti kriyāyām viśeṣa

original: ṇatayā śrutau,
analyzed: ṇa tayā śrutau

original: katham anayoḥ sāhityavivakṣā. na śrūyamāṇatā viśeṣaṇavivakṣāhetuḥ. api tu arthasaṃvyavahāro 'pi hi. pākādau yadaudanādisthālyādi ... (kriyā)
analyzed: katham anayoḥ sāhitya vivakṣā na śrūyamāṇa tā viśeṣaṇa vivakṣā hetuḥ api tu hi pāka ādau kriyā

original: vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitam apy arthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
analyzed: vyavahāra darśanāt anabhihitam api artham jānāti tadā sthālī ādīnām vivakṣitam sāhityam manyate

original: tathā manvānaḥ svayam api paktukāmas tat sarvam āharati. evam ihāpi bālaḥ prayojyavṛddhasya
analyzed: tathā manvānaḥ svayam api paktu kāmaḥ tat sarvam āharati evam iha api bālaḥ prayojya vṛddhasya

original: viśiṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhim anumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā śabdakāraṇatāṃ
analyzed: viśiṣṭa artha vyavahāra darśanena tad viṣayām buddhim anumāya śabda anantara bhāvi tayā śabda kāraṇatām

original: tāvadavadhārayati. vaktuś cāsyāṃ prayojyavṛddhapratipattau darśanapārārthyāt pradhānabhūtāyā(m upā)
analyzed: tāvat avadhārayati vaktuḥ ca asyām prayojya vṛddha pratipattau darśana pārārthyāt pradhāna bhūtāyām upā

original: dīyamānayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ sāhityaṃ vivakṣitam iti. evaṃ ca viditvā svayam api parārthaprayoge
analyzed: dīyamānayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ sāhityam vivakṣitam iti evam ca viditvā svayam api para artha prayoge

original: sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayam āveśitāv upādāya śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti
analyzed: sahitau śabda arthau hṛdayam āveśitau upādāya śabdam ca uccārya para pratipattim bhāvayati iti

original: sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvad iti // 12 -- 13 //
analyzed: sūktam sāhitya vivakṣā varṇa sāhitya vivakṣā vat iti

original: {3,226} nanv evaṃ vadatā śabdārthayoḥ kriyāsambandha eva darśitaḥ,
analyzed: nanu evam vadatā śabda arthayoḥ kriyā sambandhaḥ eva darśitaḥ

original: na parasparasambandhaḥ. tathā hi -- yat tāvad uktam abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi iti,
analyzed: na paraspara sambandhaḥ tathā hi yat tāvat uktam abhidhāna kriyāyām hi iti

original: anenābhidhānakriyāsambandha eva karmakaraṇādirūpeṇobhayor upavarṇitaḥ,
analyzed: anena abhidhāna kriyā sambandhaḥ eva karma karaṇa ādi rūpeṇa ubhayoḥ upavarṇitaḥ

original: na parasparasambandhaḥ. pratipattāv upādānād ity api pratipādyapratipādakatayā pratipattikriyāsambandhamātra eva darśitaḥ,
analyzed: na paraspara sambandhaḥ pratipattau upādānāt iti api pratipādya pratipādaka tayā pratipatti kriyā sambandha mātraḥ eva darśitaḥ

original: na parasparam,
analyzed: na parasparam

original: guṇapradhānabhāvam antareṇa sambandhāyogāt. vakṣyati hi -- guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād
analyzed: guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa sambandha ayogāt vakṣyati hi guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt

original: asambandhaḥ samatvāt iti. syād etat. kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ
analyzed: asambandhaḥ sama tvāt iti syāt etat kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvaka tvāt sarva sambandhānām

original: kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti. astu tāvat,
analyzed: kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ eva darśitaḥ iti astu tāvat

original: taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayoḥ sambandha iti vācyam eva. tad etat sarvam anubhāṣya
analyzed: tad uttara kāla bhāvī tu kaḥ nayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti vācyam eva tat etat sarvam anubhāṣya

original: pariharati -- tatreti tayorantena. asyārthaḥ -- yady api kārakāṇāṃ pradhānārthatvān
analyzed: pariharati tatra iti tayoḥ antena asya arthaḥ yadi api kārakāṇām pradhāna artha tvāt

original: na parasparasambandhaḥ,
analyzed: na paraspara sambandhaḥ

original: tathāpi pratipattyabhidhānayor yā kācit kriyā gṛhyate,
analyzed: tathā api pratipatti abhidhānayoḥ yā kācid kriyā gṛhyate

original: tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayor asti sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: tasyām ca kriyā kāraka sambandha uttara kāla bhāvī paraspara upakārya upakāraka lakṣaṇaḥ śabda arthayoḥ asti sambandhaḥ

original: tat punar idaṃ pūrvāparaviruddhaṃ pradeśāntaraviruddhaṃ ca. tathā hi -- atra tāvad ekasyāṃ kriyāyām upakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha  #
analyzed: tat punar idam pūrva apara viruddham pradeśa antara viruddham ca tathā hi atra tāvat ekasyām kriyāyām upakārya upakāraka tvam śabda arthayoḥ sambandha

original: ity uktam,
analyzed: iti uktam

original: pratipattāv upādānāt iti kriyānumānāṅgatvam eva parasparaniyamātmako darśitaḥ sambandhaḥ.
analyzed: pratipattau upādānāt iti kriyā anumāna aṅga tvam eva paraspara niyama ātmakaḥ darśitaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi iti ca karmatvakaraṇatve sambandha ity uktam. pradeśāntare śaktir
analyzed: abhidhāna kriyāyām hi iti ca karma tva karaṇa tve sambandhaḥ iti uktam pradeśa antare śaktiḥ

original: eva sambandha iti vakṣyati. kvacic ca śabdaśaktiniyamam eva sambandham āha --
analyzed: eva sambandhaḥ iti vakṣyati kvacid ca śabda śakti niyamam eva sambandham āha

original: vācyavācakaśaktyoś ca niyamaḥ phalalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vācya vācaka śaktyoḥ ca niyamaḥ phala lakṣaṇaḥ

original: iti bruvānaḥ. anyatrāpy uktam --
analyzed: iti bruvānaḥ anyatra api uktam

original: {3,227} ekābhidhānimittatvaṃ karmakartṛtvayoś ca yat /
analyzed: eka abhidhā nimitta tvam karma kartṛ tvayoḥ ca yat

original: yo vā karaṇakarmatvaniyamo 'bhidhayaikayā //
analyzed: yaḥ vā karaṇa karma tva niyamaḥ ubhidhayā ekayā

original: sa no 'rthaśabdasambandhaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ rtha śabda sambandhaḥ

original: iti. ato vivecanīyam idam -- ko 'tra sambandhaḥ śabdārthayor vārttikakārasyābhimata iti.
analyzed: iti atas vivecanīyam idam kaḥ tra sambandhaḥ śabda arthayoḥ vārttikakārasya abhimataḥ iti

original: atrocyate -- yathaikena krayakarmaṇā parigṛhītayor dravyaguṇayor itaretarākāṃkṣāparipūraṇena
analyzed: atrā ucyate yathā ekena kraya karmaṇā parigṛhītayoḥ dravya guṇayoḥ itaretara ākāṃkṣā paripūraṇena

original: parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ. na hy anāśritaḥ krayakriyām abhinirvartayati.
analyzed: paraspara upakārya upakāraka lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ na hi anāśritaḥ kraya kriyām abhinirvartayati

original: na dravyaṃ guṇaviśeṣānavacchinnam utsahate krayakriyāṃ nirvartayitum. na ca guṇena
analyzed: na dravyam guṇa viśeṣa anavacchinnam utsahate kraya kriyām nirvartayitum na ca guṇena

original: svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātram upādīyamānam api kraye gṛhyate, (svakīyago)
analyzed: sva mahimnā āśraya bhūta dravya mātram upādīyamānam api kraye gṛhyate svakīya go

original: dravyāvarodhāt. dravye(guṇamātrā)
analyzed: dravya avarodhāt

analyzed: vacchedāt tat guṇa mātram upādīyamānam api kraya kriyā na pratīcchati svakīya aruṇim

original: aguṇāvarodhāt. so 'yam artho niyamaḥ sampadyate. tad evam ihāpy ekārthapratipattyabhidhānakriyāsiddhyartham
analyzed: aguṇa avarodhāt saḥ yam arthaḥ niyamaḥ sampadyate tat evam iha api ekārtha pratipatti abhidhāna kriyā siddhi artham

original: upādīyamānayor vivakṣitasāhityayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī
analyzed: upādīyamānayoḥ vivakṣita sāhityayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ kriyā kāraka sambandha uttara kāla bhāvī

original: yo yam upakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ yam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ

original: sa eva sambandhaḥ.
analyzed: saḥ eva sambandhaḥ

original: kaḥ punar anayoḥ parasparopakāraḥ. śrūyatām -- artho hi na pratipādakam antareṇa pratipādyo bhavati,
analyzed: kaḥ punar anayoḥ paraspara upakāraḥ śrūyatām arthaḥ hi na pratipādakam antareṇa pratipādyaḥ bhavati

original: śabdo na pratipādyam antareṇa pratipādakaḥ. ataḥ pratipādyapratipādakatayāvatiṣṭhamānāv
analyzed: śabdaḥ na pratipādyam antareṇa pratipādakaḥ atas pratipādya pratipādaka tayā avatiṣṭhamānau

analyzed: anyonyasya upakāryā upakārakau bhavataḥ tat ca idam rūpam anayoḥ niyatam iti atyanta sannikarṣa mātreṇa

original: niyame sambandhābhidhānam,
analyzed: niyame sambandha abhidhānam

original: na tu niyama eva sambandhaḥ. śaktisambandhavādo 'pi cāta eva. vācyavācakaśaktyor
analyzed: na tu niyamaḥ eva sambandhaḥ ca atas eva vācya vācaka śaktyoḥ

original: eva hi satyor upakāryopakārakabhāvo bhavati. na tu śaktir eva sambandhaḥ. tad atra
analyzed: eva hi satyoḥ upakāryā upakāraka bhāvaḥ bhavati na tu śaktiḥ eva sambandhaḥ tat atra

original: pratyāsatter abhedopacāreṇa śaktiḥ sambandhaḥ,
niyamaḥ sambandhaḥ,
analyzed: niyamaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha ity evamādayaḥ samullāpāḥ. vastutas tūpakāryopakārakatvam eva sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: kartṛ tvam karaṇa tvam vā sambandhaḥ iti evamādayaḥ samullāpāḥ vastutas tu upakārya upakāraka tvam eva sambandhaḥ

original: kathaṃ punas tadrūpam anayor niyatam ity ucyate. na hy anuccarite śabde parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ śabdārthayor asti. na ca tadānīṃ tau  #
analyzed: katham punar tad rūpam anayoḥ niyatam iti ucyate na hi anuccarite śabde paraspara upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ śabda arthayoḥ asti na ca tadānīm tau

original: na staḥ,
analyzed: na staḥ

original: nityatvāt. tasmād asad etat. tan na. śaktyātmanā vidyamānatvāt{3,

original: 228} anuccarite 'pi hi śabde 'sti pratipādakaśaktiḥ,
analyzed: anuccarite pi hi śabde sti pratipādaka śaktiḥ

original: arthe ca pratipādyaśaktiḥ,
analyzed: arthe ca pratipādya śaktiḥ

original: ata eva sambandho nitya ity ucyate.
analyzed: atas eva sambandhaḥ nityaḥ iti ucyate

analyzed: nanu evam api kara hasta ādibhiḥ anekaiḥ śabdaiḥ ekatra arthe pratipādye aneka artha vacane

original: avadhāritam -- yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabdaḥ prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti. vivakṣā
analyzed: avadhāritam yadā yad artha vivakṣayā śabdaḥ prayujyate sa tasya arthaḥ iti vivakṣā

original: cārthaprakaraṇādivaśonneyā. gāmānaya dogdhum ity ukte arthād etad avagamyate sāsnādimatyasya
analyzed: ca artha prakaraṇa ādi vaśa unneyāḥ gām ānaya dogdhum iti ukte arthāt etat avagamyate sāsnādimatyasya

analyzed: vivakṣā iti yotsyāmi iti ukte

original: ṣau pratītir udeti. tad evam arthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnam anyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitam
analyzed: ṣau pratītiḥ udeti tat evam artha prakaraṇa ādi bheda bhinnam anyayā anyayā ca śaktyā upahitam

original: anyad anyac ca padam anyasyānyasya vācakam iti na padavyabhicāraḥ. artho 'pi codbhūtatatpadābhidhānayogyāvasthābhedabhinno
analyzed: anyat anyat ca padam anyasya anyasya vācakam iti na pada vyabhicāraḥ ca udbhūta tad pada abhidhāna yogya avasthā bheda bhinnaḥ

original: hastādir anyonyaś ca karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati. api caikasyāṃ
analyzed: hasta ādiḥ anyonyaḥ ca kara ādi padānām vācyaḥ iti na padam vyabhicarati api ca ekasyām

original: kriyāyām ayaṃ niyama ity uktaḥ. na caikasyāṃ pratipattāv abhidhāne vopādīyamānayoḥ
analyzed: kriyāyām ayam niyamaḥ iti uktaḥ na ca ekasyām pratipattau abhidhāne vā upādīyamānayoḥ

original: śabdārthayor anyonyavyabhicāro 'sti. tad idam uktaṃ hi niyamyete yad ekasyām iti // 14 -- 15 //
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ anyonya vyabhicāraḥ sti tat idam uktam hi niyamyete yat ekasyām iti

original: nanv evam ekakriyānimittako niyamaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha ity ucyamāne 'numānāṅgam avinābhāva evāśrito bhavet,
analyzed: nanu evam eka kriyā nimittakaḥ niyamaḥ śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti ucyamāne numāna aṅgam avinābhāvaḥ eva āśritaḥ bhavet

original: atas tadbalena dhūmādivāgnijñānaṃ śabdād arthajñānam upajāyamānam anumānaṃ syād ata
analyzed: atas tad balena dhūmāt iva agni jñānam śabdāt artha jñānam upajāyamānam anumānam syāt

original: āha -- na cāpīti. idaṃ ca śābde prasādhitam ity āha -- sādhitam iti. nanu yady avinābhāvo nopayujyate,
analyzed: āha na ca api iti idam ca śābde prasādhitam iti āha sādhitam iti nanu yadi avinābhāvaḥ na upayujyate

original: kas tarhy upayujyate. uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa -- saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ iti. nanu cāyam
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi upayujyate uktam bhāṣyakāreṇa saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ iti nanu ca ayam

original: api sambandho 'nupayogy eva. tad etad āśaṅkate -- saṃjñeti. tadaṅgaṃ gamakatvāṅgam ity arthaḥ // 16 //
analyzed: api sambandhaḥ nupayogi eva tat etat āśaṅkate saṃjñā iti tat aṅgam gamaka tva aṅgam iti arthaḥ

original: katham anaṅgam ata āha -- gamayantīti. vyavahāradarśanena{3,
analyzed: katham anaṅgam atas āha gamayanti iti

original: 229}gamayantī eṣā saṃjñā kalpyata iti. kim ato yady evam ata āha -- na caiṣeti. etad uktaṃ bhavati. gamakatvam eva saṃjñātvaṃ na tatsambandhāntaram  #
analyzed: eṣā saṃjñā kalpyate iti kim atas yadi evam atas āha na ca eṣā iti etat uktam bhavati gamaka tvam eva saṃjñā tvam na tad sambandha antaram

original: antareṇeti // 17 //
analyzed: antareṇa iti

original: yataś caivam ato dhūmāder iva gamakatvaṃ sambandhāntarapūrvakam eva paścādāpatitam
analyzed: yatas ca evam atas dhūma ādeḥ iva gamaka tvam sambandha antara pūrvakam eva paścāt āpatitam

original: ity āha -- tasmād iti. tattulyatve doṣam āha -- sānaṅgam iti. yathaivāvinābhāva eva
analyzed: iti āha tasmāt iti tad tulya tve doṣam āha sā anaṅgam iti yathā eva avinābhāve eva

original: dhūmādau pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi gamakatvam,
analyzed: dhūma ādau pratīti aṅgam na tad uttara kāla bhāvi gamaka tvam

original: evaṃ tatrāpi syād iti. dhūmādivaiṣamyeṇedānīṃ parihāram āha -- neyam iti // 18 //
analyzed: evam tatra api syāt iti dhūma ādi vaiṣamyeṇa idānīm parihāram āha na iyam iti

original: vaiṣamyam eva darśayati -- nirūpita iti. tatra hi dhūmādau mahānasādideśe 'gnyavinābhāvanirūpaṇottarakālaṃ
analyzed: vaiṣamyam eva darśayati nirūpitaḥ iti tatra hi dhūma ādau mahānasa ādi deśe gni avinābhāva nirūpaṇa uttara kālam

original: tatkṛtaivāsau gamakateti. api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ity āha --
analyzed: tad kṛtā evā asau gamaka tā iti api ca dhūme prathamam gamaka tvam na avagamyate iti āha

original: gamakatveneti // 19 //
analyzed: gamaka tvena iti

original: śabde tu viparītam ity āha -- iheti sārdhena // 20 //
analyzed: śabde tu viparītam iti āha iha iti sārdhena

original: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattir ity uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti -- kathayantīti trayeṇa. ayam arthaḥ -- tredhā hi śabde vyutpattiḥ,
analyzed: gamaka tvena eva śabde prathamam vyutpattiḥ iti uktam tat vivṛṇoti kathayanti iti trayeṇa ayam arthaḥ tredhā hi śabde vyutpattiḥ

original: vṛddopadeśāt tadvyavahārāt padāntarasamabhivyāhārād vā. sarvatra cātra gamakataivādāv avagamyate. tathā hi -- vṛddhopadeśe tāvad ayam asya  #
analyzed: vṛddha upadeśāt tad vyavahārāt pada antara samabhivyāhārāt vā sarvatra ca atra gamaka tā eva ādau avagamyate tathā hi vṛddha upadeśe tāvat ayam asya

original: vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka{3,

analyzed: atas na prakāśakaḥ iti tat ca nā evam

original: śaktivailakṣaṇyāt. vicitraśaktayo 'pi hi bhāvāḥ. tatpradīpaḥ pratyakṣaparikaratayāgṛhītasambandho
analyzed: śakti vailakṣaṇyāt vicitra śaktayaḥ pi hi bhāvāḥ tad pradīpaḥ pratyakṣa parikara tayā a gṛhīta sambandhaḥ

original: 'pi prakāśayatu nāma. naitāvatā śabdenāpi taddharmeṇa bhavitavyam. ato 'yam aparyanuyogaḥ.
analyzed: prakāśayatu nāma na etāvatā śabdena api tad dharmeṇa bhavitavyam atas yam a paryanuyogaḥ

original: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛhītasvarūpā api kāryam ārabhanta eveti śabde taddharmaḥ kiṃ
analyzed: api ca vrīhi ādayaḥ gṛhīta sva rūpāḥ api kāryam ārabhante eva iti śabde tad dharmaḥ kim

original: nāropyate. kārakahetavo hi vrīhyādayaḥ,
analyzed: na āropyate kāraka hetavaḥ hi vrīhi ādayaḥ

original: śabdas tu jñāpakahetuḥ. ato 'pekṣate svarūpagrahaṇam iti cet. kena vedam ājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇam apekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇam
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu jñāpaka hetuḥ pekṣate sva rūpa grahaṇam iti ced kena vā idam ājñāpitam jñāpakena sva rūpa grahaṇam apekṣitavyam na sambandha grahaṇam

original: darśanabaleneti ceti,
analyzed: darśana balena iti ca iti

original: samānam idaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣāyām{3,
analyzed: samānam idam

original: darśanabalād eva hi liṅgaśabdādayo jñāpakaviśeṣās sambandhagrahaṇam apekṣante. na cakṣurādayaḥ. sarvatra hi no darśanaṃ pramāṇam. kārakāś cakṣurādaya  #
analyzed: darśana balāt eva hi liṅga śabda ādayaḥ jñāpaka viśeṣāḥ sambandha grahaṇam apekṣante na cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ sarvatra hi no darśanam pramāṇam kārakāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ

original: iti nānumanyāmahe,
analyzed: iti na anumanyāmahe

original: jñānakāraṇasyaiva jñāpakatvāt,
analyzed: jñāna kāraṇasya eva jñāpaka tvāt

original: tad etad āha -- svarūpeti // 35 //
analyzed: tat etat āha svarūpa iti

original: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāg apy abhidhāne śabdaś śakto na vā. yadi śaktaḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca sambandha grahaṇāt prāk api abhidhāne śabdaḥ śaktaḥ na vā yadi śaktaḥ

original: kiṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣayā. na cet sambandhagrahaṇam eta hi tadāgamanyāyena kāraṇam āpadyeta,
analyzed: kim sambandha grahaṇa apekṣayā na ced sambandha grahaṇam hi tad āgama nyāyena kāraṇam āpadyeta

original: ata āha -- yatsādhakatameti. na tāvat sambandhagrahaṇāt pūrvam aśaktam eva śabdam avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śaktasyānugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ viha(?ratī/ntī)ti
analyzed: atas āha yat sādhakatamā iti na tāvat sambandha grahaṇāt pūrvam aśaktam eva śabdam avagacchāmaḥ na ca śaktasya anugrāhaka apekṣā sva śaktim viharati inti iti

original: kiṃ punar na vihanty ata āha -- na hīti. yadi hy anugrāhakāpekṣā svaśāktiṃ vihanyāt
analyzed: kim punar na vihanti atas āha na hi iti yadi hi anugrāhaka apekṣā sva śāktim vihanyāt

original: sarvam eva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāta. apekṣate hi sarvam eva karaṇam
analyzed: sarvam eva laukikam vaidikam karaṇam karaṇa tām jahyāta apekṣate hi sarvam eva karaṇam

original: itikartavyatājanitam anugraham iti // 37 //
analyzed: itikartavya tā janitam anugraham iti

original: kiñ ca -- astu tāvad itikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti,
analyzed: kim ca astu tāvat itikartavya tā apekṣā karaṇa bhāvam na vihanti iti

original: pratyuta tayāpi naiva karaṇatvaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: pratyuta tayā api nā eva karaṇa tvam nā asti

original: pratikaraṇasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣāniyamādity āha -- pratyātmeti. nanv evam ubhayasamavadhānam evāntareṇa kāryāniṣpatteḥ kathaṃ karaṇetikartavyatāvibhāgo
analyzed: prati karaṇa svarūpam tad apekṣā niyamāt iti āha pratyātma iti nanu evam ubhaya samavadhānam eva antareṇa kārya aniṣpatteḥ katham karaṇa iti kartavya tā vibhāgaḥ

original: ata āha -- bāhyāntareti nāntena. yatkāryasiddhau sannihitaṃ tatkaraṇam itarad bāhyam itikartavyateti,
analyzed: atas āha bāhya antara iti na antena yat kārya siddhau sannihitam tat karaṇam itarat bāhyam itikartavya tā iti

original: bāhyam api kvacid vivakṣātaḥ kārakapravṛtteḥ karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ity āha -- kvacit syād veti // 38 //
analyzed: bāhyam api kvacid vivakṣātaḥ kāraka pravṛtteḥ karaṇatayā vivakṣyate iti āha kvacid syāt vā iti

original: {3,236} etad eva darśayati -- udvigna iti. jñānotpattāv antaraṅgam api cakṣur na karaṇatayā manyate,
analyzed: etat eva darśayati udvignaḥ iti jñāna utpattau antaraṅgam api cakṣuḥ na karaṇatayā manyate

original: kin tu kutaścit tāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyam eva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti // 39 //
analyzed: kin tu kutaścid tāratamya viśeṣāt bāhyam eva pradīpam karaṇatayā vivakṣati iti

original: sa cāyaṃ vivakṣānibandhaḥ karaṇabhāvaḥ kādācitkaḥ. nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau
analyzed: sa ca ayam vivakṣā nibandhaḥ karaṇa bhāvaḥ kādācitkaḥ nitya vṛttau nityam tu kārya siddhau

original: āntarasya cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvam avagamyata ity āha -- nityavṛttāv iti. andhānāṃ dṛṣṭir
analyzed: āntarasya cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa tvam avagamyate iti āha nitya vṛttau iti andhānām dṛṣṭiḥ

original: darśanaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ // 40 //
analyzed: darśanam na asti iti arthaḥ

original: nanv astu vijñānakāryāsattiviśeṣaṇāt pradīpādyapekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: nanu astu vijñāna kārya āsatti viśeṣaṇāt pradīpa ādi apekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa bhāvaḥ

original: ātmamanassaṃyogas tu jñānotpattāv atyantam āsannaḥ,
analyzed: ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ tu jñāna utpattau atyantam āsannaḥ

original: ataḥ kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- śarīreti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nāsattiviśeṣa eva karaṇatve kāraṇam,
analyzed: atas katham tad apekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa tvam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha śarīra iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na āsatti viśeṣaḥ eva karaṇa tve kāraṇam

original: api tarhi bāhyapradīpādyapekṣayāsattiḥ,
analyzed: api tarhi bāhya pradīpa ādi apekṣayā āsattiḥ

original: ābhyantarātmamanassaṃyogāpekṣayā tv asādhāraṇyam,
analyzed: ābhyantara ātma manaḥ saṃyoga apekṣayā tu asādhāraṇyam

original: ātmamanassaṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇam iti
analyzed: ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ hi rasa ādi jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ na avyabhicāri tayā rūpa darśana kāraṇam iti

original: śakyate 'vagantum. cakṣuṣaḥ punarasādharaṇatayaiva rūpajñāne kāraṇatvam iti cakṣūrūpādibhedas
analyzed: śakyate vagantum cakṣuṣaḥ punar asādharaṇa tayā eva rūpa jñāne kāraṇa tvam iti cakṣuḥ rūpa ādi bhedaḥ

original: tu ity atroktam iti // 41 //
analyzed: tu iti atra uktam iti

original: tad evaṃ dṛṣṭānte vivakṣāsannikarṣaviśeṣakṛtakaraṇetikartavyatāvibhāgaṃ darśayitvā
analyzed: tat evam dṛṣṭānte vivakṣā sannikarṣa viśeṣa kṛta karaṇa iti kartavya tā vibhāgam darśayitvā

original: prakṛte yojayati -- tathaiveti. anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇam eva kāraṇam
analyzed: prakṛte yojayati tathā eva iti anena yat tad āgama nyāyena sambandha grahaṇam eva kāraṇam

original: āpadyetety uktaṃ tad api vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstv iti darśitam iti // 42 //
analyzed: āpadyeta iti uktam tat api vivakṣā viśeṣa vaśena astu iti darśitam iti

original: aparam api -- yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ,
analyzed: aparam api yathā cakṣuḥ draṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā ityādi parihāra bhāṣyam

original: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- yatheti. cakṣur hi pradīpādyupāyāntarāpekṣam{3,
analyzed: tasya abhiprāyam āha yathā iti cakṣuḥ hi

original: 237}api rūpaprakāśane svabhāvataś śaktam ity anaikāntiko hetuḥ. dṛṣṭānto 'pi sādhyavikala ity āha -- devadatteti // 43 //
analyzed: rūpa prakāśane svabhāvataḥ śaktam iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha devadatta iti  /

original: yadṛcchāśabdānām api jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānam eva niyogenābhivyajyata ity adhyāsavāde
analyzed: yadṛcchā śabdānām api jñāna sāmarthyam vidyamānam eva niyogena abhivyajyate iti adhyāsa vāde

original: varṇitam. atra ca yathā cakṣur iti bhāṣye cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇabhāvo darśitaḥ. kathaṃ punas
analyzed: varṇitam atra ca yathā cakṣuḥ iti bhāṣye cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa bhāvaḥ darśitaḥ katham punar

original: tulye 'pi cakṣuḥpradīpayor jñānakāraṇatve cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvam ity atropapattim āha
analyzed: tulye pi cakṣuḥ pradīpayoḥ jñāna kāraṇa tve cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa tvam iti atra upapattim āha

original: -- prakāśa iti. idaṃ ca nityavṛttau ity atroktam apy adhunā bhāṣyasamarthanārtham
analyzed: prakāśaḥ iti idam ca nitya vṛttau iti atra uktam api adhunā bhāṣya samarthana artham

original: uktam ity apaunaruktyam iti // 44 //
analyzed: uktam iti apaunaruktyam iti

original: tad evam upapāditas saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣiptaḥ -- yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakas tarhi iti,
analyzed: tat evam upapāditaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ kṛtaka tvena bhāṣyakṛtā ākṣiptaḥ yadi prathama śrutaḥ na pratyāyayati kṛtakaḥ tarhi iti

original: tad etadvārtikakāro darśayati -- puruṣeti. evaṃ cātra prayogaḥ -- yaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ sa kṛtakaḥ,
analyzed: tat etat vārtikakāraḥ darśayati puruṣa iti evam ca atra prayogaḥ yaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ sa kṛtakaḥ

original: puruṣāpekṣatvāt,
analyzed: puruṣa apekṣa tvāt

original: rajjughaṭasaṃyogavad iti // 45 //
analyzed: rajju ghaṭa saṃyoga vat iti

original: aparam api[731]svābhāvato hy asambandhāv etau śabdārthau ityādi bhāṣyaṃ,
analyzed: aparam hi asambandhau etau śabda arthau ityādi bhāṣyam

original: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- bhinneti. ayam arthaḥ -- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: tasya abhiprāyam āha bhinna iti ayam arthaḥ yathā rajju sarpa ādiṣu bhinna deśa kāla adhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśa ādi samam na asti

original: evaṃ tayoś śabdārthayoḥ. atas tadvad eva tāv api svabhāvato 'sambandhāv iti. īdṛśī cātra prayogaracanāśabdārthau svabhāvato 'saṅgatau,
analyzed: evam tayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ atas tadvat eva tau api svabhāvataḥ sambandhau iti īdṛśī ca atra prayoga racanā śabda arthau

original: asamadeśakālatvāt,
analyzed: a sama deśa kāla tvāt

original: rajjvādivat. tāv eva na samadeśakālau,
analyzed: rajju ādi vat tau eva na sama deśa kālau

original: bhinnadeśādyadhiṣṭhānopalambhāt,
analyzed: bhinna deśa ādi adhiṣṭhāna upalambhāt

original: tadvad eveti // 46 //
analyzed: tadvat eva iti

original: [731] svarūpato 'sambandhāv api tāv artha abdau iti kāśikāmātṛkāyāṃ pāṭhaḥ.
analyzed: sambandhau api tau iti kāśikā mātṛkāyām pāṭhaḥ

original: ity upādhyāyasucaritamiśrakṛtau saṃbandhākṣepas samāptaḥ //
analyzed: iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau saṃbandha ākṣepaḥ samāptaḥ
